Muchi ling lah a chu ho chu Pathen Thu ja a ahia tu hinlai vannoi lung gimna ho le haona ngaichatna ho jeh in gaso louvin aum jitai.
Muchi lei phatnaa chuho vang thu chu atahbeh a ja a chule hetchetna nei ahiuvin, chule amaho chun ajat som thum, ajat som gup chule ajat jakhat ahinsodoh e!” ati.
Jesun thusim jatchom khat hichea hin aseiye: “Van gam chu loubol mi khat in alouva muchi pha athea toh tekah thei ahi.
Hinlah chuche jan chun natong ho aihmut pat un, melmapa chu ahungin chuin changtah lah a chun changlhem ahungthen, achemangtai.
Changphung ahung khanlhit phatnin, aga jong ahung um'in chule changlhem jong chu ahung khang lenin ahi.
Loubolpa natong ho akoma agacheuvin, chuin ajah a, ‘Hepu louva muchipha nathe na'a khun changlhem akeh dimset in, hoiya kon iti hung um hintem?’ atiuve.
‘Melma khat'in abol hichu’ tin loubolpa chun ahin phongdoh tai. ‘Changlhem ho kaga bodoh dingu ham?’ tin adonguve.
“Ahipoi, chutia nabol uleh changtah bodoh tha get nuvin-nate.
A-at phat lhin kah in khantha jengu hen. Chuteng keiman chang at ho jah'a changlhem chu lhengdoh unlang, kan khomun chule meiya halvamun, chule changtah chu changkul'a khumuvin tina-nge” ati.
Hichea hin vetsahna chomkhat Jesun amange: “Van Lenggam chu ankam mu louva kithe tobang ahi.
Muchi jouse lah a aneopen ahi, hinlah hon a kitu lah a aphung lenpen ahung hitan, ahungkhang len in, thingphung ahung kisoh in, chule vacha ho ahungun chuin abah hoa abu akiset uvin ahi,” ati.
Jesun hiche thulem jong hi aseiyin: “Van gam hi numei khat'in changlhah semna dinga chol aman tobang ahi. Ama hin chol neocha chu chang bong tetohna thum'a akoi jeng vang'in, changbong chu apumpin apomsah soh hel in ahi.” ati.
Jesun mihonpi lah a thu aseina'a thusimle thulem hitobang ho hi amangcha jing in ahi. Ahimong in hitobang thulem mang cha louvin amaho koma thu asei jipoi.
Hiche hi Pathen in Themgao kam'a anaseisa: “Keiman nakom uva thulema kaseiding, Keiman vannoi kisem kipat apat thuguh kisel kahilchet peh ding ahi,” ti aguilhunna ahi.
Chuin mihonpi chu polama adalhan, Jesu chu insung agalut in ahileh aseijuiten, “Changlhem loulaiya um thulem chu nei hilchet peh un,” atiuve.
Jesun adonbut in, “Loubolpa, muchipha the a-chu Mihem Chapa ahi.
Lou chu vannoi leiset ahi, chule muchipha chu Lenggam mite ahiuve. Changlhem chu agiloupa mite ho ahiuve.
Melma changlhem changtah lah a thepa chu Diabol ahi. Chang at phat chu vannoi kichaina phat ahi, chule chang at ho chu Vantilte ho ahiuve.”
“Changlhem ho lhendoh a aum'uva chule meiya akigo banga chu, vannoi kichaini jongleh chuti ding ahi.
Mihem Chapa chun a-Vantilte ahinsol ding, chule amaho chun Lenggama kon chonset hin umdohsah ho le thilse bol jouse asuhmang dingu ahi.
Chule Vantil ho chun amaho chu meikou jejua chu alelut dingu, hichea chu kana chule hagelna umding ahi.
Chuteng michonpha ho chengse a Pau Lenggam sunga nisa tobanga vahding ahiuve. Thungaina ding nakol neiya chun ngaiyu hen chule heuhen!”
“Van'a Lenggam chu mi khat in loulaiya gou kiselguh amudoh tobang ahi. Kipah thanom pum'in aselkit'in chule anei jouse chu ajoh doh in asumnei sun chun lou chu achotai.”
“Chujongleh Van'a Lenggam chu kivei mi khat in twikoh chang manlutah ahol tobang ahi.
Aman twikoh chang man lutah chu amudoh phat in anei jouse ajoh doh in, chule lou chu achotai.”
“Chule Van'a Lenggam chu nga matna len twi lah'a kiseplha a chule nga jouse man tobang ahi.
Len chu adimset phat in, hichu vapama aloidoh uvin, atou khomun chule nga aphaho chu aboma akoiyun, hinlah aphalou ho chu apai mang tauve.
Vannoi kichaini jongleh chuti ding ahi. Vantil ho hunguvin tin michonpha hoa konna mi gilou ho ahin chom khendoh dingu ahi.
Miphalou ho chu mei deujeju sunga chun lehlut uvintin, hichea chu kana le hagelna umding ahi.”
Hiche hohi aboncha nahet nah uvem? atileh amahon “Henge,” atiuve.
Chujouvin aman aseiben, “Van'a Lenggama Hou thuhila pang seijui hung hi ho hi, in neipan aneikholna muna kona Thutah gou alui le athah ahin pohdoh tobang ahi,” ati.
Hiche thusimho le vetsahna ho ahil jouvin, aman chuche gam chu adalhan,
Achenna khopi Nazareth lama ahung kiletai. Aman amaho hou kikhopna in'a thu ahil pet'in amitakip in adatmo uvin chule aseiyun, “Hoiya kona hiche chihna le thil kidang boltheina hoiya thaneina akilah ahidem?” tin asei-uve.
Amahon anoisebol uvin, “Ama thing thembol chapa ahi, anu Mary le asopi pasal ho—Jacob, Joseph, Simon le Judah abonun ihecheh uve.
Asopi numeiho jouse jong ilah uva aumcheh uvin. Hiche ho jouse hi hoiya kona akihetdoh hintem?” atiuvin ahi.
Chuin amaho chu hatah in alung-lhalheh uvin, chule Ama atahsan nomta pouve. Chuphat in Jesun amaho aseipeh in, “Themgao chu ama insung le akhopia mite lah tilouvin mun jousea jabolna achange,” ati.
Chuin amahon atahsan lou jeh uvin thil kidang themkhat bou aboltai.
Galilee vaipopa Herod Antipas hin Jesu thu ajah phatnin.
Aman asemang ho koma chun, “Hiche hi Twilutsah John athia thoudoh kit'a hitei inte! Hijeh'a hi hitobang thil kidang hohi aboldoh ahi,” ati.
Ajeh chu Herod'in John chu ajinu Herodias (Herod naopa Philip ji anahi) lung holna'a amat'a songkul'a ahen ahi.
John chun Herod jah'a “Amanu na kichenpi hi Pathen Danthutoh kikal ahi,” atipeh jing anahi.
Herod chun John chu atha nom ahin, hinlah mipin adoudiu chu kicha'a ahi, ajeh chu mi jousen John chu Themgao khat ahi tia atahsan'u ahi.
Hinlah Herod in apen nikhoa golnop abol nauva, Herodias chanu alam chun ama alunglhai lheh jeng in.
Hijeh chun amanu hin adei chan ipi hijongleh pedinga Herod in kitepna anei ahi.
Anu ngeh dungjuiyin, “Nungahnu chun, keiman Twilutsah John luchang chu lheng konga kadeiye,” atitai.
Chuphat in lengpan thu-asei chu akisih in, hinlah jin gunho masanga akitepna ahijeh chun, aman aki-ngehna bang chun bol dingin asoltai.
Hiti chun Twilutsah John chu songkul'a alu atantai.
Chuin alu chu konga ahung kidomin chule nungahnu chu apen, ama chun anu apetai.
Khonungin, John seijui ho chu ahungun atahsa chu ahung lauvin chule avui-tauve. Chutah in amaho agacheuvin chuin Jesu jah'a ipi soh a ham ahung hil tauve.
Jesun thusoh chu ajah jah in, Ama munchom beh a konga agachen, achanga aga-umtai. Hinlah mipi chun hoilama chea ahi aheuvin, chuin khopi tin'a konin Ama chu akengin ajui tauve.
Jesu chu konga kona ahung kumlhah a ahileh mihonpi chu amun, chule Aman amaho chu akhoton chule anatnau adamsahtai.
Hiche nilhah chun seijui ho ahungun chule aseiyun, “Hichelai mun hi mun ningkoi ahin chule phat hi geisanga ahitai. Nangman mihonpi hi soldohtan, amaho acheuva khotin'a anehdiu akichoh theina ding un,” atiuvin ahi.
Hinlah Jesun aseiyin, “Hichu hithei ponte, nanghon neh ding peuvin,” ati.
Amahon adonbut uvin, “keihon changlhah pheng nga le nga ni bou kaneiyuve,” atiuvin ahi.
Jesun aseiyin “Hichu hinchoiyun,” ati.
Chutah in aman miho chu phoilah'a tou dingin aseipehtai. Jesun changlhah pheng nga le nga ni chu alan vanlam aven, chule phatthei abohtai. Chuin aman changlhah alan, ahehbal balin, aseijuiteho apen, amaho chun mihonpi chu apeuve.
Amahon angaichat chanun aneovin, aval chu seijuihon paipeh som le ni alohdoh uve.
Chuche nikho chun pasal cheh mi sang nga chun ane vaset uvin, numei le chapang ho jong ajao-thauvin ahi.
Hiche jou chun Aman miho chu ain uva asollaiyin, aseijuite chu konga lut'a chule Dil gal langkhatna anagalkai ding in asolin ahi.
Amaho ainuva asoldoh jouvin, ama mol chunga atao dingin akaldoh in ahi. Jan ahung hitan, Ama achangseh'in mola aum tai.
Hipet chun, seijuiho chun hahsatna atoh un, tolgo laiya kona gamlatah geiyuva ahitauvin, hui hattah ahung nungin, chule amaho chun twipi kinong hattah chu akimaito piuvin ahi.
Jingkah pung thum donin Jesu amaho heng lama ahungin, twi chunga lam ajot in ahi.
Seijuihon Ama twi chunga lam ahinjot chu amuvin ahileh akicha lheh jeng uve. Akichat jeh'un amaho apeng uvin: “Lhadam ahi,” atiuve.
Hinlah Jesun ahin hou paiyin, “Kicha hih un. Lungmong tah in umun. Hia ka um nai,” ati.
Chuphat in Peter in Ama ahin houvin, “Pakai, Nangma nahi monga ahileh, nahenga twi chunga lam kahin jotna dingin neihin seipeh in,” ati.
Jesun, “Henge, hungin” ati. Hiti chun Peter chu kong panga akumlhan chule Jesu lam jonin twi chunga lam ajot tai.
Hinlah Peter in hui hattah nungle twipi kinong amu phat in akichan chule lhalhum dingin aumtai. Chuin aman asamin, “Pakai, neihuhhing in,” ati.
Apettah chun Jesun akhut alhangin chule ama chu amanin, “Natahsan aneo behseh'e, ipi dinga nei sonlel ham?” ati.
Amani kong sunga alutlhon phat in, huipi athip heltai.
Chuphat in seijuiho ahung un, Ama a-Hou tauve. Amahon, “Nangma Pathen Chapa tahbeh nahi monge,” atiuve.
Amaho Dillen chu agalkaiyun, Gennesaret alhung tauve.
Miho chun Jesu ahi ahet phatnun, agamkai pumpia chun ama hunglhun chu akisei thang sohtai, chule chomkah louvin miho chun ana-damlou aneihou chu aboldam dingin abonchan ahin pui tauve.
Amaho chun apon mongkai beh atham dinguvin angeh uvin, chule Ama thamkha jouse adam tauve.
Pharisee ho le Houdan thuhil ho phabep chu Jerusalema konin Jesu kimupi din ahung lhungpai tauve.
Amahon Ama adongun, “Iti dana naseijui hon chondan luipeh ajuilou'u ham? Ajeh chu amahon neh khom masanga khutsop chonna isahlouva akoiyu ham?” atiuve.
Jesun adonbut in, “Achutileh nanghon iti danna Pathen in Thupeh apeh chu nachonnau jui man'a nahsahlou nahiu vem?
Avetsahnan, Pathen in, nanu le napa jabolin, chule koi hijongleh apa ahilouleh anu jalou tah'a houva chu kithat ding ahi.
Hinlah nanghon miho chun anule apa koma, ‘kapanhu joupoi’ tia aseidiu chu aphai natiuve. Ajeh iham itileh nangho kapeh diu pen chu Pathena kapeh dingin kakitemtai natisah uve.
Hitia hi nanghon apa le anuteu ajabol diu angai khohpoi natiuve. Hiti hin nang hon Pathen Thu chu na chonnau dan'in napailha tauve.
Vo mi phalhemho! Isaiah chun nangho thu gaova anaseisa chu adih e, ajeh chu aman,
Hiche mite hin akamun keima eijabol'un, hinlah alung sungu keiya konin gam latah ahi.
Eihouvu jong bolthu ahibouve, ajeh chu amahon mihem lungsuhtoa agelu chu Pathen Thupeh in ahiluvin ahi,” ati.
Chuphat in Jesun mihonpi chu ahung'uva chule ajah diuvin akou khomin, Aman, “Ngaiyun chule hetkhenna neiyuvin.
Nasung uva lut chun nasuboh pouve ti heuvin; nakamuva kona hungpotdoh thu johchun nasuhboh'u ahi” ati.
Chujouvin seijui ho chu akoma ahungun chule adong uvin, “Tutah'a nathusei chun Pharisee ho alung nopmosah chu nageldoh em?” atiuve.
Jesun adonbut in, “Kapan aphulou thingphung kiphut chan chu abula kibot doh ding ahi.
Hijeh chu limsah hih un. Amaho mitcho le mitcho kilamhil ahiuve. Chule mitcho khat chun achom dang khat alamhila ahileh, anilhona kokhuh'a lhalut talou ding ham?” ati.
Chutah in Peter in Jesu jah a, “Miho aneh uva akisu-bohpoi nati thulem chu neihil chenun,” ati.
Jesun adongin, “Na hetlou laiyu hiya ham?” ati.
“Naneh'u chu gilpia alut in chule posona ah aki thadoh jitai.
Hinlah na thusei chu nakama kona hung potdoh'a ahi. Hichun nasuh boh'u ahi.
Ajeh chu lungsunga konna lunggel phalou ho, toltha, jonthan hoi, huh lungput, guchat, jousei chule miseiset.
Hichengse hin nasuhboh'u ahi. Khutsop louva anneh hin nasuhboh'u ahi-poi,” ati.
Chujouvin Jesun Galilee chu adalhan chuin Tyre le Sidon gamkai sahlama agache toutai.
Chidang namdang numei khat chuche muna chun ahungin, angeh in, “O Pakai, David Chapa, nei lungset in! Ajeh chu kachapa hi lhagao phalouvin atomin asugim lheh jenge,” ahung ti.
Hinlah Jesun kamcheng khat in jong adonbut poi. Chuphat in aseijuite ahungin, “Amanu soldoh tan, amanu hi achena dingin seipeh in,” tin asei tauve.
Chuphat in Jesun numeinu jah a, “Keima amang thai kelngoi Israel mi (Pathen mite) henga bou eikisol ahi,” ati.
Hinlah amanu ahungin chule a-houvin, chuin angeh kit in, “Pakai neipanhu in,” ati.
Jesun adonbut in, “Chate nehdi changlhah lahdoh peh a chule uicha peh angai ahipoi,” ati.
Amanun adonbut in, “Hichu adih ahi. Hinlah Pakai, uicha hon jong apute dokhanga kona anmal lhajah aneh diu phalpeh ahi,” ati.
Jesun, “Lungset umnu, natahsan alene. Thil nathum chu sanpeh nahitai,” tin aseipeh e. Chule achanu chu apettah in adamdohtai.
Jesu Galilee twikhanglen'a ahung kilen, chule mol chunga akaldoh in, chuin atoutai.
Mihonpi atama tam ho chun: a-elbai, mitcho, chatmo ho, a-pao theilou ho, chule midang tampi chu Ama henga ahin pui un. Amahon Jesu ang'a alupsah uva ahileh, aman amaho chu abonchauvin aboldamtai.
Mihonpi chun adatmo lheh uve. Apao thei louho jong apao theiyun, akhel a toi ho jong adamdoh un, chule nakong chatmo ho jong adamdoh un, chule mitcho hon jong kho amutauve. Chuin amahon Israel Pathen chu avahchoi tauve.
Chujouvin Jesun aseijui ho akou-khomin, ajah uvah, “Hiche mihonpi hi ka khoto'e. Amaho hi hiche muna hi keimato ni thum jen um ahitauve. Chule amahon aneh diu imacha khendoh aneipouve. Ama ho hi gilkel'a soldoh ding kanompoi, achuti louva ahileh lampia lhasampa a alhuhkam diu ka nompoi,” ati.
Seijuihon adonbut uvin, “Mihonpi hibang loma tampihi aneh dingu gamthip muna hi hoiya ilah dingu ham?” atiuve.
Jesun adong in, “Changlhah ijat naneiyuvem,” ati. Amahon adonbut un, “Changlhah pheng sagi le nga them khat,” atiuve.
Hiti chun Jesu chun mi jouse chu tolla tou dingin aseipeh tai.
Chuin aman changlhah pheng sagi le nga chu alan, amaho dingin Pathen thangvahna aneiyin, chule ahal halin ahehbal balin ahi. Aman aseijuiho apen, amaho chun nehding chu mihonpi lah a chun ahom tauve.
Amahon angaichat jat dungjuiyun abonchauvin anetauve. Hiche jou chun aseijuite chun anehval'u chu paipeh sagi alohdoh uvin ahi.
Amaho chu pasal sang li jen alhing uvin, numei ho le chapang ho jong ajao un ahi.
Chujouvin Jesun mihonpi chu a-incheh ah asolin, chuin Ama chu kong khat'a alut'in Magadan gamkai lama agalkai tai.
Nikhat hi Pharisee ho le Sadducee ho Jesu koma apatep dingin ahungun, athuneina thudola melchihna kidang khat ahung ngeh uvin ahi.
Aman adonbut in, “Nanghon janteng van asan le jing leh kho phading ahi natiuvin,
Jingkah a van asan le nilhuma kho phalou ding ahi natiuva nahet'u ahi. Nanghon kho phat ding thua vana melchihna a kona nahet'u ahi, hinlah phat umdol amelchihna na hedoh thei pouve.
Khang gilou le jonthan hoina khang miten melchihna kidang aholuve, hinlah melchihna khat bou amaho kapeh dingu chu Themgao Jonah melchihna bou hiding ahi,” ati.
Chuche jouvin, Dillen langkhat lama agalkai phat in, seijui hon changlhah apoh lou u chu ahin geldoh tauve.
Jesun amaho agih salin, “Pharisee ho le Sadducee ho chol'a konin kichih theiyun,” ati.
Amahon changlhah apoh tahlou jeh'u chun khat le khat akinel den tauve.
Jesun amahon ipi seija ahiu chu ahen, hiti chun, “Na tahsanu alhom nave! Changlhah neilou jeh'a ipi dia kinela nahiuvem?
Tugeiya hi nahetdoh lou u ham? Mi sang nga changlhah pheng nga'a kavahva chu aval paipeh ijat nalodoh'u hitam?
Ahilou jongleh mi sang li changlhah pheng sagia, chule aval paipeh tamtah nalodoh uchu?
Ipi iti dana changlhah chung thua kasei ahipoi ti hedoh theilou nahiuvem? Hitia hi avela kasei ahi, Pharisee ho le Sadducee ho chol-lah achun kichih theiyun kati ahi,” ati.
Chuphat in anunung pena, Aman changlhah'a chol thu asei hilouva, Pharisee ho le Sadducee ho doha lhep lhahna thuhil aneiyuva achihthei diuva ahil chu ahedoh tauve.
Jesun Caesarea Philippi ahunggei phat in, aseijui ho jah a “Mihon, Mihem Chapa hi koi ahi atiuvem?” tin adong e.
Amahon adonbut un, “Mi phabep ho chun Twilutsah John ahi atiuvin, mi phabep hon Elijah ahi atiuvin, chule adang phabepma chun Jeremiah ahilouleh themgao ho lah'a khatpen hinte,” atiuve.
Chujouvin, amaho chu thu adongin, “Nanghon koi ahi neitiu vem?” ati.
Simon Peter in adonbut in, “Nangma Messiah, Pathen hing Chapa nahi,” ati.
Jesun adonbut in, “Nangma anunnoma nahi, John chapa Simon, ajeh chu nangman mihem koima'a kona nahet ahipon, vana ka-Pan nahenga hiche hi ahin phondoh ahi.
Tua hi nahenga kasei ahi, nangma Peter (song) nahi, chule hiche Songpi (Christa) chunga hi Ka houbung Ka tundoh ding ahi, chule Damun thaneina in ajo-joulou ding ahi.
Chule Keiman Van gam kot-hehho kapeh ding nahi. Leiset chunga ipi hijongleh bollou dinga na thupeh chan chu vana jong kibollou ding, chule leiset chunga ipi hijongleh na noppeh chan chu vanna jong kinoppeh ding ahi,” ati.
Chujouvin Aman aseijui ho jah achun koima koma Messiah ahi chu aphondoh louna dinguvin hatah in agihtai.
Chuchea pat chun Jesun aseijuite koma kichen tah in, Jerusalema agache ding angaikhohna aseijin, chule aman houvaipo loi le thempu le hou-dan thuhil hoa kona thil tampi gimnei hahsaho athoh ding chu ahiltai. Ama ahin tha dingu, hinlah anithum lhin nileh thinaa kona thoudoh ding ahi.
Hinlah Peter chun Ama apuidoh in chule chutia thu asei chu haphon aphoh in, “Pakai Vanin jong oiponte, hiche hi nachunga lhung hih beh jeng hen,” atitai.
Jesu, Peter lama akiheiyin, ajah a, “Satan, Kakoma konin chemangin! Nang hi keima dinga tijat um thangkol nahi! Nangman Pathena kon hilouvin mihem lunggel a kona navet jeh ahi,” ati.
Chuphat in Jesun aseijuite koma, “Nalah uva koi hijongleh eijui noma chun, nacham chon nauva kona nahung kihei-uva, na thingpel nakiput uva, chule neijui dingu ahi.
Nahinkhou naki kolchah jomuva ahileh, namansah dingu ahi. Hinlah nanghon keima jal'a nahin nau naphal doh uva ahileh, na kihuhhing diu ahi.
Chule vannoi apumpi nanga hihen lang, na hinna chan tale chun ipi phachom ding ham? Na hinna sanga man lujo ipi umnalaiyem?
Ajeh chu Mihem Chapa hi avantil teho toh'a Pa-loupina a hung ding chule mijouse chu atoh dung juicheh a athu'u atan ding ahi.
Chule Keiman thutah kaseipeh nahiuve, hikoma tupetna ding ho lah'a Mihem Chapa a Lenggama ahung masanga thilou ding aum-uve,” ati.
Ni gup jouvin Jesun Peter chule ucha teni Jacob le John chu molsang tah khat'a achanga umpi dingin apuitouvin ahi.
Amaho chun avet pettah un Jesu limso chu ahung kikhelin, hiti chun amaiso chu nisa bangin avah jengin, chule aponsil chu vah bangin avah jengin ahi.
Phot lot in Mose le Elijah ahung kilah in, chuin Jesu chu akihou limpi pai lhon in ahi.
Peter chun Pakai, “Hikoma iumu hi akidang lheh jenge! Nadeiya ahileh nang ding khat, Mose ding khat chule Elijah ding khat-melchihna ponbuh thum song inge,” ati.
Hinlah aman athusei pet chun meibang in amaho chu ahin tom khumun, chule vanna konin aw khat in ahin-seijin, “Hiche hi Ka Chapa ngailut tahbeh, ei-kipa sah'a ahi, Athu ngaiyun,” ati.
Seijui ho chu akicha behseh'un, chuin tolla amaiyu asulut tauve.
Chuphat in Jesu amaho lama ahung in chule amaho chu atham in, “Thoudoh un, kicha hih un,” ati.
Chuin amaho adadoh uva ahileh, Mose le Elijah teni chu ana chedoh tan, chule Jesu bou chu amu tauve.
Amaho molchunga kona ahung kinung le suh phat'un Jesun Amaho chu thu apen, “Mihem Chapa thina a kona kaithouva aum kahsen koima koma nathilmu'u hi seidoh hih un,” ati.
Chujou chun aseijui-ten Ama adongun, “Ipi jeh a Dan thuhil hon Messiah hung masanga Elijah hung kile ding ahi tia asei sei jingu hintem?” atiuve.
Jesun adonbut in, “Elijah chu tahbeh a hunga ijakai agontup masat ding ahi.
Hinlah Keiman kaseipeh nahiuve. Elijah ana hunga ahitai, ama chu isahlouvin aboltauve. Chule chutobang ma'a Mihem Chapan jong athoh gim ding ahi,” ati.
Chuin seijui ho chun Twilutsah John chung thu asei ahi ahedoh tauve.
Mi tampi chun Ama chu mol chunga ana ngah tauve. Mikhat chu ahungin chuin Jesu ang-ah adilsun chule aseijin,
“Pakai Kachapa lungsetna neijin, ama abuhthia ahin, chule athoh gim lheh e. Ama meisunga ahilouleh twi lah'a alhu matchet jin ahi.
Hitia hi naseijuite koma kahin puiyin, hinlah amahon adamsah jou pouve,” ati.
Jesun, “Vo tahsan neilou le miduh dahlou ho! Itihchan kaumpi nahlai ding nahiu vem? Chapangpa chu kakoma hin hinpuiyun,” ati.
Chutah in chapangpa sunga lhagaoboh chu Jesun aphoh in, hichun ama adalhatai. Hichea pat chun chapang chu adamthengtai.
Chujou chun seijuiho chun guhthimin Jesu chu adongun, “Keihon itia lhagaoboh chu nodoh joulou kahiu ham?” atiuve.
Jesun aseipeh un, “Tahsan bulhing naneilou jeh'u ahi. Thutahbeh kaseipeh nahiuve, tahsana aneova neo ankam mu tebep geiya naneiyuva ahileh, nanghon hiche mol jah'a hi, hia kon khun kichonin tia nasei thei dingu chule kichon thei ahi. Imacha ahimo ding aumpoi.
Hinlah hitobang lhagaoboh hi taona chule an-ngol tailouva potdohlou ahi,” ati.
Galilee a amaho akikhop kit phat un, Jesun aseipeh un, “Mihem Chapa hi amelmate khut'a pehdoh a umding ahi.
Ama atha dingu, hinlah ani thum nileh athia kona kaithouva umding ahi,” ati. Chuin seijuiho chu lunghem nan adim tauve.
Capernaum ahunglhun un, Hou'in a kaidong ho Peter koma ahungun chuin ajah a, “Na houhil pauvin Hou-in kai apeh ngailou ham?” tin adong uve.
“Henge, apejie,” tin Peter in adonbut e. Chuphat in insunga agaluttai. Hinlah aman thu asei masagin, Jesun anadongin, “Peter, ipi iti nagel em? Lengho khun ama mite kai adon jiu ha? Ahilouleh gal'a ajosa-hou koma kai adonu ham?” ati.
Peter in adonbut in, “Gal'a ajohou koma kai adong uve,” ati. Jesun aseiyin, “Chuti ahileh aphai, agam mite chu ongthola ahiuve.
Hita jongleh, amaho lung thoisah pohite, hiti hin Dil a gakum lhan chule ngakoi galeh lhan. Nga namat masatpen kam chu keh in, chuteng nangman sana dangka apeh len khat namu ding ahi. Hichu choiyin lang, ini-lhon ding in gapetan,” ati.
Hichepet chun seijuiho Jesu henga ahungun chule thudoh aneiyun, “Van Lenggama chu koipen alenpen hiding ham?” atiuve.
Jesun chapang neocha khat akoma din akouvin, chuin chapang chu alah uva adinsah in.
Chuphat in aseitai, “Tahbeh'a kaseipeh nahiuve, nangho nachonset nauva kona nakile-heiyuva chule chapang neocha ho tobang nahung hilouva ahileh Van Lenggama nalut louhel dingu ahi.
Hijeh chun koipen hijongleh chapang neocha ho tobanga kineosah mi chu Van Lenggama alenpen hiding ahi.
Chule koipen hijongleh Keima khel'a chapang neokhat sanga chun, Keima eisan ahi.”
Hinlah nanghon hiche aneocha ho lah'a khat Keima eitahsan'a chu chonsetna nalhahsah uva ahileh, sumhei lentah khat na-ngong changa kihen henlang twikhanglen'a kileh lut lechun nangma ding in aphajoi.
“Vannoiya hi itobang gimnan ahinphah ding hitam! Ajeh chu miho chonse din alhem in ahi. Lhep patepna hohi peltheilou ahi, hinlah alhema pang mi chu iti hahsat ding hitan tem?
Hijeh chun nakhut ahilouleh nakeng in chonset nabolsah leh tanbong in chule paimang in khutkhat ahilouleh kengkhat neiya tonsot hinna'a nalut chu khut ni ahilouleh keng ni neiya tonsot meidila nalut sangin gamchengin aphajon ahi.
Chule namit in nachonset sah'a ahileh, kaldoh'in lang chule paimang jeng in. Mit khat neiya tonsot hinna'a lut chu mit ni neiya meidila nalut ding sang in aphajoi.”
Ching theiyun, nanghon hiche ho lah'a aneopen ho jong noise hih un. Ajeh chu van'ah avantil teu Van'a ka-Pa angsunga aum jing uve.
Chule Mihem Chapa hi amangthah ho chu huhhing dinga hung ahi.
“Mikhat'in kelngoi jakhat neihen lang, chule hicheho lah'a khat chu vahmang taleh amapa chun ipi aboldem? Aman adangse somko le ko chu mol achun dalhan tin chule amang chu holding a chedoh lou ding ham?
Chule aman amu tengleh, tahbeh'a kaseipeh nahiuve, ama chunga akipana chu avah manglou somko le ko sanga lenjo ding ahi.
Hitobangma'a chu, hiche aneocha ho lah'a khatpen amah thah ding chu van'a um Ka-Pa lunglam ahipoi.”
“Tahsan nei midang khat nangma dounaa achonset'a ahileh, nachang'in chen chule athemmona chu seipeh in. Aman nasei angaiya chule hichu aphondoh'a ahileh, nangman ama chu nathujo ahitai.
Hinlah nathujo joulou tah'a ahileh, nangman mikhat ahilouleh mini kipuiyin, gache kit'in, hitia chu nangman nasei chu hettohsahna ni ahilouleh thum'in phochen hen.
Ama ada nahlaiya nasei angailouva ahileh, nachung thu chu houbunga lhut in. Chutengleh ama chun houbung thu angailouva ahileh, hichepa chu milim hou ahilouleh chidang nam dang'in kisim jeng hen.”
“Thutahbeh kaseipeh nahiuve, nanghon leiset chunga najahda chan'u chu vana jong kijada ding, chule leiset chunga naphal chanu chu vana jong kiphalpeh ding ahi. Leiset chunga ipi hijongleh bollou ding nati chan chu vana jong kibollou ding, chule leiset chunga ipi hijongleh na phalpeh chan chu vana jong kiphalpeh ding ahi.
Hiche jong hi kaseipeh nahiuve: Nalah uva mi ni na kinoptouva ipi hijongleh leiset chunga nathum chan'u chu, vana Ka-Pan nangho dinga abol ding ahi.
Ijeh inem itileh Kamin'a ni ahilouleh thum nakikhop khomnau chana chun, Keima nalah uva kaum jing nai,” ati.
Chujouvin, Peter Ama koma ahung'in chuin ajah a, “Pakai, mi koiham khat chu keima douna'a achonset'a ahileh ijatvei kijoma kangaidam thei ham? Sagi vei chan gei ham?” ati.
Jesun adonbut in, “Keiman najah'a sagi vei katipoi, hinlah sagi mun som sagi vei kaseina ahijoi.”
“Hiche jeh'a hi van Lenggam chu Lengpa khat'in asohte toh amakoma sum baho chuto sum suto dinga akoukhom toh kitekah thei ahi.
Aman sum asuhto khom nauva chun, ama koma sum sang som bapa chu ahinkai tauve.
Aman asah joulou phat'in, apupa chun ajile achate chule anei jouse ajoh'a abat chu asah dingin thu apetai.”
“Hinlah ama chu apupa ang sunga chun abohkhup in chuin athumin, ‘Lungsettah in, neikhongaiyin, keiman abonchan penange’” ati.
Chuphat'in apupa chun akhoto lheh in, chuin alhadoh in chule abat angaidam tai.
Hinlah aman lengpa adalhah chun, asoh chanpi sum asang mai mai bapa koma chun achen, angonga aman'in chule apetpet in neipen atitai.
Asoh chanpi a-anga adilsun chule phat chomkhat bep anga dingin angeh in: Nei khongaiyin, keiman penange tin angeh jenge.
Hinlah abatnapa chun angah jou tapoi. Aman mi amatsah in chule batchu asah chaisoh kahsea dingin songkul'a akhumtai.
“Soh achom dang hon hichu amuvin, alung nommo lheh tauvin ahi. Amaho lengpa koma acheuvin chule thilsoh chu agasei sohkei tauve.”
Chuphat'in lengpa chun angaidamsa pachu akoulut'in chuin ajah a, Nangma soh-gilou! Keima henga nathum jeh'a bat chujat jenpi chu kangaidam nahitai.
Keiman nangma kakhoto tobanga chu nasoh chanpi nakhoto ding hilou ham? ati.
Chuphat'in alung hang'ah lengpa chun abat aboncha asahchai kahsea dingin hichepa chu songkul'a akhumtai.
“Vana um ka-Pa chun nanghon nasopiteu chu nalungil'uva na ngaidam louva ahileh nachung'uva hitia chu achutibol ding ahi,” ati.
Jesun hicheng thu asei jouvin, Galilee adalhan chuin Jordan vadung solama Judea gamkaiya achesuhtai.
Chuche muna chun mihon tamtah'in anung ajui tauvin, chuin Aman anaho adamsahtai.
Chuin Pharisee ho phabep ahung'un hiche thudoh'a hi kipalsah dingin apatep un: “Mikhat chun ajeh khat aum pouva ahileh aji ada thei hiya ham?” atiuve.
Jesun adonbut in, “Pathen Thubua simdoh khalou nahiuvem? Hichea chun, atil abula pat Pathen in amaho chu pasal le numeiya asem ahi.”
Chuin aman aseiyin, “Hiche hin ipi jeh a pasal khat'in apa le anu adalhah'a chule ajinu akolchah ding, chule ani lhon'a khat hilhon ding ahitai ti ahilchen e.”
“Ama ni chu mini hitalouva khat ahilhon tah jeh'in, Pathen in agopkhomsa chu koiman sukhen tahih hen,” ati.
“Chuti ahileh ipi jeh'a Mose chun Danbua pasal khat'in ajinu chu dana lekha jih henlang chule solmang hen ati hintem,” atiuve.
Jesun adonbut in, “Nalung thimu atah behseh jeh'a kida thua phatsahna napeh'u ahibouve, hinlah hichu Pathen in ana lung-gon ahipoi.
Chule hiche hi kaseipeh nahiuve, koihileh aji da'a chule achom kichenpia chun jon abol ahitai, ajinu chun kitahna neilou hinkho mang ahingal louleh,” ati.
Jesu seijuite chun ajah'a aseiyun, “Hiti chu ahia ahileh jineilou aphajoi!” atiuve.
Jesun aseiyin, “Hiche thu kisei hi mi jousen sangthei ponte. Pathen panpina changhoa ding bou ahi.
Mi phabep chu apena cha hing theilou dia gonsa aum in, mi phabepma chu midang'in chutia asempeh loi jong aum in, chule abang phabep kit chu Pathen Lenggam jal'a jinei lou deilhen'a jong aumuve. Koihileh hiche hi asang theiyin kisan hen,” ati.
Nikhat hi chapang ho chu anule apateuvin Jesun achung'uva akhut angapma ataopeh ding'in ahin puijui. Ahin seijuite chun anule apateu chu mi nasugim uve tin ana houseuvin ahi.
Hinlah Jesun, “Chapang ho chu kakoma hungsah un. Hungda sah hih un. Ajeh chu Van Lenggam chu hitobang chapang hoa ding bou hiya ahi,” ati.
Chuin Aman alu chunguva akhut teni angamin, chuin phatthei aboh jouvin adalhatai.
Mikhatma Jesu koma hiche thudoh hi dong dingin ahung in, “Houhil, Tonsot Hinna kanei theina dinga ipi natoh pha kabol ngai hintem?” ahung ti.
Jesun adonbut in, “Ipi dinga apha chu ipi ham tia neidoh ham? Apha khatseh bou ahi. Hinlah na thudoh donbutna dingin Tonsot Hinna chu nanei nomleh, thupeh ho jui-in,” ati.
Ama chun adong in, “Hoipen chu ham?” ati. Chuin Jesun adonbut in, “Nangman tolthat hih in, nangman jon bolhih in, nangma gucha hih in, nangman thujou seiphong hih in.
Napa le nanu jabol in. Nangma na kingailut tobang'in naheng nakom chu ngailun,” ati.
Khangdongpa chun adonbut in, “Hiche thupeh ho jouse hi kajui sasoh kei ahitai. Ipi adang kabol ding umnalaiyem?” ati.
Jesun aseipeh in, “Nangma chamkim nahi nomle, chenlang nanei jouse abon'in gajoh in chule asum chu mi vaichaho gapen, chutileh vana gou khol ding nanei ding ahitai. Chujouleh hungin, neijuiyin,” ati.
Hinlah khangdongpan hichu ajahdoh phat in, gouthil tamtah nei ahijeh in, lung-nommotah in achemangtai.
Chuphat'in Jesun aseijui ho jah a, “Thu tahbeh ka seipeh nahiuve, mihao khat dingin Van Lenggam lut ding chu ahahsa lheh jenge.
Keiman seikit inge—Sangong sang dinga heobil hom sunga alut ding chu, mihao khat Pathen Lenggama alut sanga baijo ding ahi,” ati.
Seijui hon adatmo lheh jengun, chutobang ahileh vannoiya hi Huhhing'a koi umjou ding ham? atiuve.
Jesun amaho chu ave chang mel'in chuin aseijin, “Mihem hina lamdol'a seiding in, hithei chu ahipoi. Hinlah Pathen toh pankhom na'a ijakai ahithei soh keiye,” ati.
Chuphat'in Peter in ajah a, Keihon ijakai ka dalhauvin nanung kahin juiyuve. Ipi kahin mu dingu ham? ati.
Jesun adonbut in, “Keiman kasei chetpeh nahiuve. Vannoi akithahsem tengleh, Mihem Chapa hi Loupina Laltouna a atou tengleh, kanung juiya nangho jong laltouna, Som le ni chunga natou-uva, Israel phungsom le ni chunga thu natan dingu ahi.”
“Chule koi koihileh a-inho ahilouleh asopinu le asopipate ahilouleh apa ahilouleh achate ahilouleh aneile agou jouse dalha jenga chu, chan jakhat geiya amuding chule tonsot Hinna chu alemu ding ahi.
Hinlah mi tamtah tua choisanga umho suhnem hidiu, chule tua ima hilouva kikoi ho chuphat tengleh choisangna chang diu ahi,” ati.
“Ajeh chu Van Lenggam chu louneipa jingkah matah'a lengpi leiya natong ding tha-hola gapotdoh tobang ahi.
Aman niseh'a thaman jat apeh ding'in akinop touvin chuin natong ding'in amaho chu asoldoh tai.”
“Jingkah nidan ko in kailhang ahopan ahileh imacha bollouva moh'um mi phabep chu amun.
Hiti chun aman amaho chu agoiyin, nisa lhum teng keiman phante kati kham napenau vinge, ati.
Chuin amaho natong ding'in lengpi leiya ache tauve.”
“Ni lhangkai pung nga'a ama khopi sunga aga umkit pet in, aman midang phabep amoh'um amun ahi. Aman, ‘Ipi dinga tunia natong lou nahiuvem?’” tin adonge.
“Amahon, ‘koima eigoi-yuva aum loujeh ahi’ atiuve. Lou neipa chun aseipeh un, chuti ahile che-un chule ka lengpi leiya natongho lah'a ga jaovun' ati.”
“Chuche nilhah chun aman natongho lamkaipa chu aseipeh in, natongho jouse kou lut in chule natong nunung pena atoh manu pe panin,” ati.
Pung nga'a kigoiho chu sum apeh phatnin, achang cheh un nikho thaman akimu cheh tauve.
Akigoi masa ho chu asumu ladinga ahung phat'un, amaho chun tam mu cheh ding akinem uve. Hinlah amaho jong chu nikho thaman to kitoh akipeuvin ahi.
Amahon atohman akimu phat'un, amaho alou neipa chunga alungnom tapouve.
Khuchehon pung khat bou natong uva, keiho nilhum keiya nisa ahah laise thoh lhum keiho toh kibang'in amaho napeuve atiuvin ahi.
“Aman amaho khat chu adonbut in, ‘Gol, keiman adihlou kabolpoi! Nangma nilhum keiya nikhotha man lo dinga nanop hilou ham?’”
Nasum kilah in chule chen, hiche natong nunung pen hi nanga tobang'in kapenome, ati.
Kasum chu kadeina banga kaman ding chu dantoh akikalna ipi uma ham? Keiman midang kakhoto jeh'a nei mitthipna ding ipi umem?
“Hiti chu ahin, tua anunung peh-ho chu chuphat teng amasapen hidingu, chule amasaho anunung hung hiding ahiuve,” ati.
Jesu chu Jerusalem lama achetou in ahileh, aman seijui som le ni ho chu guhthim in achoma akou doh in chule achunga ipi hung soh ding thu aseipeh tai.
Aman aseiyin, “Ngaiyun, eiho Jerusalem jon'in ichetou uve, chule thempu pipui hole houdan thuhil ho khut'a Mihem Chapa hi kipedoh ding ahi. Amahon thadinga apehdoh dingu ahi.
Amahon Rome sepai ho khut'a apehdoh dingu, sakol jepna'a avoh dingu chule thingpel a akhetbeh dingu ahi. Hinlah ni thum nileh thinaa kona thoudoh kit ding ahi,” ati.
Chua pat chun James le John Zebedee chapa teni Nu chu Jesu koma achate nito ahung'un ahi. Aman jana neitah in adilsun lungsetna angeh e.
Aman adong in, “Ipi nathum nom ham?” ati. Amanun adonbut in, “Na Lenggama kachapa teni hi jabolna mun'a: khat najet lama chule khat navei lama koi gel in,” ahungtin ahi.
Hinlah Jesun adonbut'in ajah uva, “Ipi nathumu nanghon na kihet pouve! Keiman gimhesoh kathohna ding khon kadon ding chu nadon ngam hinam?” ati. Amanin, Henge, kangam lhon'e tin adonbut lhontai.
Jesun ajah lhonna, “Nangnin tahbeh mongin kagimna khon hi nahin don lhon ding ahiye. Hinlah keiman koi kajet'a ahilouleh kaveiya toudi ham? Ti thuneina kaneipoi. Ka-Pan alhendoh a agonpeh ho ding mun ahiye, tin aseipeh tai” ati.
James le John tenin ipi athumlhon ahi seijui adang som ho chun ajah doh phat'un alung gil uva nomo asalheh tauve.
Hinlah Jesun amaho chu akou khomin, chuin ajah uva, “Nanghon vannoi vaipipo hon midang chunga ki piput sahna anei-jiu naheuve chule lamkai lenho chun anoiyuva ho chunga thuneina aneiyu naheuve.
Hinlah nangho lah'a chutilou ding ahi. Nangho lah'a alamkai pipu hinoma chu nasoh uva pang ding ahi.
Chule nalah uva amasa hinoma chu nasoh'u ahung hi angaiye.
Ajeh chu Mihem Chapa jeng jong chu jenle dinga hilouva, ajen ding le mitamtah hinna dinga ahinna pedinga hunga ahi,” ati.
Chuin Jesu le aseijuihon Jericho khopi chu adalhah nung uvin, mihon tamtah'in anung ahinjui uve.
Mitcho mini chu lampi pama atou lhon'e. Amanin Jesu chun hilampi chu ahinho ding ahi ti ajahlhon phat in, amanin hasap in asam lhon in, Pakai David Chapa, neikhoto lhon in! atilhon tai.
Mihonpi chun aphoh uvin, “Thip lhon in atiuvin.” Hinlah amanin aha-sapcheh lhon in, “Pakai, David Chapa, neikhoto lhon in,” atilhone.
Jesun a-aw lhon ajah phat in, ading'in chule akouvin, “Ipi kabolpeh lhon ding nei deisah lhon'em?” atitai.
Amani chun, Pakai kho kamunom lhon'e, ati lhon'e.
Jesun amani chu akhohsah jal'in, amitlhon athampeh tai. Hipettah chun kho amuthei lhontai! Chujouvin amanin ajuipai lhontai.
Jesu le aseijuite Jerusalem ahung naiyun, Bethphage khopi Olive mola um chu ahin phatauve. Chuin Jesun aseijui mini amasanga asol'in,
Aseiyin, “Khuche khoa khun galut lhon in, nagalut lut lhonle nangnin sangan anouto kihen na gamu khom ding ahi. Ani lhon'in lham lhon'in chule kakoma hinpui lhon in.
Koiham khattouvin ipi bola nahi lhon'em tia donga aumleh Pakaiyin aman nom e, tilhon'in, chuteng aman aphal jeng ding ahi,” ati.
Hiche thilsoh hi Themgao thusei guilhunna dinga soh ahi,
“Jerusalema chengho jah a seijin, ‘Veuvin, na Lengpa chu nakomuva ahunge. Ama nunnemtah ahin, sangan chunga atouvin—sangan nou chunga ahung touve,’” tia kisei chu.
Seijui teni chun Jesun athupeh bang'in abol lhone.
Amanin sangan chule anou chu Ama koma ahin pui lhon'in chule amaho chun apon'u chu sangan nou chunga aphauvin, Ama achunga atouvin ahi.
Mihonpi atamjo chun Ama masang sang-ah aponsil hou chu lam lhongpi'a chun aphauvin, chule midangse chun theoboh ho alham un chuin lampia apha tauve.
Akijot nauva Jesu chu alai lunga aum in chule Ama kimvel sea ho chun asam un, “David Chapa jeh in Pathen vahchoiyun! Pakai mina hungpa chunga nunnom hen! Chung Van sang penna Pathen vahchoiyun!” atiuve.
Jerusalem kho mite jouse chu khopi sung Ama alut lut chun aboisoh jeng tauvin, amahon adong un, “Ama hi koihiya ham?” atiuve.
Chuin mipi ho chun, “Ama hi themgao Jesu, Galilee gamkai Nazareth khoa kon ahi,” atiuve.
Jesu Hou'in sunga chun alut in chuin maichama kilhaina thilto dinga ajoh'a le acho ho chu anodoh pan in ahi. Aman vapal joh ho touna le sum lhenglea pang ho dokhang chu abungbu tun pehtai.
Aman ajah uva, “Pathen lekhabu thun, Ka Hou'in chu taona in kiti ding dol ahi, hinlah nanghon guchaho thil kiselguhna mun naso tauve,” ati.
Mitcho le elbai ho Hou'in a chun ahung un, Aman amaho chu aboldam in ahi.
Thempu pipui ho le houdanthuhil hon athil kidang bol chu amu uvin, chule chapang hon Hou-in sunga “David Chapa jal'in Pathen vahchoiyin umhen,” atiu ajau-vin ahi. Hinlah lamkaiho chu alunghang thei lheh jeng uve.
Ama hon Jesu adong uvin, “Hiche chapang ho hin ipi aseiyu najah em?” atiuvin, Aman “Henge kajanai, naosen chapang noi cheplai kam'in vahchoina nachamkim sah e, ti nasim doh nailou'u ham?” ati.
Chujouvin Ama Bethany akile kit in hichea chun ajan geh dentai.
Jingkah in Jesu chu Jerusalema ahung kilen ahileh agil akel tai.
Aman lam pama theichang phung um chu agatoh tan. Ama jong agaum ding ham tin aga ve in, hinlah ado jeng bou amun ahi. Chuphat in Aman theichang phung chu, “Nangma itih in jong gakit tahih in!” ati. Chuin apettah chun theichang phung chu agoppai jenge.
Seijuiho chun hichu amu phat'un alung dongun chule adong un, “Iti dana theichang phung chu goppai jeng ahi dem?” tin adatmo tauve.
Chutah in Jesun Amaho aseipeh in, “Keiman Thutah kaseipeh nahiuve, nanghon na tahsan uva chule lungthoina neiloubeh nahiuleh hitobang hi nabolthei diu ahi, chule asanga lenjong nabol theidiu ahi. Nanghon mouljah'a jong nangma kichon mangin lang chule twikhanglen'a kileh lut'in tileu chun chuti jeng ding ahi.
Ipia ding hijongleh natao theiyu, chule tahsanna naneiyuva ahileh namu dingu ahi” ati.
Jesu Hou'in a kona ahung kilekit in chule thu ahilpan in ahileh, thempu pipui holeh upa ho Ama koma ahung un ahi. Amahon adong un, Koi thuneina'a hicheho jouse hi nabol ham? Kon bolin tia thu napeh ham? natiuve.
Jesun adonbut in, “Nang hon thudoh khat hi nadonbut'uva ahileh koi thuneina'a hiche ho jouse hi kabol ham seipeh nauvinge.
John chun miho baptize theina thuneina anei chu vana kon ham ahilouleh mihem a kon bep bou ham?” ati. Amaho le amaho akihouvun, “Eihon vana kon ahi itiuva ahileh Aman ipi jeh'a eihon John thusei chu itahsan lou u ham tia eidoh dingu,
Hinlah ama mihem bepbou ahi tin seileu hen, mipi oimo ichan diu ahi, ajeh chu miho chun John chu themgao ahi atiuve ti aseiyun ahi.”
Hiti chun achainakeiyin adonbut un, “Keihon kahepouve,” atiuve. Chuin Jesun adonbut in, “Chuti ahitah le koi thuneina'a hiche ho jouse kabol ham kaseipeh lou ding nahiuve” tin aseitai.
“Hinlah hiche thudol hi ipi nagel uvem? Mi khat chapa ni nei chun, alen jopa koma, ‘chapa gachedoh inlang, tunin lengpi leiya na gatong in’” ati.
Chapa chun adonbut in, “Ka-e, kachelou ding ahiye,” atin hinlah chujoupeh chun alunggel akhel in agache tai.
Chuphat in apa chun chapa khatpa jah a, “Nangchen” atileh ama chun “henge,” Hepa tin aseiyin, ahin aga chedeh poi.
Chapateni lah'a chu koijoh apa seingai hiya ham? Amahon adonbut un, Amasapa atiuve. Chuphat in Jesun ahilchen in, “Keiman tahbeh'a kaseipeh nahiuve, kaidong kitahlou ho le numei kijoh ho Pathen Lenggama nangho masanga lut diu ahi.”
Ajeh chu Twilutsah John chu anahung in, chule adih'a hinna ding lampi chu nakopeh uvin, ahin nanghon ama chu natahsan pouve, hinlah kaidong ho le numei kijoh hon atahsan-uve. Chule hiche aso nung in jong Ama natahsan nompouvin chule nachonset nauva nakisih pouve.
“Tun thusim achom khat ngaiyun. Lounei khat hin lengpilei abol in, apal agen kimvel'in, lengpitheiga lhohna ding leiko alaiyin, chule gahvet-suina dingin insang asan ahi. Chujouvin aman lengpilei chu alei-lhou ho khut'a apedoh in, chule gamchoma agache tai.”
Lengpiga alhun phat in, alei lhou'a pang ho koma asohte asolin ahi.
Hinlah alei lhou hon asoh ho chu aman un, khat avouvin, khat athat un chule achom khat chu songa asep tauve.
Hichun alou neipa chun asoh atamjo cheh chu lengpi theiga lohkhom dingin asolin ahileh abolngai ngai anabol un ahi.
“Achainakeiyin alouneipa chun achapa asolin, amaho chun achapa chu anajabol teiyunte tin agel'in ahi.”
“Hinlah loubol ho chun achapa hung amu phat un, amaho khatle khat akihou un, ‘agou lo’ dingpa hikoma ahunge. Hungun, ama that'u hitin agam hi eiho chan ding'in kiheidoh'u hite,” atiuve.
Hitichun amahon aman'un, lengpi leiya kon in akaidoh un, chule ama chu athat tauve.
Jesun adong in, “Lengpilei neipa chu ahung kile teng loubol ho chu i-lonte tia nagel uvem?” ati.
Hou lamkai ho chun adonbut uvin, Aman mi-engseho chu melse tah in that intin, chule alengpi lei chu alougasoh achanding pethei midang henga apehdoh ding ahitai, atiuve.
Chutah in Jesun amahotah adong in, “Hiche hi nanghon Pathen Thutheng bua nasimdoh khah lou u ham? In-sa hon adei-lou song chu aning'ah apipen in apang tai. Hichehi Pakai thilbol ahi chule gahvet ding in aki-dange.
Keiman nangho kaseipeh nahiuve, Pathen Lenggam chu nanghoa kona kiladoh a, chule phatea ga sodoh thei nam dang kipe ding ahi.
Koi hijongleh hiche songa kipal chan chu ahal hal'a chip ding chule alhuhkhum chan chu atagoi ding ahi,” ati.
Thempu pipuho le Pharisee ho chun hiche thulem hi ajah phat un, amaho douna'a thusim kisei–loubol mi engse ahiu chu akihetdoh tauve.
Amahon Ama amatnom uvin, hinlah mipi chun Jesu chu themgaova angaito jeh un akichauvin ahi.
Jesun amaho chu thulem dang jong aseipeh in ahi. Aman ajah uva,
“Van Lengam chu lengkhat in achapa jineina golvah loupitah abol thusim toh tekah thei ahi.
Neh le donding gontupsoh ahiphat in, asohte asolin akikou ho chu agahetsah tauve. Ahin, amaho abon'un ahungnom tapouve.”
“Hiti chun aman asoh dangho chu amaho gaseipeh dingin asolin, Golvah anneh ding gontupsa ahitai. Bongchal hole gancha thaotah ho chu kithat a, ijakai kigong tupma ahitai. Ankong um ding'in hung un agatisah-e.”
Hinlah akikou ho chun anahsah pouvin chule ama lampi cheh'a ache tauve, khat alouva, achom dang khat akiveinaa,
Adang-sen asottol leho chu aman'un chule jachat umtah in abol'un chule athat tauve.
“Lengpa chu alung hang in, chule asepaite asoldoh in tolthat ho chu asumang'in chule akhopiu jong ahal tauve.”
Chule aman asohte jah a, Golvah an gonsan aumtai, chule jin'a kikouho jong jaboltah a kilom ahipouve.
Tun lamlhong aningkoi tin'ah cheuvin chule namu mu hou chu gakou uvin, ati.
Hiti chun sohte chun amu chanu chu mipha le miphalou geiyin akou uvin ahileh, golvah in chu jin adim tai.
“Hinlah lengpa chu jinho kimu pia ahunga ahileh, aman mikhat chu kichenna Golvah vona kivonlou amudoh tai.”
Aman ajah a, kichenna Golvah vona kivon louva iti dana hikoma naum ham tia adoh le imachan adonbut tapoi.
Chutah in lengpa chun alhachate ho jah a akhut le akeng ho kan'un lang chule polam muthima lehdoh tauvin, hichea chu kana le hagelna um ding ahi.
“Ajeh chu mitampi kikouva ahi, hinlah mi themcha bou deilhen ahi,” ati.
Chutah in pharisee ho akihou-un Jesu chu athuseiya kipal sah'a mat ding angaito tauve.
Amahon aseijuiteu phabep asol'un, chule Herod lama pangho jong jaotha ahiuve. Amahon “Houhil,” mikitah nahi ti kaheuve. “Nangman Pathen lampi dihtah nahil'in koima dat-khen naneipoi chule maipha nave poi,” atiuvin ahi.
“Tun hiche thua hi ipi nagel em neiseipeh'un: Caesar henga kai peh hi dih'am ole dihlou ham?” atiuve.
Hinlah Jesun alunggel'u phalou chu ahen, aseiyin, “Nangho mi phalhem ho! Ipi dinga doha'a neimat got'u ham?”
Kai kipehna sum chu neivetsah un, ati. Ama hon Rome te sum avetsah tauve.
Aman adong in, “Koilim le koipen min ham?” tin adong tai.
Amahon adonbut'un, “Caesar a,” atiuve. Aman aseipeh in, “Caesar a chu Caesar peuvin, chule Pathen achu Pathen peuvin,” ati.
Aman adonbutna chu adatmo-uvin chuin achemang tauve.
Hiche nikho mama chun Sadducee hon mithi ho thokitna aumpoi ti hou lamkai ho Jesu henga ahung un, hiche thudoh hi ahung bol tauve.
“Houhil, Mose chun mi koi ham khat cha neilouva athi khahtah'a ahileh anaopa chun meithainu chu akichenpia chule acha chun aupa min apohding ahi ati.
Aphai, vetsahnan sopi pasal sagi aume. Atahpen pa chun ji aneiyin cha neilou vin athitai, chuti chun asopipa chun meithainu chu akichen pitai.
Hinlah asopi ani napa jong chu athitan, chule asopi athum channa pan amanu chu akichenpi tai. Asagina chan in hiti chun abonchauvin aum tauve.
Achainan, numeinu jong athitai.
Hijeh chun neiseipeh un, thokitna'a chu koipen ji hiding hitam? Ajeh chu asagi-uva chu amanu akichenpiu ahi” tin adong tauve.
Jesun adonbut in, “Pathen Thule Pathen Thahatna nahet lou jeh uva nasuhkhel jiu ahi.
Ajeh chu mithiho chu thokitna'a amaho kicheng talou, kichen jong kibolsah talou ahiuve. Amaho chu vana Vantilte tobang ahiuve.
Hinlah tun, mithiho thokitna umham tithua Pathen Thua nasimdoh khahlouvu ham? Masang peh'a anathisaho Abraham, Isaac chule Jacob ho chu athijoupeh uvin, Pathen in aseiyin,
Keima Abraham, Isaac chule Jacob Pathen kahi. Hitia chu Ama ahing ho Pathen ahin, athiho Pathen ahipoi,” ati.
Mihonpi chun athusei ajah phat un, athuhil chu adatmo lheh tauve.
Ahin aman Sadducee ho paomo hel'a alha chu Pharisee hon ajahdoh phat un, amaho akikhom un, ama thudohna neikit ding'in akinopto tauve.
Amaho lah'a mikhat Hou Dan thuthem khat chun hiche thudoh'a hi kipalsah ding agon ahi.
“Houhil, Mose dan dung juiya hoipen hi thupeh lenpen ham?” ati.
Jesun adonbut in, “Nangman Pakai na Pathen chu nalung pumpia, nahinna pumpia chule nalungthim pumpia na-ngailut ding ahi.
Hiche hi thupeh amasa le alenpen ahitai.
Anina jong athupina kibang ahi. Nangma na kingailut banga naheng nakom na-ngailut ding ahi.
Hiche thupeh tenia hi Dan thu apumpi le themgao hon angeh jouseu chu kikhaiya ahi,” ati.
Hipet chun Pharisee hon aum-kimvel un, Jesun amaho thudoh khat adongin:
“Messiah chung chang thua ipi nagel uvem? Ama koicha ham? ati. Amahon adonbut un, Ama David Chapa ahi,” atiuve.
Jesun adonbut in, “Chuti ahileh iti dan'a David chun Lhagao Theng'in ahetsa'a kona Messiah chu ‘Ka-Pakai’ ati hintem?” Ajeh chu David chun,
Pakai chun kapakai koma, Keiman na melmate kasuh nem'a nakengto noiya ka koi masang sen, kijabolna kakhut jet'ah tou jingin, ati.
David in Messiah chu Ka-Pakai, tia akou thei leh, Messiah chu iti achapa hithei ding ham? ati.
Chuin koima chan ama chu adonbut thei tapouve. Chule hiche jouva pat chun, koiman thudoh abolngam tapouve.
Chutah in Jesun mihonpi le aseijuiho jah a chun,
“Hou Dan thuhil hole Pharisee ho Mose Danbu ho sutoh dinga houhil lamkaiya lhendoh ahiuve.”
Hijeh chun amahon nahil chan'u chu bol un chule nahil nauva aseiyu ngaiyun, hinlah aum chan'u vang juihih un. Ajeh chu amahon ahilu chu abol pouve.
Amaho hin mihon apoh joudiu kalval chonna angeh un, hinlah pohgih ngai jangna ding in akhut jung khat'u jong chasah lou ahiuve.
“Athilbol jouseu chu mimu dinga bou bol ahiuve. Abanjang uva taona bom akoiyun, asungah Pathen Lekhabua thucheng kijih aneiyun, chule amahon sangkhol chol mong kailha agei kikhit ho akiah-uve.”
Chule amaho hi anneh khomna dokhang mun thupi laiya touva chule hou-kikhopna in'a jabolna'a tou anom'uvin ahi.
Amahon kailhang mun'a min jaboltah'a alem diu adeiyun, chule houhil ati diu adei-uve.
“Koiman houhil nati diu janom hih un, ajeh chu nanghon houhil khat naneiyun, chule nangho nabon chauva sopite hina a kibang cheh nahiu ahi.”
Chule hiche leiset chunga koima Pa sah hih un, ajeh chu vana um Pathen chu Lhagaova na-Pau ahi.
Chule koiman nangho houhil tin kikousah hih un, ajeh chu nanghon houhil naneiyun, Messiah chu ahi.
Nalah uva alen pen hinoma chu soh ahi angaiye.
Hinlah ama kichoisang ho chu kisu nem'intin, chule akingai nem ho chu kichoi sang ding ahiuve.
“Itobang lunghemnan nahin phah diu hitam nangho hou dan thuhil hole Pharisee ho. Miphalhem ho! Ajeh chu miho maikoh'ah nanghon Van Lenggam kot chu nakhah'un ahi. Nang hola nalut pouvin chule midang ho jong alut diu na janom deh pouve.”
“Itobang lunghemnan nahin phah diu hitam nangho Hou dan thuhil hole Pharisee ho. Miphalhem ho! Nanghon meithai ho anei-agou thil chung'ah jachatna thei leuvin dohan nabol'un, chule hou ngaisah tah tobang'in mipi lah'a sotpi natao un ahi. Hiche jeh'a hi gimbolna nasatah kipe ding nahiuve.”
“Itobang lunghemnan nahin phah diu hitam nangho Hou dan thuhil hole Pharisee ho. Miphalhem ho! Ajeh chu nanghon mi khat na loilutna ding un, gam tina twikhanglen gal geiyin navah leuvin, chule khat touvin lung ahin heiya ahileh nangho amachu nivei jen Damun cha in nasem un, nangho jong nahiu ahi!”
“Mitcho lamhil ho! Itobang lunghemna in nahin pha diuvem! Ajeh chu nang hon Pathen hou-in'a kihahsel ima akhohpoi natiuve; hinlah hou-in sunga Sana'a kihahsel chu khoh'ah ahi, natiuve.”
Mitcho mingol ho! Hou-in'a sana ahilouleh Hou-in sana suthenga chu hoijoh thupijo hintem?
Chule nanghon maicham muna kihahsel chu imacha akhohpoi, hinlah maicham chunga thil kipedoh'a kihahsel chu khoh ahi, natiuve.
Itobang loma mitcho nahiu ham! Maicham chunga thilto kichoi chuleh thilto suthenga maicham joh chu hoiche thupijo ham?
Nangho maicham pan'a nakihahsel tenguleh hiche maichama kihahsela chule maicham chunga umho geiya chu kihahsela nahi tai.
Chule nangho Hou-in pan'a na kihahsel tenguleh hiche maicham munle maichama cheng Pathen'a kihahsel nahiu ahitai.
Chule van min pan'a nakihahsel teng Pathen laltouna le Pathen laltouna'a toupa'a chu kihahsel nahi ahitai.
“Itobang lung hemnan nahin phah diu hitam nangho Houdan thuhil ho le Pharisee ho. Miphalhem ho! Ajeh chu nanghon nahonsoh uva kona muchi neopen geiyin som'a khat napeuve, hinlah danthupeh akhohjo, adih'a thutan khotona chule tahsan nahsah in nagel pouve!”
Mitcho lamhil ho! Thousi vaibong naval louna ding uvin twina lhiu vin, hilah nanghon sangongsang napum val uve!
“Itobang lunghemnan nahin phah diu hitam nangho Houdan Thuhil hole Pharisee ho. Miphalhem ho! Ajeh chu nanghon khon le kong chu apolam siltheng nathem un, hinlah nasung lamu, chip setna le kichang khohsahnan nadim uve.”
Mitcho Pharisee ho! Amasan khon le kong chu asung soptheng un, chutengleh apolam jong chu hungtheng tante.
“Itobang lunghemnan nahin phah diu hitam nangho Houdan Thuhil hole Pharisee ho. Miphalhem ho! Ajeh chu lhan kiloibang tobangbep nahiuve, apolam vet hoi, hinlah nasunglam'u mithi gu le nen dimset nahiuve.”
Polama vet ding'in midihho to nakilou uvin, hinlah nasung gil lamu phatlhemna le danbei nahibou uve.
“Itobang lunghemnan nahin phah diu hitam nangho Houdan thuhil hole Pharisee ho. Miphalhem ho! Ajeh chu nanghon napu napa teuvin anathau themgao hole Pathen ngaisah ho lhan chu nasemhoiyun ahi.”
Chujongleh nanghon kapu kapateu phatlai chun keiho anahing leuveng themgao ho athanauva kajaolou beh dingu ahi, natiuve.
“Hinlah hitia nasei jeng vangun, nanghon themgao that ho sonle chi lhah nahiuve tiphot chetna nakiphondoh u ahiye.”
Cheuvin lang napu napa teuvin ana-patsau chu nanghon gabulhit un.
Gulho, gulse chilhah ho! Damun thutanna chu iti napel thei mong ding'u ham?
“Hijeh'a chu keiman themgao ho le miching ho chule Houdan thuhil ho na henguva ka hinsol ahi. Hinlah nanghon abang chu thingpela na khetbeh dingu, chule adangse chu hou ki khopna in'a najep dingu, chule khopi khat'a kona khopi choma nadelle dingu ahi.”
Hitia chu michonpha Abel kitha'a pat Berekiah chapa Zechariah Hou'in maicham teni kikah'a kithat ho jouse chunga themmona nahin kipoh dingu ahi.
Thutahbeh kaseipeh nahiuve, hiche thutanna hi tukhang mite chunga hung lhung ding ahi.
“Vo Jerusalem, Jerusalem themgao ho that le Pathen thupole ho that'a pangho! Ahpin anoute alhaving tenia a-opkhum tobanga nachateu itobang tah'a kakhoptup kigot hitam! Hinlah nanghon neiphal peh pouve.
Chule tun veuvin, na in'u chu dalhahsa le ahomkeo ahitai.
Ajeh chu hiche thutahbeh hi kaseipeh nahiuve, hiche thutanna hi tukhang mite chunga chu ding ahi!”
Jesun Hou'in leitol mun adalhah ding chun, aseijuite ho chun Hou'in kisahna in tampi ho chu avetsah uve.
Hinlah aman adonbut in, “Hiche in kisadoh ho namu'vem? Tahbeh'a kaseipeh nahiuve, abonchauva kiphelha sohkei ding, songhi khat chunga khat kisethom jong umlou ding ahi,” ati.
Chomkhat jouvin, Jesu Olivet molla atouvin ahi. Aseijuiho chu guhthimin akoma ahung un, hiti hin aseiyuve, “Nahung kitna ding amelchihna ipi hiya chule vannoi kichaini itih le hiding ham?” ahung tiuve.
Jesun aseipeh un, “Koima cha kipui khelsah hih un.
Ajeh chu keima min'a mi tampi hung dingu, keima Messiah kahi ahungti dingu, amahon mi tampi alhep lhah diu ahi.
Chule nanghon galthu hole galbol khum dinga kigihna ho najah dingu, hinlah kicha hih un. Tahbeh'a hiche hohi hunglhung ding, hinlah hichu achaina hipai jeng loulai ding ahi.”
Namkhat le namkhat gal'a kibolto ding, chule lenggam khat le lenggam khat kidou ding ahi. Vannoi muntin'a kel lhan tin chule ling hung kihot ding ahi.
Hinlah hicheho jouse hi amasa pena naosonat thoh ahahsat bang bep hiding, adang jong hung umbe nalai ding ahi.
“Chuteng nangho, amahon namat uva, nabol engset diu chule nahin tha dingu ahinalaiye.
Chule mi tampi keiya kona kihei mang ding chule kipedoh to'uva chujongleh kihoto ding ahiuve.
Chule themgao lhem tamtah hung umdoh ding, mitampi alheplhah dingu ahi.
Chonsetna chu muntin'a pungcheh cheh ding chule mi tampi ngailutna'a hung dailha ding ahiuve.
Hinlah koi hileh akhonni geiya thoh lhum'a chu huhhing'a umding ahi.
Chule Lenggam Kipana Thuphahi vannoi pumpia kihil lhang le ding ahi; hitia chu namtin in ajah dingu; chujou tah le achaina hung hiding ahi.”
“Daniel themgaovin asei nikho chu nahin mu dingu chule thet umtah chu mitmu tah'a munthenga ahung din namu dingu ahi (asim sim'in gelkhoh hen).”
Chuteng leh Judea gam'a umho mol lama jam uhen.
Inchunga um chu insunga thil gakilah dingin kumsuh dahen.
Louva uma jong chun asang khol chol kilah ding'in kile dahen.
Numei naovop hole naonoi chepsah minu ho ding'in hiche nikho ho sung chu iti ahoiset tadem?
Chule najam nau phat chu phalbi lai ahilouleh Sabbath nikho ahilouna ding'in taovun.
Ajeh chu vannoi kipat til'apat anasoh khalou chule hung umbekit talou ding thoh-hahsa chungnung hunglhung ding ahi.
Tahbeh in, chuche thoh hahsa nikho chu kisuchomlou hileh, mihem khat jeng jong hoidoh lou ding ahi. Hinlah Pathen lhenchomte jal'a nikho chu kisuchom ding ahi.
“Chuche phattengleh koiham khattouvin ven, Messiah hikoma aume ahilouleh khukoma aume atia ahijongleh tahsan hih un.
Ajeh chu Messiah lhem hole themgao lhem ho hung kipatdoh uvintin, melchihna kidangle datmo umho chu ahin boldoh dingu, ahitheile Pathen lhenchomte tah jong alheplhah dingu ahi.”
Veuvin, keiman aphat lhun masanga kahilchah masah nahiuve.
“Hiti ahijeh chun, mi koiham khattouvin, ven, Messiah chu hikoma, ahilouleh gamthip a aume, atiu jongleh tahsan hih un.
Ajeh chu kolphe chun solam ahinsala chule lhumlam ahinsalvah pai tobanga, Mihem Chapa ahung jong chuti ding ahi.
Ajeh chu muthong ho kikhop khom chun anaivela thilong uma ahi avetsah banga, hiche melchihna ho hin phat kichai ahungnaitai ti ahilchet ahi.”
“Hiche hesohna nikhoho kichai jou jouleh, Nisa thim in tin, Lha jong avah sohdoh tapontin, Ahsiho jeng jong van'a kona pullha ding, chule Van thaneina ho chu kihot lingsoh ding ahi.
Chule achainakeiya Mihem Chapa ahungna ding melchihna van hoa hung kilang doh ding, chule leiset mite jouse chunga lunghemna umding ahi. Amahon Mihem Chapa chu van meilhang lah'a thunei le loupi tah'a ahung amu dingu ahi.
Chule Aman avantil ho chu sumkon ginthong jeju chutoh, asoldoh tha ding, chule amahon alhenchomte chu vannoi muntina kona van le leiset kikah kigamlat napen geiya kona chu akhop khom dingu ahi.”
“Tun theichang phunga konin kihilna khat neiyu hite. Thingbah ho ahung dot a chule anaho anou tengleh khal ahung naitai ti naheuve.
Hitobang ma chun hiche ho jouse namu soh tenguleh, Ama hung kitna ding anaitai, kotbul ahin phatai ti heuvin.
Thutahbeh kaseipeh nahiuve, hicheho jouse hi akichai masangsea hiche nam mite hi suhmil'a umlou ding ahi.
Van le leiset hungmang ding, hinlah Ka-Thuhi manglou ding ahi.”
“Hinama jongleh, hicheho hunglhunna ding chu vana Vantil ho hihen lang, ahilouleh Chapa Amatah in jong koima chan anikho le aphat tah ahepoi, Pa bouvin ahet ahi.”
“Mihem Chapa chu ahung kinungle teng, Noah nikholai tobang hiding ahi.
Chuche nikho lai chun, twisanglet masangin, miho chun golvah abolun, chule golnop le kichenna ho Noah kong sunga alut nikho lhin kahsen abol'un ahi.”
Twisang ahunglet'a chule amaho alhoh mang masang seuvin miho chun, ipi hungsoh ding ahi ahepha pouve. Mihem Chapa ahung teng jongleh chutima hung hiding ahi.
“Pasal nin louva na hintong khom lhon intin, khat kila'a khat johpa kida lhading,
Numei nin sumheiya chang goikhom lhon in tin, khat kila'a, khat kida lhading ahi.”
“Hiti ahijeh chun nangho jong ki-hongphan um un! Ajeh chu ipi nikhoa na Pakai hung ding ahi nahe pouve.
Hiche hi heuvin: Inneipa chun itih a gucha ahung ding kihetleh, ama kihongphan um intin, chule a-in chu phetvanga aumsah louding ahi.
Nangho jong nakigin jing'u angaiye, ajeh chu Mihem Chapa chu nagel loupet tah-uleh hung ding ahi.”
“Soh tahsan um, phottohna neiya umpa chu a-pupa insung pumpia asoh dang ho phatecha vepha'a aneh diu aphatcha gong tobang ahi.
A-pupa chu ahung kile kit'a chule asohpa chun phatechan atoh ding dol atonge ti amua ahileh kipaman amuding ahi.
Tahbeh'a kaseipeh nahiuve, a pupa chun hiche sohpa chu anei jouse chunga amopohsah ding ahi.
Hinlah hiche soh chu phata hih leh chule hitin gel henlang: Kapu hi niphabep set hung kile lou ding ahi, tihen lang,
aman soh pasal dangho chu votahen lang, nopneh bol hen chule jukham tahen lang hileh,
a-pupa chu hetsah masatna neilouvin hung henlang chule agel loupet hitaleh,
aman hiche sohpa chu asat tel tel'a chule mi phalhem ho lah'a akoi ding ahi. Hichea chu kana le hagelna um ding ahi,” ati.
“Chutichun Van Lenggam chu mounu-loiho nungah som thaomei kiken'a Moulang lamto dinga kigo hotoh kitekah ding ahi.”
Amaho lah'a nga chu angol'uvin, chule adang nga chu aching-uve.
Nga angol ho chun athao meiyuva ding'in thao akiken bulhing pouve.
Hinlah adang nga ho vang chu aching theiyuvin thao bom'a thao akiken beuvin ahi.
Moulang chu ahung-gei phat in, amaho abonchauvin alulhu'uvin chule a-ihmu tauve.
Jankhangkim in khosam aw chun asukhang un, “Veuvin, Moulang chu ahungtai! Hungdoh un chule lamtouvin!” ati.
“Mounu-loiho chu abonchauvin athoudoh un, chule athaomeiyu akigot tauve.
Chuphat in adang nga angol ho chun aloi dangho chu angah un, nathao twiyu chu phabep neipeu vin, ajeh chu kathao meiyu mitding ahitai” atiuve.
Hinlah adangse chun adonbut un, keihon ibon-uva dingin kanei lhing-pouve. Ajohna mun khat'a gacheuvin chule nangho ding gachouvin ati.
“Ahin amaho thaotwi choa ache kah un, Moulang chu ahungtai. Chuphat in kigosa umho chu amatoh golvahna in'a chun achekhom'un chule kot chu akam tauve.”
Khonungin, mounu loi nga ho chu ahung phat un, polama ading'un, akou-un, “Pakai! Pakai! Keidin kot hongin” atiuve.
Hinlah Aman alekou vin, “Kasei hi tahsan un, Keiman nangho kahepouve,” ati.
“Hijeh chun nangho jong kihong phauvin! Ajeh chu nanghon kahung kile nading nikho le phat chu nahe-pouve.”
“Chujongleh Van Lenggam chu mikhat khol gamlatah a gajin doh toh kitekah ding ahi. Aman asohte akou khom in chule asum chu aumlou kah'a ding in amaho chu ngansena apetai.”
Aman khat chu dangka sumdip nga jen apen, michom khat dangka sumdip ni apen, chule anunung penpa dangka sumdip khat apen ahi. Amahon athauvin ajokham cheh'a achandiu ahoppeh sohkei in ahi. Chujouvin ama khol jindin achetai.
“Dangka sumdip nga kilah sohpa chun asum chu aveikan-in ahileh nga-ma alodoh tai.”
Dangka sumdip ni sangpa jong chu natong in achen ahileh ni-ma alodoh betai.
Hinlah dangka sumdip khat sangpa chun leiset ko alaiyin chuin apu sum chu avuitai.
Phat phabepset jouvin apupa chu akholchena'a kon in ahung kilen, chule asum chu iti amanchah uvem tin akoukhom in, akholtoh in ahi.
Dangka sumdip nga angansepa chu ahungin nga-ma ahin choiben chuin aseiyin, Pu, nangman Dangka sumdip nga neipeh ahin, keiman sumdip nga-ma kamube-e, ati.
“Apu chun apahcha lheh jeng in, ‘Nabol aphalheh jenge Ka sohpha le tahsan umtah nahi. Hicheng sum hi tahsan um-a nachin ahin, tua hi keiman ngensena tamjo-cheh kapeh ding nahitai. Kipah thanom khomu hite!’”
“Dangka sumdip ni sangpa chun ahin nailut in, aseitai, ‘Pu, nangman veipung dinga neipeh Dangka sumdip nia kon in kasupung in, ni-ma kamube-e.’”
“Apu chun, nabol aphai kasohpha le tahsan umtah, nangma sum lhomcha chunga tahsan umtah nahi, hiti chun tua mopohna tamjo cheh kapeh ding nahi. Kipah thanom khom'u hite!”
“Chujouvin, Dangka sumdip khat sangpa chu ahung'in chuin aseiyin, ‘Pu, keiman nangma hi migumtah nahi ti kahen, naphuna louva na-atjin, chule nalho louna'a nakhom khomji ti nahina kahei.
Nasum chu kamansah ding kanatijan, hijeh'a chu leinoiya kasel ahi. Ven, nasum hi kilelah kit in,’” ati.
“Hinlah apu chun adonbut in, Nangma sohgilou le thase, Keiman kaphulouna'a ka-at nahet'a, chule kalholouna leiya kakhop-khom nahet ahileh,
ipi dinga kasum chu sum veipungna'a koilouva nahim? Chuti hen hileh athoi themkhatbeh toh mutha tadinga! ati.”
“Chujouvin aman thu apen, Sum chu hiche sohpa a kon in ladoh uvin chule dangka sumdip som mupa koma peuvin.
Akipe kham kham phatea amanje heho chu, atamjo cheh kipe ding, chule abu-lhingset'a anei dingu ahi. Hinlah imacha bollou ho chu lhomcha anei chasun'u jong kilah mangpeh ding ahiuve.
Tun, hiche soh phachom loupa hi polam muthima paidoh un, hiche muna chu kana le hagelna umding ahi,” ati.
“Hinlah Mihem Chapa chu aloupina'a ahung tengleh avantilte jouse chutoh, chuteng aloupina Laltouna'a touding ahi.
Namtin jouse Ama angsunga kikhom dingu, chule aman miho chu achingpan kelcha'a kona kelngoi achom khen tobanga akhen ding ahi.
Aman akelngoite chu ajetlama akoiya chule kelcha ho chu aveilama akoi ding ahi.”
“Chuteng Lengpa chun jetlam'a ho koma chu, ‘Hungun, Kapa phattheina changho, vannoi kisema pat nangho dinga kigongsa lenggam chu hunglo tauvin.’”
Ajeh chu keima kagil anakel in chupet in nanghon an neipeuve. Kadang anachah in, chupet in nanghon don ding neina peuve. Keima maljin kanahin, chupet in nanghon na'inuva, neina puilut uve.
Sagohkeu kanahin, chupet in nanghon kavon ding neipeuve. Songkul'a kaum in chupet in nanghon neihung vil uve, atiding ahi.
“Chutengleh michonpha ho chun, ‘Pakai, itih'a nagilkel kamu uva, chupet'a kavah vauham? Ahilouleh nadangchah'a chu donding ipi kapeh uvem?
Chule maljin nahi kamu uva, kajenphat nau um'em? Ahilouleh sagoh keova nauma, ponsil ding kapeh uvem?
Itih'a nanat kamu uva chule songkul'a naum itih'a kamu uva kahungvil uvem?’” atidiu ahi.
“Chuteng Lengpa chun, thutahbeh kaseipeh nahiuve, kasopiho lah'a aneopen nabolnau chu, nanghon keima neibolnau ahi.”
“Chutah le Lengpan aveilama umho lam angat'a aseiding, Chemangun, gaosap changho, Diabol le lhagao boh ho dinga gotsa kikoi tonsot meidil'a lut un.
Ajeh chu kagil akel'in chupet in nanghon an neinehsah pouve. Kadang achah in chupet in nanghon don ding jong neipe pouve.
Maljin kana hin chupet in nanghon na'in uva neipui lut pouve. Sagohkeo kanahin, nanghon ponsil neinapepouve. Kana dammo in chule songkul'a kaumin, chupet in nanghon neivil pouve.”
“Chutengleh amahon adonbut-uva, ‘Pakai keihon itih'a nagilkel kamu'uva ahilouleh nadangchah kamu'uva, maljin nahia ahilouleh nanat a, songkul'a nalut a chule kapanpi lounau um'em?’” tia aseidiu ahi.
“Chutengleh aman amaho chu adonbut a, Keiman thudihtah kasei ahi, nanghon kasopite lah'a aneopen napanhunom lounau chu keima neijen nom lou u kahetna ahi.
Chuteng amaho chu tonsot gimbolna a lutding'u, hinlah michonpha ho vang chu Tonsot Hinna'a lut dingu ahi,” ati.
Hichengho jouse aseijouvin Jesun aseijuite jah a,
“Ni ni sunga kalchuh kut kipan ding ahi ti naheuve, chuteng Mihem Chapa hi thingpel a khetbeh dinga pehdoh'a umding ahi,” ati.
Chuchepet chun Thempu pipui hole upa ho chu Thempu chungnung Caiaphas in'a akikhom un,
Jesu chu guhthim'a iti matdoh'a chuteng thathei hiding ham ti agong tauvin ahi.
“Hinlah hichu Kalchuh Kut kimansung hidahen, achutilouleh mipi venjou hipou-vinte,” tin kinoptona aneiyuve. Numei Khat'in Jesu Thao Manlutah Anu
Hiche pet'a chu Jesu Bethany khoa Simon, tumasang jep'a anaphahpa, in'a uma ahi.
Aman an aneh pettah in numei khat ahungin Alabaster haithei hoitah thaonamtui mantamtah chu ahinchoiyin, chuin Alujanga chun asunglhasoh jeng tai.
Seijuiho chun hichu amuphat'uvin alung hangun, “Iti kimoh suhmanga hitam?”
“Hichu man tamtah'a joh thei hiya, a-sum chu mivaicha ho peh thei ahi,” atiuve.
Hinlah Jesun hichu ahedohpai-jin, “Ipi dinga numei nun kachunga athilpha bolna thua oimoa nahiuvem?
Mivaicha ho chu nalah uva umjing ding, hinlah keima nalah uva kaum jing lou ding ahi.
Amahin katahsa hi vuidinga agon'a thaonamtui hi kachunga asunlhah ahitai.
Thutahbeh kaseipeh nahiuve, vannoi pumpia Kipana Thupha kihillhangna chan'a, hiche numeinu thilbol hi kigeldoh'a chule kihoulimna'a kimang ding ahi,” ati.
Chuphat'in seijui som le ni lah'a Judas Iscariot chu thempu pipui henga agachen,
chuin adongin, Jesu nangho koma pehdohna dinga sum ijat neipeh dingu ham? agatin ahi. Chuin amahon dangka nong som thum apeuvin ahi.
Hichea pat chun Judas chun Jesu pehdohna dingin phat kijenpet avetai.
Cholsolou changlhah kut kipat'in seijui ho Jesu henga ahungun, chuin adongun, “Kalchuh Kut an-neh hoilaiya kagon diu nadeijem?” atiuve.
Aman aseipeh in, “Khosunga galut leu chun, mi khat namu dingu, ama koma chun, Houhil chun aseiye, ‘kaphat ahung naitai, na in'a kaseijuite to kalchuh kut kaneh dingu ahi’ tin seipeh un,” ati.
Hiti chun seijuiho chun Jesun asei tobang'in abol'un, chua chun kalchuh kut agagong tauvin ahi.
Nilhah ahung hi phat in, Jesu chu som le ni chuto dokhanga atou khom un ahi.
Amahon an aneh laitah uvin, aman aseiyin, “Thudihtah kaseipeh nahiuve, nangho lah'a khat in neipehdoh dingu ahi,” ati.
Alunglha lheh jeng uvin, ban neichan adong jenguvin, Keima kahi ham, Pakai? atiuve.
Aman adonbut in, “Nalah uva tutah'a lhenga kaso khompi hin eipeh doh ding ahi.
Ajeh chu Mihem Chapa chu Pathen Thun anasei masahpeh ahi dung juiya thitei ding ahi. Hinama jongleh Ama pedoh'a pang pa ding chun itobang tijat hoise ahung tadem. Amapa ding chun apen'a penglou anahijoleh phajo tadinga,” ati.
Apedoh'a pang dingpa Judas jong chun adongin, Houhil, keima hichu kahim? ati. Jesun aseipeh in, “Nakisei khah e” ati.
An aneh laitah un Jesun changlhah phabep alan chuin phatthei aboh in, chujouvin neocha chan aheh balin chuin aseijuite apen, “Kilah un chule neuvin, ajeh chu hiche hi katahsa ahi,” ati.
Chuin Aman khon'a lengpi twi chu alan, chujouvin Pathen athangvah jouvin, amaho chu apen chule aseijin: “Hichea kon in doncheh uvin.
Ajeh chu hiche hi kathisan Pathen le Amite kikah'a kitepna aphotchetna mitampi chonset thenna dinga analongdoh chu ahi.
Kasei hi melchih un, Keiman ka-Pa Lenggama nangho toh athah beh'a kadon kit kahsea lengpitwi hi kadonkit lou ding ahitai,” ati.
Chujouvin amahon la khat asauvin, chule Olive mol'a ding in apotdoh tauve.
Lampia chun Jesun amaho aseipeh in, “Tujan'a hi nabon chauva nei dalhah manghel dingu ahi.” Ajeh chu Pathen Thun aseiye, “Pathen in kelngoi Chingpa chu avoh lhuh ding, chule kelngoi hon chu cheh chau diu ahi.
Hinlah keima thina'a kona kahung thodoh jou teng keima namasang sanguva kache ding chule chua chu keima neimu dingu ahi,” ati.
Peter in aphongdoh jeng in, Adangin nahin dalhah cheh diu hijeng jongleh, keiman vang nadalha ponge, ati.
Jesun adonbut in, “Peter thu dihtah kaseipeh nahi, tujan sunga hi, ahchal khon phat masanga hi thumveijen kahepoi tia neiseilep ding ahi,” ati.
Peter in asei teitei jengin, “Ahipoi, Keima Nangma toh thitha ding hi jong leng naseilep ponge,” ati. Chuin seijui adangho jousen achuti seicheh uve.
Chujouvin Jesu amaho tochun Olivet thingphung ho lah'a Gethsemane hon'a chun acheuvin chuin Aman aseiye, “Keima khukom muna khu kagachea kagatao sungin, hilaiya hin touvun,” ati.
Aman Peter le Zebedee chapa teni James le John chu akipuiyin, chuin Ama alunghem in chule alung lha lheh jengtai.
Aman amaho aseipeh in, “Kalungthim hi thina chan geiya ding in ana behseh tai. Hikom muna hin umun chule keima neingah un,” ati.
Ama agache chon in, chule amai tol'a asulut in, ataovin, “HePa! Hithei ding ahia ahileh, hiche gimthohna khon hi keiya konin kichon manghen. Hinlah keima thusah hijolouvin, nangma phatsah joh chu hijo tahen,” ati.
Chuphat in aseijuite henga ahungin ahileh a-ihmut'u ahungtoh tai. Aman Peter jah a, “Nidan khat jeng jong nei kigin peh joulouvu ham?
Lhepna'a nalhah louna dingun kigingun chule taovun. Ajeh chu Lhagaovin agonan, hinlah tahsan ajoupoi,” ati.
Chuin Jesun amaho chu anivei nan adalhan chule ataovin, “HePa! Hiche khon hi kadon louva kichondoh lou ding ahileh, nalung got hita hen,” ati.
Ama amaho koma akile kit phat in, amaho chu a-ihmut'u ahung mukit tan ahi, ajeh chu amaho a-ihmut'u soh behseh jenga ahitai.
Hiti chun Ama athum veinan agatao kit in, asei ngaima chu agasei kit in ahi.
Chujouvin aseijuite koma ahungin chuin aseiye, “I-mu jeng un. Kicholdouvin, Hinlah veuvin phat ahung lhung'e. Mihem Chapa hi michonse ho khut'a pehdoh'a uma ahitai.
Kipat un cheute. Veuvin, eipedohpa hichea aume,” ati.
Chuin Jesun hiche thu aseina laiyin, seijui som le ni ho lah'a khatpen Judas chu mihon tampitoh chemjam le moltum choi pum in ahunglhung un ahi. Amaho chu miho lah'a upa ho le thempu pipui ho hinsol ahiuve.
Amatsah'a pang Judas chun amaho melchihna gontohsan akoiyin: “Nang hon koipen mat ding chu nahet theina dinguva keiman kalem-a abeng kachop peh ding ahi,” ati.
Hiti chun Judas chun Jesu ahinjon pai jelin, “Chibai houhil,” atin abeng achoptai.
Jesun ajah'a, “Kajol, ipi boldia hung'ah nahim? Nabol ding chu boltan,” ati. Chujouvin amahon Jesu chu aman tauve.
Hinlah Jesu to umkhom ho lah'a khat chun achemjam aladoh in chuin Thempu chungnung sohpa chu asat le abilkol asat lha jenge.
Jesun aseipeh in, “Na chemjam chu koidoh in. Chemjam mangcha ho chu chemjama thiding ahiuve.
Keiman Ka-Pa jah'a Vantil asangsang ho chu eihuhdoh diuva kathum-mo ham? Chule Aman apettah'a ahinsol paijeng thei ahi nageldoh lou u ham?
Hinlah keiman chuti bolleng, Pathen Thubun asei tua guilhung ding ati hi, iti hithei ding hitam?” ati.
Chujouvin Jesun mihonpi jah'a chun, “Keima hi gamsung vaipohna khelgoa neingai touva chemjam le moltum thoa eiman dinga hunga nahiuvem? Ipi dinga Hou-in'a neimat lou u ham? Chua chu niseh'a thu kanahil ji ahi.
Hinlah hicheng jouse hi Pathen Thubua thu kisei aguilhun na dinga hitia ahi,” ati.
Chujouvin Jesu man ho chun Caiaphas Thempu chungnung in'a apui tauve, hiche muna chu hou danthuhil hole upa ho kikhoma ahiuve.
Hiche phatkah sunga chu Peter in galkanga Jesu chu ajui ahi. Ama agalut in chule avesuiya pangho chutoh atoukhom in chujongleh iti kichai yuvem ti angahtai.
Asunga thempu pipui hole upa ho akikhom jouse chun Jesu chu jouthua hettohsahna neiya hitia chu athemomna ding angai touvin ahi.
Hinlah amahon jouthua hettohsahna ding tamtah anei vangun midang thua hettohsahje ahetapouve. Ajona keiyin mini masang lama ahungdoh lhon in,
amani chun, “Hichepa hin keiman Pathen Hou-in kasuhmang'a chule ni thum sunga katundoh kit thei ding ahi atie,” atilhon in ahi.
Chuphat in thempu chungnung chu ading doh in, chuin Jesu jah'a chun, “Nathemo channau hi nadonbut lou ding ham? Nachung thua ipi nakiseinom um'em?” ati.
Hinlah Jesu chu thipbeh'in aum in ahi. Thempu chungnung chun ajah a, “Pathen hing mina katem nahi, Nangma Pathen Chapa Messiah chu nahim, neiseipeh un,” ati.
Jesun adonbut in, “Nasei khai. Chule khonung teng nanghon Mihem Chapa hi Pathen jetlam thaneina'a atou namu dingu ahi,” ati.
Chutah chun Thempu chungnung chun hoise val asah chu vetsahna'in a-ponsil abotkeh in chule aseiyin, Pathen ataitome! Ipi hettohsah dang ingaichat beu ngaiyem? Nangho jousen Pathen ataitomna thucheng naja tauve.
Ipi ham nangho thulhuh chu? Tia adoh le amahon, “Athemmoa ahi, athi dinga pha ahi,” atiuve.
Hiphat chun amahon Jesu maiya chil aset un chule akhut tumuva achum tauve. Chule abang phabep in angeiphe abengun,
anuisat un, Messiah gaovin seiyin! Koipen in navoh ham? atiuve.
Hiche pet'a chu Peter chu thutanna mun pamlama touva ahi. Chupet chun soh numei khat ahung pheiyin chule “Nangma Galilee-a Jesu nungjui ho lah'a khat nahi,” ahung ti.
Hinlah Peter chun miho masanga chun aseilep in, “Ipi thu nasei ahi keiman kahepoi,” ati.
Chujouvin kelkot phung ageipet in, soh numei chom khat in amachu ahen chule akimvel'a touho koma chun, “Hichepa hi Nazareth Jesu toh um-ah ahi,” ati.
Peter in avellin aseilep in, kihahsel to-thon, “Hichepa chu ahet'a kahetlou ahi,” atitai.
Chule chomkhat jouvin achom dang khat akimvela dingho chu Peter koma ahung in, aseiyin, “Nangma amaho lah'a khat nahi, Galilee mi nahi, na pao aw chun kahedoh jeng uve,” atiuve.
Peter kihahsel tothon, “Jou kaseile gaosap chang ing'e keiman hichepa hi kahepoi,” ati. Chuin apettah chun ahchal chu akhongtai.
Apettah chun Jesu thusei chu Peter lunggela ahung kilangdoh in, “Ahkhon masanga thumvei neiseilep ding, Keima hi koi ahi kahe-khapoi,” tia nasei ding ahi, tichu ageldoh in polama apot'in lhasetah in akap tai.
Jingpi matah in thempu pipui hole miho lah'a upa ho atoukhom kit un, Jesu thana ding angaito tauve.
Chujouvin amaho chun Ama akan un, apui mangun, chuin Rome gamvaipo Pilate henga apui tauve.
Ama pedoh'a pangpa Judas chun Jesu chu thichan geiya dinga themo achan'u chu ahen, alunga akisih lheh jeng tai. Hiti chun aman dangka somthum chu alan, thempu pipui hole upa ho koma achoiyin,
aman aphongdoh in, “Kachonse tai, ajeh chu keiman themmona neilou chu kapedoh tai” ati. Ama hon adonbut'un, “Keihon ija kageldeh uvem, hichu nangma boina hibouva chu,” atiuve.
Chujouvin Judas chun dangka sum nong chu Hou-in sunga aleh lhan chule apotdoh in amale ama akikhai lihtai.
Thempu pipui ho chun sum nong chu aloh khom un, aseiyun, “Hiche sum hi Hou-in'a sumkoina'a koikhom nom-ponte, ajeh chu mithana dinga kipedohsa ahi,” atiuve.
Akihoutoh jouvun, ajonan amahon beldengpa honlei choh ding in agellha tauve. Chule hichu gampam mi kivuina dingin asem tauve.
Hijeh'a chu leimun min chu Thisan Man kitia ahi.
Hiche hi Jeremiah themgao thusei aguilhun nan “Amahon dangka som thum nong chu alauvin, Israel miten aman dinga agel-uva aphasah nau man chu ahi.
Chuin amahon bel dengpa honlei chu, Pakaiyin ahilna bangtah in acho tauve.”
Chupet'a chu Rome gamvaipo Pilate ang-a Jesu ding ahin, Gamvaipo chun “Nangma Judah te Lengpa nahim?” tin adonge. Jesun adonbut in, “Nasei khai” ati!
Hinlah Thempu pipui hole upa hon ama douna thu aseiyun, Jesu athipbeh in ahi.
“Amahon nangma douna thu hijatpi aseiyu hi najahlou ham?” tin Pilate in adong in ahi.
Chuin Jesun athemmosah naho'uva imacha adonbutlou jeh chun Gamvaipo chun adatmo lheh e.
Kalchuh Kut kumseh le kiman jina'a chu mihonpin adeiyu khat gamvaipo chun sohchang khat alhadoh jiu ahi.
Hiche kum'a hi sohchang giloutah khat Barabbas atiu ana um'ah ahi.
Mihonpi chu Pilate in'a akikhop pet un, hiche jingkah chun, aman amaho chu adong in, “Nangho dinga koijoh ham kalha dohpeh dingu? Barabbas ha ahilouleh Jesu kiti Messiah hi kalha dohpeh diu ham?” ati.
(Amahin houlamkai hon Jesu chu thangthipman'a amat'u ahi, ti ahechen lheh in ahi).
Pilate thutanna'a atoupet tah in ajinu chun hiche thuhi athot in: “Hiche themmona beipa hi limsah hih in. Ama jeh hin tujan ka-ihmutna'a chun kathoh gimlheh jenge,” ati.
Hichepet chun thempu pipui hole upa ho chun mihonpi chu atem un, Barabbas chu lhadoh'a auma chule Jesu chu thisah ding in atil tauvin ahi.
Hiti chun Gamvaipopa chun adong kit in, “Koijoh hi lhadohpeh leuveng nalungu ham?” ati. Mihonpi chun, Barabbas atiuve.
Pilate in adonbut in, “Messiah kiti Jesu hila ikalo ding ham?” ati. Amahon, “Thingpel'a khenbeh in,” atiuve.
Pilate in “Ipi jeh inem? Ipi suhkhel len anei ham?” ati. Hinlah mihonpi chun aha sap cheh uvin, “Thingpel'a khenbeh in,” atiuve.
Plate chun imacha phatchomna aum-louva chusanga boina asocheh ding chu amu phat in, aman cha-konga twi athum in chule mihonpi masanga chun akhut akisop in aseitai, Hichepa thisan kisona'a hin themmona kaneipoi: Nanghon kimopoh tauvin'ati.
Chuin miho jouse chun, Ama thina chunga keiho le kachateu geiyin mo kipoh naveh tangu tin ale-donbut un ahi.
Chuin aman Barabbas chu alhadoh peh'in, Jesu vang chu sakol jepna thih lingneiya jep ding in Rome sepai ho thu apen chule amahon thingpel'a akhetbeh diuvin apedoh tai.
Gamvaipopa sepaiho chun Jesu chu a tol-piu thutanna mun'a apuiyun chule sepaiho chu akou doh un ahi.
Amahon apon chu ahoh lhauvin, chule ponsandup asilpeh uvin ahi.
Amahon ling bah ho chu lukhuh in asem un chule alu chunga akoiyun chuin akhut jetlam'a peng tengol akichoisah un leng-tengolin aneisah uve. Chujouvin totnan a-anga adilsu-uvin chuin dainopnan, Kajabol'ui, Judate Lengpa atiuve.
Chujongleh chil aset khum un chuin atenggol chu alahpeh un chule hichea chun aluchang avohpeh un ahi.
Achainakeiya totnopna'a anei nung-uvin, amahon ponsan chu alahpeh uvin chuin amapon asilpeh kit tauve. Chujouvin amahon thingpel'a khetbeh ding in apui-tauve.
Lampia chun mikhat Simon, Cyrene a kona hung ahin, chuin sepaiho chun ada-adoiyin Jesu thingpel chu aputsah tauve.
Chuin amaho Golgatha atiu (hichu lugumun kitina) mun chu alhung tauve.
Sepaiho chun juthuh le gilkha kihal apeuvin, hinlah aman ate jouvin, adon nom-tapoi.
Amahon Thingpel chunga akhetbeh jouvun, sepaiho chun aponsil chu avangpha pha chang hen tin vang asang tauve.
Chujouvin amaho akimvela atouvun chule ama kikhai pet in angah un ahi.
Jesu luchunga chun melchihna khat atah un, ama dounaa aheh setnau phondohnan, “Hiche hi Jesu Judah te lengpa,” tin akijih in ahi.
Gamsung kivaipoh kikhelsah goa mini chu khat ajet lama chule khat aveilama Amatoh akhetbeh thauvin ahi.
Chule ahin hopa ho chun isahlou tah in akhasuh khum uvin,
amahon asam un, “Kiven tun, nangman Hou'in chu nasuh chima chule ni thum sunga natundoh ding in naseiye. Chutia nangma Pathen Chapa nahileh nangma kihuhhing'in lang chule thingpel'a kon'in hungkum lhan,” atiuve.
Thempu pipui ho, houdan thuhil ho chule upa ho jong chun totnopnan Jesu chu ahouvun,
ataitom un, “Aman midang ahuhhing theiyin, hinlah ama akihuhhing theipoi” atiuve. Hitia hi ama Israel te lengpa hiya ham? Tutah hin ama thingpel a kon'in hung kumlha hen, chutileh katahsan diu ahi.
Aman Pathen atahsan in, hijeh chun Pathen in ama adeiya ahileh huhhing hen. Ajeh chu aman aseiyin, “Keima Pathen Chapa kahi, ati” atiuve.
Gamsung kivaipoh kikhelsah goteni jong chun hitima chun ahouse lhon in ahi.
Sunkim'a pat nilhangkai nidan thum geiyin gamsung pumpia mu athim in ahi.
Nilhangkai nidan thum don in, Jesun aw sangtah in asam in, “Eli, Eli, lema sabach thani?” hichu “Ka Pathen, ka Pathen, ipi dinga neidon lou hitam?” ti kiseina ahi.
Akimvela dingho phabep chun ahekhel-uvin, chuti chun themgao Elijah akouvin agel uve.
Amaho lah'a khat chu alhai jelin chuin twichop phonna juthuh chu agadelhop in, pumpeng leh'a chun adontheina ding in atah sang in ahi.
Hinlah midangho chun, “Khongaiyin, Elijah ahuhhing dinga hungnam, veuhite,” atiuve.
Chujouvin Jesun ahinsam kit in, chuin a-Lhagao alhadoh tai.
Hichepet chun Hou-in munthenga pondal chu anah a pat ato geiyin keh ni akiso tai. Leiset akithing in chule songpi ho jong akehlha jenge.
Chuin lhankot ho akihong in, Pathen ngaisah athisaho tahsa chu kaithouvin aumkit un ahi.
Jesu thokit jouvin amahon lhankhuh chu adalhauvin, Jerusalem khopia alut un, chule mitamtah henga agakimusah uvin ahi.
Rome sepai jalamkaipa le sepai dang ho akikhetbehna mun'a umho chun ling akihoa hitiho thusoh chun atijatsah lheh uvin ahi. Amahon aseiyun, “Hiche hi Pathen Chapa tahbeh ahiye,” atiuve.
Chule numei tampi Jesu toh Galilee akon'a ahin lhonpi ama gelkhoh ho chun gamlatah a kon-in aveu vin ahi.
Amaho lah'a Mary Magdalene, James le Joseph nu Mary, chule James le John (Zebedee chapateni) ahiuve:
Nilhah ahung hi phat in, Joseph Arimathea khoa mihaopa, amahin Jesu nung anajui ahin,
Pilate henga agachen chule Jesu tahsa chu athum in ahi. Chule Pilate chun ama pehdoh ding in phalna apetai.
Joseph hin atahsa chu alan tupat ponnem thengsel'in atom in ahi.
Aman ama lhan thah, songpia kon'a kigeihom sunga chun akoiyin ahi. Chujouvin aman alutna mun'a chun songlentah khat atahlut jouvin achemangtai.
Mary le Magdalene chule Mary chomnu lhan'a atou un chule angah un ahi.
Ajingin, Sabbath nikhon thempu pipuho le Pharisee ho Pilate kimupidin aga-cheuvin ahi.
Amahon ajah a, “Pu, hiche milhem lhapa chun ahinlaiya khatvei anasei chu kageldoh uve. Aman ni thum joule thina'a kon'a kathodoh kit ding ahi.
