Hijeh'a hi lhan chu ni thum lhinkah'a dingin mohor nam in. Hiche hin aseijuite ahung uva chule atahsa guhmangna chule mijouse koma ama athilah'a kon in athoudohtai atina diu umta ponte. Hiti chu hileh amasa suhkhel sang'a phajo hiding ahi,” ati.
Pilate in adonbut in, “Hou-in ngah ho chu puiyun lang chule nahonbit thei chan un hongbit un,” ati.
Hiti chun amahon lhan chu mohor anam'un chule avetup ding'in angah akoi tauve.
Cholngahni kichai hapta kipatni jingpi matah in, Mary Magdalene le Mary chomnu chu lhan gave ding in apotdoh lhonin ahi.
Phulou helouvin ling hattah in akihot in ahi. Ajeh chu Pakai vantil chu van'a kon'in ahung kumlhan, song chu atangdoh in, chule achunga chun atouvin ahi.
Amai chu kolphe bangin avah in, chule aponsil chu buhbang ban'in abangin ahi.
Angah ho chun ama chu amu phat-un kichatnan adim un, chuin athia to abang jeng uve.
Chujouvin vantil chun numeiho jah a, “Kicha hih uvin, keiman thingpel'a ana-kikhenbeh Jesu chu nahol'u ahi kahenai.
Ama hiche muna hin aumtapoi! Aman aseisa bangin, Ama thinaa kon'in athou dohtai. Hung'un lang, Pakai tahsa lupna mun hi hung vetauvin.
Chule tuhin, chepai jeng un, chule aseijuiho koma Ama thinaa kon'in athou-dohtai, chule Ama namasanguva Galilee a anache masa ding ahi. Chuche muna Ama namu dingu ahi. Keiman kanaseipeh'u geldoh uvin,” ati.
Numeiho chu lhan akon'in achepai jeng-un ahi. Amaho chu ahakichat'u toh chule kipa thanop toh thon, vantil thupoh chu seiding'in alhailoi jengun ahi.
Chuin amaho acheuva ahileh, Jesun amaho akimupin chujongleh ana lamtouvin ahi. Chuin amaho akom lama chun alhaiyun, akeng atuh uvin, chule dilsun a-hou tauve.
Chujouvin Jesun ajah uva, “Kichahih uvin! Cheuvin, kasopite ho koma chun Galilee a che ding'in gaseipeh un, chule chua chu keima eimu dingu ahi, ti gaseipeh un,” ati.
Numei ho chu lampi ageina laiyun, lhan ngah phabep chu khopi sunga alut'un chule thempu pipuho henga ipi thusoh ahi chu agasei tauve.
Upa ho chun kihou khomna aneiyun, chule amaho chun sepaiho chu sum tamtah pehguh ding'in aseilha tauve.
Amahon sepaiho jah'a chun, “Nanghon Jesu seijuite chu jan'a ka-ihmut pet-un ahung un, chujongleh along chu ahung gudoh tauve, tin seiyun.
Gamvaipo chun hiche thu chu ajahdoh'a ahileh, keihon nadinpiu ving ting hahsatna nachunguva lhunsah pouvinge,” atiuvin ahi.
Hiti chun lhan ngah ho chun sum aguh'a kipe chu akilah un, hiti chun asei dinguva kinganse chu aseitauve. Amaho thusim hi Judahte lah'a thusim in akiseison peh in, chule tuni geiyin akisei jing nalaiye.
Chujouvin seijui som le khat ho chun Galilee adalhauvin, Jesun ateppeh nau mola chun agache tauve.
Ama amu phat'un, dilsun a-hou tauve, hinlah phabep in aging chalel-uvin ahi.
Chuin Jesu ahung in, chujongleh aseijuite jah'a chun, “Van'a le leiset chunga thuneina jouse Keima eikipedoh'a ahitai.
Hijeh chun, nangho cheuvin chule namtin jouse seijuiyin gasemun, amaho chu Pa le Chapa chule Lhagao Theng min-in Twilutsah uvin.
Keiman Kathupeh ho jouse hi seijui thah hochun aboncha ajui sohkeina dingun hil-uvin. Chule hiche khang kichai kahsea dingin Keiman nangho Ka-umpi jing nauve,” ati.
Hichehi Messiah Jesu Christa, Pathen Chapa thudola kipana thupha chu ahi.
Isaiah Themgaovin anasei: “Veuvin, keiman namasanguva thupole kahin solle. Aman lampi nagonpeh diu ahi.
Ama chu ahi gamthip a aw samginga, ‘Pakai hungna ding lampi semtoh-un! Amadin lampi sutheng un!’ tia chu,” anati bangin ahung kipanin ahi.
Hiche thupole chu Twilutsah John chu ahi. Ama chu gamthip ah aumin chule mihon achonset kisihnau chule ngaidam channa dia Pathen ang akiheilutnau vetsahna dinga baptize achan diuvin thu ahilin ahi.
Juda gam jouse, Jerusalem mite jouse chutoh, John muding le thusei ngai dingin acheuvin ahi. Chule amahon achonsetnau aphondoh phat un, aman Jordan Luiyah baptize achansah in ahi.
Akivonna chu sangongsang mul pon ahin, savun konggah-in akong ageh-in, chule a-anneh chu khaokho le gam khoiju ahi.
John'in, “Koiham khat hungvah ding ahitai, Ama chu keima sanga lenjo-kei sanga lenjo cheh hiding, keima akengchot khao sutlham dinga jong lom kahipoi.
Keiman twiya baptize kachansah nahiuvin, ahivangin Ama chun nangho Lhagao Thenga baptize nachansah dingu ahi!” ati.
Nikhat Galilee gamsunga Nazareth khoa konin Jesu ahungin, Jordan luiyah John khut'in baptize achangtan ahi.
Chuin Jesu twi lah-a konin ahungdohin, van akikehson Lhagao Theng vakhu bangin achungah ahungchui.
Van'ah aw ahung gingin: “Nangma kachapa deitah nahi, nachungah kalung alhai tangeiye,” ati.
Chuin Lhagaochun gamthip'a apuimang paiyin,
Chua chun ni somli Satan lhep patep in aumin, gamsaho laha aumin, vantil hon avengkol un ahi.
Phat chomkhat jouvin John songkul'a akhum jouvun, Jesu Galilee gamah achen, Pathen Kipana Thupha ahillhanglen,
“Pathen phattep ahung lhungtai,” tin asampeh in, “Pathen Lenggam chu anaitai. Chonsetna kisih-unlang, Kipana Thuphahi tahsanun!” atin ahi.
Nikhat Jesun Galilee Dillen pang ajotpana ah ngaman'a kivah le nehhol, Simon le asopipa Andrew chun dillen a ngamatna len anase lhon agatohkhan ahi.
Jesun akoudohin, “Kanung hinjui lhonin, keiman miho matje nahil lhon inge!” atin ahi.
Chuin amanin alen adalha lhonin anung ajuipai jeng lhontai.
Chuin twipanga kon themkhat ache chon jepleh Jesun Zebedee chapateni, Jacob le anaopa John chun kongsunga len anakhuiphat pet lhon amun,
Amani chu akouvin ahile, amanin apau Zebedee toh kongsunga um thaloa agoihou chu adalha lhonin ajui lhontai.
Jesu le akilhonpiho Capernaum khopiah achelut'un ahi. Cholngahni ahung lhunchun houin'ah acheuvin, hiachun thu ahil pantan ahi.
Aman danthu sunho banga hillouva, thuneitah banga ahil jeh'in miho chun athuhil chu kidang asalheh-un ahi.
Chuin hetloukah'in lhagao-boh vop mikhat houin'ah anaumin, ama chun ahinsampaiyin,
“Nazareth Jesu, Ipi dinga kalah'uva hung kikum nahim? Keiho suchimit dinga hung nahim? Nangma koi nahi kahenai—Pathen Theng chu nahi!” ati.
Jesun amachu aphoh-in, “Thipmin! Amaa kon chun hungdoh'in,” tin thu apen ahi.
Chuin lhagao-boh chun mipa chu aheh-in, hapen in apengin ahung potdoh tai.
Mijousen kidang asauvin, thilsoh chungchanga chun khat le khat akidongun ahi. “Hiche hi ipi kihilna thuthah hikit hitam? Itobang thuneina hitantem! Lhagao-boh jengin jong athupeh angaiye!” atiuvin ahi.
Jesu Christa thu chu Galilee gamsung pumpiah akithangsoh pai jeng tan ahi.
Kikhopna in chu Jesun Jacob le John toh adalhah jouvin Simon le Andrew in'ah alut un ahi.
Chua chun Simon nupanu chu khosih dammon analum e. Amahon adammo thu chu Jesu ahetsahpaiyun ahi.
Hichun amanu koma chun achepheiyin akhut in atuh-in, akaithouvin atousah tai. Hichun akhosih chun alhatan, chuin amanu chu amaho nehding semin apangtai.
Nilhum jou nilhah-in mihon ana-damlou le thilhavop ho chu Jesu komah ahin puiyui.
Khomite jouse chu ave din kotkhah phunga akitit dimsoh jenge.
Chuin Aman hivei chom chom veiya damlou mi tamtah adamsah'in, chule thilha tamtahma adeldoh'in ahi. Hinla Ama Christa ahi chu thilhahon ahet'u ahijeh-in thilhaho chu apaodoh sahpoi.
Khovahlhah masang ajing jingkah-in Jesu athouvin, apotdohin gamthip munah achen, chua chun taona agamangin ahi.
Chomkhat jouvin Simon le aloiho apotdohun, chuin agamudoh tauvin ahi.
Amudoh phatnun ajah-a, “Mijouse hinla Nang nahol cheh-un,” atiuvin ahi.
Jesun adonbut in “Khopi danga jong kahillhangle theinadin cheute, hiche dinga chu hung kahi,” ati.
Chuin Galilee gamsungseah achelen, akikhopnau intin'ah thu ahillhanglen chule thilha adeldohpeh in ahi.
Chuin miphah khat Jesu hengah kijendamsah dingin ahungin, adilsun, ajah-a, “Nalung ahileh neidamsah'a neisuh theng thei ahi,” ahung titai.
Athusei chun alung atohkhah behseh jeh'in, Jesun akhut alhangin athamin, “Kalung ahi,” atitai. Chuin, “Damthengtan!” ati leh,
Apetpet'in aphah chu aphapai jengin, adamthengtai.
Chuin amapa chu khamgahna aneiyin asoldohtai.
“Hichehi koima komah seidoh hih in. Hisang chun thempu koma chen lang gakivetsah'in. Mose dan thupehsa dungjuiya phah kijendamhon maicham thilto apeh ding dol chu choiyin lang gapetan. Hichu nadam thengna mipi het'a phondohna hiding ahi,” tin thupeh aneiyin ahi.
Ahivangin amapa apotdohin, thil-umdol chu aseiphongle tan ahi. Hichea kon chun Jesu chu mipin aumkivelle jeng tan, hijehchun lhangphongin khopi sungah alut thei tapoi. Hichun munthip thip lah-a aumjotan, ahijeng vang'in muntina konin mipin ahin jonlut jing nalaiyui.
Nikho phabep jouva Jesu Capernaum'a akilekit chun, in lamah akile kittai ti muntin'ah anathangsoh man kittan ahi.
Chomloukah'in aumna in'ah chun mipi ahung kititdim jengin, umna ding kotphung polam jeng jong onglou khop'in mi adimlha jeng tai. Mipiho chu Pathen thu ahil jing laiyin,
Pasal li-in langthi khat pheh chungah ahin pulutnun ahi.
Mipi atam behseh jeh chun Jesu kom alutthei tahih-un, hijehchun Ama luchung dontah'a inchung alhong chu aphevangun, langthipa chu alupna pumin a-angsungah akhailha jeng tauvin ahi.
Atahsan jeu chu Jesun amun, langthipajah-a chun, “Chapa, nachonsetnaho kingaidam ahitai,” ati.
Ahinlah danthusun phabep khat chua touho chun alungthim uvah,
“Ibola hitia chu thu aseiham? Hiche hi kitaitomna ahi. Pathen bouvin chonset angaidamthei ahi!” tin agel un ahi.
Alunguva ipi agelu chu Jesun ahepai jengin ajah uvah, “Ibola lung-opkai le lungboi nahiuvem?
Langthipa koma, ‘Nachonsetnaho kingaidama ahitai’ ti toh ‘Thouvin, nalupna pheh chu kichoidoh'in lang lam jottan,’ ti chu hoijoh baijo am?”
Ahoi hita jongle leiset chunga Mihem Chapan chonset ngaidamna thahat aneiye ti nahetna diuva photchenna kavetsah ding nahiuve, ati.
Chuin langthipa lamah Jesu akiheiyin, “Thouvin, nalupna pheh kichoiyin lang in lamah chetan!” ati.
Chutah chun langthipa chu akichomin, alupna pheh akilah-in japi lungdong ho mitmutah chun achedoh tai. Amaho chun kidang asalheh jengun, “Hitobang himhim kamukha pouve,” atiuvin Pathen avahchoi avahchoi tauve.
Chuin Jesu apotdohin dillen pangah achekit tan, chuah mipi ahenga hungho chu thu ahil e.
Chuin achephei leh, Alphaeus chapa Levi chu akaidonna mun'a atou amun ahi. Hichun ajah'ah, “Neijuiyin lang kaseijui hitan,” atileh ama chu akipatdoh'in anung ajuitai.
Chujouvin Levin Jesu leh aseijuite ain'a annedin akouvin, chuleh kaidongho le michonseho tamtah jong akouthan ahi. (Jesu nungjuiho lah-a hitobang mi chu tamtah um ahi).
Danthuhilho lah-a pharisee hon Jesun michonse holeh kaidongho toh an anehkhom chu amu phatnun, aseijuite jah-a, “Itidan a kaidongho le michonseho toh an anehkhom ham?” ati tauvin ahi.
Hichu Jesun ajatan, hichun ajah uvah, “Atidamten louthem angaipouve, adamlouten bou angaiyui. Michonphate kouva hung kahipoi, lunghei dia michonsete kouva hungjoh kahibouve,” atipeh tai.
Khatvei John seijui holeh Pharisee hon an angol laiyun, mi phabep ahungun Jesu jah-ah, “I-atile John seijuiho le pharisee hon an ngoljiuva, nangma seijuihon an angolji louham?” tin adongun,
Jesun adonbut in, “Mouloma chehon golnop aneilaiyuva an angol jiuvem? Achutilou ding hetsa ahi. Moulang in aumpi laiseuva an angollou diu ahi.
Amavang moulang chu akomuva kon'a akipuimang ni hung lhung ding ahi—chuche nileh an angol dingu ahi.
Chujongleh, koiyin pon thah hal chu ponluiya abeh ngaiyem? Beh taleh abehna joh chun kai ehjocheh intin, athah joh chun alui chu akaiset ding ahi.
Chuleh koiman Lengpitwi thah savun pengluiya akhum ngaipoi; achuti kibol leh alengpitwi chun asavun peng chu tumkeh intin, lengpitwi le savun peng akop a mang ding ahi. Lengpitwi thah chu peng thah-a akhumji bouvui,” ati.
Cholngahni khat hin Jesu buleilai ajot in ahileh, aseijuiten ache pum un changvui chu asih pan tauvin ahi.
Chuin Pharisee hon Jesu jah-a, “Vetang, ibola Cholngahnia bolngailou abol uham?” atiuve.
Jesun adonbut in, “David le aloiho alhahsam uva agilkel pet'uva chu i-abolu nasim khah hih um?
Abiathar Thempu chungnung ahilaiyin Pathen in'ah alut in, Thempu tailou adangin aneh dia phal hilou changlhahho chu anen, aloiho jong apen ahi,” ati.
Jesun amaho jah-a aseipehben, Cholngahni chu mihem dinga kisem ahi. Cholngahni dinga mihem kisemjoh ahipoi.
Chuti chu ahin, Mihem Chapa chu Pakai ahin, Cholngahni Pakai jong ahi, ati.
Jesu Judaho Pathen houna in'a achekit leh chuah mi khutlang ngoi khat agamui.
Hichu Cholngahni ahijeh'in amelmaten ahehset theina diu achanglhi jinguvin ahi. Khutlang ngoipa chu Cholngahnia adamsah-a ahi leh themmo chan ding tohgon aneiyui.
Jesun khutlang ngoipa jah-a, “Hungin lang mipi masangah hung dingdoh-in,” atitai.
Chuin Ama doudal le nelkal-ho lang ngan akiheiyin ajah-uva, “Cholngahnia thilpha bol ding danthun aphal em, ole ase bolna ding nikho ham? Hiche nikho hi hinna huhdoh nikho ham, suhmang nikho joh ham?” tia adoh leh, amahon adonbut tapouve.
Hichun Aman lunghangtah in amaho chu avekimvelin, alungtah jeh'u chun nommo asalheh-in ahi. Hichun khutlang ngoipa jah-a, nakhut lhangin, atin chuin alhangin ahileh, akhut chu adamtan ahi.
Chuin Pharisee ho chu apotdoh-un Ama suhmang theina ding angaito uvin, Herod solchahho toh akihoutoh paitauve.
Jesu aseijuite toh dil lama chun acheuvin, mihon tamtah'in ajuiyun ahi. Amaho chu Galilee le Juda gam'a kon,
Chuleh Jerusalem, Idumia, Solam Jordan luigala kon, Tyre le Sidon chunglam gam'a kon jong ahiuve. Athilbol kidang thuthanga konin gamlatah tah'a kipanin ahung veuvin ahi.
Jesun aseijuite asolin, mihonpin Ama lam ahin phutlou nadin kong gotsa-a akoi diuvin athuhilin ahi.
Chuche nikho chun mi tamtah adamsah'in, hijehchun adamlouho chun Ama atohkhah theina dingun Ama lam chu ahin no tentun jengun ahi.
Lhagaoboh vop-ho vang chun Ama amu chan un, tolsenan akineiyun, a-ang sungah abohkhup un, “Nangma Pathen Chapa chu nahi!” tin asam jiuvin ahi.
Ahin Aman lhagao phalouho chu Ama koi ahi aphondoh louna diuvin agih-in ahi.
Chujouvin Jesu molchunga akaltouvin, alhonpi dinga angaichat chengse chu akouvin, amahon jong ajuiyun ahi.
Chuin mi somleni alhengdoh'in, asolchah dingin apansahtan ahi. Amaho chu Ama kilhonpi ding le thuhillhang le asollea pang ding ahiuvin,
Chuleh thilhaho nodoh theina thuneina jong apen ahi.
Hiche somleni alhenho chu: Simon (Aman Peter asahpa chu),
James le John (Zebedee chapateni, Jesun, Boanerges (Van-ging chapate tina) tia amin aphohpehteni),
Andrew, Philip, Bartholomew, Matthew, Thomas, James (Alphaeus chapa), Thaddaeus, Simon (mi kipum pehpa),
Judas Iscariot (Ama johdohpa); hicheng hi ahiuve.
Khatvei Jesu in khat'a alut leh, mihonpi ahung kikhomkit tauve. Hijehchun Ama le aseijuiten an nehphat tahbah jong aneithei tapouve.
Hichu ainkoten ajah phat uvin apuidoh dingin ahungui. “Ama hi angol a hita hi,” atitauve.
Jerusalema kon'a hung danthusunho ma jong chun, “Amahi thilhate lengpa, Satan in avop ahi. Ama a kon'a chu thilhate nodoh theina tha anei ahi,” atiuvin ahi.
Chuin Jesun amaho chu akouvin, ahilchetna dingin, Satan in Satan iti anodoh thei ding ham?
“Lenggam khat amite kikhentel'a kidouto chu mahthah-a lhutei ding ahi.
Hibang chun insung kikhentel chu chehchaova dingdoh theilou ding ahi.
Satan jong kisepkhen henlang ama le ama kidou taleh iti dingdet thei ding ham? Dingdoh joulouhel ding ahi.
Seichenbe inge. Satan tobanga hat mi khat in'a chu koiham thaneitah'a galut'a chule aneiho gachom ding chu? Ama sanga hatjoa bou chun ama chu akantuma chutengle bou athil achomthei ding ahi.
Chule tahbeh'a kaseipeh nahiuve, itobang chonsetna le kitaitomna hijongle kingaidam thei ding ahi.
Amavang koihileh Lhagao Theng taitom vang chu imatih chan'a ngaidam changlou ding, hichu tonsot geiya ngaidam changlou ding chonsetna ahi,” ati.
Hicheho aseinajeh pentah chu amahon Ama chu, “Lhagao phalouvin avop ahi,” ati jeh-u ahi.
Chuin anu le asopite ahungun inpoah adingun, Ama ahungdoh-a kihoulimpi dingin thu athot'un ahi.
Hipet chun mihonpi Jesu kimvelin atou chahkheh-in, thupopa chun ajah-a, “Nanu le nasopite polamah aumun, nahin hol uve,” ahung tin ahi.
Jesun adonbut in, “Koiham kanu? Koiham kasopiteho?” ati.
Chuin akimvela touho chu avegolin, “Ven, amahohi kanule kasopiteho ahiuve,”
Koihileh Pathen lunglama chonhochu kasopipa, kasopinu chule kanu ahi, ati.
Avelin dil panga thu ahilpan kit tai. Mipi tamtah akomah ahung kikhom pai jengun, Ama kong sungah aluttan ahi. Kong sunga chun atouvin, mipite chu vaokamah atouvun ahi.
Amaho chu thulem'in thutamtah ahilin,
“Ngaiyun! Muchi thepa muchi then achen ahi.
Athe atheleh abang lamsih-ah achun, hiho chu vachaten ahungloh-un anegam tauvin ahi.
Chule abang songlheo chunga leipatna lah a achun, alei asalou jeh'in akehdoh jengin,
Ahivangin nisan ahin kah phatnin asanggon, jung aneilou jeh'in agoplhapaitan ahi.
Chule abang linglah-a achun, ling hochu ahung khangin chang phung dong nalaiho chu adeplihtan, ahinga aumtapoi.
Adangho chu leiphalaiya achun, ahung khangin aga tan, hiho chu ajat somthum, ajat somgup, ajat jakhat chengin apungtan ahi!”
Chuin Aman aseiyin, “Koihileh khojahna ding nakhang neiyin ngaihen,” ati.
Chomkhat jouvin aseijui somleni ho toh akimvela midangho toh aumkhom pet'in, amahon athulem seiho chu ipi kiseina ham tin adongui.
Aman adonbut in, “Pathen gam thuguh chu nangho kipea nahi tauve. Hinla thulema kaseina jeh chu polam miho jah dinga ahi,
Hichu Lekhabun aseisa aguilhunna ding: ‘Kathilbol amu tengule, ima jildoh hetdoh aneilou diu. Kathusei ajah tengule, ima hetdoh aneilou diu. Achutiloule keima lam'ah hung kiheiyuntin, ngaidam chang get unte,’ kiti chu ahi,” ati.
Abanin Jesun akomuva, “Nanghon hiche thulem hi nahetlou monguham? Achutile thulem dang jouse iti nahet tadiuvem?
Loubolpan muchi athe chu Pathen thu midang koma kihillhang tobang ahi.
Muchi kithe lamsih-a chuhon avetsah chu ahileh, Pathen thu ja-a ahivanga Satan in ahung kilhohmang pai toh tekah ahi.
Songlheo chung leipatna lah-a chuhon avetsah chu, athu ajah jah-a thanomtah'a joppai jengho ahi.
Ahivangin amahochu jung neilou ahi jeh-un, apangsot jouji pouve. Pathen thutahsan jeh'a boina le suhgimna ato tengule jung aneilou jeh-uvin alhupaiji tauve.
Ling lah-a muchi kithehon avetsah chu Pathen thu ja-a,
Ahivanga leiset hinkho lungkhamna ten alodimsetna, haona lungthim chule thildang dang ngaichatnan thu chu adeplih jeh-a ga sodoh joulou tobang ahi.
Chule leipha laiya chuhon avetsah chu athu ja-a, hea jopte chu ahiuvin, abang ajat somthum, abang jat somgup chule abang ajat ja-a aga punsah beho ahiuve,” ati.
Chuin Jesun ajah-uva, “Koiyin meivah khu lo sung le jalkhun noiya atun ngaiyem? Koiman bolponte! Meivah chu avahhoiselna ding mun'ah akitungjin ahi.
Ijeh-inem itileh thil kiselguh chengse chu achaina leh kiphongdoh ding, chuleh akiselguh jouse chu vahdoh ding ahi.
Koihileh khojahna ding nakhang neiyin ngaihen,” ati.
Chuin ajah uva, “Najah chengseu chu lungluttah in ngaiyun. Phataha nangai chan uva, hetgilna nakipe dingu ahi—chuleh kipehbe dingbon nahiuve.
Koihileh kathuhil ngaiho chu hetbena kipehbe ding, ahinlah koihileh kathuhil ngailou chu ahetsa themkhat jong amahoa kon'a kilahmang peh ding ahi,” ati.
Jesun ajah uva, “Pathen gam umdol chu loubolmi khat'in leiya muchi athe tobang ahi.
Asun ajan'a a-imut pet chuleh aha pet hijongleh, amuchi the chu ahung kehdoh-in, akhanglenin, hinla aman hitia chu thil iti hung umdoh ham ahepoi.
Leiset'in achamin ahin gadohsah jin, amasapenin avui ahung dondoh-in, chuteng achaina leh ahung gadoh-in aminji tai.
Aga chu amin phatleh, a-atphat ahitah jeh'in loubolpa achen, koiten a-atpai jitai,” ati.
Jesun aseiben, “Pathen gam hi ipitoh kitekah ding hitam? Ipi thulema kahilchet ding hitam?
Ankam mu chang leiya kithe tobang ahi, hichu muchi lah-a aneopen ahi.
Ahivangin ahung kedoh tengleh hampa dang jouse sangin alenjon, abah lentah jong ahin sodoh jin, chutichun chunga leng vachate abah lim noiya ahung geh jiuvin ahi,” ati.
Chuin chutobang thulem tamtah mangchan amahon ahetthei diu kham thu ahil e.
Mihonpi jah-a thulem tilouvin imacha aseikhapoi. Ahinla aseijuite chengse vang chu guhthimin ijakai ahilchen jinai.
Chuin nilhah-in Jesun aseijuite koma, “Hungun, dil khu agal langah galkaiyu hite,” ati.
Chutichun mihonpi chu adalhauvin, Jesu chu konga akitolpi tauvin, kong dang phabep'in vang ahinjuiyun ahi.
Chuin khopi hui ahung nungin ahile, twi kinong chu kong sunga ahung kinonglut matchet jengtan, adimpai ding ahitan ahi.
Apetchun Jesu chu kong mei lamah lukhap kikhap'in ana ihmun, aseijuiten asukhang'un ajah-a, “Houhil, kalhummang gam dingu hi imalouva nagel ham?” atitauve.
Jesu akhah phat'in huipi chu aphoh-in, twi-nong jah-a, “Thipmin! Thipchet in!” tia thu apeh leh, apettah'in huipi chu athipchet jeng tan, kho aphaseltan ahi.
Chuin Aman ajah uva, “Ibola nakichat uham? Tahsanna nanei nailou uham?” atitai.
Seijuiho chu akithing jeng tauvin, “Hichepa hi koi mongmong hiya, huipi le twi-nongin jong athu angai ahitadem?” tin akidongto tauvin ahi.
Chutichun dil gal langkhat lama Gerasene gamah agalkai tauvin ahi.
Konga pat Jesu ahung potleh lhan'a konin lhagaobohvop khat'in ahung kimupin ahi.
Ama chu lhanmol'a cheng ahin, koiman atuhtang joulou, thihkhaova jong ahen joulouvu ahi.
Bul atuhsah uva thihkhaova jong ahen ji vangun thihkhao chu asattanjin, bul chu atumkehjin, koimachan abolngoi joulouhel ahitai.
Sunle jan in lhanmola chun aumin chule molchungah a-aole a-aolejin, songhem in ama aki-at chenjin ahi.
Gal a pat'in Jesu ahinmun, ahung lhaijelin a-angah abohkhup in ahi.
“Pathen chungnungpen Chapa Jesu, ipi dinga neihung suhboi got ham? Pathen min'a nahenga katao ahi, neibolgim hih-in,” tin apeng jeng tai.
Hichun Jesun ajah-a, “Mipa-a kon chun hung potdoh'in, nang lhagao boh,” tin ano tai.
Chuin, “Namin ipiham?” tia adohleh, aman adonbut in, “Tamtah kahi jeh'un kamin Janel ahi,” ati.
Chuin chuche gamkai sunga kon'a nodoh ahilouna dingun Jesu hengah hataovin ataotan ahi.
Hiche mun lhang pang khat'a chu voh hon tamtah kilha-a ahi.
Janelte chun, “Voh hon lah-a kaluttheina dingun neisollun,” tin athum tauve.
Jesun jong aphalpehtan, lhagao-bohho chu ahung potdoh-un vohchaho sunga chun aluttauvin, hichun vohcha sangnijen chu halhaiyin alhaiyun, kol ah alhailhauvin dil ah alhalut'un, twi lah-a chun alhumgam tauvin ahi.
Chuin ganchingho chu ajam'un, khopi sung le loujaovah athu chu aseile tauvin ahi. Mipi chun ipi tidan hitam tin ave dingin ahung lhaipheiyun ahi.
Chuin Jesu kom ahung lhun'un, thilha Janel voppa chun pon akisila chule lunglima anatou chu amuvin akichalheh jengui.
Chuin thilha-voppa leh vohchaho umchan achen achaiya mua hetohhon thil umje chu aseipeh-uve.
Hichun amahon Jesu chu agamsung uva kon'a potdoh dingin ahengah ataouvin ahi.
Chuin konga alut konin masanga thilha-voppa chun ama toh kilhon khom dingin angeh tai.
Ahivangin Jesun ajadan ajah-a, “Na in a chenlang nainkote hengah Pakaiyin itobang thil loupi nabolpeh-a, iti nakhoto'em abonchan gaseitan,” atipeh tai.
Chuin amapa chu akipatdoh'in Decapoli (khopi som) jouseah Jesun thil lentah abolpeh chu lhangphong tah'in aseile pantai. Mijousen kidang asalheh jengun ahi.
Chuin Jesu konga akitolin agal langkhat alhungin, hiachun mihonpi tamtah ahenga ahung kikhomun ahi.
Hichun kikhopna in'a vaipo holah-a mi khat, amin Jairus chu ahungin, Jesu amu phat in akengbulah abohkhup in,
“Kachanu khangdongcha thiding dinmun'in aumtan, lungset in hungin lang achunga nakhut hung ngamin lang, ahinna dingin neijen dampeh-in,” tin ahung taove.
Chuin Ama chutoh akilhon pheiyin, mihonpin jong ahin juiyun, atom lellul jengun ahi.
Hikahlah chun numei khat jong kumsomle kumni athi longa damlou aumin ahi.
Louthem tamtah akivetsahna-a sum le pai anei jouse sumang jouva ahitan, imala phachom louvin khoh chehcheh in aumin ahi.
Amanu chun Jesu thudol anajan, hijehchun mihonpi lah-achun ahungin Jesu pon mong chu ahung tham tai.
Amanu chu akingaiton, “Apon jengjong hi thamleng dam nange,” ti atahsan e.
Chomloukah'in athiput chu akangin atang jeng tahbah-in, anat thohlel'a kon aol le adamdoh dan chu atichungah akihettan ahi.
Chutah chun Jesun atichunga kon'a amidamsahna tha apotdoh chu akihet in, hichun mipi lah-a chun akihei kimvelin, “Kapon thama chu koiham?” tin adongtai.
Aseijuiten ajah-a, “Mipi hijat'in nanehle jenguva, itidan'a, ‘Koiham eithama?’ tia dohna nabol ham?” atiuvin ahi.
Hinlah Aman chuche bol a chu mudohna dingin avelelen ahi.
Amanu chun achunga thilsoh chu ahen, kichasasan kihot pum in ahungin a-angah abohkhup in, ama ahi akiseidohtai.
Chuin Jesun ajah-a, “Boinu, natahsan in nadamsah ahitai. Lungmongin chetan. Nathohnatna chu kichai ahitai,” ati.
Amanu koma thu asei jinglaiyin, thupole khat Jairus in'a konin ahungin, “Nachanu athitai. Houhil hi kisahboisah ngaitaponte,” tin Jairus komah ahungseiye.
Akihounau chu Jesun ajatan, Jairus koma chun, “Kichahih-in, tahsan poupoutan,” ati.
Chuin Peter, James le John (James naopa), hicheng tailou midang koiman ajuiding ajadan akijuisah poi.
Kikhopna in vaihompa, Jairus in alhun'u chun, mihonpi chu anapoh cheichoi jengun, kap le maova aum'u chu Jesun amun ahi.
Chuin ama alut'in ajah uva, “Ibola hitia hi napo cheichoiyuva nakau ham? Chapangnu chu athi ahipoi, aihmu ahibouve,” ati.
Thiop mihonpi chun anuisat uve. Hichun abonchauvin asoldohsoh-in, chapangnu nu le pa toh chule ahinkilhonpi seijui thumho chengsetoh chapangnu umna'a chun alut un ahi.
Chuin chapangnu khut chu atuh-in, “Talitha cumi,” atin ahi. Hichu “Boinu, kithouvin!” tina ahi.
Chupettah chun chapangnu chu ahung thouvin, adingin lam ajotpai jeng tai. Amanu chu kum somleni bou ahinalaiye.
Chutah chun amaho chun kidang mainan kidang asapouve. Hiche thuhi koima ahetsahlou diuvin Jesun akhamgah-in, chule amanun aneh ding an apeh diuvin thu apen ahi.
Chuin chua kon chun Jesu achedoh'in, achenna Nazareth lamah aseijuite toh achetan ahi.
Cholngahni ahunghi phat in Judaho kikhopna in'ah thu ahil panin, chuin athuhil chu mi tamtah ajaho chun kidang asauvin, “Hichepa hin hoiya kon'a chihna le thiboltheina hichengpi hi akilah ahitadem?” atiuvin ahi.
Chuin nuisat toh athovin, “Ama hi thingthem bol maimai, Mary chapa, chuleh James, Joseph (Joses), Juda le Simon sopipa ahibouve. Chule asopi numeiho jong ilah uva cheng uva hi,” atiuvin ahi. Amaho chu alungu adongin ahivangin atahsan nom pouvin ahi.
Chuin Jesun adonbut in ajah uva, “Themgao chu ama achenna gamsung le ainkote lah chule ama insung tailouvin mundang jouseah jabolna achang jin ahi,” ati.
Chukoma miten atahsanlou jeh'un ana damlou phabep khat chunga akhut angapma adamsah tailou chun thil kidang ima abol theitapoi.
Atahsanlou dan'u chu adatmo lheh jenge. Chuin khonainai dunga achelelen thu ahille tai.
Chuin aseijui somleni ho chu akouvin, lhagaoboh chunga thaneina apen, chujouvin mi ni-nin asoldoh tai.
Chule ajinnauva tenggol tailou imadang, changlhah jong, sakhao jong, dangka dip sunga sum them jong—akenlouhel diuvin thu apei.
Kengchot vang akiseuva, sangkhol thoni vanga kiahlou diuvin aseipeh-in ahi.
“Hoikom hijongle nachena chan uva, nalhun lhunnau in'a chun khosung napotdoh kahseuvin umun.
Ahinlah koi kho hileh nahin lhunsahlou le nathu seiyu ngailou khomite nadalhah tengule dalhah ahitauve ti ahettohsahnan nakeng phanguva agam leivui chu thinglhauvin,” tin thu apei.
Chutichun akipatdoh un, mihemten lunghei ding ahi ti chu ahillhangleuvin,
Thilha tamtah jong anodoh'un, ana-damlou tamtah jong thao anu uvin aboldam un ahi.
Jesu min gamtina akithan tah jeh chun Leng Herod Antipas in hiti thu chu ajatan, mi phabep in, “Ama hi John Baptist athia kon'a thoudoh kit hinte. Hijeh'a chu thilkidang boltheina anei ahi,” tin aseijiuve.
Loikhat in, “Themgao Elijah ahi,” atiuvin, loikhat kit chun, “Malai themgao minthangho banga themgao khat hiyakhu,” atiuve.
Herod'in Jesu chung thu ajah phat in, “Alu katansa John chu athia kon'a hung thoukit hinante,” ati.
Ijeh-inem itileh Herod'in anaopa Philip jinu Herodias chu akichenpi ahin, amanu jal'a chu ama tah'in mi asola John chu amatsah-a, akan'a songkul'a akhum ahi.
John chun Herod jah-a, “Nasopi ji jia naneiya nakichenpi hi dan ngai ahipoi,” anatijin ahi.
Hiche jeh'a chu Herodias chun ama chu hahot in ahot in, thadingin atup in, ahivanginla Herod phalnalouvin abol theipon ahi.
Ijeh-inem itileh Herod chun John chu michon phatah le mithengtah ahi ti chu ahet jeh'in ajabolin, chuleh avesuiyin ahi. Herod'in John ahoulimpi teng ahimo ji lheh in, ahijeng vang'in, athusei angainom kit jin ahi.
Hinlah Herodias in phat gomkom anga jing chu Herod pen nikho chun ahunglhung tai. Chuche nikhoachun gamvaipo natong alen-alalho, galsat-thalchoi lamkaiho chule Galilee gam'a milunho chengse vahnan golvah abolin ahi.
Hiachun achanu chu ahung lut in, alamin ahileh leng Herod le atoukhompi chengse chu alung lhaisah sohtan, chuphat'in lengpan nungahnu jah-achun, “Nagot chan thum'in, keiman pengkate,”
“Nathum chan chu kapeh ding ahi, kalenggam akehkhat geiya jong kapehthei nahi,” atitai.
Chuin amanu apotdoh'in, anu komah, “Ipi kathum dingham?” tia agadoh leh, anun, “John Baptist luchang thum'in,” ahin titai.
Chuphat'in amanu kintah'in lengpa hengah ahungloiyin, “John Baptist luchang tutah-in konglheng khat'in neipe lechun katipenne,” tin athumtai.
Chuin lengpa alunggim talheh jengin, ahivanginla mi masanga athutep le akihahselna chule a-ankong umpiho jalchun amanu thilthum chu nahsahmon akoithei tapoi.
Hijehchun asolchah hemchoiho khat chu John lu galadingin asoltan, ama achen songkul sungah alu agatang dentai.
Chuin alu chu kong khat'in ahin domin nungahnu chu apen, aman anu agapetai.
Chuin aseijuiten ajah phat'un ahungun along chu ahung lauvin lhan'ah avuitauve.
Chuin solchah hochu anatohnauva konin Jesu henga ahung kileuvin, akimanchah dan'u le athuhil danho-u chu aseiyun ahi.
Chuin Jesun ajah uva, “Hungun, munthip'ah chomkhat gakichol ute,” ati. Ijeh-inem itileh ahungle achele mi atam behseh jengin an jeng jong nemanlou ahitauve.
Hitichun amaho munthip lam jonin kongin akitolphei tauvin ahi.
Hinlah mi tamtah'in hitia akitoldoh-u chu anamuvin, hichun khopi mun chomchoma konin mitamtah chu twipang achun anachepheiyun, agallanga chun analhung masakit tauvin ahi.
Kong sunga kon Jesun kal ahinsedoh leh hitia mihonpi anaum chu Jesun amun, achingbei kelngoi hontoh abah jeh-u chun alung asen, hichun amaho chu thil tampi ahilin ahi.
Nilhah lam'in aseijuite ahungun ahenga, “Hikom hi gamthip ahin, phathila agei lheh tan,
Hitehohi ikimvel uva loujao le khosunghoa acheuva nehding imathem agakichoh diuvin soldohtan,” atiuvin ahi.
Hichun Jesun adonbut in, “Nanghon aneh diu peuvin,” ati leh, “Ipi-em kapeh diu? Mi hijatpi vahna ding vang chu sum tampi kakilona diuvin lha tampi lut inte!” tin ahin donbut uve.
Chuin Jesun, “Changlhah pheng ijat naneiyum? Gave temun,” atin, hichun agaveuvin, “Changlhah pheng nga toh ngani aum e,” atiuvin ahi.
Chuin mihonpi chu abonchauvin hamhing eng lah-a chu ahon hon'a atousah diuvin aseijuite athuhil e.
Chuin amaho agol golin—ja khat cheng, som nga chengin atoutauvin ahi.
Jesun changlhah pheng nga toh nga ni chu alan, vanlam aven, phatthei aboh-in changlhah chu ahehbalbalin, a-anguvah luipeh dingin aseijuite apen, nga ni jong chu ahoppeh soh keiyin ahi.
Hichu amahon aneuvin, abonun aneva sohkeiyui;
Akivahva jouvun changlhah le nga aval chengse paipeh somleni aloh dimun ahi.
Mihonpi kivahva chu numei le chapangho simlouvin pasal cheh mi sang-nga vel alhinge.
Chuin Jesun mihonpi chu alhadoh jinglai chun aseijuite chu gal langkhat lama Bethsaida anagalkai masa dingin konga chun alutsah-in asoltan ahi.
Abonuva alhahdoh soh phatnin, tao dingin mol chungah akaltoutai.
Jansot lamin aseijuite chu dil lailunga kong chung'ah aumun, Ama achangin tolgo chunga aumden e.
Chuin amaho dil chunga konga akitol uva, hui le twi-nongin anuh-uva alungdon'u chu amun, khovah ding kon lamin akengin dil chungah lam ahinjot'in, amaho chu khelding agon ahi.
Ahin amahon dil chunga kenga lam ahin jot amu phat'un thilha hinte atiuvin, a-aosot jengun ahi.
Abonchauva Amachu amu sohkeiyu ahin, atija lheh jengun, ahivangin Aman amaho chu ahin houpaiyin ajah-uva, “Kichahih'un, hangsanuvin, keima hiche'ah kaumnai,” ati.
Chuin kong chunga chun akaldoh in, hui jong athip jengtai. Amaho chu alungdong lheh jengui.
Ajehchu changlhah kidang thudol jong chu hephatalou ahitauve. Alungtah behseh nalamuva chuti ahi.
Chuin agalkaiyun Gennesaret gamsung alhungun, kong chu twipam chin'ah angatauve.
Chuin konga konin apotdohdoh'un, miho chun anahepai tauvin ahi.
Agamsung uva alhai kimvel leuvin, chuah aume ti ahetna chanuvin ana-damlouho chu alupna pheh pumin ahinpu uvin ahi.
Achena chan khoneo, khopi chule loujao gamkochong alutna chan'ah adamlouho chu japi kititna kailhang mun'ah alupsah-un, apon mongkaibeh atham dingun ahenga ataovun ahi. Hichun athamkha chan chu adam jengun ahi.
Nikhat hi Pharisee holeh hou-lamkai danthusunho phabep Jerusalem'a kipat'in Jesu kimupi dingin ahungun ahi.
Aseijuite mi phabep khat'in dan nitlou le khut soplouva an aneh uchu ahung mudoh tauve.
(Judaho adehset'a, Pharisee hon akhang akhanga chonna dan dungjuiya khut phatea sopngim louva anehji lou u ahi.
Hitobangma chun, amahon kailhanga kicho hijongle twiya khut adelutlou leh ima anengai pouve. Hiche chu chonnangai tampi—khomho, belho, sum-eng chule jalkhunho sopthengna kin-gun—hitobang chondan tampi anei lah-uva khat ahi.)
Hitichun, Pharisee holeh hou danthuhilhon adongun, “Ipijeh'a naseijuiten akhang akhanga ichonna ngaiyu banga khut soplouva an aneh-uham?” atiuvin ahi.
Jesun adonbut'in, “Isaiah Themgaovin miphalhem nangho chungchang thua: ‘Hiche nam mite hin akamsunguvin eichoianun, alungthimula keiya konin gamlatah ahi.
Amahon eihouvuhi moh ahi. Mihem semthu lungsuhto ho chu Pathen thupeh dan'a ahil u ahi,’ tin anaseiye.
Nanghon Pathen danthupeh ahibangtah chu nahsahmon nakoiyun nangho chonnamlhah joh natuhdetjo tauve.
Nachonna ngaiyu natuh dettheina diuvin Pathen danthupeh tahbeh chu nahei lamdang uve.
Atekahnan, Mose'n Pathen'a hungkon danthu napeuve: ‘Nanu le napa jabolun,’ chule ‘Koihileh anu le apa housea chu thi jeng hen,’ ati.
Hinlah mihon anu le apa koma, ‘Gelse hih'un, kahinpanhu joupoi, ajehchu kahinpeh ding chu Pathen'a dia kapeh dingin kakiteptai,’ tia aseitheiyu jongleh aphatmona aumpoi natiuve.
Hiti chun nule pate agel-thupitah diu angaikhohpoi natiuve.
Hitia hi nangho chon-namlhah joh najui jing theina diuva Pathen thupeh hochu juilouva nakahlhah jiu ahitai,” ati.
Chuin mipite chu athuhil ngaidin akouvin, “Nabonuvin ngaiyun, chule hetthem ding gouvin.
Polama kon'asunga lutchun ima asubohpon; lungsunga kon'a hung potdoh joh chun asuhbohji ahibouve.
Angaina ding nakhang neiyin ngaihen,” ati.
Chuin Jesun mihonpi chu adalhan insung alut leh aseijuiten thulem asei chun ipilamdol akoa avetsah ham tin adongui.
“Nanghon jong nahet theilou laiyu ong? Natahsa sunga lut an nanehho chun nahin suhboh lou u ahi chu namu theilouvuham?
An nanehlut'u chu lungsunga lutlouvin oisungah alut in posona-ah ahungdoh jitai.” (Hitia kiseihi, Pathen mitmun an jouse hi santhei dol ahisoh keiye ti aphondohna ahi).
Chule Aman aseibe kit'in, “Lungsunga kon'a hungpot chun mi asuhboh ahi.
Ijeh inem iti leh mihem lungsunga konin apolamah—lunggitlou, jonthanhoi, guchat, toltha,
Midangtoh-jon, papset, gitlou, mi-dohabol, huhna, kimitthipna, kitaitom, hoitho, ngolna kitiho hi ahung sohdoh ji'e.
Hiche thilphalouho hi lungsunga potdoh ahin, mihem suboh ji chu ahiuve,” ati.
Chuin Jesun Galilee gam adalhan, sahlama Tyre gamsungah achetai. Hikoma chun in khat'a alhungin, aumna in chu koima hetsah anompoi, ahinlah akiselthei deh tapoi.
Hiachun Ama thudol anajakha numei khat ahungin, akengbula ahung bohkhup in ahi. Amanu achanu chu lhagaoboh vop ahin,
Achanu a kon'a lhagaoboh anodohpeh dingin ahung taovin ahi. Amanu chu Syrian Phoenicia tolkon, Gentile-ho ahijeh chun,
Jesun ajah-a, “Amasapenin keima insung, Judate chateho kavahva masat tahdi ding ahi. Chate changlhah lahpeh-a uichate masanga selhah angai ahipoi,” ati.
Amanun jong, “Hichu ahinai, Pakai, hijongle dokhang noiya um uichan jong chate lhengkonga kon tolkhe changlhah nehmoh anehkhah jiu khula-em,” tin adonbut in ahi.
Chuin Jesun, “Nadonbut hoilheh-e! Tuhin na-in'ah chetan, nachanu chu thilhan adalhatai,” atipehtai.
Hichun Amanu jong a-in'a acheleh achanu chu jalkhun'a analup amun, lhagaoboh anapotdohtan ahi.
Jesun Tyre gamkol sungse adalhan, Sidon ajotpan Decapolis gamkai ajotpeh in, Galilee Dillen alhungtai.
Chuin anangong, pao jong paochen theilou khat hi ahenga ahin puiyun, achunga akhut angap dingin ataovun ahi.
Hichun Aman mipi lah'a konin apuidohin, akhutchalin akol sung akhoiyin,
Achil aset in, alei athamin, chuin vanlam aven akhoisan, “Ephphatha,” ati. Hichu kihongin! tina ahi.
Chuphat tah chun ana avangin, aleigui jong akilham tan, kichehtah'in apaotheitai.
Chuin Aman amaho chu koima jah-a aseidohlou diuvin akhamtan ahi. Ahinla amahon ahaseiphong cheh'un ahi.
Kidang asabehseh jengun, avel avelin, “Aman ijakai abol jouse hi aloupi lheh jenge. Nangongla ana avansah-in, paomola apaosah-e,” atiuvin ahi.
Hichelaichun mipi ho chu atamlheh jengtan chule nehding ima aneilou jeh-un Jesun aseijuite chu akouvin ajah uva,
“Mihonpi hi kakoma aumnau nithum ahitan, amahon nehding ima aneipouve,
Chule annelouvin a-inlam chan uva solleng lampia lhasampa ding ahiuve. Akimkhat hi gamlatah a kon hung ahiuve,” ati.
Aseijuiten adonbut un, “Hikom gamthip laiya mi hichengpi lhingset'a vahna ding changlhah kon hoiya alahding ham?” atiuvin ahi.
Jesun adongin, “Changlhah pheng ijat naneiyum?” ati leh, “Pheng sagi aume,” atiuvin ahi.
Chuin Aman mihonpi chu tolla tou din asolin, changlhah pheng sagi chu alan, athangvah-in, chujouvin ahehbalbalin a-angsunguva luipeh dingin aseijuite chu apen, amahon mipi anga chun aluipeh-ui.
Chule aseijuiten nga neochacha phabep khat jong aneiyun, hijong chu phatthei aboh-in a-angsunguva luipeh dingin asoltan ahi.
Chuin amahon aneuvin, avasoh keiyun, anehmoh-u anong aval chu longkai sagi alohdoh-un ahi.
Amaho chu numei-chapang simlouvin mi sangli jen ahiuvin, anehva jouvun Jesun in lamah asoltauve.
Phat chomkhat jouvin, Ama aseijuite toh konga alutpaiyun, Dalmanutha gam alhung tauve.
Pharisee hon Jesu ahunglhung taiti ajah phatnun, kinelkalpi dingin ahungun ahi. Athuneina photchenna dingin van'a kon melchihna avetsah diuvin angeh-un ahi.
Chuin alungsungah akhoisan, “Tukhang mite hin ibol a melchihna ahol uham? Tahbeha kasei ahi, hiche tukhang mite hi imacha melchihna kipelou ding ahi,” atitai.
Chuin amaho chu adalhan, konga alut kit'in, langkhat panga dingin akipat dohtai.
Hinlah aseijuiten changlhah kipoh ding ahin haimil tauve. Konga chunla changlhah phengkhat tailou adang aum hihhel in ahi.
Chuin Aman amaho chu ahilchah-in, “Chingtheiyun, Pharisee ho le Herod chol lah-a kihongphauvin,” ati.
Hiche aseiya kon chun changlhah ahin poh haimil jeh-un amaho akihoulimun, akioimoto uvin ahi.
Akihounau chu Jesun ahen, ajah uva, “Changlhah naneilou jeh uva ibola kioimoto le nahiuvem? Tugeiya nalunguva hedoh loulai nahiuvem? Hetthemna dinga nalungu hibangloma tah lheh jeng ham?
Mit neiyuva—mutheilou nahiuvem? Nakhang neiyuva—jatheilou nahiuvem? Gel jong nagel dohlou monguham?
Mi sang-nga changlhah pheng nga kahoppeh-a chu amoh-ahal paipeh ijat nalodimum?” atileh amahon, “Somleni ahi,” atiuvin ahi.
Mi sangli lah-a changlhah pheng sagi kihoppeh-a chu nehmoh aval longkai ijat nalodimum? ati kit leh, “Sagi ahi,” atiuvin,
“Achutile tugeiya jong hedoh loulai nahiu ham?” atin ahi.
Amaho Bethsaida alhun phat'un, mi phabep in mitchopa chu Jesu henglama ahin puiyun, chule amahon atohkhah-a adamsah din angeh-uvin ahi.
Jesun mitchopa chu akhut in atuh-in, khosunga konin apuidohtan ahi. Chuin amit a achil aset in achunga akhut angamin, “Tua hi kho namum?” tin adongin ahi.
Mipa chun akimvel dung aven, “Henge, miho kamun, ahinla kichentah'in kamutheipoi, thingphungte chat lele tobang'in kamui,” ati.
Chujouvin amit akhut'in atham kit'in, ave changmelin ahileh adamhel jengtan, ima jouse kichentah'in amutheitan ahi.
Jesun ama asoldoh in, “Khosunga chun lutpa tahih-in,” tin akham'in ahi.
Jesu le aseijuiten Galilee gam adalhauvin Caesarea Philippi koma khohoa chun ache leuvin ahi. Lampia alamjot laiyun thu adongin, “Keima hi mihon koi ahi eitiuvem?” ati leh,
Aseijuiten, “Loikhat in John Baptist, loikhat in Elijah chule loikhat kit chun Nangma hi themgaoho lah a achom khat hinte atiuve,” tin adonbut uve.
Chuin Jesun, “Ahileh nanghonla keihi koi ahi neitiuvem?” tia adoh leh, Peter in, “Nangma Messiah chu nahi,” ati.
Ahinlah Jesun koimacha koma aseidohlou beh diuvin ahilchahtan ahi.
Chuin Aman amaho chu Mihem Chapan thohgimna tamtah athoh-a, vaipo upa hole thempu pipuho chule danthu sunhon adoudal diu thuho aseipeh-e. Chule thalih-a auma, nithum jouleh thoudoh kit teiding ahi chu ahil pantan ahi.
Aman hichu phongtaha aseijuite koma asei jinglaiyin, Peter in apuidohin hitobang thuho chu aseilou din angeh-in ahi.
Ahin Ama akiheiyin, aseijuiteho aven Peter chu aphoh-in, “Kanung lama chen, Satan! Nangman Pathen thulam gellouvin, mihem thulam jeng nagele,” atin ahi.
Chuin Aman aseijuiho le mihonpi chu ahenglama akouvin, “Nalah-uva koi hijongleh eijui noma chun, nacham chonnauva kon'a nahung kiheiyuva, na thingpel nakiput uva, chule neijui dingu ahi.
Ijeh inem itileh koi hile ahinna huhhing nom'a chun alhaso ding ahi. Amavang koi hile keima jal le Kipana Thupha jal'a ahinna lhaso'a chun akihuhhing joh ding ahi.
Ijeh-inem itileh min vannoi pumpi neihenlang ahinna chan taleh, ipi phatchomna anei ding ham?
Min ahinna khel'a ipi apeh dingham?
Ijeh inem itileh koihileh tulai chonthanhoinale chonsetna khanga keima le kathuhil jachatpi chu Mihem Chapan jong apa loupina-a vantil thengtetoh ahung nileh, amapa chu ajachatpi ding ahi,” ati.
Jesun aseibe nalaiyin, “Keiman tahbeha kaseipeh nahiuve, tua hichea dingho kimkhat hi Pathen gam thaneitah'a ahung lhun amu kahseuva thina tepkhalou ding aumuve!” ati.
Nigup jouvin Jesun Peter, James chule John atumbeh in molsang chungah apuitouvin ahi. Chuah amaho angsung laitah-a Jesu avou akikheltan,
Aponsil chu vah bangin aemleng jengin, leiya koiman pon hitobanga chu asop bang theilou khop'in abangin ahi.
Chuin Elijah le Mose ahung kilah lhonin Jesu chu ahoulimpi lhonin ahi.
Chuin Peter in, “Houhil, hikoma iumuhi eiho din anom ngeiye! Geldohjingna din lhambuh thum song uhite—Nang ding khat, Mose ding khat chule Elijah ding khat,” atin ahi.
Hiche asei hi akichat behseh jeh'a seiding hetmoa asei ahi.
Chuin meilhang khat'in amaho chu ahin lekhun, meilah-a konin aw ahung gingin, “Hichehi ka-Chapa deitah chu ahi, athu ngaiyun!” ati.
Chuin akimvelu avet uleh, koimacha amutahih un, Mose le Elijah chu anachemang tan, Jesu changseh le amaho changbou aumtauvin ahi.
Molla kon'a ahung kumsuh jing laiyun, Jesun athilto-u chu Mihem Chapa athia kon'a athodoh kit kahsea koima jah-a aseidohlou diuvin akhamgah-in ahi.
Athusei chu alunguva aching jingun, athia kon'a athodoh kit chu ipi aseina ahidem, tin akidongto jiuvin ahi.
Chuin amahon adongun, “Ibola danthusunhon Messiah hung masanga Elijah hung kit masa ding ahi atiuham?” atiuleh Aman adonbut in,
“Elijah chu hungmasa'a ijakai ahung semphat ding mong ahi. Ahinla Pathen Thubun Mihem Chapan gimhesoh tamtah athoh ding chule mite nahsahmoa umding ati ham?
Kaseipeh nahiuve, Elijah chu hunga ahitai, chule thil hungsoh ding anakisut bangtah'in isahlou tah'in anabol tauve,” atin ahi.
Chuin seijui dangho henglama ahung kileuva ahileh, amaho chu mipin anaumkimvelu chu amuvin, hou lamkai phabep khattoh jong anakinel un ahi.
Mihonpin Jesu amu phatnun, akipah thanomun ahengah ahung lhaiyun, ahung lamtouvin ahi.
Hichun Jesun, “Amaho khutoh ipi thua kinel nahiuvem?” tin adongtai.
Mipi lah'a konin mi khat in ahin donbut in, “Pakai, kachapa nadamsah dingin nahenga kahin puiye. Amahi lhagaoboh-in avop in, apaodohsah thei tapoi.
Hoikom hijongle lhagaoboh hin amat matna'ah ahehlhujin, chule achilphon alhan, aha ageljin chule alhasamdel ji tai. Hijeh a chu naseijuite koma einodohpeh diuva kangeh leh abolthei pouve,” ati.
Hichun Jesun akomuvah, “Tahsanna neilou mite! Itihchan kaumpi ding nahiuvem? Kahenga chapangpa chu hin pui tangu,” atitai.
Hichun chapangpa chu ahin puiyui. Ahin lhagaoboh-in Jesu amu phatnin, chapangpa chu nasatah'in aveingoiyin ahileh tolla alhun, achilphon akai letlut in akitel lelen ahi.
Chuin Jesun chapangpa apa jah-a, “Ahitinahi itih-a pat hitam?” tia adoh leh, apan, “Aneolaiya kipan ahitai.
Tha dingin abangleh meiya, abangleh twiyah alehlutjin ahi. Hijongle Nangman alonaje nahet leh kachunguva khotona neipumin neikithopin,” tin aseitai.
“Alonaje nahet leh, nati chu ipi naseina ham? Atahsanho dingin ijakai ahithei soh keiye,” tin Jesun adonbut e.
Hichun hetmanlouvin chapangpa apa chu ahung kapjah jengin, “Pakai, katahsan'e, katahsan lelna abeina din neikithopin,” tin ataotai.
Chuin Jesun mi ahung kikhop tam chehcheh amu phatnin lhagao-boh chu aphoh-in, ajah-a, “Ngaiyin, nang lhagao phalou, chapangpa paomosah le nangonsahpa, thu kapeh nahi, chapangpa sunga konin hung Potdoh inlang lutkit tahih-in!” ati.
Hichun lhagaoboh chu apengjah jengin, chapangpa chu hatah in aveingoiyin, chuin adalhatai. Chapangpa chu athi bangin aumtan, mihonpi chu akihou lahlah-un, “Athi hitakhu!” atiuvin ahi.
Ahin Jesun akhut in amanin, akaithouvin ahileh ahung thoudoh jengtan ahi.
Chujou chomkhat jouva Jesu le aseijuite insunga aumlaiyun aseijuiten, “I-atileh keihon kanodoh lel'u ahidem?” tia adoh-ule,
Jesun adonbut in, “Hitobang hi taona thahatna'a bou kinodoh thei ahi,” ati.
Chumun chu adalhauvin, Galilee gam ajot un, min ahetdoh diu chu Jesun adeipoi.
Ijeh-inem iti leh Aman aseijuite toh phat mankhoma thuhil ding phat angaichan ahi. Hichun Aman ajah-uva, “Mihem Chapa chu melmate khut'a pehdoh-a umding ahi. Amahon atha dingu, ahivanga nithum nileh Ama thoudoh kit ding ahi,” ati.
Athusei chu ipi asei ham ti ahethei pouvin Ama doh dingla akichauvin adong ngam pouve.
Amaho Capernaum ahung lhungun, chuin insung aumpet'un ajah uva, “Lamdunga chu ipi nangaitou ham?” tin adongin ahi.
Ahin, adonbut theipouve, ajehchu alah uva koichu alenpen hintem ti akinel ahiuve.
Hichun Jesu atouvin somleni ho chu akouvin, “Koihileh amasapen hinom chu nukhah pending ahi, chule mijouse jenlea pang hiding ahi,” ati.
Chuin chapang neocha khat alaiyuva adinsah-in, chuin apomin ajah uva,
“Koihileh keima min'a hitobang chapang neokhat sanga chun keima eisan ahi, chule koihileh keima eisang chan chun, keima bou eisan hilouvin eihinsolpa jong sana hi,” ati.
Hichun John'in Jesu komah, “Houhil, amin'a thilha nodoh mi khat kamu uvin, hinla ama chu eiho lah-a pang ahilou jeh-in kakham tauve,” ati.
Jesun adonbut in, “Kham hih-un, kamin'a thil kidang bol a keima eiseiseloi thei koima aumpoi.”
Koi hijongle eidouloupou chu eilama pang ahi.
Koi hijongle Messiah nungjui-mi ahi tiatwi khon khat donding napechan'u chu, tahbeha kaseipeh nahiuve, itinama jongle ama chun kipaman asan ding ahi.
Chule koi hijongleh keima eitahsan khangdongchaho jeng jong setna-a kipallhuh sah chun angonga sumhei songlentah kikhai henlang twikhanglen'a kilehlut leh ama dingin aphajoi.
“Chule nakhut langkhat'in nachonsetsah'a ahileh tanbong jengin. Khut ni neiya meikong mittheilou damun'a che sangin tibukimlou khut langkhatseh toh hinkemlouna-a lut aphajoi.
Chu mun'a chu thanho thi dehlou ding, mei jeng jong mit talou ding ahi.
Nakeng langkhat'in nachonsetsah'a ahileh tanbong jengin, keng ni neiya damun jot sangin keng langbeiya hinkemlouna mun'a lut aphajoi.
Chu mun'a chu thanho thi dehlou ding, mei jeng jong mit talou ding ahi.
Namit langkhat'in nakipal lhuhsah'a ahileh kaldoh jengin, mit ni neiya damun'a nakilelut sangin mit lang choa Pathen gam'a lut nangma dingin aphajoi.
Chu mun'a chu thanho thi dehlou ding, mei jeng jong mit talou ding ahi.
Ijeh-inem itileh mijouse meiya chisoa kiso ding, chule gankikat jouse chi kiso-al ding ahi.
Chihi apha ahivangin a-alna beita henlang tamtaleh ipia ki-alsah kit ding hitam? Chi bangin gun neiyun lang khat le khat chamdelin um uvin,” ati.
Chuin Jesun Capernaum adalhan chua konin Judah gamkol sung le Jordan Lui solam gamkaiyah ache suhtan ahi. Mihonpi chu ahenga ahung kikhom kit tauvin, chutichun Aman amaho chu thu ahilkittan ahi.
Chua chun Pharisee ho mi phabep ahenga ahungun mochantheina dinga kipalsahna dingin, “Pasal in aji ada hi danngai hinam?” tin thudoh ahung neiyui.
Jesun athudoh-u chu adonbut in, “Mose'n nangho jida thua danthu itobang napeh-uvem?” tia adoh leh,
Amahon, “Da ding aphalnai. Mi khat'in aji adana dia lekhasut apehlut'a, chuleh amanu chu asoldohthei ahi, tin aseiye,” atiuvin ahi.
Chuin Jesun adonbutnan: “Nangho lungtah behseh jeh'a hitia chu dan nahin ngaijangpeh-u ahibouve.
Ahivangin semtila pat'a Pathen in pasal le numei anasem ahitai.
Hichun ipijeh'a pasal in anulepa adalhah-a ajia beh ham ti avetsah-in,
Chule ama ni chu pumni hitalouva pumkhat, tahsa khat hilhon ding ahi tai.
Hijehchun Pathen gopsa chu mihemin sukhen hih hen,” ati.
Phat chomkhat jouvin, aseijuite toh insunga amaho bou aumpet'un, hiche thuhi ahin podoh kit'un,
Aman aseipeh-in, “Koihileh aji da-a jidang neichun ajinu chu ajonsan ahi.
Numeiyin jong apasal ada-a midang toh akichen leh amanu jong chu ajong ahi,” ati.
Nikhat hi minu-mipate phabep khat'in achateu chu Jesun atham'a phatthei aboh diuvin ahin puiyun ahile aseijuiten anajadauvin ahi.
Jesun hichu ajah phatnin aseijuite chungah alungphamon, ajah uva aseiyin, “Chapang neochaho chu kahengah hungsah'un, jahda hih-un! Ijeh-inem iti leh Pathen Lenggam chu amaho tobanghoa bou ahi.
Tahbeh'a kaseipeh nahiuve, koihileh chapang neoho banga Pathen Lenggam sanglou chu itinama jongle hichea chu lutlou ding ahi,” ati.
Chuin chapangho chu apomin akhut achunguva angam'in phatthei abohtai.
Chuin Ama Jerusalem lang jon'a ache ding konin mi khat ahung lhaijelin a-angsungah adilsun, ajah-ah, “Houhil pha, tonsot hinkemlou kanei theina dinga ipi kabol ding ham?” ati.
Jesun, “Ibola apha neitiham? Pathen khatseh tailou koima apha aumpoi,
Ahin, nathudoh donbutna dingin Thupeh chengse: Tolthat hih-in, Jonbol hih-in, gucha hih-in, dohan mi bol hih-in, nanu-napa jabolin, ti chu nahetai,” ati.
Hichun khangdongpan, “Houhil, hichengse chu kachapan laiya pat kahin nitpeh ahitai,” ati.
Chuin Jesun amachu aven, angailu lheh jenge. Adonbutnan, “Thil khat nabat nalaiye, chen lang nanei chengse gajoh-in langvaicha gentheiho gahoppehtan, chutileh vangou nanei ding ahi. Chuleh hungin lang kanung juiyin,” ati.
Chucheng asei ajah phat'in amai athim jengtan, gou haotah ahijehin lungnom motah in achemangtan ahi.
Chuin Jesun aseijuite avekimvelin, “Mihao theiho hi Pathen gam'a alut diu iti hahsat hitam!” ati.
Athusei chu aseijuiten adatmo lheh-uve, ahinlah Jesun asei kit'in, “Chateho, Pathen Lenggama luttheina ding hi thil hahsatah jong ahi,
Tahbehin, mihaoho Pathen Lenggam alut sangin sangongsang heo-bil hom'a alut ding abaijoi!” ati.
Amahon kidang asalheh jengun, “Achuti ahileh koi huhhing'a umjou ding ham?” atiuvin ahi.
Jesun amaho aven, “Mihem dingin hitheihih jongleh Pathen dingin ahimo aumpoi,” ati.
Chuin Peter ahung paodohin, “Keihon ijakai kadalhauvin nanung kahin juitauve,” ati.
Jesun adonbut in, “Henge, ahinai. Chuleh tahbeha kaseipeh nahiuve, keima jal le Kipana Thupha jal'a a-in, asopi pasalho, asopi numeiho, anu, apa, achate chule anei-agou dalhahon,
Ajatja-a in le lou, sopi pasal, sopi numei, nulepa, chate chuleh nei le gou—bolsetna thohpum puma akisan ding ahi. Chuleh khonung hinkhoa tonsot hinkemlou anei ding ahi.
Amavang tua athupipenho hung thupimo pen intin, tua thupimo penho hung thupipen tante,” ati.
Hichun Jerusalem jonin achetou tauvin, Jesu chu amasanguva achen ahileh aseijuiten adatmo lheh jenguvin, chuleh anunguva cheho chu kichatnan adimuvin ahi. Aseijui somleni ho apangin achesah-in, hichun khonunga Ama chunga hunglhung ding thuho aseipeh kittan ahi.
“Veuvin, Jerusalem jonin ichetauve, chukoma chu Mihem Chapa hi thempu pipui hole danthusunho khut'a pehdoh-a umding, chuleh amaho chun athina dinga themmo achansahuva hiding namdangte khut'a apehdoh dingu,
Chuleh amaho chun a-el ela aboluva chil asetkhum dingu, avoh-uva chuleh atha dingu, chuleh nithum jouleh ama thoudoh kit ding ahi,” ati.
Chuin James le John, Zebedee chateni ahung lhonin akihoulimpi lhonin, “Houhil, kathum lhon neibolpeh tei lhonin,” atilhon e.
Jesun, “Nathum lhon chu ipiham?” ati leh,
Amanin, “Naloupina'a natou tengle khat najet lamah khat naveiyah neitousah lhonin,” atilhon tai.
Hichun Jesun, “Nathum lhon nakihet lhon poi! Keiman chomkhat joule kahin don ding thohgimna khon khachep'a chu nadon ngapchat lhon ding hinam? Thohgimna twilut'a kachan ding chu nachan ngam lhon ding hinam?” tin adongtai.
Amanin jong, “Henge, kangam lhonne!” tin aseilhon e. Chuin Jesun adonbut in, “Kadon ding khon'a vang nadon lhon ding ahin chule thohgimna twilut kachanna jong changngam lhon nan nate,
Ahivangin kajet le veiya tousah ding vang chu keima boltheidol ahipoi. Pathen in hichu alhendohsaho dinga agotsa ahitabouve,” ati.
Seijui som ho chun James le John thilthum ajah-u chun athimah-un alungphamouvin ahi.
Jesun amaho chu akoukhomin, “Nanghon naheuve, leiset mite lah'a vaipo ho khu amite pakaiyin apangun chuleh gamvaipo milun milal-hon anoidouhou chunga athuneinau asouvin vai ahomuvin ahi.
Nangho lah'a vang chutilou ding ahi. Koihileh nangho lah'a alen hinoma chu nalhachauva pang ding ahi.
Chuleh nalahuva apipuipen hinoma chu mijouse soh ahi ding angaiye.
Ijeh inem iti leh Mihem Chapa tah jong chu jen dinga hung hilouvin mijenle ding le mitampi lhatdohna dinga ahinna tohdoh ding joh-a hung ahibouve,” ati.
Chuin amaho Jericho khopi alhungun, Jesu le aseijuiten khopi sung adalhah ding kon'un mihonpi tamtah'in anung ahin juiyui. Chuti lai chun mitcho khat, Timaeus chapa Bartimaeus chu lampam'ah anatouve.
Nazareth Jesu chu nailam chan aum taiti ahet phatnin, “Vo David chapa, neilungset in!” tin ahin sam pantan ahi.
Mi tamtah chun, “Thipmin!” tin ama chu aphoh-un, ahivangin aman ging cheh-in, “David chapa, neilungset in!” tin ahin sam kit'e.
Jesun ajah phatnin adingdenin, “Hilama hung din seipeh-un,” atin, amahon jong mitchopa chu aganai pheiyun, “Kipah thanomin! Hungtan, Aman nakouve,” atipeh-un ahin pui tauve.
Hichun Bartimaeus chun asangkhol-tho chu asut in akoilhan, chuin akichom touvin Jesu heng ahin jon tai.
Jesun, “Ipi bolpehleng nadeiyem?” tia adoh leh, mitchopan, “Houhil, kho muleng kati,” ati.
Chuin Jesun ajah-a, “Chetan, natahsan in nadamsah tai,” ati leh, chupet tah chun kho amupai jengin, lamlhungin Jesu ahin juitai.
Hitichun Jesu le aseijuiten Jerusalem ahinjon tauvin, Olive Lhanga Bethphage le Bethany kho alhung tauve. Jesun aseijui mi ni anache masadin asolmasan,
“Che lhon inlang, namasang jon lhon'a khopi sunga khun lut lhonin. Nalut lut lhon leh sangannou kihen, achunga koima touna khahlou lai khat namu pai lhon ding ahi. Hichu sutlha lhon inlang hinkaiphei lhonin.”
Mi khattouvin, “Ibola nasut lhonham? tia ahin doh leh, ‘Pakaiyin manna nom aneiye, chomkhat jouteng hinthahvah kit lhon nange,’ tilhon'in,” atipeh-e.
Seijui teni achelhon in, khopi sung lamlen'a inkot poa kotphunga sangannou kihen agamu lhontan ahi.
Chuin asut lhon leh akoma anadingho loikhat in, “Ibola sangannou chu nasut lhon ham?” atiuvin,
Chuin amanin Jesun asei bang chun amaho komah aseilhonin ahile ahin phalpeh tauve.
Sangannou chu Jesu henga ahinkai lhonin, achunga apon'u asep'un, Ama achunga atoutan ahi.
Mipi atama tamin lampiah apon'u aphauvin, mi abangkhat in loulaiya theoboh asat'un lampiah aphauvin ahi.
Jesu chu alailunga achesah'un, amasang lam le anunglama, “Pathen thangvah-in umhen! Pakai min'a hungpa chu anunnome!
Lenggam hung lhung ding Pu David gam chu phattheiboh chang hihen! Chungnungpen'a Pathen chu thangvah-in umhen!” tin asam asam'un ahi.
Chuin Jerusalem khopia houin'a chun Jesu agalut'in, ijakai avet kimvel sohkei jouvin, nilhah lam jong ahitan, apot in somleni ho cheng toh Bethany'a akilekit tauvin ahi.
Chuin ajingkah-in Bethany'a kon'a ahung potdoh leh agil akeltan ahi.
Hichun theichangphung amun, aga aum khattoule tia agavetle theiga phat lhingjep nailou ahitoh lhonin ado tailou aga ima amutapoi.
Jesun thingphung jah-a chun, “Tukallhah koiman natheiga nekit tahih hen!” atitan ahi. Chutia aseichu aseijuiten anajauvin ahi.
Chuin Jerusalem ahunglhun'un, Jesu houin sunga alut in, asunga thiljoh holeh thilchoho anodoh pantan, chule sumlhengho dokhang le vakhu johho touna chu alekhup peh tan ahi.
Houin sunga chun koima thilkeo apohle ding ajanom tapoi.
Ajah-uva aseiyin, “Thubua: ‘Ka-in chu namtin dinga taona in kitiding ahi,’ tia kisun hilouham? Ahin nanghon gucha michomho kokhuh in naso tauve,” atin ahousetai.
Hichu thempu pipui hole hou danthuthemhon ajauvin ahile, athimah tauvin, Jesu tha ding tohgon aneipan tauve. Hinlah mipin athuhil chu kidang asah-uva angainom jeh-u chun Ama chu akichauvin ahi.
Hiche nilhah chun Jesu le aseijuiten khopi adalha tauve.
Ajing jingkah-a theichang phung chu ahin jotpau leh anagoplhasa-a aum chu amutauve.
Chuin Peter in ageldoh-in, “Vetan Houhil, theichangphung nagaosap chu agoptai!” ati.
Chuin Jesun adonbut in, “Pathen tahsanun,
Tahbeha kaseipeh nahiuve, koihileh hiche mol jah-a, ‘Kichondoh'in lang twikhanglen'ah kilehlut tan,’ ati leh chutijeng ding ahi. Hinla hichu tahsanna dihtah nei lelung-opkaina beihel ahi angaiye.
Hiche jeh a chu kasei ahi, nataova thil nathum chan chu namusan ngaito leuchun namu dingu ahi.
Chule atao dinga nadinpet leh van'a na-Pauvin jong nasuh khelnau angaidam theina din koi hijongle nadou uchu ngaidamun.
Nanghon mi suhkhel nangaidamlou vangule van'a na-Pauvin nangho suhkhel jong angaidam louding ahi,” ati.
Jerusalem ahunglhung kit tauvin, Jesu Houin sungah agavahlelen ahileh thempu pipui holeh danthusunho ahenga ahungun,
“Ipi thuneina'a hitihohi nabolham? Hitobang bolna dinga kon thaneina napeh ham?” atiuvin ahi.
“Keiman thukhat nadong uvingting neidonbut'un lang chuteng keiman jong ipi thuneina'a hichehi kabol ham naseipeh nauvinge,” tin Jesun adonbut in ahi.
Hichun, “John chun twilutsah abol thuneina chu vanna kon ha, mihem a kon ham? Nei donbut'un!” tin adongtai.
Amaho le amaho akidongto uvin, “Vanna kon ahi tileu hen achutileh ibola John natoh natahsanlou uham tintin,
Mihem a kon ahi iti ngam diu baham?” akitiuvin ahi. Amaho akichauvin ahi—mijousen John chu themgao tahbeh'a angaito cheh-u ahijeh chun.
Achainan adonbut un, “Kahepouve,” atitauve. Chuin Jesun adonbut in, “Achutile ipi thuneina'a hicheng hi kabol ham ti keiman jong naseipeh povinge,” atitai.
Chuin Jesun thulem'in thu ahin pantan: “Mikhatnin lengpilei abolin, akimvel ah pal agenin ahi. Chuin achilnading khuh alaiyin, insang asan, chuin aleilhouho khut'ah lousan dingin apedoh in gamdangah achetan ahi.
Aga lo phat ahi phat'in ama chan ding chu ladingin aleilhouho hengah asohho khat asoltai.
Hinlah leilhouho chun amapa chu amanun avouvin, khutgoh keovin ahin soldoh tauve.
Chuin lou neipan asohho khat asol kit leh ama jongchu ajumsouvin, alu ahin vohpeh-uve.
Chujouvin achom khat asol kit'in ahile ama chu ahin that tauve. Chule adang asol ho jong abang ahin vouvin, abang ahin thatnun ahi.
Asolthei ding khat bou aumtan, ama chu achapa deitah chu ahi. Lou neipan achainakeiyin, ‘Kachapa ahijeh'in anajabol nauvinte,’ tin ama chu asoltan,
Ahinlah aleilhouho chu akihouvun, ‘Veuvin, agamngah ding, agou loding pa ahunge, khaiye! Thatdoh-utin agam hi eiho chang taute,’ akitiuvin ahi.
Chuin aman'un, athat'un along chu lengpilei polam'ah alehdoh tauvin ahi.
Hichan gei chu ahitahleh lengpilei neipa chun leilhou ho chu i-lotante tia nagel uvem? Naseipeh-unge—ama hung intin aleilhouho chu sugamintin lengpilei chu midang pedoh tante.
Thubua kisun: ‘Insahon adeimouva apaiyu song chu inning songin apangtan,
hichehi Pakai thilbol ahin, vetdingin avetlom lheh-e,’ tia kisun chu nasim dohkhah-uvem?” tin adonge.
Chupet'a um hou lamkaiho chun—leilhou migilou ho chu amaho toh kitekahna'a kisei ahi tin agel tauvin, Jesu chu matding ago tauvin ahi. Ahinlah mipiho akichat kit jeh-uvin, adalhauvin achemang tauve.
Chomkhat jouvin lamkaiho chun thua themmo chansah-a mattheina dingin Pharisee ho phabep khat le Herod miho phabep chu Jesu thudoh boldingin asol un ahi.
Hichun agacheuvin, “Houhil, Nangma midih nahin, koima gin naneipoi. Dihtah'a Pathen lampi chu nahil ahi chu kaheuve. Ahile neiseipehun—Caesar kai kapeh-uhi dihthei ding hinam ahiloule dihlou ding ham?”
Kapeh diu ham, kapehlou diu ham? agatiuve. Jesun aphatlhemnau chu amudoh'in, adonbutnan, “Ibola neilunglah patep uham? Romte dangka-pumkhat hinchoiyun langnei vetsah un, chule naseipeh-uvinge,” ati.
Ahin choi phat'un, Jesun aven, “Hichea kinam hi koi lim le koi min ham?” tia adohleh, amahon “Caesar a ahi,” atiuvin ahi.
Chuin Jesun, “Chuti ahile aphai, Caesar a chu Caesar peuvin lang, Pathen'a chu Pathen peuvin,” atipeh tai. Adonbutna chu adatmo lheh jengun ahi.
Chujouvin Sadducee—mithi thokitna aumpoi tiho—chu ahengah ahungun, ajah-a thudoh aneiyun,
“Houhil, Mosen eithupeh dungjuiyun mi khattouvin cha neilouva ajinu adalhah'a, athi tah'a ahile, asopipa chun ajinu chu vehen lang asopipa phunggui amanlouna ding chun chi khaipeh hen tin akiseiye.
Achutile, tekahnan ucha pasal sagi aume. Amasapenpa chun ji aneiyin chikhai louvin athitai.
Aban'a pan amanu chu jin aneiyin chikhai louvin athin, athumnapa jong chutima chu ahin,
Hitichun akitol suhpeh tauvin, asagiuvin chikhailou ahitauve. Achainan numeinu jong chu athitai.
Ahileh tun neiseipeh-un, thokit nia amanu chu alah uva koipen ji hitantem? Ijeh-inem iti leh asagiuva amanu chu jia anei cheh-u ahitai,” atiuve.
Jesun adonbut in, “Nasuhkhel'u chu Pathen thubua thu kisei nahethem pouvin chule Pathen thaneina nahet lou uhi ahi.
Ijeh-inem iti leh mithiho athodoh tengu chule ji anei tahlou diu chujongleh kichensahna umtalou ding ahi. Hiche thudol'a hi vanna Vantilte tobang hiding ahitauve.
Ahileh, mithiho kaithouva aum diu thudol hi—Mose'n hamboh meikou thudol asutna-ah, Abraham, Isaac chule Jacob thi jou khonungpeh-a Pathen in Mose koma, ‘Keima Abraham Pathen, Isaac Pathen chule Jacob Pathen kahi,’ tia asei thu chu sim khalou nahiuvem?
Chu dungjuiya chu ama ahingho Pathen ahin, athihoa ahipoi. Nanghon thuhettohlou suhkhelna lentah naneiyu ahitai,” ati.
Chua hou danthuhilho lah'a khat in akihounau chu anajan, Jesun kichentah'a ahil chu ahechen in, hijeh chun aman Jesu jah-a, “Thupeh jouse lah'a hoichepen hi thupipen ham?” tin adongtai.
Jesun adonbut'in, “Thupeh pipen chu hichehi ahi: ‘Ngaiyun, vo Israel! Pakai Pathen hi khatseh bou ahi.
Nangman Pakai na-Pathen chu, nalung pumpi, nahinna pumpi, nangaitona pumpi chule nathaneina jousea nangailut mong mong ding ahi.’
Anina jong kibangchet'in athupin ahi, hichu: ‘Nangma nakingailut bangin naheng nakom ngailun.’ Hicheteni sanga thupijo thupeh dang aumpoi,” ati.
Hou dan thuhilpan adonbut in, “Naseihoi ngeiye, Houhil. Nangman thudihtah in thu naseiyin Pathen khatseh bou aume, Pathen dang aumpoi nati-e.
Chule Pathen chu lungthim pumpi, khohet theina pumpi le thanei jousea ngailut ding ahi chu kahen, chule eima ikingailut banga iheng ikom ngailut ding jong chu kahei. Hichu ganpum goa kilhainale longlhenna sangin gamchengin aphajoi,” ati.
Danthuhilpan kichentah'a adonbut ajah phat'in Jesun ajah-a aseiyin, “Nangma Pathen Lenggam toh nakigamlat poi,” atipeh tai. Chukal chun koiman thudang adongngam tapoi. David Chapa Thudol Asei
Phat chomkhat jouvin, Jesun houin sungathu ahil pet'in miho adongin, “Danthusunhon Messiah chu iti David chapa ahi atiu hintem?
Ijeh-inem iti leh Lhagao Thengin ahil a konin David jengin jong, ‘Pakaiyin ka-Pakai jah-ah, jabolna mun'ah kajet lamin touvin namelmate cheng nakeng chotphaa kaneisah masangsen,’ anatin ahi.
David amatah'in Pakai chu Pakai asah-in, achutileh achapa iti hithei dingham?” atin ahi. Mipi chun Jesu thusei chu thanomtah'in angaiyui.
Jesun aseibe kit'in, “Danthusunhoa konin kihongphauvin! Ajehchu amahon sangkhol chol kiah-a kholailenna chule kailhanga min chibai aboh diu athanoppiuve.
Chule kikhopna in le golvahna'a touna pipen adeiyui.
Hinlah kiphatlamna beihelin meithaiho nei le gou lahpehna dingin alhemlha jiuvin, houguttah bangin japi mutheina ding munhoah sottahtah taona amang jiuve. Hichejeh'a hi amaho hi gotna sangtah chang diu ahi,” ati.
Chuin Jesu Houin sunga sumdolna bom jon'ah atouvin, mipin sumdolna boma sum alelut chu aven ahile mihao tamtah'in tamtahtah alelut'u amui.
Chua chun vaichatah meithainu khat ahungin sumsan-nong pumni alehlut in ahi.
Chuin aseijuiteho akouvin ajah'uva, “Tahbeh'a kasei ahi, hiche meithai vaichanu hin adang jouse sangin sumdolna-ah atam lelut pene.
Ijeh-inem itileh adangho jouse khun aneival ato-u ahin, amanu vang hin aneichasun ahinpi chengse alelut jeng ahi,” ati.
Chuin Jesu houin'a konin apotdohin, aseijuite khat'in aseiyin ajah-ah, “Houhil, vetemin hichea in len thupitahho hi! Abanga song lentahtah kimangho khu athupi ngeiye,” ati leh,
Jesun adonbut in, “Henge, ven, hiche in lentahho hung kisuchim sohkei ding ahi. Songkhat jeng jong khat chunga kisethom umlou helding ahi!” ati.
Phat chomkhat jouvin Jesu Olive Lhanga Houin jon'ah atouvin ahile, Peter, James le John chule Andrew ahenga ahungun, ajah'a adongun,
“Neiseipehun, hitobang phat chu itih tengle hiding ham? Hitobang ahung lhun ding hettheina ding amelchihna neiseipehun,” atiuve.
Jesun adonbut'in, “Koimacha kilheplhahsah hih-un,”
Ijeh-inem itileh mi tamtah keima minin hunguntin, “Keima Messiah kahi,” tiuvintin mi tamtah alheplhah dingu ahi.
Chule gal kisat thuthang najah diu ahi, ahivangin lunglinglau hih-un. Henge, hitiho chu hung lhung tei ding ahin, ahivangin achaina hilou laiding ahi.
Namkhat le namkhat chule gam khat le gamkhat kidouding, leiset chung mun chom choma lingkihot'a, kel lhading ahivanga hichu naosonat kipat tobang hinalai bep ding, aban'a jong umding ahinalaiye.
Hitiho chu ahung lhun tengle, kiging phauvin! Khosung vaipo ho khut'a pehdoh-a naum dingu, chuleh houin munhoa jep le suhgim'a naum dingu ahi. Keima nungjui nahi jeh-uva vaipo hole lengho masanga thutanna anga nadin dingu ahi. Hinla hiche phat chu keima thudol naseipehna diuva phat kijenpet hiding ahi.
Ijeh-inem iti leh Kipana Thuphahi namtin lah'a kihillhang ding ahi.
Ahivangin amahon namatuva a-angsunguva nadin tengule ipi kasei dingham tin lungdong masahih-un. Hitobang phatteng chuleh Pathen in seidinga napeh chan'u chu sei jengun, ajeh chu aseiya chu nangho hitalouva Lhagao Theng joh hiding ahitai.
Chule asopin asopipa, apan acha tha dinga ahin pehdoh ding, chaten anule apa ahin douva athadiu ahi.
Chule kaseijui nahi jeh uva mijousen nahin vetda dingu, ahinlah akhon nigeiya thohlhumpa bou chu huhhing'a umding ahi.
Thet umtah thilsuboh chu adinlouna ding dol mun'a adin namu nikho'u hung lhung ding ahi. (asimhon chingtheitah'a simding!) Chuteng chuleh ud agama um chengse lhang gamah jamlut hen.
Inchunga umho jong athilkeo kilah dingin kumsuhda hen.
Koitobang loulaiya umjong apon-ah sangkhol kilah dingin hung kiledahen.
Ohe! Chuche phat laitah'a navop le naonoi chepsah ho ada nadiuve!
Chuche phat chu phalbi daplai ahilouna dingin taovun. Chutobang gentheina nasatah chu Pathen in leiset asema pat tuni geiyin aum khahih laiye; chuleh umjong umlou ding ahi.
Pakaiyin hiche phat chu asuhchomlou hileh ahingah koima umlou ding ahi.
Tahbeh'a, lhenchomte jal'a anikho chu asuhchom ahitai.
Chule koitobang hamkhat in najah uva, Veuvin, hikoma Messiah aume, atia ahiloule “Khukom'ah aume,” ati jongle tahsanhih'un.
Ajehchu Messiah lhemle themgao lhem hung sohdoh intin melchihna le mu kidang dang ahin vetsah dingu ahin, ahitheile lhenchomte jeng jong lheplhah ding ahin got diu ahi.
Nangho vang chingtheiyun, ijakai kahil masahdem nahiuve!
Hitobang nikhoho jouteng chule nisa thimintin lha vahta louding,
Vanlaijola konin ahsiho pullhantin, van'a hatnaho chengse kihotlingsoh ding ahi.
Chutahleh mitin in vanlaijola Mihem Chapa chu athuneina le aloupina toh meilom chunga ahung amu diu ahi.
Chutengtah chule Aman avantilho asola leiset monga pat van mong geiya kolkimvel lia kon'a alhenchomte alonkhom ding ahi.
Tuhin theichang phunga konin kihillun. Abah adon'a, ajih akilhap tengle nipi anaitai ti naheuve.
Chutobangma chun, nanghon jong hicheng chu aguilhun namu tengule, ahungkitna ding anaitai, kotbul ahung geitai ti heuvin.
Tahbeha kaseipeh nahiuve, hichengse aboncha a aguilhun masangsea tulai khang mite hi manglou ding ahi.
Van le lei mangding ahin, keima thu vang manglou ding ahi. Koiman Anikho le Anidan Ahepoi
Ahivangin hitobang ahungsona ding chu koi hihen, vanna Vantilte hihen, Chapa hijongle, Pa tailou koiman anikho le anidan tah chu ahepoi.
Aphat tah nahetlou jeh-un, chingtheiyin kiging jingin umun.
Mihem Chapa hungkit nikho hi tekahnan: mi khat'in asohten atohdingu thuneina apeh-a, kotngah jong kiging jinga um dinga thu apeh'a, a-in dalha a kholgama chemang tobang ahi.
Hijehchun kiging jingin um'un! Ijeh-inem itileh inneipu chu itih-a ahung ding nahe pouve, nilhahlam ahim, jankhangkim ahim ahung ding phat nahe pouve.
Hung lhung taleh na-imut pet'u hung tohkhante. Nangho jah-a kasei hi mijouse jah-a kasei ahi. Kiging jingin umun! ati.
Hichun Kalchuh Kut le Cholsolou Changlhah Kut kimanna ding nini aumtan ahi. Thempu pipui hole danthusun hon Jesu chu guhthima mat'a thatheina ding lampi anahol jing nalaiyun ahi.
Ahin, “Kalchuh Kut sung hidahen, achutiloule mipi lah-a thunoh umget inte,” tin akinopto uve.
Chulai chun Jesu chu Simon, phah anaveipa, in'ah alhunge. Chua an aneh laiyin numei khat'in songval bomin thaonamtui mantamtah ahin choiyin, abom chu asukeh-in aluchungah abunglhan ahi.
Ahin alah uva loikhat chu alungnommo'uvin, “Ibol'a hitia hi thaonamtui mantam kimoh suhmang hitam?
Ijeh-inem itileh hiche thaonamtui hi kijohleh kumlhunga thalo jat toh kikot intin, hichu vaicha gentheiho pehthei hiding!” atiuvin aphunkhum tauvin ahi.
Ahinlah Jesun adonbut in, “Amanu chu oimo hih-un, keima'a dinga thilphatah abol ahitai.
Ijeh inem iti leh vaicha le gentheiho nakomuva aumjing nauve, nagot chan uva nahu theiyu ahi. Kei vang nakomuva umjing ding kahipoi.
Amanun abolthei chan abol ahitai. Kathilong chu vuiya ahung umtheina dinga thao einu masat ahitai.
Keiman tahbeh'a kaseipeh nahiuve, vannoi pumpia Kipana Thupha kilhangsapna chan'a hiche numeinu thilbol jong hi amanu hetjingna'a kiseitoupeh ding ahi,” ati.
Chuin somleni ho lah'a mi khat Juda Iscariot chun Jesu chu matsah theina dingin thempuho hengah agachen ahi.
Amahon ahet phat'un akipatdoh'un, ama chu sumpeh dingin atemtauvin ahi. Chuin aman Jesu chu pehdoha matsah theina ding agomkom aholtan ahi.
Cholsolou Changlhah Kut nimasa nia Kalchuh Kut kelngoi atha pet uvin aseijuiten ajah-ah, “Kalchuh Kut Ankong hoikoma kagon diu nadeiyem?” atiuvin ahi.
Hichun aseijui mi ni khopi sunga gache lhon din asolin, “Khopi sung nalut lhon teng, twibel pua mi khat nato lhon ding ahi. Amachu jui lhonin.
Ama alutna inneipa jah-a chun, ‘Houhil'in: kaseijuite toh Kalchuh Kut ankong kasokhomna diu indan chu hoilai ham? ati,’ gatilhonin.
Chule ama tah-in insong chunga indan lentah gontupsa a kikoi khat navetsah lhon ding ahi. Hikom chu ahi inehkhomna diuva nagonna diu mun chu,” ati.
Chuin seijui teni chu apot lhonin, khopi sungah alut lhonin, akisei bang chun imajouse chu agatoh lhonin, Kalchuh Kut an ding chu agagong lhon tai.
Hichun nilhah-in Jesu aseijuite toh chua chun agalhung tauve.
Atou uva an aneh laitah-un, Jesun aseiyin, “Tahbeha kasei ahi, tua kaneh khompi lah-a khat hin eipehdoh ding ahi,” ati.
Amaho alungkham pan tauvin, banneichan khat khat in ahin dongui, “Kei kahim?” tin.
Aman adonbut in, “Nangho somleni lah'a khat, tua lhengkong kasokhompi hi ahi.
Mihem Chapa chu athi ding dol masanglai peh'a pat Thubua anakiseisa ahitai. Hinama jongleh, Mihem Chapa melmate khut'a pedoh-a johdohpa chu—Ohe, ada nadinge! Ama chu apen'a anapenglou hile ama dinga phajo dinga!” ati.
Chuin a-anneh laitah'un Jesun changlhah phabep alan, hichu phatthei aboh in, chuin ahehbalbal'in aseijuiteho apen, “Hichehi katahsa ahi, neuvin,” ati.
Chule khon'a lengpitwi alan, phatthei aboh-in amahochu apen, chutichun abonchauvin adonsohkei tauvin ahi.
Chuin Aman ajah'uva aseiyin, “Hichehi kathisan, Pathen le amite kah'a kitepna thah um photchetna ahi. Hiche hi mi tamtah chonset ngaidamna dinga longdoh ahi.
Tahbeha kaseipeh nahiuve, keiman Pathen Lenggama athah-a kadon kit ni ding tailou lengpitwi hi kadonlou ding ahitai,” ati.
Hichun la asauvin, chujouvin apotdoh'un Olive Lhang lamah ache tauvin ahi.
Lampia achepet'un Jesun ajah'uva aseiye, “Nangho nabonchauva nalungthoi sohkeidiu ahi. Ijeh-inem iti leh, Pathen thubun: ‘Keiman kelngoi chingpa kavohlhuh ding ahi, chujou teng akelngoite chu chehchao diu ahi,’ ati.
Ahinlah keima thina-a kon kahung thodoh jouteng Galilee gam lama namasanguva kache ding chua chu neimu diu ahi,” ati.
Chuin Peter in aseiyin, “Abonchauvin lungthoi ongleur, kei vang lungthoi ponge,” ati.
Hichun Jesun, “Keiman tahbeh'a kasei ahi, Peter—nangman tu jan'a ah ni vei akhon masanga thumvei neiseilep ding ahi,” atipeh-e.
Peter in, “Kanompoi! Nangmatoh thitha teiding hijongleng, naseilep hihhel ing kate,” atichangmelin ahi. Chule abonchauvin achuti seicheh-un ahi.
Amaho olive thinglei lah-a Gethsemane atiu honsung achun ahungun, chuah Jesun aseiyin, “Keima katao sungsen nangho hikoma hin anatou jingun,” ati.
Aman Peter, James chule John akipuiyin, alunghem lheh jeng tai.
Chuin Jesun, “Thinakhop helin kalung hesoh behseh jengtai. Hikoma hin um unlang eina kiginpeh-un,” ati.
Chule amasang lamah neokhat ache chon'in tollah akhupboh-in alhun, ahitheile hiche phat chu Ama-a kon'a akitolmang theina dingin ataove.
Akapjah-in, “Abba, Hepa! Imajouse Nanga dinga hithei ahi. Ahitheile hiche gimthohna khon hi keiya konin kitolmang hen. Hinla Nangma lunggot bang joh hihen lang, keima lunggot bang hida hen,” tin ataotai.
Chujouvin ahungdohle khatteho chu ana imutlhuh-u ahung toh'in, Peter jah-a, “Simon, na-imut hitam? Nidan khat jeng jong kiginga umjoulou nahim?
Lhepna-a nalhahlouna dingun, kigingun, taovun ijeh-inem iti leh lhagaovin agonan, tahsan ajolou ahi,” ati.
Chuin amaho adalhan, ache kit'in atao ngai bangin agatao kittai.
Chuin ahung kile kit'in ahile amaho chu ana-imut'u ahung toh kit'in, aimutso behseh jeh-un adonbutje ahepouve.
Athumvei channa-a ahung kile kit chun ajah uva, “Tun i-mu uvin lang kithaol tauvin. Aphasettai, phat alhingtai. Hinla—veuvin, Mihem Chapa hi michonsete khut'a kipedoh ahitai.
Kipat'un, chetauhite. Veuvin, eipedohpa hiakhun aumtai!” ati.
Jesun hichu asei jou jouvin, hetmanlouvin, Judas, aseijuiho lah'a khat, chu mihonpi moltum le chemjam kichoi puma hungho toh ahung kilhon khom'in ahi. Amaho chu thempu pipui holeh houlamkaihon ahinsol'u ahi.
Ajohdoh-a pangpa, Juda Iscariot chun melchihna ahil masan, “Namat diu chu chibai kaboh-a kachop penpen chu hiding ahi. Ama chu puimang un,” ati.
Ahung lhun lhun'un Juda chu Jesu hengah achen, “Houhil!” tin chibai bohnan achoptai.
Chuin akhut alhauvin Jesu amantauvin ahi.
Jesu nungjuiho lah'a mi khat'in achemjam asatdohin thempu chungnung sohpa asat leh abilkol langkhat asatlhan ahi.
Jesun adongin, “Galguh bolho mandinga kon banga moltumle chemjam thoa keiman dinga nahung uham?
Houin sunga kaum laiya ibola neimatlou uham? Niseh leh nalah'uva thujong kanahil jinge. Ahinlah Thubua thukiseisa aguilhunna dinga hitia hi thilsoh vang ahinai,” ati.
Chuin aseijuite jouse akithecheh-un, ajamgam tauve.
Alah'uva gollhang khat asangkhol tupat ponnem khatseh kiah aumin, ama chu ahungkon hon amat'ule,
Aman apon-ah chu akhut'uva adalhan, asagohkeovin ajammangtai.
Amahon Jesu chu thempu chungnung hengah akaiyun, chua chun thempu pipui chengse le vaipo upa ho chule danthusunho ahung kikhomun ahi.
Peter in galkangin ahin juipeh-in chule jangpet'in thempu chungnung inpi leitol sungnung geiyin ajuilutpeh in chua chun sottolleho lah'a atouve.
Asunglamah, thempu pipui holeh houlamkaiho chengsen Jesu tha theinadia hehsetna le themmo channa ding pansattheina ding ahol un ahivanginla amupouvin ahi.
Jouthu tamtah'in ahehseuvin, ahinlah akitoh tapouvin ahi.
Akhonna-in, mi phabep akipatdoh'un,
“Amaa kon'a kajah-u chu: khut'a kisa hiche houinthenghi suse-ingting, nithum jouleh khut'a sahlou achom dang khat katundoh ding ahi,” ati-e tin ahin hehse tauvin ahi.
Ahivanginla hichea jongchun athuseiyu akitoh kitpouvin ahi.
Chuin thempu chungnung chu mipi masanga adingdoh in, Jesu thudoh abolin, “Hitehon nahehnau thu aseiyuhi nadonbut lou dingham?” ati.
Ahivangin Jesun donbut louvin thipbeh'in aumin, chuin thempu chungnungin adongin, “Nangma Nunnom Chapa, Messiah chu nahim?” atitai.
Jesun adonbut in, “Kahi,” atin, chuleh, “Nanghon Mihem Chapa hi thuneina mun'a Pathen jetlam'a atouva chule van meilah-a ahung namu dingu ahinalaiye,” ati.
Chuin Thempu chungnung chun alunghan vetsahnan aponsil abotkeh-in, “Hettohsahna ipi iholbe nahlai dingu ham?
Pathen ataitomna thu naja tauve. Nanghon iti nagel um?” atileh abonchauvin asam'un, “Athidinga lom ahi!” tin aeo lahlah jengun ahi.
Mi abangkhat'in achil asetkhum'un chule amit akanpeh-un, akhutnun achumun, “Gaothu neiseipeh-un,” tin eltolin ahouvun, angeiphe abengun apuimang tauve.
Hichepet'a chu Peter noilama leitola uma ahin, thempu chungnung ole numei khat ahungin ahile,
Peter in mei aoi chu amun, amanu chun aven ajah a, “Nang jong Nazareth Jesu toh kiloi nahi,” ati.
Ahinlah Peter in, “Nasei chu kahehih hel'e,” tin adonbut'in, leitol maiya apotdohleh ahchal akhongtai.
Chuin sohnu chun amun akoma dingho jah-a, “Hichepa hi amaho lah'a khat ahi!” atikit e.
Ahinlah Peter akilepkittai. Chomkhat jouvin, akoma dingho chun, “Amaho lah'a khat mong mong nahi, ajehchu Galilee mi nahi-e,” atikit tauvin ahi.
Ahivangin aman, “Kajou kasei leh gaosap chang inge—naseipau hi kahekha hihbeh-e!” atijeng tai.
Chujou jouvin aniveina'in ah ahung khong paitan ahi. Chutah chun, Jesu thusei: Ah ni vei akhon masanga thumvei neiseilep ding ahi, ati chu ageldohtan, hakan akaptan ahi.
Chuin jingpi tah'in thempu pipuho, vaipo upa ho, danthusunho, chule hou vaipoloi chengse akihoupaiyun, Jesu chu akan'un, akaiyun Pilate khut'ah apedoh tauve.
Pilate in Jesu adongin, “Nangma Judate Lengpa nahim?” ati leh, Jesun adonbut in, “Nasei chu adih-e,” ati.
Chuin thempu pipuihon thu tamtah'in ahehse tauvin ahi.
Pilate in adong kit'in, “Amaho hi nadonbutlou ding ham? Vetang thu hijat'a nahin heh-uhi?” Jesun adonbutlou beh phat'in Pilate in adatmo lheh jenge.
Vaipopa chena-ngai dol'a kumseh-a Kut sungse leh sohchangho lah-a amipin athum pen penkhat chu alhadohpeh ji ahi.
Chulai chun songkul'ah Barabbas atiu gamsung chohnoh-bol le tolthat khat aumin ahi.
Mihonpi chu Pilate henga acheuvin, angaina banga songkultang khat lhadoh din agaseiyui.
Chuin Pilate in, “Judate lengpa hi lhadohpeh leuveng nadeiyum?” tin asei tai.
Ama chun thempu pipuihon thangset man'a apehdoh-u ahi ti chu ahet ahi.
Ahivang'in thempu pipuihon Barabbas joh chu lhadohna dingin mipi chu atilseuvin ahi.
Hichun Pilate in ajah uva, “Achutileh Judate Lengpa natipau hi i-kalo ding bahitam?” ati.
Chuin amahon asamkit'un, “Thingpela khenbeh-in!” atitauve.
“Ijeh-inem? Ipi abolset em?” tia Pilate in asei vang'in, mipi chun ahasap cheh-un, “Thingpel'a khenbeh-in!” atitauve.
Mipite lunglhaina dingin Barabbas alhadoh-in, Jesu chu ajep jouvun thingpela khetbeh dingin apedohtan ahi.
Chuin hemchoi (sepai) sottol hon Ama chu Praetorium atiu, vaipo inpi sunga chun akailut'un, sepai jouse akoukhom sohkeiyun ahi.
Chuin Jesu chu ponsandup asilpeh-un, leng-lukhuh tobanga linga kiphan chu akhuhpeh-ui.
Chuin, “Judate Lengpa, choianun!” tin, totnopnan chibai aboh-un ahi.
Chuin amaho chun peng tenggolin alu avo avouvin, chule achil asetkhum'un, totnopnan adilsu uvin chibai aboh-ui.
Achainan ael-ela totnopna'a aboljouvun aponsan chu ahoh lhauvin, ama pon ale silpeh-un thingpela khetbeh dingin apuiphei tauvin ahi.
Cyrene kiti gamkochong langa pat hungkon, Simon kitipa chutoh amaho chu lamkah-a akitohpa uvin, hichun ama chu achamlouvin Jesun ahinput thingpel chu aputsah-un ahi. (Simon hi Alexander le Rufus penna pa ahi.)
Chuin Jesu chu lugu-mun atiu Golgotha mun'achun alhut tauvin ahi.
Chuah myrrh toh kihal lengpitwi apeuvin ahile Ama anompoi.
Chuin thingpel'a akhenbeh-un, aponsil chu avangpha pha chang hen tin vang asangtauve.
Jesu akhetbeh-u chun jingvai nidan ko ahitan ahi.
Achunga chun ahehnau hetnan, “Judate Lengpa” tia kisun chu atah-un ahi.
Ama toh gamsunga chohnohbol mi ni, khat aveilamah, khat ajetlamah akhenbeh-un ahi.
“Ama michonse chochibol-ho toh akisimtha tai,” tia Lekhabua kisun chu aguilhungtan ahi.
Chuin achele avahleho jousen akhasuh khumun, “Katei! Nangin houin kasuhchima nithum nileh kasahdoh kit ding ahi natin, tuchun kivet in.
