Nangma kihuhhing inlang thingpel'a kon chun hung kumlha tangem!” atiuvin ael-elin ahouvun ahi.
Chutobangma chun thempu pipui hole danthusunhon jong abol ui. “Aman midang ahuhhingin, Ama akihuhhing theipoi!
Kamu'uva kahettheina dingun Israelte lengpa chu tutah hin thingpel chunga kon'in hung kumlha hen!” atiuvin totnopnan abol'un ahi. Ama toh kikhetbehtha teni jong chun hitichun aseilhon e.
Chuin sunkim velhin gam jouseah nidan thum chan mu athimtan ahi.
Hichun nidan thum dontah'in Jesu hapen in apengin, “Eloi, Eloi, lema sabach thani?” atitai. Hichu: “Ka-Pathen, ka-Pathen, ibola neidalhah hitam?” atina ahi.
Avel'a umho phabep chun Elijah akou hinte atiuve.
Hichun mi khat alhaijelin, lengpitwi thuh-a twichop phon adelhop in, adontheina din peng tenggol leh chu ajah-in, amapa chun, “Khongaiyutin, Elijan ahung huhdoh-em veuhite!” ati.
Chuin Jesu kithongtah'in ahung peng kit'in ahai atantai.
Hichun Houin'a pondal len chu achunga pat anoilam geiyin aehlha paiyin, kehni akisotan ahi.
Chule Rome sepai jalamkai khat'in thilsoh ijakai amu jouvin, “Hichepa hi Pathen Chapa tahbeh ahimonge!” tin aphongdoh jeng tai.
Numei phabep chun thilsoh chu gal'a konin ahin galdot ui. Amaho lah'a chun Mary Magdalene toh Mary (James le Joseph dinga anu) chule Salome jong apangun ahi.
Amaho cheng chu Jesu Galilee gam'a aumlaiya, Ama ajuile ajenlea anapangho chu ahiuve. Chule numei tamtah Jerusalem'a Ama hin kilhontoupiho jong chu ahiuve.
Hichengse hi Cholngahni masang Kiginnia soh ahi. Chuin nilhahlam ahung hitan,
Arimathea Joseph chun Jesu longdamsa chunga mopohna ladingin Pilate koma agathumtan ahi. (Arimathea Joseph chu mi jaumtah vaipo holah-a khat ahin, chule Pathen Lenggam hunglhun ding ngahjing mi khat ahi.)
Pilate in Jesu chutia athiloi jeng ding chu atahsanpon, hijeh chun Rome sepai jalamkaipa chu akouvin Jesu athi tahbeh hitam tin adongin ahi.
Chuin Rome sepai jalamkaipan athi chu aphotchen phatnin along chu Arimathea Joseph koma apedohtai.
Chuin Joseph chun along chu alalhan, tupat ponnem achon, hichun atomin, songpi kivut-hom lhan sungah chun alupsahtai. Chujouvin lhankot'a chun songlen khat atanglut'in, lhan chu asinnan ahi.
Chule Mary Magdalene toh Mary (James nu) chun Jesu longdamsa akoinau chu avelhi jing lhonin ahi.
Chuin Cholngahni nilhah ahung hia, cholngah nit akichai jouvin, Mary Magdalene, James nu Mary, chule Salome chu apotdoh'un thaonamtui gachoh-a Jesu tahsaa nu dingin akigong uve.
Hapta nimasapen jingpi matah niso kon vel in, amaho lhan lama chun agacheuvin ahi.
Lampiah amaho akihouvun, “Lhankot song chu kon eitahdohpeh tauvintem?” akitiuvin ahi.
Chuin ahung lhun phat'un avet uleh song chu tahdohsa'a anaum chu amutauve. Asong chu lenpitah ahi.
Hichun lhan sunga chu alut'ule gollhang khat ponbangleh kisil'a jetlam'a tou amu'uvin chuin amaho chu atijalheh jengun ahi.
Ahivangin vantil chun amaho jah-ah, “Nangho tijahih'un, nanghon thingpela kithat Nazareth Jesu chu nahol'u ahi. Ama hikoma aumtapoi! Ama thinaa konin athoudohtai! Hungun, hung veuvin, hilai hi alonglupna chu ahi.
Tun cheuvinlang Peter le aloiho komah Aman athi masanga anasei bang chun Galilee gam'a namasanguvah anache masatai, chua chu Ama namu diu ahi, ti gaseipeh tauvin,” ati.
Numeiho chu atijauvin, kihot pumin lhan'a konin ahung potdoh'un, akichat behseh jeh-un imasei je jong ahepouve. Chuin amahon agan'a gangin seijuiho—Peter le aloiho komah agaseipeh tauvin ahi.
Hapta nimasapen jingkah-a Jesu athodohkit jouva akimutopi masatpen chu Mary Magdalene, asunga thilha sagi anodohpeh nu chu ahi.
Amanu chun seijui lunghemtah'a anaumho jah'a chun thilsoh umdolho chu agaseipeh tai.
Ahivangin amahon athusei chu atahsanpouvin ahi.
Phat chomkhat jouvin lim chombeh-in aseijuiteni Jerusalema kipan'a thinglhang lama cheteni komah akilah-in ahi.
Amani achelhon in seijui dangho jah-a agasei lhon leh amahon atahsandeh pouve.
Chuin ankong aum laitah'un seijui somlekhat-ho hengah Jesu akilah-in athodohkit nunga amuho thusei atahsanlou jeh-u le alungtah jeh-un asosalin ahi.
Chuin Aman ajah uva, “Nangho vannoi leiset gamjouseah cheuvin lang thilsem mihem namtin jah-a hiche Kipana Thuphahi gahil lhang leuvin.
Koihileh, atahsan'a baptize chang chu sohcha ding ahi. Atahsanlou vang chu themmo hange umding ahi.
Chule atahsante chu melchihna kidangin ajuipeh dingu ahi: Keima min'a thilha anodoh dingu, paothah, pao choma pao dingu,
Gul akhut'a adop dingu, Thinathei ima don ongleur ima tilou ding ahiuve. Chule ana-damlou chunga khut ngamleu ana chu damding ahi,” ati. Jesu Vanna Akaltou
Chuin Jesun ajah uva chucheng asei jouvin van'ah lahtouvin aumin, Pathen jetlam'ah atoutai.
Chuin amaho achedoh'un muntin'ah ahillhangleuvin anatohna chan'uvah Pakaiyin akithopiuvin, chule melchih nain ajuisah-in athuseiyu chu aphudetpeh-in ahi.
Mi tampin eiho lah'a ana guilhung thilsoh ho chungchang sutdoh agouvin ahi.
Amahon amittah'a mu seijui masaho thulhut amangchauvin ahi.
Thil jouse abul'a pat phatah'a kholchil ahitoh lhon'in, keiman jong chingthei tah'a nangma dinga jihdoh ding kakigel lhah ahitai, jana sangpen chang Theophilus,
chutia chu thutah nana kihil jouse chu ahimong nai ti nanop nading ahi.
Judea gam'a Herod leng ahi laiyin, Zechariah kiti Judah thempu khat ana um'in ahi. Ama chu Abijah thempu loi lah'a khat ahin chule a'inneipi Elizabeth jong chu Aaron thempu khailhah'a kon ahi.
Zechariah le Elizabeth chu Pathen mitmun achonpha lhon'in, Pakai dan thupeh le chon na dan jouse chingthei tah'a jui ahilhon'e.
Elizabeth in nao avop theilou jeh chun cha aneilhon pon, chule ani lhon'in hateh'in ateh gel lhon tai.
Nikhat Zechariah chun Hou'in sungah Pathen kin abolin, ajeh chu chuche hapta sunga chu mopohna chang ahi.
Thempuho chonna ngai banga, ama chu Hou'in muntheng sunga lut'a chule thil namtui hal dinga lhendoh hi ahi.
Thil namtui akihal jing laiyin, mipi tamtah pamlangah ading'un taona amang uve.
Zechariah muntheng sunga aumpet in Pakai vantil khat ahengah ahung kilah in, maicham phung jetlam a chun adingin ahi.
Zechariah in hichu amuphat in akithing'in hatah in akicha tan ahi.
Ahivangin vantil chun aseiyin, “Kicha hih'in Zechariah! Pathen in nataona asangtai. Na inneipi Elizabeth in chapa khat nahinpeh ding, chule amin John nasah ding ahi.
Nangman kipana lentah nanei ding, chule mi tampi ama pen a kipah ding ahi,
ijeh inem itile ama chu Pakai mitmua hung len ding. Aman ju kiti le khamna thei thil kiti atohkhah thei lou ding. Ama chu apen masang jenga jong Lhagao Theng dimset ding ahi.
Chule aman Israel mi tamtah Pakai a-Pathen'u henga alehei ding ahi.
Ama chun Elijah lhagao le thahat aken ding ahi. Aman mipiho chu Pakai hung na dinga agontup ding ahi. Mipa te lung achate chunga aheiya chule doudal lungput neiho michonphaho chihna akisan sah ding ahi,” ati.
Zechariah chun vantil jah'a aseiyin, “Hitobang hi aso ding ken iti kahet thei ding ham? Tun keima kateh tan, chule ka inneipi jong kum tamtah alhing tai,” tin adong tai.
Chuin vantil chun aseiyin, “Keima Gabriel kahi! Pathen angsung tah a ding kahi. Ama ahi keima nahenga hiche kipana thupha podinga eihin sol ah;
Ahinlah tun, nangman kasei natahsan pon, chujeh'a nangma nathipbeh ding chule nao apen tokah'a paothei louva naum ding ahitai. Ajeh chu kathusei chengse hi aphat cha guilhung tei ding ahi,” ati.
Achutilai chun mipi hon Zechariah chu ahung potdoh ding angah jingun, ipi bol'a hibanga hi sot den hitam tin alungdong gam tauvin ahi.
Achainakeiya ahung potdoh phat chun ama apaodoh thei tapon ahi. Chuin amahon amaiso le apaotheilouva kon chun Hou'in muntheng sunga chu mu anei hinte ti ahedoh un ahi.
Zechariah in Hou'in a athempu natoh hapta alhin phat in inlam'a akile tan ahi.
Phat chomkhat jouvin ajinu Elizabeth chu ahung gai paiyin chule lhanga jen potdoh louvin aum thipbeh tan ahi.
“Pakai iti phat hitam!” tin aphongdoh in “Aman kacha neilou jeh'a jumna eilah mang peh tai,” ati.
Elizabeth naovop kal lhagup lhin'in, Pathen in Gabriel vantil chu Galilee gam Nazareth kho ah,
nungah theng Mary hengah asol'in ahi. Amanu chu Joseph kiti Leng David insung khailhah pasal khat toh kicheng dinga got'a um ahitai.
Gabriel chu amanu hengah akilah in aseitai, “Chibai, sahluttah nu! Pakaiyin naumpi,” ati.
Lungdong le lung kika lahlah pum in Mary'in vantil thusei chu ipi tina ahi agel tai.
“Kicha hih'in Mary,” tin vantil chun aseitan ahi, “Ajeh chu nangman Pathen lunglhaina nakimutai!”
“Nangma gaiyin natin chapa khat nahin ding chule amin Jesu nasah ding ahi.
Ama hung len ding chule Chungnung pen Chapa kiti ding ahi. Pakai Pathen in apu David laltouna apehding ahi.
Chule Israel chunga tonsot'a vai apoh ding, alenggam in beitih aneilou ding ahi!” ati.
Mary'n vantil chu adongin, “Hinlah, hichu iti hithei ding ham? Keima nungah theng kahi,” ati.
Vantil chun adonbut in, “Lhagao Theng nachunga hung chu ding, chule chungnung pen thanei na in nalekhu ding ahi. Hijeh a chu naosen apeng ding chu atheng hiding chule ama chu Pathen Chapa kiti ding ahi.
Ipi aval um ding ham, nasopinu Elizabeth in jong ateh nungin nao avop tai! Mi hon aching'ah ahi atiuvin, hinlah tun chapa khat avop'in lhagup alhingtai.
Ajeh chu Pathen dingin ima ahimo aumpoi” ati.
Mary'n adonbut in, “Keima Pakai sohnu kahi, kachunga lhungding nasei jouse hung guilhung hen,” ati. Chuti chun vantil chun amanu chu adalhatai.
Ni phabep jouvin Mary jong Judea gam thinglhang lang,
Zechariah chen na khoa chun acheloi chal'in ahi. Amanu insung alut in Elizabeth chu chibai aboh'e.
Mary'n chibai aboh gin ajah chun Elizabeth naosen chu a-oisung a chun ahung kichom in, chule Elizabeth chu Lhagao Theng adimset tan ahi.
Elizabeth in kipanan ka cheng ahinlon Mary jah'a chun aseitai, “Pathen in numei jouse chunga phatthei naboh ahitai, chule na cha jong anunnom'e.
Ipi jeh'a hibanga jana kachan a ka pakai nu in eihung vil ham?
Nei lemna awcheng kajah chun kasunga naocha kipah in ahung kichom'e.
Anun nom nahi, ajeh chu Pakaiyin aseichu abol ding ahi ti natahsan e,” ati.
Mary'n adonbut in “Kalhagao vin Pakai achoi-an e.
Kalhagao eihuhhing pu Pathen chunga iti kipah thanom hitam!
Ajeh chu aman asoh numei nu dinmun ave jingin, chule tua pat'a khang jousen nunnom eiti diu ahitai.
Ajeh chu Hatchungnungpa chu atheng ahi, chule aman keima din thil loupi abol'e
Aman ahepina akhang akhang'in ama gingte amusah jinge.
Abanthahat chun kichat um tahtah thil abol'e! Aman mikiletsah le hoitho ho athecheh ji'e.
Leng chapate alaltounau-vakon in aloilhan mi kineosah te adomsang ji'e.
Aman agilkel te thil pha phan avah in chule ahao te khutgoh keovin asoldoh ji'e
Aman asoh Israel akithopin khoto dingin ageldoh'e.
Ajeh chu aman hiche kitepna hi iputeu, Abraham, chule achate dinga asem ahi.”
Mary chu Elizabeth koma lhathum tobang aum jouvin a'inlam ah akile tai.
Elizabeth chu anaoso phat alhin phat in amanun chapa khat ahingin ahi.
Chuleh aheng akom le asopi chengin Pakaiyin akhoto naho ajahdoh phat un, mijouse amanu toh akipah khom cheh tauve.
Naosen chu niget alhin in, amaho abon'un cheptansah dingin ahung'un ahi. Amahon apa banga amin Zechariah sahding agouvin,
ahivangin Elizabeth in, “Ahipoi, amin John ahi,” atitai.
“Ipi natim?” tin amaho ahung eojah jengun “Na insung uvah hitobang min chu aum khapoi,” atiuve.
Hijeh chun naosen min chu apan ipi akisah nom am ti mit-heiyin adongun ahi.
Aman lekhasutna pheng athum'in, mijouse lungdong in alhan “Amin John ahi” tin ahinjih e.
Chutah chun Zechariah jong ahung paothei tan chule Pathen avahchoi pan tai.
Akimvel'a cheng chengse din kichatna alhung tan chule Judea thinglhang gam sungse ah thilsoh umchan chu akithejal soh tai.
Chuche thilsoh jajouse chun athilsoh hochu alungin aching geh'un, “Hiche chapang hi ipibep ahungsoh tadem?” atiuvin ahi.
Chuin apa Zechariah chu Lhagao Theng adimset tan chule hiche gaothu hi aphongdoh in ahi:
Vahchoiyun Pakai, Israel Pathen chu; ajehchu aman amite avil'in alhatdoh tai
Aman huhhing hattah khat asoh David khailhah a kon in eipeuve.
Athemgao thengte henga malaiya akitepna banga
Tua eiho igalmiteu vakon le eihotbolteu va kona huhdoh a umding ihitauve.
Aman ipu ipateu khotonan akitepna thengho ageldoh jingin–
Akitepna ipuluiyu Abraham koma anakitepna bangtah in
i-galmiteuva kon in eihuhdoh uve, Pathen kichatna beihel'a ijen thei nadiuvin
Then na le chondihna a ihin laiseuva dingin
“Chule kachapa, nangma chungnung pen themgao kiti ding nahi; ajeh chu nangman Pakai lampi semtoh sa nakoi ding ahi.
Nangman amite, achonset nau ngaidam na'a kona huhhingna akimudoh nadiu naseipeh ding ahi.
Pathen mikhotona nemheo vanga jingkhovah chu van'a kona eiho chunga hung kisukeh go ahitai.
Muthim'a touho le thina lim'a touho vah pedinga, chule chamna lampi komu peh dinga ahi,” ati.
John chu ahung khanglen in chule lhagaovin ahung hatdoh in ahi. Chule Israel koma lhangphonga natoh apat kahsen ama gamthip lah dungah aumin ahi.
Chuphat lai chun Rome gamvaipo, Augustus chun Rome gamsung pumpia minsut ding thupeh ahin neitan ahi.
(Hiche hi minsut amasapen Quirinius Syria gamvaipo ahilai anahi).
Mijouse ama ama hung kondoh na khopi ah minsut na a kijihlut dingin akile un ahi.
Chule Joseph chu leng David chilhah ahijeh chun, Judea gam Bethlehem, David gollui laiya achenna in'a ache angaitai. Chua chun ama akholjin in Galilee gam Nazareth kho a pat in akipatdoh'e.
Aman agolngai Mary chu akipuiyin, amanu chu agaiyah ahi akichen in ahi.
Chule chumun a aum laiyun, naoso phat chu ahung lhing tan ahi.
Amanun acha masa, chapa khat ahingin, pon'in phatah in ajel in gan ankong ah alupsah'e, ajeh chu gemun amaho dia onglou anahi.
Chuche jan chun kelngoi chingho loujao anai dungah aum'un, kelngoiho aventup u ahi.
Phulou helouvin Pakai vantil khat ahenguvah ahung kilah in, chule Pakai loupina in akimvel'u asalvah soh'e. Amaho akichauvin,
ahivangin vantil chun alhamon in, “Kicha hih'un” tin aseiyin “Keiman nangho kipana thupha, mijouse dinga kipana hinso ding kahin pohpeh uve.
Huhhingpu, ahi, Messiah chu, Pakai chu tunin David khopi Bethlehem ah apengtai!
Chule nanghon hiche melchihna a hi nahetdoh thei diu ahi: Nanghon naosen pon ajol jol'a kitup sel'a kijel, gan ankonga kilupsah nagamu diu ahi,” ati.
Phulou helouvin vantil chu vanmi janel honpi hon ahinjop'un–van sepai hotoh–Pathen avahchoiyun chule hitin aseiyuve,
“Van chungnung pen'a Pathen loupi hen, chule leiset chunga Pathen lunglhaina mi ho lah'a cham leng hen,” atiuve.
Vantilte van lam'a akilephat un kelngoi chingho khat le khat akihouvun, “Bethlehem a cheu hite! Hiche thilsoh ho Pakaiyin eiseipeh uhi gaveuhite,” akitiuve.
Amaho khosung a chun kinloi tah'in acheuvin Mary le Joseph agamu uvin, chule naosen chu gan ankong a chun analum'e.
Ama amuphat uvin kelngoi chinghon thilsoh ho le vantil in naosen chungchanga amaho jah'a aseiho mijouse aseipeh tauvin ahi.
Kelngoi chingho thusei jajouse chu alungdong lheh jeng tauvin,
ahivangin Mary'n hitiho jouse hi alungsungah akoiyin khatvei vei kom le ahin geldoh ji'e.
Kelngoi chingho akelngoi hon teu hengah akile kit un, athilmu hou le ajah hou jal'in Pathen aloupisah un chule avahchoi tauve. Vantil in aseipeh'u bang chet in thil asoh'e.
Niget jouvin naosen chu chep atanpeh un amin Jesu asah tauve, hichu vantil in akijil masanga pat'a anaminsah sa ahitai.
Chuin kisuhthengna thilto phat alhing tan, Mose dan'in chapang khat apen jouva boldinga angeh dungjuiyin; chuti chun anu le apan Pakai henga pehdoh dingin Jerusalem'a ahin pui lhon'e.
Pakai danthu chun hitia hi asei ahi, “Numei cha masa chu pasal ahia leh, amapa chu Pakai henga kikatdoh ding ahi.”
Chuin Pakai danthua kingeh bangtah in kilhaina chu atoh lhon in ahi–vakhu kop khat ahiloule vapal ni hiji ahi.
Chuphat lai chun Jerusalem ah Simeon kiti mikhat anaum'e. Amachu michonpha le Pathen hou guttah chule Messiah ahunga Israel ahung lhatdoh ding kinem'a ngahjing khat anahi. Lhagao Theng achungah achun,
chule Pakai Messiah amutokah'a thilou dinga anaseipeh anahi.
Hiche ni chun Lhagao chun Houin sungah apuilut in ahi. Chuin Mary le Joseph chun naosen chu Pakai koma danthua kingeh dungjuiya ahung pehdoh lhon chun,
Simeon chu anaum in ahi. Aman naosen chu alan Pathen athangvah in, hitin ati,
“Chungnungpen Pakai, tun nasohpa lungmongin thisah tan nakitepna bangin,
Keiman namihuhhingna kamutai,
Mijouse dinga nagon chu,
Ama hi namtin vaipi henga Pathen phongdoh ding vah chu ahi, chule ama hi nami Israelte loupina chu ahi.”
Jesu nu le pachu ama chungchang thu kisei ho jeh chun alungdong lheh jeng lhon'e.
Chuin Simeon in amaho chu phatthei aboh in chule Mary, naosen nu koma chun aseitai, “Hiche chapang hi Israel sunga mi tamtah lhuhna dinga got'a um ahi, ahivanga midang tampi a dinga kipana hiding ahi. Ama hi Pathen'a kona melchih na a hung kisol ahin, hinlah mi tamtah'in adoudal ding ahi.
Chuho jeh'a mi tamtah lunggel thuhpen ho kiphongdoh ding ahi. Chule chemjam in nalhagao asutkhah ding ahi.”
Themgao khat amin Anna kiti khat jong Houin a chu umah ahi. Amanu chu Phanuel chanu Asher phung'a mi ahin, chule hateh'a teh ahitai. A-inneipu chu akichen lhon kum sagi bep sunga thi ahitai.
Chutia chu amanu hin kum somget le li jen meithai hinkho ahin man ahi. Amanun Houin adalha ngai pon, asun ajan in aum jingin, an-ngol le taona pumin Pathen ahoujinge.
Simeon chun Mary le Joseph koma thu aseilai chun amanu jong ahungin Pathen avahchoi pantai. Chapang chungchang thudol Pathen in Jerusalem ahuhdoh nadinga gingcha tah'a ngah jing ho jouse komah aseiyin ahi.
Jesu nu le pan Pakai danthu dungjuiya boldinga lom cheng abulhit soh lhon phat in, a-in'u Galilee gam Nazereth kho ah akile tauve.
Chumun a chun chapangpa chu tahsa damthei tah le hattah in ahung khanglen in ahi. Amachu chihna adimset in chule Pathen khotona achungah aume. Jerusalem Hou'in a Jesu
Kumseh le Jesu nu le pa Kalchuh Kut mang'in acheji lhonin ahi.
Jesu kum somleni alhin chun angaima bangin hiche kut mang ding chun acheuve.
Kut kichaiyin inlang Nazereth a kile din akipan tauvin, ahin Jesu chu Jerusalem ah aumden tan ahi. Anu le apan atil'in hichu ahedoh lhon pon,
ajeh chu kholjin dang hotoh kilhon khom dan a angaito lhon ahi. Ahivangin ama chuche nilhah'a ahung kilulah loubeh phat in asopi aheng akom le aloi agol ho komah aga vele lhontai.
Amulhon loubeh phat in Jerusalem lamah ama holdin akile kit lhon tai.
Nithum jouvin achainakeiyin Houin sungah agamudoh lhonin, houhil ho lah a atouva, athuseiyu angaiya, chule thudoh anei chu amudoh lhon tai.
Ama thusei jajouse chun athuhet le athudoh donbut ho chu adatmah lheh jeng tauve.
Anu le apan ima lunggel je jong ahelhon tapoi. Chuin anun ahinseiyin, “Chapa,” ipijeh'a hiche hi keini koma nabol ham? Napa le keiman munjouse kahol lhon'a lunggim a kahilhon tai, ati.
“Ahivanga ipijeh'a neihol khoh u ngai ham?” tin adongin, “Nahet lou u ham kapa in'a kaum ding mong ahi hi?” tin adonge.
Ahivangin ipi aseina ahi ahedoh lhon pon ahi.
Chuin amaho chutoh Nazareth lam'a a-kile un chuva chun anu apa thunoiya aumtai. Chule anun hitiho jouse hi alungthimah aguh'in avop jing in ahi.
Jesu chu chihna le atahsa in akhangin chule Pathen le mihem deisah na in aumtan ahi.
Rome gamvaipo Tiberius vaipoh kal kum somlenga lhin kum ahitan, Pontus Pilate chu Judea gamvaipo ahin; Herod Antipas chu Galilee gam vaipo ahin; asopipa Philip chu Iturea le Traconitus gamsungsea vaipo ahin; Lysanias chu Abilene gam vaipo ahi.
Annas le Caiaphas chu thempu chungnung anahilhone. Hiche phatlai hin Pathen a konin gamthip lah'a um, Zechariah chapa John hengah thu ahung lhungin ahi.
Chuin John chu amun amun'ah Jordan vadung pang langto gel'ah achen, mihon alungheiyu vetsahna a baptize achan nadiuvin thu ahil lhang len chule Pathen henga ngaidam chan nadia akilehei diuvin aseiye.
Isaiah chun John chungchang thu anaseiyin hitin ati, “Ama hi gamthip'a khosam aw ahi, Pakai hungna ding alampi semtoh un! Ama dingin lampi sutheng un,
Phaicham lah kidip ding, chule molboh ho le thinglhang lah kinot cham ding akon ho kisujang ding, chule mun phol lah ho kisunam ding,
Chuteng leh mijousen amuding, huhhingna Pathen'a kon hung kisol chu,” ati.
Mihonpi chu John henga baptize chang dinga ahung uchun, aman hitin aseiye, “Nangho gulse son ho! Koiham Pathen lunghan na hunglhung dinga kon jamdoh dinga nagihsal uvah?
Chonset'a kon lung naheiyule Pathen lam a nakile'u chu nahin dan uva konin tahlang'un. Nanghon khat le khat komah, ‘Bitna kanei nauve, ajehchu Abraham son kahiuve’ tin moh sei hih un. Hichu imacha ahipoi, ajehchu kaseipeh nahiuve, Pathen in hiche song hoa kona jong Abraham son le pah asemdoh thei ahi.
Tu jenga jong Pathen thutanna heicha gottupsa, thingphung ajungho tutan dinga phasadem'a um ahitai. Henge, thingphung aga phalou jouse chu phuhlhuh'a uma meilah'a selut hiding ahi.” ati.
Mihonpi chun adong'un, “Ipi kabol diu hitam?” atiuve.
John in adonbut in, “Sangkhol ni neiyin, khat chu avaicha ho peuvin. An neh ding neiyin agilkel te jong hoppeh in,” ati.
Lepthol'a natong kaidong ho jong baptize chang din ahung un chule adong'un, “Houhil, ipi kaboldiu hitam?” atiuve.
Aman adonbut in, “Gamsung kivaipohna in angeh kalval in kai dong hih'un,” atipeh'e.
“Ipi kabol diu hitam” tin sepai phabep khat in jong ahung dongun ahi. John in adonbut in, “Alamlouvin sum kilah hih'un ahiloule adihlouvin mi hehset bol hih'un, chule na losan'a chun lung lhaiyun,” ati.
Mijousen Messiah chu hungvah dinga aginchat cheh u anahin, chule John chu Messiah chu hingap hitam ti ahetnom ten'un ahi.
John in athudoh uchu adonbut in hitin aseiye: “Keiman nangho twiya baptize kachansah nahiuvin, hinlah keima sanga lenjo khat ahunge–nasatah a lenjo ahidan chu keima asoh hiding le akengchot khao sutlham dingin jong kalhing joupon ahi. Amachun nangho Lhagao Theng le meiya baptize nachan sah ding'u ahi.
Ama phol jap-ngimna mangcha a changsi le atah lhehkhen dinga phasadem'a um ahitai. Chuteng aman changchilna phol asuhthenga changtah chengse chu achangsal'a asun'a asi ho vang chu mit theilou meilhum sunga aselut ding ahi,” ati.
John chun kipana thupha miho koma aseiphong na achun chutobang gihsalna kamcheng jong amangchan ahi.
John in jong lhangphong tah in Galilee gam vaihompa, Herod Antipas chu, Herodius, asopipa jinu, akichenpi jeh le athilse bol adang tamtah jeh chun demna aneiyin ahi.
Hijeh chun Herod in John chu songkul'ah akhum'in, achonsetna dangtoh hiche hi akibelap tan ahi.
Nikhat mihonpi chu baptize achan laiyun, Jesu amatah jong baptize achangin ahi. Ama atao leh vanho ahung kihongin,
chule Lhagao Theng, tahsa lim pu'in van vakhu bangin ahung kumsuh in achunga chun achu'e. Van'a kon chun aw khat'in hitin ahinseiye, “Nangma kangailut tah kachapa nahi, chule kipana lentah neihin pohpeh'e,” ati.
Jesu chu kum somthum alhingtai, aman japi lah'a natoh ahinpat chun. Jesu chu Joseph chapa tin akihen ahi. Joseph chu Heli chapa ahi.
Heli chu Matthat chapa ahi. Matthat chu Levi chapa ahi. Levi chu Melki chapa ahi. Melki chu Jannai chapa ahi. Jannai chu Joseph chapa ahi.
Joseph chu Mattathias chapa ahi. Mattathias chu Amos chapa ahi. Amos chu Nahum chapa ahi. Nahum chu Esli chapa ahi. Esli chu Naggai chapa ahi.
Naggai chu Maath chapa ahi. Maath chu Mattathias chapa ahi. Mattathias chu Semein chapa ahi. Semein chu Josech chapa ahi. Josech chu Joda chapa ahi.
Joda chu Joanan chapa ahi. Joanan chu Rhesa chapa ahi. Rhesa chu Zerubbabel chapa ahi. Zerubbabel chu Shealtiel chapa ahi. Shealtiel chu Neri chapa ahi.
Neri chu Melki chapa ahi. Melki chu Addi chapa ahi. Addi chu Cosam chapa ahi. Cosam chu Elmadam chapa ahi. Elmadam chu Er chapa ahi.
Er chu Joshua chapa ahi. Joshua chu Eliezar chapa ahi. Eliezar chu Jorim chapa ahi. Jorim chu Matthat chapa ahi. Matthat chu Levi chapa ahi.
Levi chu Simeon chapa ahi. Simeon chu Judah chapa ahi. Judah chu Joseph chapa ahi. Joseph chu Jonam chapa ahi. Jonam chu Eliakim chapa ahi.
Eliakim chu Melea chapa ahi. Melea chu Menna chapa ahi. Menna chu Mattatha chapa ahi. Mattatha chu Nathan chapa ahi. Nathan chu David chapa ahi.
David chu Jesse chapa ahi. Jesse chu Obed chapa ahi. Obed chu Boaz chapa ahi. Boaz chu Salmon chapa ahi. Salmon chu Nahshon chapa ahi.
Nahshon chu Aminnadab chapa ahi. Aminnadab chu Admin chapa ahi. Admin chu Arni chapa ahi. Arni chu Hezron chapa ahi. Hezron chu Perez chapa ahi. Perez chu Judah chapa ahi.
Judah chu Jacob chapa ahi. Jacob chu Isaac chapa ahi. Isaac chu Abraham chapa ahi. Abraham chu Terah chapa ahi. Terah chu Nahor chapa ahi.
Nahor chu Serug chapa ahi. Serug chu Reu chapa ahi. Reu chu Peleg chapa ahi. Peleg chu Eber chapa ahi. Eber chu Shelah chapa ahi.
Shelah chu Cainan chapa ahi. Cainan chu Arphaxad chapa ahi. Arphaxad chu Shem chapa ahi. Shem chu Noah chapa ahi. Noah chu Lamech chapa ahi.
Lamech chu Methuselah chapa ahi. Methuselah chu Enoch chapa ahi. Enoch chu Jared chapa ahi. Jared chu Mahalalel chapa ahi Mahalalel chu Kenan chapa ahi.
Kenan chu Enosh chapa ahi. Enosh chu seth chapa ahi. Seth chu Adam chapa ahi. Adam chu Pathen chapa ahi.
Chuin Jesu, Lhagao Theng dimset pumin, Jordan vadunga kon in akile tan ahi. Ama chu gamthip'a din Lhagao puidoh in aumin,
hichea chun diabol lhep patep'in ni somli sung aume. Jesun hiche phatsungse chun ima anepon chule gilkel lheh jengah ahitai.
Chuin diabol chun ahengah ahinseiyin, “Nangma Pathen chapa nahile hiche songhi changlhah pheng akiso nadin seiyin,” ati.
Ahin Jesun aseipeh in, “Ahipoi! Pathen Lekhabun mihem changlhah bouseh'a hinglou ding ahi” ati.
Chuin diabol chun apuitouvin, phat chomkhat kah sung in vannoiya lenggam ho avetsah soh keiyin ahi.
“Hiche lenggam ho loupina le achunguva thuneina nangma kapeh ding nahi,” tin diabol chun aseiyin, “Ajehchu aboncha keiya ahin kapeh nom nom kapeh thei ahi.
Aboncha nangma kapeh ding nahi nangman keima nei hou leh,” tin aseitai.
Jesun adonbut in, “Pathen Lekhabun hitin aseiye, ‘Nangman Pakai na Pathen bouseh nahou ding, ama kin jeng bou nabol ding ahi’” atipeh tai.
Chuin diabol chun Jerusalem houin tingvum ah apuiyin chule aseitai, “Pathen Chapa nahile chomlhan!
Ajehchu Pathen Lekhabun hitin aseiye, Aman avantilte navengtup ding le nahoidam dingin thupeh hin neiyin te.
Chule amahon akhut uvin natuh intin, chutia chu nangman nakengpah jengjong song chunga naki suhkhah lou ding ahi,” ati.
Jesun adonbut in, “Pathen Lekhabun hitin jong aseikit'e, Nangman Pakai na Pathen napatep lou ding ahi” ati.
Diabol chun Jesu alhep patep jou phat in, phat gomkom umkit kah a din adalhatai.
Chuin Jesu Galilee langah Lhagao Theng thahatna dimset pumin akiletai. Ama chungchang thulhut ho agamkai pumpi ah gangtah'in akithejal soh tai.
Akikhopnau in tin'ah thu ahil jin mijousen apahcha lheh'e.
Ama Narareth kho, ahung seilet na khoa ahung chun, abolngai jing bangin Sabbath nin akikhopnau in'ah alut in Pathen Lekhabu sim dingin adingdoh in ahi.
Isaiah themgao lekhajol chu apeuvin ahi. Aman lekhajol chu alhamlhan hitia kijihna mun chu amudoh tai:
“Pakai Lhagao kachungah aume, ajehchu mivaicha ho dinga kipana thupha podingin thao einui, Aman sohchang ho akilhadoh diu thu phongjal din eisol'e—mitchon kho amuding, Suhnem a umho kijalen sah ding ahiuve.
Chuleh Pakai khotona phat ahunglhung tai,” kiti lai chu asimdoh tai.
Lekhajol chu anungjel in, lhachale pa khut'ah anungpeh in, atoutai. Kikhopna in'a mijousen ama chu mit-lhalouvin aveuvin,
chuin aman amaho jah'a thu aseipan tai. “Pathen Lekhabua kisun tua najah'u chu tuni tah hin aguilhung tai!” ati.
Mijousen aseiphalheh jengun chule akamsunga kona aphondoh lungsetna thuho chu kidang asauvin ahi. “Hiche hi iti ham?” tin amahon adongun, “Hiche hi Joseph chapa hilou ham?” atiuve.
Chuin aman aseiyin, “Nanghon lung opkai loubeh'a hiche thuchih hi nei seikhum teidiu ahi: Louthem, nangma kisudam in–aledohna, ‘Capernaum a nabol tobang thil kidang ho chu hilai nakhomun'a jong bol'in’” tiuvin nate.
Ahivanga thutah chu kaseipeh nahiuve, themgao koima ama gamsungah min apom ngaipoi.
“Tahbeh in Elijah phat laiyin Israel gamsungah ngaichat khohtah nei meithai tamtah anaume, vankot kum thumle akeh akikha'a gamsunga kel nasatah analhun chun.
Ahivangin Elijah chu koima komah ana kisol poi. Gamchom mi kom joh'a sol anahi–Sidon gam'a Zarephath khoa meithai nu kom.
Chule themgao Elisha phat laiyin jong Israel gamsungah miphah tampi ana um'in, ahivangin Syria mi Naaman bouseh suhdamin anaume,” ati.
Hiche thu ajah phat un, kikhopna in'a umho chu alunghang tauvin ahi.
Achomdoh un, aman'un akhochen nau kol mong lama chun apui tauve. Hiche kol'a chu sotlhah ding atiu ahi,
ahivangin akikah lah uva akihehdoh in akiva mang tai.
Chuin Jesu Capernaum kiti Galilee gam kho khat'ah achen, chukom mun'a chun choldo nikho seh le akikhopnau in'a chun thu ahil ji'e.
Hikom'a jong chun mihon athuhil chu kidang asalheh'un ahi, ajeh chu aman thuneitah'a aseijeh ahi.
Khatvei akikhopnau in'a aumpet in, thilhavop khat–lhagao boh'in avop khat–Jesu henga chun ahung pengjah jengin,
“Che mangin! Ipijeh'a kalah'uva hung kikumlut nahim, Nazereth Jesu? Keiho sumang dinga hung'ah nahim? Keiman nangma koi nahi kahenai–Pathen Mithengpa!” atin ahi.
Jesun athusei alatan in, “Thip'in! hiche mipa'a kon chun hung potdoh'in,” tin thupeh aneitan ahi. Chutah chun thilha chun mipa chu lhonglaiyah ahin seplhun, mihonpin avetjing laichun; chuin ama'a kon chun ima bolsebe talouvin ahung potdoh tan ahi.
Kidang san mipi ho chun aphongdoh un, “Ipi thuneina le thilboltheina hiche mipa hin anei hitam! Lhagao boh jeng jong athun anungin, athupeh'a kon in ajam uve!” atiuvin ahi.
Chuche gamkai pumpi a chun Jesu thu chu khotin'ah akithang tan ahi.
Chuche nikhoa akikhopnau in adalhah jouvin, Jesu Simon in'ah achen, hikom'a chun Simon nupanu khosihpi jeh'a nasatah a dammo agatoh khan ahi. “Lungset'in sudam teiyin,” tin mijousen athum tauve.
A-jalkhun komah adingin, akhosih chu aphoh thip tan ahileh akhosih chun amanu adalhatai. Chuin amanu athoudoh pai ngallin amaho ding anneh sem in apangtai.
Nisa alhum toh lhon'in, chuche nilhah chun, khosung pumpia a-insungmi damlou neiho sen Jesu hengah ahin puiyun ahi. Itobang natna hijong leh akhut'in atohkhah chan chu suhdamin aum tauve.
Mi tamtah chu thilhavop ahiuvin; chule thilha ho chu athupeh'a kon in ahung potdoh'un, apengjah un, “Nangma Pathen Chapa nahi,” atiuvin ahi. Ahivangin ama Messiah ahi ahetjeh'u chun, aman amaho chu aphohthip in thu aseidoh sah tapoi.
Ajing jingkah matah in Jesu munthip lah khat ah achedoh tan ahi. Mihonpi chun amachu muntin aholle un, achaina kheh a amu phat uvin, aman amaho adalhah nalou diuvin atao tauve.
Ahivangin aman adonbut in, “Keiman Pathen Lenggam Kipana Thuphahi khodang'a jong kaseiphong ding ahi, ajeh chu hiche dinga chu eikisol ahi,” ati.
Chuti chun akholjin abanjop'in, Judea gam pumpia akikhopnau in tin'ah thu ahillhang len ahi.
Nikhat Jesun Galilee dillen panga thu asei laiyin, mihonpi tamtah'in Pathen thu ngainom na jal'in aneh chinto tauvin ahi.
Kong ni akeuva tuipi pamchin'a akingah amudoh tan, ajehchu ngaman mi ho chun adalhah uva alen'u akisop u ahi.
Kong khatpa sunga chun alut in, kong neipa Simon jah'a Jesun twi lah'a asot lut dingin aseiye. Hijeh chun kong sunga chun atouvin, mihonpi chu chua kon in thu ahil'in ahi.
Thu asei jouvin Simon jah'a, “Tun chen, lithuh langjep ah, nalen chu seplhan, nga themkhat manding in,” ati.
“Pipu” tin Simon in ahin donbut in, “Jankhovah hel'a habol'a kabol u ahin chule ima manlou kahiuve. Hinlah nangman nasei ahileh len seplha kit inge,” ati.
Tu vang'in alen'u nga adimset in akehlha pan tai!
Kithopi angeh nauva konin akivoppi hou kong dang khat'ah ahung un, chule chomlou kah'in kong teni chu anigel'in nga adimset in alhalut paiding ahilhon tai.
Simon Peter in thilsoh ho amuchet phat in Jesu masangah adilsun chule aseitai, “Oh Pakai, lungset in neidalhan–keima navel'a um ding'in kachonse behseh jenge,” ati.
Ijeh inem itile nga chujat amat jeng uchu kidang asah val ahi, adangho jong chutima chu ahiuve.
Akiloipi teu, James le John, Zebedee chapateni jong chun kidang asalhon'e. Jesun Simon adonbut'in, “Kicha hih'in! tua pat'a miman joh'a napan ding ahitai,” ati.
Chule tolgo lah alhun lhun uchun, amahon thil jouse adalhauvin Jesu nung ajui tauve.
Khokhat a hin Jesun phat sottah phah nat a dammo khat amui. Hiche mipa chun Jesu amu chun amai tol'a asulut in adamsah din athum'e. “Pakai” tin aseiyin, “Nalung ahileh nei sudam theiyin chule nei sutheng theiye,” ati.
Jesun akhut alhangin atham'in, “Kalung ahi” tin aseiyin, “Damin!” ati. Chupet tah chun phahnat na chu abeihel tai.
Chuin Jesun amapa chu koima jah'a thilsoh ho aseipeh louna din ahilchah tai. Aman aseipeh in, “Thempupa koma chen chule aman na vechil hen. Mose dan'in angeh dungjuiya atiphah nat kiboldam peh hon apeh dinga lom ho kichoiyin. Hiche hi japi lah'a suhthenga naum phondohna ahi,” ati.
Jesun chutia ahilchah jeng vang chun, athilbol theina thuho gangjep joh'in thejal ahin, chule mihonpi tamtah athusei ngai ding le anatnau damsah nomna jeh'in ahung uve.
Ahin Jesu ataodin gamthip lah'a achemang jin ahi. Jesun Langthi Khat Adamsah
Nikhat Jesun thu ahil laiyin, Pharisee phabep khat le hou dan thuhil ho ama kom naina ah atou uve. (Hiche miho hi Galilee le Judea chule Jerusalem gam pumpi khotin'a hungdoh hiuleh akilom'e). Chule Pakai misuhdam na thilboltheina chu Jesu komah hatah in aumin ahi.
Miphabep khat in elbai nakong khat alupna pumin ahin pouvin ahung uve. Insunga Jesu kom pohlut tei agouvin,
hinlah mihonpi jeh chun aphajou tapouve. Hijeh chun inchungah akaldoh un inting aphelhauvin, chuin amahon adamloupa chu alupna pheh pumin mihonpi lah Jesu maikoh laitah achun ahin khaisuh uve.
Atahsan jeu amuchun Jesun mipa koma chun aseitai, “Gollhang, nachonset akingaidam tai” atipeh e.
Ahivangin Pharisee hole hou danthuhil hochu amaho le amaho akihouvun, “Amahi koiya kigel ham? Pathen taitom ahi! Pathen bouseh in chonset angaidam thei ahi,” atitauve.
Jesun ipi agel'u ahen, hijeh chun amaho chu adongin, “Ipi jeh'a nalungsung uva hiche hi nadoh uham?
Hoiche joh seidinga baijo em ‘Nachonset kingaidam ahitai’ kiti le ‘dingin lang lamjot tan’ tihi?” ati.
“Hijeh a chu keiman Mihem Chapan leiset ah chonset ngaidam na tha aneiye ti kavetsah ding nahiuve,” ati. Chuin Jesun elbai nakong pa lam ngan akiheiyin aseitai, “Dingin, nalupna pheh kilahdoh in lang, inlam'ah chetan,” ati.
Chuin gangtah in, mihon avetjing layin, mipa chu ahung chomdoh in, alupna akilahdoh in, chule inlam Pathen thangvah pumin achetai.
Mijouse chu lungdon nale tijatnan alodim un, chule Pathen avahchoiyun, “Tunin thil kidang ho kamu uve,” tin aphongdoh uve.
Phat chomkhat jouvin, Jesun khopi adalhah le, kaidong khat amin Levi kiti akaidon na munah amun, “Neijuiyin lang ka seijui hin” tin Jesun asei tai.
Hiti chun Levi jong akipatdoh in, thil jouse adalhan ama ajuitai.
Chujouvin Levin a'in ah Jesu jin-ja-um hinan an-nehkhom abol in ahi. Levi tohkhompi kaidong tampi le maljin dang in jong an anekhom uve.
Ahivangin Pharisee hole ahou danthuhil houvin Jesu seijui ho hengah aphunchel uvin, “Ipi dinga khutobang aboh hotoh naneh uva nadonkhom uham?” atiuvin ahi.
Jesun adonbut in, “Midamthei ten louthem angaicha pouve–adamlouten vang angaichauve.
Keima achonpha'a kigel ho kouva hung kahipoi, amavang chonse ahi kihetdoh'a lunghei dingho kouva hung'ah kahibouve” ati.
Nikhat miphabep in Jesu jah'a, “Tuilutsah John seijui hon an angol'un atao jom jing un, chule Pharisee ho seijui honjong chutima chun aboluve. Ipi jeh a nangma seijui hon phatseh'a aneh uva adon jing jengu hitam?” tin aseiyun ahi.
Jesun adonbut in, “Moupui golvahna a maljin hon moulang toh mou aloplaiyuva an angol ngaiyum? Tahbeh in achutipoi.
Amavang moulang chu nikhat amahoa kona kilamang ding ahi, chuteng tah le amahon an angol diu ahi.” ati.
Chuin Jesun hiche thutekah hi apen ahi: “Koiman ponhal vonthah'a konin acheplhan chule vonlui behnan aneipoi. Ijeh inem itileh vonthah chu seding ahitai, chule hiche vonthah hal chu vonlui chutoh kijot lou ding ahi.”
“Chuleh koiman lengpitwi thah peng luiyah akhum ngaipoi. Ijeh inem itile lengpitwi thah chun savun peng chu aphutjah ding, lengpitwi chu kisujah ding chule peng chu kisuse ding ahi.
Lengpitwi thah chu savun peng thah a khum ding ahi.
Ahin koima lengpitwi lui don'in athah chu adeiji tapoi. ‘Aluipa ma aphajenge’ atijiuve,” tin aseiye. Jesu Seijuihon Cholngah Nikhoa Changvui Asiu
Cholngahni khat Jesun bulei lai ajot lai hin, aseijui ten changvui asihtan un, akhut uvah anoiyun, chang chu aneuvin ahi.
Ahivangin Pharisee ho phabep in, “Ipi jeh'a nanghon dan nasuhkeh uva Cholngah nia bolngailou chang-ga nalolhah uham?” atiuve.
Jesun adonbut in, “Pathen Lekhabua kisun David le aloiten agilkel pettah uva ipi anabol'u nasimdoh khah lou u ham?
Ama Pathen in'a alut'in, dan asukeh in, thempu ho bouseh in anehthei changlhah theng chu anen ahi. Akiloipi ho jong phabep khat apen ahi.” ati.
Chule Jesun aseiben, “Mihem Chapa hi Cholngah ni chung jenga jong pakai ahi” ati. Jesun Khut-Jetlang Ngoi Pasal Khat Adamsah
Cholngah nikho dang khat a Jesun kikhopna in'a thu ahil laiyin mikhat akhut jetlang ngoi khat aumin ahi.
Hou danthuhil ho le Pharisee hon Jesu chu avelhi keuvun ahi. Hichepa chu asuhdam poupouleh Cholngah nin na atonge tia ngohna neiding atiu ahi.
Ahivangin Jesun alunggel'u ahen ahi. Akhut ngoipa jah'a chun, “Hungin lang mijouse masangah hung ding tem'in,” tin akou tai. Hijehchun mipa jong chu malangah ahungin ahi.
Chuin Jesun anelkal ho jah'a, “Ken nangho thudoh khat kaneiye. Danthun Cholngah nia thilphabol aphal'am, ahilouleh thilse bolnading nikho ham? Hiche nikho hi hinkho huhhing nading nikho hai ahiloule suhset nading nikho ham?” ati.
Aman amaho chu khat khat in ahin golvet vet in chule mipa jah'a chun aseitai, “Nakhut lhangdoh in” ati. Chutichun mipa chun akhut alhangdoh in ahile thahsemphat ahitai.
Hiche a hin Jesu galmi ho chu alunghang un amachu ilo ding ham ti akihoukhom tauve. Jesun Seijui Ding Som Le Ni Alhendoh
Nikhat hitiho jou sotloulaiyin Jesu molchung khat ah taona mang din achetouvin, chule jankhovah in Pathen hengah ataove.
Ajing khovah in aseijuite jouse akoukhom soh keiyin amaho lah achun solchah dingin somleni alhengdoh in ahi. Amin hou chu hiche ahi:
Simon (Peter asah), Andrew (Peter sopipa), James, John, Philip, Bartholomew
Matthew, Thomas, James (Alphaeus chapa), Simon (Zealot tia kikou),
Judas (James chapa), chule Judas Iscariot (khonunga ajohdohpa) ahiuve. Jesun Mi Tamtah Na-Atoh Peh
Molchunga pat amaho ahungsuh uchun aseijui ho Jesu toh, mun beh achamlai len khat ah adingun, anungjui tamtah chule mihonpi chun aumkimvel uve. Hichea chun mipi Judea gam pumpi le Jerusalem a kon chule sahlam Tyre le Sidon gam twipang langa pat'a hung jong aumun ahi.
Amaho chu ama thusei ngai ding le anat nahou kijendam sah dinga hungu ahi; chule lhagao boh in asuh genthei hojong jendam in aumuve.
Mijousen ama chu tohkhah agocheh un ahi ajeh chu suhdam na thaneina chu ama a kona potdoh ahi, chule mijouse asudam in ahi.
Chuin Jesun aseijuite henglam ngan aseitai “Avaichate Pathen in phatthei naboh uhen, Ijeh inem itile Pathen Lenggam chu nanghoa ahi.
Tua gilkel te Pathen in phatthei naboh uhen, ijeh inem itile lungnachima naum diu ahi. Tua kap te Pathen in phatthei naboh uhen, ijeh inem itile phat khatleh nanui diu ahi”
Phattheinan nangah uve, Mihem Chapa najui jeh uva mihon namuda uva napampai uva nataitom uva chule aphalouva nagaosap teng uleh.
Hichu aso teng leh kipah un! Henge, kipah'in kichom un! Ijeh inem itile tohphatman lentah in Van-gam ah nangah uve. Chule geldoh jingun, apu apateu chun khanglui lai themgao hojong chutobang chun anabol uve.
Ipi lungkham nan nangau hitam nangho ahaote ho, ijeh inem itile nakipanau chu tua bou naneiyu ahitai.
Ipi lungkham nan nangau hitam nangho tua thaochet'a uma ninglhing te, ijeh inem itile gilkelna nasatah Phat khat'in nangah jing uve. Ipi lungkham nan nangau hitam tua nui te, ijeh inem itile nanui nau chu kana le lunghem na kisoh ding ahi.
Ipi lungkham nan nangau hitam nangho japin apachat ho, ijeh inem itile apu apateu jong chun themgao lhem ho ana pachat u anahi. Melma Chunga Lungsetna Nei Ding
“Ahin, nangho thu ngainom ho, keiman kasei ahi, nagalmi teu ngailu'uvin! Namuda teu hengah thilpha bol'un.”
Nasamse teu phattheiboh un. Nasukha teu dingin taovun.
Mi khattou vin nabengphe langkhat abeh le, nabeng langkhat jong do peh in. Khattouvin na ponlen alah got leh na sangkhol jong peh than.
Athum chan chu pein; chule nathil nanga kona akilahdoh teng leh, nunglah ding gohih in.
Min nang nabol nadinga nadei dan bang bangin midang komah bol'in.
Nangman nangailu ho bou nangailut le, ipi jeh'a nakithang at ding ham? Michonse ten jong angailuteu angailut u ahi!
Chuleh nachunga thilpha bol ho kom bouseh a thilpha nabol leh, ipijeh a nakithang at ding ham? Michonse ten jong hichan chu abol'u ahi!
Chuleh nangman nahin sajou ding hokom'a bou sum naphal leh, ipi jeh a nang kithang-at ding nahim? Michonse ten jong michonse te kom ma'a abon'a nungmu dinga aphal thei ahi.
“Nagalmiteu ngailu uvin! Amaho komah thilpha bol'un. Nungmu ding kinem louvin phal'un. Chuteng van'a kon natohphat man'u chu len ding ahi, chule Chungnung pen chate umchan tahtah natho diu ahi, ajeh chu ama hi kipaje helou hole migilou ho dinga pha ahi.
Napau mikhoto them ahi banga nangho jong khoto them nahi diu ahi. Midang Chunga Thu-Tanna
Midang chungthu tan hih'in chule nang chungthu jong kitan louding ahi. Midang demna thu seihih in, achutiloule nachunga hung lhung ding ahi. Midang ho ngaidam in nang jong nakingaidam ding ahi.
Pein, chutileh namu ding ahi. Nathilpeh chu aboncha a nangma kom hung kile ding ahi–akison chahkheh, lo chah kheh sa, mun a-on nadinga, letset'a chule naphei chunga kisunglha ding ahi. Napehdoh jat chun namu ding jat aphotchen ding ahi,” ati.
Chuin Jesun thutekah hicheng hi aseiye: “Mitcho khat chun midang kaihoi theiyin tem? Anilhon'a kokhuh a lhalut lhon talou ding ham?”
Jillai ho ajilkungpau sangin alenjo poi. Amavang jillai khat bulhingset'a kichuh chu ajilkungpa tobang hiding ahi.
“Chuleh ibol'a naloi nagol mit'a bohhal um chu nalunggim pi ham nangma mit'a inkam uma chu?”
Nangma mit'a inkam kimu louva, “Jol, namit'a bohhal um chu nalahdoh peh inge, tia seiding iti nagel theiyuham? Miphalhem, amasan nangma mit'a inkam chu kilah doh masat in, chutileh nagol mit'a bohhal um chu abol ding dan nahet ding ahi. Thingphung Agan Aki-Hedoh In Ahi.”
“Thingphung pha khat in ga phalou asodoh theipoi, chule thingphung phalou vin ga pha asodoh ngaipoi.
Thingphung khat chu agan akihen ahi. Theichang ga lingphung hoa konin akilou khapoi, chule lengpiga jong lingboh ah akilou poi.
Miphan alungsung thilkholna pha a konin thilpha asodoh in, chule migilouvin alungsung thilkholna phalouva konin thilse asodohe. Nasei chu ipi hileh nalungsunga hung kondoh ahi.
“Hijeh a chu ibol'a ‘Pakai, Pakai’ tia neikou jing uham, kasei bon bollou uva?
Keiman koiham khat kahenga hunga, kathuhil ngaiya, chule eijui ho chu itobang hidiu ham navetsah unge.
Ama chu mikhat inkhat sa'a abulphu ding thuhtah'a laiya akhombul song chunga phut tobang ahi. Twi ahungso'a in chu ahin nuh jong leh dettah a kisa ahijeh chun adingdet kheh in ahi.
Amavang koihileh athu ja'a chule nunglou hochu mikhat akhombul umlouva insa tobang ahi. Twipi ahungso'a hasuh a asuh le alhu pai ji tai.” ati.
Jesun hiche ho jouse miho koma aseijou phat chun, Capernaum langah akile tai.
Hiche lai chun Rome sepai jalamkai khat dinga asoh sahlut tah khat chu hatah in adammon thiding kon cha ahitai.
Sepai jalamkai pan Jesu chungchang ajahdoh phat in, aman ja umtah Juda upa ho asolin, ahinkou uva asohpa ahung damsah din asol'e.
Hijeh chun amahon jong ngehkhoh tah in Jesu chun mipa akithopi din atao tauve. “Napanpina chang dinga lom khattou aumleh, ama hi ahi,” atiuvin ahi
“Ajeh chu aman Juda miho eilungset un kikhopna in jong eisah pehuve,” atiuve.
Hijeh chun Jesu jong amaho toh alhon'in achetai. Ahivangin in ahunglhun masangjep un, sepai jalamkai pan loi phabep asol'in hitin agasei sah e, “Pakai, ka-in'a hung dingin nang le nang kisugim hih in, ajehchu keima chutobang loma jana chang dinga kilom kahipoi.”
Keima hungdoh a nangma toh kimuto dinga jong lhingjou lou kahi. Naum na'a kon chun thu chu seijeng'in, kasohpa suhdam'a umding ahi.
Ken hiche hi kahenai, ajehchu keima jong kachunga ho thunoiya um kahin, chule kenjong ka sepai ho chunga thuneina kanei ahi. Keiman “Chen” ti bouseh kasei le acheuvin, “Hungin” katileh ahung uve. Chule kasohte komah “Hiche bol'in kati leh abol jenguve,” atiuve.
Jesun hiche thu ajah doh phat in, atija lheh jenge. Mihonpi anungjui ho heng lam angan hitin aseiye, “Kaseipeh nahiuve, hitobang tahsan na hi Israel pumpi sungah kamukha poi!” ati.
Chuin sepai jalamkaipa loiho chu a'inah akile tauvin ahileh sohpa damthengsel'a anaum chu amu'uvin ahi. Jesun Meithainu Chapa Athisa Akaithou
Chomkhat jouvin Jesu aseijui hotoh Nain kho langah acheuvin, mihonpi tamtah'in ajui uve.
Thivui dinga hung kijotdoh honkhat khopi kelkot phunga chun atohkha uvin ahi. Khangdong athipa chu meithainu chapa changkhatseh ahin, chule khosunga pat mihonpi tamtah'in amanu aumpiu ahi.
Pakaiyin amanu amu chun, alungsung khotonan adimtan ahi. “Kap hih'in!” tin aga lhamon e.
Chuin thikong lama chun achen atongkhan ahile apoho adingden'un ahi. “Gollhang” atin “Kaseipeh nahi, thoudoh in” ati.
Chuin athiah pasal chapang chu ahung toudoh in thu aseipan tai! Chule Jesun anu anungpeh tan ahi.
Kichatna lentah in mihonpi chu alonvuh tai, chule amahon Pathen avahchoiyun, “Thil nasatah bolthei themgao khat ilah uvah akisepdoh tai,” atiuvin chule “Pathen in tunin amite aviltai,” atiuve.
Chule Jesu chungchang thusoh Judea gam pumpi le akimvel thinglhang gamkai ho'ah the chansoh'in aumtai.
Twilutsah John seijui hon Jesu thilbol jouse chu John aseipeh tauve. Hijeh chun John in aseijuite lah'a mini akouvin,
chule adong dingin Pakai komah asoltai. “Nangma Messiah kanga jingu chu nahim, ahilouleh achom dang khat kavet nahlai diu ham?” agatisah e.
John seijui tenin Jesu amu lhon phat in aseilhon tai, “Twilutsah John in hiche dong dinga eihin sollhon ahi, Nangma Messiah, kanga jing pau chu nahim, ahilouleh achom dang khat kavetjing nahlai diu ham?” atilhon e.
Hiche pettah a chu Jesun mi tampi anatnau, adammo nahou asuhdam pet, lhagaoboh vop ho aboldam pet, chule khomulou ho kho amusah pet anahie.
Jesun John seijui teni chu aseipeh in, “John hengah kile lhon in lang nathilmu lhon le nathujah lhon chengse seipeh lhon tan–mitchon kho amun, elbaiyin lam ajot'in, miphah ho jendam ahin, nangong'in kho ajan, mithiho kaithouvin aumin, chule Kipana Thuphahi mivaichate hengah seiphong'in aumtai.
Chule seipeh lhon'in, keima jeh a kiheimang louho chu Pathen in phatthei aboh'e,” ati.
John seijui tenin adalhah jouvin Jesun ama thudol mihonpi jah'a chun aseiyin ahi. “Itobang mi veding'a gamthip a chu nache uham? Ama chu huimut lingle peng don anem ham?
Ahiloule ponsil mantamtah'a kivon mi mudinga nakiginchat um? Ahipoi, von hoitah kivon hole nomsatah'a hingho chu leng inpia bou akimui.
Themgao ve nahiu ham? Henge, chule themgao sanga chungnung jo ahi.
John chu Pathen Lekhabu in hitia aseipa chu ahi, Ven, keiman namasangah ka thu lhangsam kasol'e, chule aman nalampi namasanga asemtup ding ahi.
Kaseipeh nahiuve, anahing jouse lah'a, koima John sanga lenjo aumpoi. Ahin Pathen lenggam a aneopen jengjong chu ama sangin alenjon ahi!” ati.
Hiche thu ajah tah'un, mipi jouse–kaidong ho jengin jong–Pathen lampi chu adih ahi ti apom'un ahi, ajeh chu amaho John khut'a baptize anachang ahiuve.
Amavang Pharisee hole hou danthu themhon Pathen thilgon apampaiyun ahi, ijeh inem itile amahon John tuilutsah chu apomlouvu ahi.
“Tukhang mite hi ipi toh katekah tadem?” tin Jesun adongin “Iti kahilchet ding ham?” ati.
Amaho hi kailhang lah'a chapang kichem tobang ahiuve. Amaho aloi agol ho komah aphunchel un, “Keihon moupui golvah la kalhauvin, nalam pouve” hijeh chun thivuina la joh kalhauvin chule nakap pouve.
Ajeh chu Tuilutsah John chun aphat ho changlhah neh ahiloule lengpitwi don kiti hohin asumang pon, chule nanghon, “Thilhavop ahi” natiuve.
Mihem Chapan, alangkhat'ah, anen adonin, chule naseiyun, “Milop jukham chule kaidong ho le chonse dang ho jol le gol!” natiuve.
Ahinla chihna chu adih ahi ti anungjui ho hinkho'ah tahlangin aume, ati.
Pharisee ho lah'a khat in Jesu toh nilhah an nehkhom din angeh in, hijeh chun Jesu jong ama in'a chun achen an nedin atoutai.
Chukom muna an aneh ding chu numei jonthanhoi a chonse khat in ahetphat in, amanun songval bom khat'ah thao namtui mantamtah kikhum ahinchoiye.
Chuin amanu chu adilsun amapa kengmuh gal lam'a chun adilsun akaptai. Amitlhi akengmuh lamah avalhan, hichu asam in athehgo in ahi. Chuin akengmuh chu namtui athe in achop chuh chuh tan ahi.
Pharisee mipa anne a koupa chun hichu amuphat in ama le ama akihoulim in, “Hiche mipa hi themgao ahipou pouleh, itobang numei ham athamkha nu hi, amanu hi michonse ahi! ti ahet tei ding ahi,” atin ahi.
Chutah chun Jesun alunggel chu ahin donbut in, “Simon” tin Pharisee pa koma chun, “Thilkhat nakomah kaseinom'e” ati. “Sei jeng in, houhil” tin Simon in adonbut paiyin ahi.
Chuin Jesun hiche thusim hi aseipeh tai: “Mikhat in mini sum abatsah in–khatpa dangka ja-nga chule khat dangka som-nga.
Ahin anigel lhon in asajou lhon tapon, hijeh chun hepi na neitah in angaidam in abat lhon akah peh tai. Chujou chun koijoh chun ama chu ngailu jon tem tia nagel em?” tin adongtai.
Simon in adonbut in, “Keigel in abat tamjopa chu,” ati. “Hichu adih'e” tin Jesun aseitai.
Chuin numeinu heng lam ngan akiheiyin Simon jah'a aseitai, “Hiche numeinu hichea dilsu nu hi ven. Keima na'in a kahung lut chun, nangman tui kakenga vutkhu sillhah nading neipepon, ahivangin hiche nu hin amitlhi tuiyin asop lhan, chule asam in atheh ngim in ahi.”
Nangman chibai neiboh pon, ahin kahung lut a pat hichenu hin kakengmuh achop chop jong anga hih laiye.
Nangman kalua olive thao nuding na gelkhoh pon, amanu vang hin kakeng phang thao namtuiyin anui.
“Kaseipeh nahi, amanu chonsetna ho–tamtah ahiuvin, ngaidam ahitai, hijeh a chu amanun ngailutna lentah eimusah ahi. Amavang mi akingaidam lhom chu akipah lhom in ahi” ati.
Chuin Jesun numeinu jah'a, “Nachonsetna ho kingaidam ahitai” ati.
Dokhanga tou miho chu ama ho le amaho akihouvun, “Hiche mipa hi koi hiya mi chonse jong angaidam ham?” atiuvin ahi.
Chule Jesun numeinu jah'a aseitai, “Natahsan in nahuhhing ahitai, lungmongin chetan,” ati.
Chujou vin Jesu anaivellah kho ho vilding in akipandoh in, Pathen Lenggam chungchang Kipana Thupha seiphong leh hillhang le akop in ahi. Aseijui somleni ho jong akipuiyin,
lhagaoboh vop'a kon le anatna kisudam numei phabep khat jong ahiuve. Amaho lah a chun Mary Magdelene, thilha sagi anodoh peh nu;
Joanna, Chuza jinu, Herod sumkolveina vesuipa; Susanna; chule adang mi tamtah Jesu le aseijui te anei agouva panpi na hintoh doh jing ho jong ahiuve.
Nikhat Jesun thusim khat thulem'in mihonpi tamtah, kho chom chom'a kon hung kisutoa athusei ngaidinga hung ho komah hitin aseiye:
“Loubol mi khat amuchi tu dingin achedoh tai. Aloulai dungah athe len ahileh, muchi abang chu lamsih'a achun, chuva chun chotphan aumin, chule vachaten anedoh tauve.
Muchi adang songlah'a achui. Ahung khang doh'in, ahin akehdoh chu agoplha loiyin asunou ding alhomjeh in athidoh tai.
Muchi adang chu linglah'a achun, ahung kehdoh in chule ling chun adeplih jitai.
Muchi adang khat kit chu leipha laiyah achui. Hiche muchi chu akhang in, ga ahin son anakitu sangin ajat jakhat in agan ahi” ati. Hiche aseijouvin ahung pengjah jengin, “Koihileh angai na ding nakhang nei chan in angaiya ahetchet ding ahi,” ati.
Aseijui hon hiche thulem hi ipi kisei na ham adongun ahi.
Aman adonbut in, “Nanghon Pathen Lenggam thuguh nahet thei nadiuva phalpehna chang nahiuve. Amavang midangho hilna a thulem kaman hi Pathen Lekhabua kisun guilhun nadinga ahi: Ahin vet teng uleh, amu tahtah lou diu ahi. Ajah teng uleh, ahetthei lou diu ahi.”
“Hiche hi thulem kisei avetsahna chu ahi: Muchi chu Pathen thu ahi.
Lamsih a chu muchin avetsah chu, thu kisei ja'a ahivanga agiloupa hunga atahsan thei nalou ding le asochat lou na dinga alungsunga kon alahmang peh miho aseina ahi.
Muchi songlah'a chu hon avetsah chu, thu kisei ja'a chule kipah tah'a kisanta, ahivanga jung akhothuh loujeh uva phat chomkhat kah'a bou tahsan, lhepna atoteng uleh lhuji ho aseina ahi.
Muchi linglah'a chu hon avetsah chu, athu ja'a ahivanga athujah chu leiset gimna haosatna chule nopsahna hon atomchah a khangdoh thei talou ho aseina ahi. Hijeh chun apilhing thei tapouvin ahi.
Chule muchi leipha laiya chu chun milungtheng, lungthim pha, Pathen thu ja'a nung ho, chule lungneng tah'a ga tamtah sodoh ho aseina ahi. Meivah Lheng Akikhu Den Ngaipoi”
“Koiman meivah avah in chule lheng'in akhun ahiloule jalkhun noiyah asel ngaipoi. Meivah chu atunna ah akitungin, chuva chun avah chu insunga lut jousen amuthei bouve.
Ijeh inem itile akiselguh jouse lhangphonga hung kipodoh ding, chule akiphongdoh lou jouse meivah noiya kipodoh ding mijouse kihetsah ding ahi.”
“Hijeh chun iti najah uvem chingtheiyun. Kathuhil ngai jouse, hetthem theina kipeh be ding. Amavang thungai louho chu, ahetsa dan'a agel hou jeng jong amahoa kona kilamang ding ahi.” ati. Jesu Le A-Insung Mite
Chuin Jesu anu le asopiho amatoh kimudin ahung un, ahin mihonpi jeh chun ama kom nailut theilouvin aum tauve.
Koiham khat'in Jesu aseipeh in, “Nanu le nasopiho polangah aumuve, chule nakimutopi nom uve,” atipeh tai.
Jesun adonbut'in, “Kanu le kasopi ho chu koi hileh Pathen thu ja'a athua nungho chu ahiuve” ati.
Nikhat Jesun aseijuite jah'a aseiyin, “Dil gal langkhat ah galkaiyu hite” ati. Hijeh chun kong sungah alut'un akipatdoh tauve.
Konga akitol laiyun, Jesu chomkhat kichol din a-imu'e. Ahin sotloulaiyin, huipi hattah tuipi chungah chun anungsuh'e. Kong chu tui adim tan, amaho setoh teiding dinmun'ah achutauve.
Aseijuite acheuvin agakaithou un, “Pipu, Pipu, alhalut ding ihitauve!” tin apengjah jeng tauve. Jesu athodoh phat in, huipi le tui kinonglai chu aphohthip tai. Chuin apettah in huipi athip'in imajouse anomsel tai.
Chuin amaho chu adongin, “Natahsan'u hoiba ham?” ati. Amaho akihoulhi chilchel'un, “Thupeh anei teng huipi le tuikinong jengin jong athu angaiye!” akitiuve.
Hichun amaho Galilee a pat in dil gallang, Gerasene gamkai ahunglhung tauve.
Jesu konga kona apotdoh leh, mikhat thilhavop khat ahungin ahung kimupin ahi. Phat sottah amapa chu in beiya chule sagoh keova khopi pam lhanmol lah'a cheng ji ahi.
Jesu amu mu chun apeng'in chule amasanga alhu jengin ahi. Chuin ahung peng in, “Ipi jeh a kakoma hung kikumlut nahim, Jesu, Chungnung pen Pathen Chapa? Lungsettah in, katao ahi, nei gimbol hih in,” ati.
Ijeh inem itile Jesun hiche lhagaoboh chu amapa a kona ahungdoh nadinga ana thupehsa ahitai. Hiche lhagao boh hin mipa hi athunun ji ahi. Akimattup'a thihkhaova akibultuh jeng jong leh, aman imalouva atumtan jia gammang lah adelji, apumpia thilha thaneina noiya um ahitai.
Jesun adongin, “Namin ipi ham?” ati. “Janel” tin ahin donbut'e, ajehchu hiche mipa chu thilha tampin abop ahi.
Thilha ho chun Jesun atosin bei onghom'a asol louna diuvin angeh tauve.
Hiche mun'a chu voh hon tampi mollanga lha ahiuvin, chule thilhaho chun hiche vohchaho sunga alut nadiu joh in athum'un ahi. Hijeh chun Jesun phalna apen,
chuin thilhaho chu mipa a konin ahung potdoh'un vohchaho sungah alut uvin, chule vohcha honpi chu molchung akensuh'a pat chun alhaisuh un dillen a chun alhai lhauvin alhum lut gam tauve.
Achinghon thilsoh chu amuphat un, anai vel'a khoho le akimvel thinglhang gam ho ah alhai lut un thusoh chu athejal le tauve.
Thilsoh umchan veding in mipiho ahung lhaidoh uve. Mihonpi chomloukah in Jesu hengah ahung kikhom un, chule hiche mipa thilhaho a kona kilha ongpa chu amuuvin ahi. Amapa chu Jesu kengbul'ah atouvin, von akivon'in, chule alimgeh tan, chule amaho chu abonun akicha tauvin ahi.
Chuin thilsoh umchan muho chun adangho jah'a thilha voppa chu iti suhdam'a umham ti aseipeh un ahi.
Chuin Gerasene gamkaiya mipiho jousen Jesu hengah agam'u adalhah'a achemang nadin angeh tauve, ajehchu kichatna nasatah huinun chun alodim u ahitai. Hijeh chun Jesu jong kong sungah alelut in adalhatai, dil gal langkhat le galkai kit dingin.
Mipa thilha kinodoh peh pa chun amatoh lhonkhom din athum'in, ahin Jesun inlang joh a asol'in, hitin aseipeh e,
“Ahipoi, na insungmite kom joh'a chen lang, chule Pathen in nadinga nabolpeh jouse hi gaseipeh tan,” ati. Hijeh chun amapa chu khopi dung lah'a achen, Jesun thil loupi abolpeh ho aseiphong len ahi.
Dil gallang a chun mihonpin Jesu ana lem'un ahi, ajeh chu amahon ananga jingu ahi.
Chuin Jairus kiti akikhopnau in'a lamkai khat, ahungin Jesu kengbul'a abohkhup in a'ina akilhonpi din ahung tem'e.
Achanu changkhat seh, kum somleni bep chu, thiah ahi. Jesu amapa chutoh alhon khom'in ahileh amachu mihonpi chun atom chahkheh jengin ahi.
Mihonpi lah'a chun numei khat kum somleni jen thilong'a damlou aumin, amanun damna akimu jou lou ahi.
Jesu nung lang'a pat ahungin, amanun Jesu ponmang athamtai. Apettah chun athilon atang hel tai.
“Koiham ei tongkha?” tin Jesun ahin dongtai. Mijousen ahilounau aseiyun chuin Peter in, “Pipu, mihonpi hin nasuhkhah ahi,” ati.
Ahivangin Jesun aseiyin, “Koiham khat in thamkhah ding lungput neimonga eitham ahi, ijeh inem itile keiya kona suhdamna thaneina apot kahei,” ati.
Numei nu chun ki-immang thei kahitapoi ti ahet phat in, kithing pumin akengbul'ah adilsutan ahi. Mihonpi chun ipi jeh a atohkhah ham chule adampai jeng thu ahilchet hochu ajauvin ahi.
“Chanu” tin amanu jah'a chun, “Natahsan in nadamsah ahitai, lungmongin chetan” ati.
Amanu koma thu aseijing laiyin, kikhopna in'a lamkai pa, Jairus, in'a kon thupole khat ahung vailhungin ahi. Aman amapa jah'a aseipeh in, “Nachanu athitai. Tua houhil nasuhboi chu phachomlou ding ahitai,” ati.
Ahin Jesun thilsoh ajah chun, Jairus jah'a hitin aseiye, “Kicha hih'in, tahsan poupouvin, amanu suhdam'a umding ahi,” atipeh e.
Amaho in ahunglhun phat'un, Jesun Peter, John, le James, chule numei chapangnu nulepa tailou midang koima toh alut ding anompoi.
In chu mi tamtah akap le amaovah dimset'a um ahi, ahin aman aseiyin, “Kap tahih un! Athi ahipoi, a-imu ahibouve,” atipeh'e.
Ahivangin mihonpi chun anuisat un, ajeh chu athitai tichu hoitah a ahet'u ahi.
Chuin Jesun akhut in atuh in chule aw sangtah in, “Chanu, thoudoh in!” tin aseitai.
Chuin hiche pet tah chun amanu hinna chu ahung kilen, kinloitah in ahung dingdoh e! Chuin Jesun nehding khattou apeh diuvin aseipeh tai.
Anu le apa chu akipah val behseh jengin, ahin Jesun thilsoh chu koima koma seidoh lou din ahilchah e.
Nikhat Jesun aseijui somleni ho chu akoukhom in, thilhaho jouse le natna jouse suhdamna thahatna le thilboltheina apen ahi.
Chuin aman amaho chu Pathen Lenggam thudol mijouse seipeh ding leh adamlou te damsah dingin asoldoh'e.
“Najin nadiuvah imacha kipoh hih'un” tin ahilchah in “Tenggol ham, sakhao ham, an neh ding ham, sum ham ahilouleh von khel jeng jong kipoh hih'un.
Nache na chan uvah khopi nadalhah tokah uvin nalhun nau in a chun um'un.
Chule khopi khat chun nangho lemding adauva ahileh, nakengphang uva vutkhu ho thinglhauvin, hiche miho chu aso so kisoh tauhen tia lhahdohna in,” ati.
Hitichun amahon khotin'a gamchot apan'un, Kipana Thupha lhangsap chule ana damlou damsah toh aboluve. Herod In Jesu Aki-Mupi Nom
Herod Antipas, Galilee gamvaipopan Jesu natoh thilbol jouse ajahdoh phat in alungboi dentai. Mi konkhat chun Twilutsah John athilah'a kon thoudoh kit ahi atiuve.
Adanghon Jesu chu Elijah ahilouleh themgao holah'a khat athia kon thoukit ahi atiuve.
“Keiman la John kathat tan,” tin Herod in aseiyin, “Ahileh hiche mipa, athusim kajah pa hi koiham?” ati. Chule ama chu mutei ding atup jing tan ahi. Jesun Mi Sang Nga Val Jen Avahva
Seijui ho ahung kileu chun, Jesu hengah athilbol jouseu aseipeh tauve. Chuin ama amaho chutoh guhthim chan Bethsaida kho langah ache tauvin ahi.
Ahivangin mihonpi chun hoiya ache aholdoh un chule ajui tauve. Aman amaho chu alem in, Pathen Lenggam thudol ahil'in, chule ana damlou ho asudam in ahi.
Nilhangkai vaigei thim lang hin seijui somleni akoma ahungun aseitauve, “Mihonpi hi naivellah khoho le loujao dungah soldoh tan, anneh le jan gena ding akimu thei nadiuvin. Hikom munthip'a hin neh ding imacha aumpoi,” ahung tiuve.
Ahivangin Jesun aseiyin, “Nanghon amaho vah'un” ati. “Ahin keihon changlhah pheng-nga le nga ni bouseh kaneiyuve,” tin ahin donbut'un, “Ahilou le kacheuva nehding mihonpi hijat dinga hi kagachoh diuva nangaitom?” atiuve.
Ajeh chu chukoma chu mi pasal sang nga jen umah ahi. Jesun adonbut in, “Mi somnga nga bep'a aloi loiya tou dingin seipeh un,” ati.
Hijeh chun mipi abon'un atou tauve.
Jesun changlhah pheng nga le nga ni chu alan, vanlam aven, phatthei abohtai. Chuin changlhah ho chu ahal hal'a asuhkeh toh kilhon in, changlhah le nga chu aseijuite komah ahin pedoh doh jengin, amahon mipi ho ahoppeh uve.
Chuin abon'un aduchan chan aneuvin, chule chomkhat jouvin seijui hon nehmoh paipeh somleni alohdoh uve.
Nikhat achangseh'a tao dingin Jesun mihonpi adalhan ahi. Aseijuite bouseh toh um ahin, aman hitin adong tai, “Mihon kei hi koi ahi eitiuvem?” atileh,
amahon adonbut un, “Abangin Twilutsah John nahi atiuvin, abangin Elijah, chule adanghon malai themgaoho lah'a khat thoukit nahi atiuve,” atipeh uve.
Chuin aman amaho chu adong'in, “Nanghon la koi ahi neitiuvem?” atileh Peter in adonbut in, “Nangma Messiah, Pathen a kon hung kisol chu nahi,” ati.
Jesun aseijuite koi ahi koima koma aseidoh louna diuvin agihsal'in ahi.
“Mihem Chapa hin gim genthei tampi athoh ding,” tin ahinseiyin, “Amachu upa ho, thempuho, chule hou danthuhil hon ahin pampai diu ahi. Ama chu tha a umding, amavang anithum nileh athilah'a kona kaithouva umding ahi” ati.
Chuin mihonpi jah'a chun aseiyin, “Nangho koi tobang kanungjui nom naum uleh, nangma chang kingailutna'a konin kiheidoh un, na thingpel niseh'in kiput un, chule neijuiyun.
Nahinkho nahuhhing nom le nachan ding, amavang keima jal'a nakatdoh le nahuhhing ding ahi.
Chuleh ipi phatchomna mun natem, vannoi pumpi neiyin lang nangma tah kisusen kisumang le chun?
Khattouvin keima le ka thusei eijachat pi leh, Mihem Chapan jong amachu aloupina a chule Pa le vantil thengte loupina a ahung kile tengleh ajachatpi ding ahi.
Thutah kaseipeh nahiuve, tutua hikom'a dingho lah'a mi phabep'in Pathen Lenggam amu tokah uva thina atolou diu ahi,” ati.
Niget hamkhat jouvin Jesun Peter, John, le James hocheng hi molchung khat'ah taodingin apuitouve.
Chuin atao laiyin, amaiso ahung kikhel'in, chule avon'ah ho kidangtah'in abangsel jengin ahi.
Phulou helouvin mini, Mose le Elijah ahung kilah lhonin Jesu toh akihoulim pan tauve.
Amaho chu vet ding'in aloupi lheh jengui. Chule amaho chu leiset a pat'a apotdoh ding thu, Jerusalem a guilhung vahding thun akihoulim un ahi.
Peter le adang teni chu ihmu lhugam ahitauve. Akhahdoh uchun, Jesu loupina chu amu'uvin chule mi ni amatoh adinkhom chu amu'uve.
Mose le Elijah in adalhah kigot pan laiyuvin, Peter in, aseijeng jong helou khop'in ahung eodoh'in, “Pipu, hilai mun'a ium'u hi anom'e! lim munthum'ah hetjingnan song uhite–khat nang ding, khat Mose ding, chule khat Elijah ding,” ahintie.
Ahin, hitia asei jeng vang chun, meilhang khat in alekhu tauvin, meilhangin atomkhum toh lhonin kichat nan amaho alodim tauve.
Chuin meibol lah kon chun awgin khat'in hitin ahin seiye, “Hiche hi Kachapa ahi, Kalhendoh pa ahi. Athu ngaiyun,” ati.
Awgin athip chun Jesu chu achangseh anahitai. Hiche athilmu houchu chuche phat laichun koima komah aseidoh pouve.
Ajing'a molchunga pat ahung suh jou uchun, mihonpi tamtah'in Jesu akimupi uve.
Mihonpi lah'a mikhat chun ahin kouvin, “Houhil, lungset'in kachapa neivet peh in tia katao ahi, ajeh chu ama bouseh hi kacha neisun ahi.
Lhagao gilouvin aman jin, phulouvin apengjah jin, chule akam ah achilphon alhajin ahi. Ahehlhujin achangin amoh dalhah ji poi.
Na seijuite hengah einodoh peh nadiuvin kathum'in hinlah anodoh jou pouve,” ahung ti.
Jesun aseitai, “Nangho tahsan bei le midihlou ho! Nangho itih chan kaumpiuva kakhongai jing ding nahiu ham?” atin, chuin mipa jah'a chun, “Nachapa hikomah hinpuiyin,” ati.
Chapang pa ahung machon jep laiyin, thilha chun tol'ah ahin sulhun, nasatah in aveingoi jenge. Ahivangin Jesun lhagao gilou chu aphoh thip in chapangpa chu asudam tai. Chuin aman amapa chu apa alepeh kittai.
Chutobang thilsoh Pathen thilboltheina kidangtah amu uchun mipi chu atiu ajalheh jeng tai. Athilbolho jouse mijousen adatmah laiyin, Jesun aseijuite jah'a hitin aseiye,
“Ngaiyuvin chule kathusei hi geldoh jingun. Mihem Chapa hi agalmite khut'a pehdoh a umding ahi,” ati.
Ahin amahon ipi aseina ham ahethei pouve. Athupina chu amahoa kona kiselguh ahi, hijeh chun ahethei pouve, chule doh ding jong kichakit ahiuve.
Chuin aseijuite koi alenpen ham ti akinel salah lah jeng tauvin ahi.
Ahin, Jesun alunggel u ahen, hijeh chun chapang neocha khat akoma dingin alai.
Chuin aman amaho jah'a aseiye, “Koi hileh hitobang chapang neocha keima thalheng'a sang'a chun keima eisan ahi, chule keima eisanga chun eisol'ah kapa jong asan ahi. Nalah uva aneopen chu alenpen ahi,” ati.
John in Jesu jah'a, “Pipu, koihamkhat in namin'a thilha anodoh kamu uvin, ahivangin eiho loilah'a ajao loujeh in angah dingin kaseipeh tauve,” ahin ti.
Ahivangin Jesun adonbut in, “Kham hih un, koihileh nadoudal lou phot chu nanga ding ahi” ati.
Van'a lahtouva aumna ding phat ahung naitoh lhonin, Jesu Jerusalem jon din dettah a kigellha pumin achen ahi.
Aman thupole ho Samaria khokhat'ah, availhun na dinga akigot theina diuvin asol masan ahi.
Ahivangin hiche khoa mipi ho chun Jesu chu asang tapouve, ajehchu ama Jerusalem jona achejing lai ahi.
James le John in hiche amudoh lhon phat in, amanin Jesu jah'a, “Pakai, van'a kona amaho gouvam jeng ding mei ikou lhah diu ham?” atilhone.
Ahin Jesu akiheiyin amani chu aphoh'in ahi.
Hijeh chun amaho khochom khat ah ache tauve.
Amahon chutia lam ajot laiyun, koiham khat'in Jesu jah'a, “Nache na chan'ah najui inge,” ati.
Ahin Jesun adonbut in, “Si-al hon chenna ding ko aneiyun, vachaten gena ding bu aneiyun, ahivangin Mihem Chapan alu ngapna ding jeng jong aneipoi,” atipeh e.
Aman midang khat jah'a, “Hungin, neijuiyin” ati. Mipa chu anom in hinlah hitin aseiye, “Pakai, amasan inlam kileng ting kapa gavui masa tadinge,” ati.
Ahivangin Jesun aseipeh in, “Lhagaova thihon amithi hou kivuiyuhen! Nangma kin chu chele a Pathen Lenggam thudol seiphong chu ahi,” ati.
Achom khat in aseiyin, “Henge Pakai, keiman najui inge, ahin amasan ka insungmi tetoh gakivailhah tadinge,” ati.
Ahin Jesun aseipeh in, “Koi hileh akhut'a langkon tuhta chule nunglam ve chu Pathen Lenggam a dingin alhing poi,” ati.
Tun Pakai in seijui adang mi somsagi le ni alhengdoh in amaho chu akop kop'in khotin le muntin vilding agot naho ah asol in ahi.
Hiche ho cheng hi amaho ahilchahna ahi: “Lousoh ga khoptup ding atam, ahin natong ho alhome. Hijeh chun Pakai hengah taovun amachu ga chomtup dia mopo ahi; alouva natong ding mi ahin solbe nadin thum'un.”
Tun cheuvin, chuleh geldoh jingun keiman si-al lah'a kelngoi kisol tobanga kasol nahiuve.
Sum le pai ima kipoh hih'un, sakhao jong kipoh hih'un, kengchot akop'in jong pohih un. Chuleh lampi dungah khattou lem dingin kingapa hih'un.
Khattou in'a nalut teng uleh, amasan “Pathen lungmonna hiche in'a hin umhen” tin asauvin.
Hichea cheng ho chu alungmon uleh, phattheina chu umden ding; achutilou uleh, phattheina chu nahenguva hung kile ding ahi.
In khat'a kon inkhat ah vahle hih'un. Munkhat bou ah um unlang, amahon napeh peh uchu neuvin chule don'un. Min phatah a najen nau sanding kiphalam hih'un, ajehchu anatong chun alosan amuding mong ahi.
“Khopi khat a nalut uva nasan uleh, namasanga ahin luidoh doh uchu neuvin.”
Adamlou sudam'un lang seipeh'un, “Pathen Lenggam chu tun nakom uva aumtai” tiuvin.
Ahin khopi khattou in nasan dauleh, alampiu dunga chun chedoh unlang seiyun,
Nakhopiu sunga vutkhu ho geiyin kakenguva kon'in kathing lhauve, nasoso kisoh dinga dalhah nahiuve ti vetsahnan. Chule hiche hi heuvin–Pathen Lenggam chu anaitai!
Kaseipeh nahiuve thupi kitan nileh agilou Sodom kho chu chutobang khopi ho sanga phajep diu ahi.
“Itobang lunghemnan nangau hitam, vo Korazin le Bethsaida! Ijeh inem itile nalah'a thilkidang kibol hohi agilou Tyre le Sidon khohoa kibol hitaveleh, sotlaiya pat'in amipihon achonset nauva kon lungheina nei untin, khaodippon kisil untin chule akisih'u tahlang nan aluchung uvah vutvam kiloi tauvinte.
Henge, Tyre le Sidon khopi teni hi thupi kitan nileh nangho sanga phajep diu ahi.
Chule nangho Capernaum mite, van-gam'ah jabolna chang nauvin natem? Nachan loudiu ahi, thina mun'a nachesuh joh diu ahi,” ati.
Chuin aseijuite jah'a aseiyin, “Koihileh nathuhil'u kisan a chun keijong eisan ahi. Chule napampai chan'u chun keijong eipampai ahi. Chule koihileh keima eipampai chan chun Pathen, eihinsolpa apampai ahi” ati.
Seijui somsagi leni ho ahung kileuvin, thanom tah in thulhut ahin bol'un ahi. “Pakai, thilhaho jeng jong kathu uvin anunge nangma min kapat ule,” atiuve.
“Henge” tin amaho aseipeh in, “Keiman Satan van'a kona kolphe banga alhahsuh kamui!
Veuvin, keiman nangho galmi thilboltheina chunga thuneina kapeh nahiuve, chule nanghon gul le aipi chunga lam najot diu chule nachilgoi dingu ahi. Imachan nasuhkhah loudiu ahi.
Amavang lhagao gilou nathuuva anun jeh in kipah hih'un, ahin van-gam'a namin'u akijihlut jeh joh in kipah un,” ati.
Hiche pettah chun Jesu Lhagao Thenga kipana adimset tan, chuin hitin aseiye, “O Hepa, van le lei Pakai, hiche thilho nangman aching le athem'a kigel hoa pat'a naselguh a, chapang ho henga naphondoh jeh in kakipah'e. Henge Pa, hitia kibol hin nangma nalunglhai sah'e,” ati.
“Kapan keima imajouse chunga mopohna eipeh ahitai. Pa tailou koiman Chapa chu dihtah in ahepoi, chule Chapa tailou le Chapa in hetsah dinga alhen ho tailouvin koiman Pachu dihtah in ahepoi” ati.
Chuin amaho changseh aumpet un, aman aseijuite heng lam ngan aseiye, “Nathilmu chengseu mu ah mit hochu anunnom e.
Kaseipeh nahiuve, themgao ho le lengho tamtah'in nathilmu chengseu hi muding anagaldot jingu ahin, hinlah anamupouve. Chuleh najah houhi jah ding anagaldot jing'u ahin, hinlah anaja pouve,” ati.
Nikhat hou danthua them khat Jesu patep dingin adingdoh in hiche thudoh hi adonge, “Houhil, tonsot hinna kanei thei nadia ipi kabol ding ham?” ati.
Jesun adonbut in, “Mose dan in ipi asei em? Iti nasim am?” tin adongtai.
Mipa chun adonbut in, “Nangman nalung pumpin, na lhagao pumpin, na thaneina pumpin, chule nalungthim pumpin Pakai naPathen chu ngailun. Chule nangma nakingailut bangin naheng nakom ngailun,” tin aseiye ati.
“Adih'e” tin Jesun aseipeh in, “Hichu bol'in chule nahin ding ahi!” ati.
Mipa chun athilbol them akichan nom'in, hijeh chun Jesu chu adongin, “Koiham kaheng kakom?” ati.
Jesun thusim khat in adonbut in: “Juda mikhat Jerusalem a pat Jericho lam jon in ajin suh in ahi, chule ama chu lamkah ah migucha michom hon abulu un, aponsil aholhah peh un, avouvin, chule athisa tobang'in lam pang'ah adalha tauve.”
Thempu khat in agatoh khan, hinlah mipa chuva akijam amu mu chun, lampi pang langkhat joh apal in adalhatai.
Hou'in lhachale ho khat agachen chule chukom'a akijam chu amun, ahin aman jong lamsih lang khat ah apeldoh tai.
“Chuin musit'a um Samaria mikhat ahung pheiyin, mipa amu chun, avoujang nat peh tan ahi.”
Akom ah ache naiyin, Samaria mipa chun akivohna maha chu ajen'in olive thao le ju asunkhum in, atompeh tai. Chuin mipa chu ama sangan chungah ahin puiyin, in khat ah ahin puilut in chukoma chun ajenlen ahi.
Ajing in in-ngahpa chu dangka cheng ni apen, aseiyin, “Hichepa hi anavesui in. Achunga lutjat hiche sanga atamjoh khah le, kahung kit teng kapeh ding ahi,” ati.
“Tun seiyin hiche mithum ho lah'a chu koipen tah chu hiche mipa gucha michom hon avoh pau dinga aheng akom hi ham?” tin Jesun adongtai.
Mipa chun adonbut in, “Akhoto pachu ahi,” ati. Chuin Jesun aseiyin, “Adih'e, tun chenlang chutobang chun gabol tan,” ati.
Jesu le aseijuite Jerusalem lam jona achejing laiyun, khokhat ahung lhung un, chua chun Martha kiti nun a-in'a dingin alemin ahi.
Asopinu Mary chu Pakai kengbul ah atouvin, athuhil chu angaiye.
Ahivangin Martha chu jan anneh lentah agon jeh chun alunggim in ahi. Jesu komah ahungin ahung seitai, “Pakai dihtheilou nasah lou khattou ham kasopinu thipbeh a atouva ken natoh jouse katoh? Eihung kithopi na dingin hinsol in,” ati.
Ahivangin Pakai in amanu hengah aseiyin, “Ngailut Martha, nangma hitiho jouse chunga hi lunggima lung himo nahi.”
“Thilkhat bouseh khohsah le lunggim nading aume. Maryn hichu akimudoh in, chule amanu a kona kilamang thei lou ding ahitai,” ati.
Khatvei hi Jesu munkhat ah taona mangin aume. Ahin chai chun, aseijuite lah'a khat akom'ah ahungin aseiye, “Pakai, taoje neihil'un John in aseijuite ahil bangin” ahung ti.
Jesun aseiyin, hitia hi natao dingu ahi: “Hepa, namin chu thengtah in kikoi hen, nalenggam hung lhung loi hen
Niseh a kangaichat u anneh nei peuvin
Chule kachonset nau ngaidam in, Kachunguva chonse ho kangaidam bangun chule lhepna ah nei lhahlut sah hih'un” ati.
Chuin taoding dan ahilben, hiche thusim hi amangchai: “Tekah nan nangma jankhang kim in naloi nagol in khat'ah nachen, changlhah pheng thum palah ding nadei jal'in naga chetai” Nangman akom'ah naseiyin,
“Kaloi khat tuchun eivil dingin ahung vailhungin, chule keiman ima nehsah ding kaneipoi, tin nathum tai.”
Chuleh tekahnan, ama chun alupna dan sunga kon chun, “Nei houloh tahih in. Kot jong tujana dinga kikhah ahitai, ka insungmi te le keima jong jalkhun'a kabon chauva umah kahi tauve. Nakithopi thei ponge,” ahin ti.
Hiche hi kaseipeh nahi–ihamtin ajol le agol ahijeh chun bolhih jongle, nangman kot sottah nasuh suh jenga ahileh, ama thoudoh intin nathil thum chan chu napeh ding ahi, jahcha lou hel'a napansot jeh'a chu, ati.
“Chule hijeh a chu kaseipeh nahiuve, thum jing jengun, chule nathum chu namu ding ahi.” Hol jingin chule namu ding ahi. Kot chu kiu jing in chutileh kot chu nakihonpeh ding ahi.
Ajeh chu athum chan'in akisan in, ahol jousen amun. Chule kot kiu jouse akot kihonpeh ding ahi.
“Pate ho, nachateuvin nga athumleh, akhel'a gul napeh um?
Ahilouleh ahtui athum nauva aipi napeh uvam? Henge napepouve!
Hijeh a chu nangho michonsen bon nachateu thilpha pehje nahet uleh, van'a um napauvin Lhagao Theng iti napehda diu ham athum ho jouse dinga” ati.
Nikhat Jesun mi apaotheilou khat a konin thilha anodoh peh in ahi, chule thilha chu apotdoh jou chun, mipa chu ahung paodoh pan tai. Mihonpi chun kidang asauvin,
ahin miphabep khat chun, “Athilha nodoh chu lungdon ding ahipoi. Aman athilbol theina khu Satan, thilhate lengpa'a kona amu ahi,” atiuve.
Adanghon, Jesu patep nom nan, van'a kon melchihna kidang, athaneina photchetna a avetsah dingin angeh un ahi.
Alunggel u ahetan, hijeh chun aman aseitai, “Itobang lenggam hileh khat le khat kidouna a kibung khen kiti chu amangthah ding ahi. Insungkhat jong kidouna a kibung khen chu lhulham ding ahi.
Nanghon keima Satan in eisuh thahat danin naseiyuve. Ahin Satan chu akikhentel'a ama le ama akidou le alenggam chu iti khantou tantem?
Chuleh kei chu Satan suhthahat kahi leh, nalah uva thilha nodoh ho la? Amahon jong thilha anodoh u ahi, hijeh a chu amahon nathusei jeh uva chu nahin dem diu ahi.
Amavang keiman Pathen thahatna jal'a thilha kanodoh ahileh, Pathen lenggam chu nalah uva hunglhung ahitai.
Ajeh chu Satan banga mihat tah khat chu amanchah kimkeiya akivon a a'inpi akiventup teng leh anei agou ho bit ahi–
ama sanga thahatjo khat'in ahung bulhu a, athaneina alahmanga, agal manchah achom'a, chule anei agou apoh mang ho ahopcheh kah'a chu.
Koi hileh keimatoh pangkhom lou chu eidoudal ahi, chule eikhop khompi lou chu athecheh ahi.”
Lhagao gilou khat in mihem khat adalhah teng leh, nelgam lah dungah achejin, kicholna ding mun aholjin ahi. Ahin khatcha amulou teng leh aseijin, “Kahungdoh na mipa koma kile tange,” ati.
Hijeh chun akilen ahileh ana umnasa in chu akitheh thengsel'a chule kitup sel'a aumchu amun ahi.
“Chuin hiche lhagao chun ama sanga giloujo lhagao sagi ma amun, chule amaho abon'un hiche mipa sunga chun alut un aching tauve. Chuin chuche mipa chu amasa'a sangin akhoh cheh jitai,” ati.
Hitia thu asei lai chun, mihonpi lah'a kon chun numei khat in ahin kouvin, “Pathen in nanu phattheiboh hen–nahung kondoh na naobu, chule nahin chep noi jong,” ati.
Jesun adonbut in, “Ahin hiche sanga chu Pathen thu ja'a anatoh a podoh ho chu anunnom cheh ahiuve” ati.
Mihonpin Jesu anehchin to laitah in, aman hitin aseiye, “Hiche khang gilou hin melchihna kidang kavetsah dingin asei sei jenguvin; ahin melchihna kapeh ding chu Jonah melchihna bouseh hiding ahi.
Ama chunga thilsoh chengchu Pathen in Nineveh mite henga asol ahi ti melchihna ahi. Mihem Chapa chunga thilsoh jong hiche miho dinga Pathen sol ahi melchihna ahi.”
“Sheba lengnun, thupi kitan nikho leh hiche khang mite douna'a dingdoh ding themmo achanding ahi, ijeh inem itile ama mun gamlatah a konin Solomon chihna thungai dingin ahunge. Tun Solomon sanga lenjo khat hikom'ah aume–ahin nanghon athu nangai pouve.
Nineveh khomite jong thupi kitan nileh hiche khang mite douna'a dingdoh diu chule themmo achandiu ahi. Ijeh inem itile amahon Jonah thuseiya konin achonset nauva kon lungheina aneiyuve. Tun Jonah sanga lenjo khat hikom'ah aume–ahin, nanghon athu nangaipouve.”
“Koiman meivah avah in chule aselmang in ahilouleh lo akhukhum ngaipoi. Chusang chun, meivah atunna ah akitung jin, chua kon chun insung lut jousen avah amuthei bou uve.”
“Namit chu natahsa dinga vah hinpedoh meivah ahi. Namit chu ahoi laisea, natichung pumpi chu vah dimset ahi. Ahin, aphatmo teng, natichung chu mithum in atom ahi.
Vah kaneiye tia nakigel chu muthim tahtah ahipoi ti kiphot chen in.
Vah'a chu nadimset'a, aning akah a muthim behlou nahileh, na hinkho pumpi chu, meivah vahtah in asalvah banga vahset ding ahi.” ati
Jesun thu aseilaiyin, Pharisee holah'a khat'in a-in'a anne ding in atem'in ahi. Hijeh chun ama alut in dokhanga atouna mun alotai.
A an-vailhun pan, amasa'a Juda chondan a khutsil bollouva an nedia atoulhah jeng chu amun adatmo lheh jengin ahi.
Chuin Pakai chun amapa jah'a, “Nangho Pharisee hohin khon le lheng apolam siltheng chingthei tah'in nabol'un, ahin asunglam vang anen–kiloset nale gitlouna a dimset nahiuve!
Vo mingol! Pathen in asung jong chule apolam jong asem gel hilou ham?
Hijeh chun asung lang jong mivaicha ho thilpeh peh'a konin kisutheng un, chutile apumpia nathen dingu ahitai.”
“Itobang lunghem nan nangau hitam Pharisee ho! Ajeh chu nanghon som'a khat nahon sung uva anche aneopen geiyin natoh dimdem'un, hinlah adih'a thutan le Pathen ngailut nakhohsah pouve. Henge, somakhat napeh diu mong ahinai ahivangin athupijo thilho notthap hih'un.”
“Itobang lunghem nan nangau hitam Pharisee ho! Ijeh inem itile nanghon kikhopna in dunga touna thupi hoa tou le kailhang mun lah'a navale nauva min chibai naboh ding nadeiyun ahi.
Henge ipi lungkham nan nangau hitam! Ijeh inem itile nangho loulaiya lhankhuh kiselguh tobang nahiuve. Mihon lepthol kibol chu helouvin achungah lam ajot un ahi” ati.
“Houhil” tin Hou danthu them khat in ahinkouvin, “Nathusei chun keiho jong eisujum uve,” ati.
“Henge,” tin Jesun aseiyin, “Itobang lunghem nan nangau hitam nangho hou danthu themho!” Ajeh chu nanghon pohjou lou ding houthua ngehna nasem uvin mipi na sugenthei uvin, hinlah nakhut jung khat jong apohgih'u ngaijang peh nadingin nalam khapouve.
Lungkham na itobangin nangau hitam! Napu napa teuvin malaiya anathau themgao ho lhan nasem uvin ahi.
Ahin tahbeh in, napu napa teuvin anabolkhel u napom u vetsahna a ahetoh'a napan u ahitai. Amahon themgaoho anathat'un, chule nanghon amaho najopnau photchetnan alhan nasem uve!
Hiche hi Pathen in achihna a nangho chungchang anasei chu, Keiman themgao le solchah ahenguva kasol ding, ahivanga amahon abang athauva abang abolset diu ahi.
“Chutia chu hiche khang mite hi vannoi kiphudoh a pat Pathen themgao kithat ho jouse chunga mopo diu ahi.”
Abel kitha a pat a Zechariah, maicham le muntheng kikah a kithat pa geiya hiche khang mite kingoh ding ahi.
“Itobang lunghem nan nangau hitam nangho hou danthu them ho! Ajeh chu mipi a kon'in hetna kot-heh mihoa konin naladoh un, nangho tah jong lenggam sungah nalut pouve, chule adang alut ding jong najada uve,” ati.
Jesun adalhah got toh kilhon in, hou danthu hilho Pharisee ho chun ahin galmimu cheh cheh un, chule thudoh tamtah doh a suh lunghang ding agouvin ahi.
Amahon thangkol'a osah ding hehset nathei thuseidoh sah ding atiu ahi.
