Hiche pet chun, mihonpi chu asang ajan ahung khang in akisucheh chuh un chule khat le khat kichonkha ton aumun, Jesun hichun aseijuite henglam ahin ngan agih sal in, “Pharisee ho chol a konin kihong phauvin”—aphat lhemnauva kon'in.
Phat ahung lhunge, thil akikhukhum jouse kiphongdoh ding ahi, chule aguh'a umjouse jong mijouse koma kihetsah ding ahi.
Muthim'a nasei jouseu chu khovah a kija ding ahi, chule kot kikhakhum na a olcha nakiseipeh toujong chu inchunga mijouse jah'a kisamphong ding ahi! Gin Ding Koipen Ham?
“Ngailut umtah jol le gol te, natahsa that thei hochu kicha hih'un.” Hiche jou le chun nachungah ima abolthei tapouve.
Ahin kichat ding koi ham naseipeh unge. Pathen kichauvin, aman nangho tha nathei le damun'a lelut nathei thilboltheina tha anei ahi. Henge, ama ahi kichat ding.
“Vasah nga man ijat ham–paisa ni man ham?” Ahin Pathen in khat jeng jong asumil pon ahi.
Chuleh nalu'a na samjang ho jengjong aboncha kisimtoh soh ahitai. Hijeh chun kicha hih'un; nangma vasah honpi jouse sanga manlujo nahi.
Kaseipeh nahiuve, koi hileh hiche leiset'a lhangphonga keima eiseidoh chan chu, Mihem Chapan jong Pathen Vantilte jaona'a aseidoh ding ahi.
Amavang koi hileh hiche leiset'a eiseilep chan chu Pathen Vantilte masanga kiseilep diu ahi.
Koihileh Mihem Chapa douna thusei chan chu kingaidam ding ahi, amavang koi hileh Lhagao Theng taitom'ah vang chu kingaidam louding ahi.
“Chuleh kikhopna in'a vaipo hole thuneiho anga athu tan dinga nahin kai teng uleh, iti nakiven ding ham ahiloule ipi nasei ding thu ah lunggim hih un.
Ajeh chu Lhagao Theng chun apettah a seiding napeh diu ahi,” ati.
Chuin koiham khat'in mipi lah'a kon chun ahin kouvin, “Houhil, kasopipa jah'a kapa nei le gou eikihoppi nadingin seiyin,” ati.
Jesun adonbut'in, “Jol, kon nangni kah'a thutan'a eipansah'a, hiti khati iti kagel lhah ding ham?” ati.
Chuin aman aseiben, “Chingtheiyun! Neipap kiloset kiti jouseah kivengun. Hinkho hi naneijat a kisim ahipoi,” ati.
Chuin aman thusim khat aseipeh tai: “Mihao khat hin loumun khat, alei phatah, ga hoitah tah sodoh aneiyin ahi.
Amapa achangin akihoulim in, ‘Ipi kabol ding hitam? Ka lousoh ga jouse koina ding mun la kanei pon,’” ati.
Chuin aman aseiyin, Kahetai! Kachangsal jouse phelhangting asanga lenjo cheh thahsah inge. Chutileh keiman ka chang le mim jouse kholkhomna ding dan ninglhingset in nei tange.
Chutengleh keima nomtah'a katouva keima le keiman hitia hi kasei ding ahi, “Kajol, nangman kumsottah a ding ninglhing set'a kikhol khom naneiye. Tun lung olmo hih in! nen lang, don'in lang, chule kipah in!” tinge ati.
Ahivangin Pathen in amapa jah'a chun, “Mingol! Tujan ma ma'a nathi ding ahitai. Chuteng leh nanatoh ga jouse hi koi chang tantem?” ati.
“Henge, lei gouthil bouseh kholkhom'a Pathen toh haosatah'a kiguijopna neilou mi chu angol ahi” ati.
Chuin, aseijuite kom lang ngan Jesun aseitai, “Hiche jeh'a hi keiman nitin hinkho a dingin lunggim hih'un kati ahi”—neh le chah ninglhing set'a chule sil le chen lhingset'a kanei ding hinam tin.
Ajeh chu hinkho hi anneh ding sanga lujo, chule natahsa jong sille chen sanga lujo ahi.
Va-ah ho khu veuvin, amahon tula atu pouvin, at la a-at pouvin ahiloule khol la akholkhom pouvin, ajeh chu Pathen in avahnai. Chule nangho vacha ho sanga ama dinga loupijo nahiuve!
Nalunggim nau jousen nahinkho phat bihkhat ajopbe theiyem?
Chule lunggim nan imacha chutobang thil neocha jong alolhin sah theilouleh, thil lentah chunga jong lunggim chu ipi phachom ding ham?
“Lily pah ho le akhan doh dan khu veuvin. Amahon na jong atong pouvin chule avon hou jong akisem thei pouvin, ahin, Solomon jeng jong, aloupina jouse a akivon chun amaho tobang lom'in ahoijou poi.
Chuleh Pathen in pahcha ho tunia uma jing a meilhum sunga selut ding bon kidangtah'a akhohsah'a ahileh, aman nangma thonlouva nakhohsah teitei ding ahi. Ipi bol'a hibanga tahsan na neo hi naneiyu ham?”
“Chuleh ipi kaneh ding ham ipi kadon ding ham tin lungboi hih'un. Hiche ho thil'a chun lunggim hih'un.
Hiche thil hohin vannoi pumpia atahsanlou ho lungsung alodim'in ahi, ahivangin Napauvin nangaichat changseu chu ahemasa jitai.
Pathen lenggam chu thil jouse sangin hol'un, chule aman nangaichat chan'u napeh diu ahi.”
“Hijeh chun kicha hih'un, hon lhom ho, ajeh chu nangho lenggam peh ding hi napau dinga kipana lentah ahi.”
“Nanei nagou ho joh'un lang angaicha ho peuvin. Hichun van'a gou nakhol peh dingu ahi! Chule van-gam a sumdip hon chultih aneipouvin chule atovang aum khapoi. Nagou khol chu bitkeiya umding ahi; guchan jong aguhmang theilou ding ahi chule nget'in jong asuhset thei lou ding ahi.”
Nanei nagou umna'a chu nalung ngaichat jong aum ding ahi. Hetman Louva Jesu Hung Kit Ding
“Natohna dingin kivontup san umun chule nathaomei vahjing'un;
Na Pakai pa moupui golvah na'a kon ahung kile ding nanga bangin. Chutileh ahung lhun'a kot ahinsuh teng leh kot nahonpeh a nalutsah thei nadia phasadema naum ding ahi.
Soh ho kiging jinga umho le ahung kile ding ngah jing ho chu kipaman kipediu ahi. Thutah kaseipeh nahiuve, amatah in amaho chu atousah ding, atai akikhi ding, amaho chu atou uva aneh laiyuva chu ajen ding ahi.
Ama jankim lah ahilou le khovah kon'a hung maithei ahi. Ahin, ahung pet a kiging jinga um sohte chu kipaman apehding ahiuve.”
“Hiche hi hethem in, in-neipan itih phatchet'a gucha hung ding ham ti heleh, aman a-in chu veihonga aumsah lou ding ahi.
Nangjong kiging jinga naum jing ding ahi ijeh inem itile Mihem Chapa chu naginchat lou pettah uva hung ding ahi,” ati.
Peter in adong in, “Pakai hiche thutekah chu keihoa ding bou hai mijousea ding ham?” ati.
Chuin Pakaiyin adonbut in, “Soh kitah le lung limgeh chu apakai pan insung pumpi le sohdang ho chunga jong mopohna apeh'a avahsah ho chu ahi.
Apakai pa ahung kile a asohpan na phatah'a atoh ahung mu leh, kipaman umding ahi.”
Thutah kaseipeh nahiuve, hitobang soh chu apakai pan anei jouse chunga mopohna apehding ahi.
Ahinlah, iti tantem asohpa chun, “Kapakai pa hi tem'in hung ponte” tin gelhen lang, asohdang ho vo hen, neh nom ne hen, ju kham kham jeng taleh?
Apakai pachu seiphong masa lou leh ginchat umlou pettah in hungin tin, chuteng aman asohpa chu asat goi goi ding mikitah louho toh asolmang tha ding ahitai.
“Chule soh khat apakai pa dei he'a, ahivanga kigongtup lou chule akihilchah na ho tongdoh lou chu, nasatah a bolgimna ato ding ahi.
Ahivanga ahelou khattou chun thilse abol leh, ama chu gihsa louva kigimbol ding ahi. Koiham khat chu tamtah akipeh le, ama a kona chu tamtah kile ngeh ding ahi; chuleh khattou chu mopohna tamtah akipeh le, asanga tamjo chu kingeh ding ahi.”
“Keima vannoi hi meiya tih dinga kahung ahi, chule akoudoh hitaleh katilheh jenge!
Keiman thoh hahsa tah baptize chanding kamakho'ah kaneiye chule hichu akimolso kah a kalung khamna iti san tam!
Leiset a chamna hinpo dinga hunga nei gel'um? Ahipoi, keima miho kibung khensah dia hung'ah kahi!
Tua pat'a insung ho kikhentel diu ahitai, thum'in eijop uva, nin eidoudal ding–ahiloule nin eijop'a thum'in eidou ding ahi.
Mipa chu chapa douna'a chule chapa chu mipa douna a kibungkhen ding ahi; chanu douna minu chule minu douna'a chanu; chuleh ateh in mou douna chule mouvin ateh douna'a kikhenna um ding ahi” ati. Phat Kihei-Dan Hetna
Chuin Jesun mihonpi lam aven aseiye, “Nanghon meibol lhumlam langa ahung umdoh phat le, nasei jiuvin, ‘go hung juding ahi’ natiuve. Chuleh nangho nadih uve.
Lhanglam hui ahung nun teng leh, naseijiuvin, ‘Tuni chu salheh ding ahi’ natiuvin, chule achuti ji'e.
Nangho mingolho! nanghon leiset chunga van umje nasuto theiyun, ahin nanghon tuphat umdan naledoh thei pouve.”
“Ipi jeh'a nangho dinga adih chu naki gellhah thei lou u ham?”
“Nangho thukitanna muna nahehse hou toh nache teng uleh, amun nalhun masang in kihoutoh pi ding gon. Achuti louleh thutan vaihompa masanga nahehse pan nakai ding, aman vaipopa henga napehdoh a, aman songkul'a nakhum ding ahi.
Chule hichu aso leh nangman achainapen sum geiya napeh doh masang sea itinama jong leh nakilhadoh louhel ding ahi,” ati.
Hiche phatlai hin Pilate in Galilee gam mi phabep'in Hou'in a kilhaina gantha abollaiyun athat'e tithu Jesu seipeh in aumin ahi.
“Hiche Galilee miho chu Galilee gam midang ho jouse sanga chonse joa nangaito uvam?” tin Jesun adongin, “Hijeh a chu chutia thoh genthei athoh u ahi natiuvem?
Ahipoi, kaseipeh nahiuve, nalung nahei uva Pathen lam'a nakihei lou uleh nangho jong mangthah ding nahiuve.
Chuleh Siloam inting achima adellih mi somleget hochu la? Amaho chu Jerusalem a dinga michonse pen ho hitauvam?
Ahipoi, chule kaseipeh kit nahiuve, nalung nahei lou uleh namanthah diu ahi” ati.
Chuin Jesun hiche thusim hi ahinseiye: “Mikhat in ahonsung ah theichang phungkhat atun chule avel vel in aga umding ham tin ahung ve jin, hinlah amapa alung lhalheh jeng jin ahi.
Achainan honlhou pa jah'a, Kumthum hulteh kanga ahitai, ahin tuchan'in theichang khatbeh jong aga poi! Phuhlhu uvin,” ati. Honsungah mun alobep seuvin anohphah e, ati.
“Hon lhoupan adonbut in, ‘Pakai phat khatvei peh ben, kumkhat umsah ben, chule keiman phatechan vesui ingting leiphat na ding tampi sung inge.
Khovei leh theichang imu le aphai. Imulou uleh, na phuhlhuh thei ahitai’ ati” tin aseiye.
Cholngah ni khat hi Jesun kikhopna in'a thu ahil pet hin,
Numei khat lhagaoboh in lam jot moa alha amui. Kum somleget jen tingbong'a dingjang thei louva alha ahi.
Jesun amanu amu chun, ahinkouvin aseitai, “Ngailut umtah numeinu, nanat na'a kona kisudam'ah nahitai,” ati.
Chuin amanu chu atham'in ahileh amanu jong chupettah chun adingjang thei tai. Pathen iti avahchoi hitam!
Ahivangin kikhopna in'a lhacha mopopa chun cholngah nia amisuhdam jeh chun nommo asan. “Hapta sunga nigup natoh nading um ahi,” tin mihonpi jah'a chun, “Hiche nikho ho a chun hungun, Cholngahni hilouvin” ati.
Ahivangin Pakaiyin adonbut in, “Miphalhem ho! Nabon uva Cholngah nia na natoh sohkeiyu chula! Na bongchal ham ahiloule na sangan ham Cholngah nia akihenna a pat a sutlham'a tui donsah dia napui jiu hilou ham?
Hiche lungset umtah numeinu, Abraham chanu hi, Satan in kum somleget jen soh'a ahentang ahi. Cholngahni hijongleh chutobang suhdam chu dihlou ham?” ati.
Hichun agalmi ho asujum in, ahin mijousen thilkidang abolho jeh chun akipah tauve.
Chuin Jesun aseiyin, “Pathen Lenggam chu itobang ham? Iti katekah ding ham?
Ankam mu neocha tobang mikhat in hon'a atu tobang ahi; ahung khangin chule thingphung ahung kisoh e, chule vachaten abah tin'ah genading bu akisah jiuve,” ati.
Aman adong kit in, “Pathen Lenggam chu ipi toh kitekah ding ham?
Nupi khat in changlhah asemna a amanchah chol tobang ahi. Changbong atena dimthum'a chol neocha akoi ahivangin, apumpin ahin thulha jin ahi,” ati.
Jesu khopi hole khoneo tin'ah achen, achena chan'ah thu ahil'in, Jerusalem lam amano jinge.
Koiham khat in ahin dongin, “Pakai, mi themkhat bou huhhing'a um ding ham?” ati. Aman adonbut in,
“Pathen Lenggam lutna a kotjim lam'a lutna dingin kihabol un, ajeh chu mi tamtah'in lutding agotding ahivanga losam diu ahi.
In neipan kot akam jou teng, geisang val ding ahitai. Nangma pamlam'a nadin'a kot nakiu ding chule natao ding, ‘Pakai, keiho dingin kot neihon peh un!’ nati ding, ahivanga aman nahin donbut diu, ‘Keiman nangho koi nahiu ahiloule hoiya kon nahiu kahekhapoi’ ati ding ahi.
Chuteng nanghon naseidiu, ‘Ahivanga nangma toh kaneh uva kadon uva, chule kalampiu lah dunga jong neinahil u chula’ natidiu ahi.
Chule aman hitia hi ahin donbut ding, ‘Kaseipeh nahiuve, keiman nangho kahekhapoi chule hoiya kona hung nahiu kahepoi. Kakoma konin potdoh'un, nangho thilse bolteho.’
Chumun'a chu ka le hagel um ding ahi, ijeh inem itile Pathen lenggam a chu Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, chule themgao jouse namudiu ahi, amavang nangma nakipaidoh ding ahi.
Chule miho vannoi pumpi–solam le lhumlam a pat, sah le lhang a pat–Pathen lenggam'a amun'u kilo dinga hung khom diu ahi.
Chule hiche hi kichin in: mi phabep tua mi-noinung pen dan'a umhohi khonung leh alenpen hidiu ahi, chule tua alenpen hohi aneopen hidiu ahi,” ati.
Hiche pet chun Pharisee ho phabep khat in ajah'a, “Hikoma konin potdoh'in nakihinso nom leh! Herod in nathatdoh nom'e!” atiuve.
Jesun adonbut in, “Cheuvin lang chuche si-al chu gaseipeh un, thilha kanodoh jing ding chule ana damlou kasuhdam jing ding, tunia jong jinga jong; chule anithum nile kahung lona kasuh bulhit ding ahi.
Henge, tuni le jing, chule ajing kit le kalampia chu kachejom ding ahi. Ajeh chu Jerusalem tailouva themgao kithat theilou ding ahi.”
“O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, themgaoho that le Pathen sottolle ho songa seplih khopi! Ijat vei ahpin anoute alhaving noiya a-opkhum banga nachate khoptup ding kagot ham, ahivangin neibolsah poi.
Chuleh tun, ven, na-in hi kidalha ahitai. Chuleh nangman neimu kitlou ding ahitai, ‘Pakai min'a hungpa anunnom'e!’ tia naseikit tokah'a,” ati.
Cholngahni khat Jesu nilhah an nedin Pharisee ho lamkai khat in'ah achen, chule miho chun phatah in avelhiuvin ahi.
Hiche a chun mikhat, aban le akengho pom khat aumin ahi.
Jesun Pharisee hole danthu themho chu adongin, “Cholngah nikhoa misuhdam danthun aphal hai aphallou ham?” ati.
Amahon adonbut nom lou phat un, Jesun anapa chu atham'in chule asudam'in asolmang tai.
Chuin amaho lam ngan aseitai, “Nangho cholngah nia natonglou koi naum uvam? Nachapa ham ahiloule na bongchal hamkhat kokhuh a alhahlut le, aladoh dinga nakino ji hih um?” ati.
Avel'in adonbut thei kit tapouve.
Nilhah anne a hung jouse chun touna nom nom jabolna mun achu cheh'u Jesun amu phat in, aman amaho chu hiche thumop hi apen ahi.
“Moupui golvah na'a kouna namu teng uleh, jabolna munhoa tou hih un. Ijem tin nang sanga jabolna chang ding khat ana kikou khataleh ipi tin tem?”
Kinneipa chun ahung seiding, “Natouna chu hiche mipa hi pen” atiding ahi. Chuteng nangma najah cha ding ahi, chutengleh dokhang noiya kikoi touna hoa chu natou ding ahitai!
“Chusang chun dokhang kengbul mun nemnung pen'a chun touvin. Chuteng kinneipan nahin muding nahenga hunga, ‘Jol, nang dingin mun phajep kaneiyuve!’ ahung tiding ahi. Chuteng nangma chu jin kikou dang ho masanga jana nachan ding ahi.
Ijeh inem itile ama kichoisang chan chu suhnem'a umdiu ahi, chule akineosah chan chu dopsang'a umdiu ahi” ati.
Chuin in-neipa chu aven, hitin aseiye “Nangman nehkhom ahilouleh golvah nabol teng, naloi nagol ho, nasopiho, na inkote, chule naheng nakom mihao ho kou hih'in. Ajeh chu amahon nangma nahin koukit diu ahin, hiche bou chu natohga hiding ahitai.
Chusang chun mivaichaho, chatmo ho, elbai ho, chule mitcho ho kou jon.
Chuteng michonpha thokitna'a Pathen in nanungsah joulou ding ho nakou jeh a nangma tohphatman napeh ding ahi,” ati.
Hiche thu ajah hin mikhat dokhanga Jesu toh toukhom khat in, “Pathen Lenggam'a golvah ankonga galhah ding iti anop tadem!” tin ahin phongdoh e.
Jesun adonbut nan hiche thusim hi aseipeh e: Mikhat hin golvah lentah abol in kouna lekha jong tamtah athot doh tai.
Golvah anneh khom chu gontup ahiphat in, asohte asol'in, akikou ho jah'a, “Hungun golvah ankong gontup ahitai” agatisah'e.
Ahivangin amahon abon'un ahitheilou nau thu aseiyun ahi. Khat in, “Tutah chun loumun kachon kavettoh lou akhoh'e, lungsettah in nei ngaidam in” ati.
Khat kit chun, Keiman tutah chun bongchal to-nga kahin chon, hithei nam ti kavet got ahi, lungset'in nei ngaidam un, ati.
Achom khat in, tun ji kaneiyin, hijeh chun hung thei ponge, ati.
“Sohpa chu akilen apakai pa kom ah ipi iti adonbut'u aseipeh tai. Apakai pachu alung hang in hitin ahinsei tai, ‘Kintah'in chenlang, khopi sung lamlen tin'ah mivaicha ho, chatmo ho, mitcho ho, chule elbai ho gakou tan’ ati.
Asohpan hichu aboljou phat in, ahung hetsah in, ‘Mun a-ong nalaiye’ ahung ti.
Hijeh chun apakai pan aseiyin, ‘Chedoh in lang lamlen pam lah dung chule aning kah lah'a um koi hijong leh, namu mu hinkouvin, ka-in mi adim nadingin’ ati.
Ajeh chu kakou masat ho chun golvah an chu aneokhat jong atekhah lou diu ahitai,” ati.
Mihonpi tamtah chun Jesu nung ajuiyu ahin, ama akihei kol'in ajah'uva aseitai,
“Nangho kaseijui nahi nom uleh, mijouse nahot ngai ahi, tekah na'a–Nanu napa, naji nachate, nasopi ho–henge, nangma hinkho tah jong chu. Achuti loule kaseijui nahithei lou dingu ahi.”
Chule na thingpel nakipoh'a kanung najui lou leh, kaseijui nahithei lou diu ahi.
Ahivangin kipan hih'un athoh hah ding dan nasimtoh masang'un. Ijeh inem itile, kon insah apat ding ham amasa'a alutding jat vetoh'a, ajona dinga sum ninglhing ding hinam ti simtoh masalouva?
Achuti loule akhombul bou najoa sum nabei maithei ahi, chuteng chuleh mijousen nanuisat bepding ahitai.
Amahon seiyunte, “Hiche pa khu ahi, insah kipan'a aban ajona ding boldoh joulou pa khu” tiuvinte.
“Ahilouleh, Leng khat galbol ding, koi athumop them hotoh toukhom'a, asepai sang som chun ama nokhum dinga hung kon sang som ni chu ajoding hinam ti kigel masalou ding'ah?
Chuleh ajolou ding leh, palai sol'in tin, agalmi ho gamlat pet'a chu kihoucham ding agot tei ding ahi.
Hijeh a chu nanei jouse napehdoh tokah a kaseijui nahithei lou diu ahi.
“Chi hi asu-al dingin aphai. Ahin, a-al na chu mansah taleh, iti na-alsah kit ding ham?”
A-al lou chi chu leiset a dinga jong chule leithao a dinga jong phachom lou ahi. Paidoh in aumji tai. Koi hileh nakol neichan in ngai hen chule hetthem hen.
Kaidong hole adang michonse ho Jesu thuhil ngai dingin ahung jiuvin ahi.
Hiche hin Pharisee hole hou danthu hil ho aphunchel sah tan, michonse hotoh akipol'in nejong anekhom uve! tin aseitauve.
Hijeh chun Jesun hiche thusim hi aseipeh in ahi:
“Mikhat in kelngoi jakhat neihen chule alah'a khat chu vahmang taleh, ipi bol tantem? Adang somko le ko ho chu gamthip a adalhah'a chule avahmang pachu amu tokah'a agahol lou ding ham?
Chuteng ahinmu tengleh, kipah tah in a'in lam'a din alengkouvah hin kipoh tante.
Ahung vailhun tengleh amapan aloi agol chule aheng akom koukhom in tin, ‘Nei kipa khom piuvin ajeh chu keiman ka kelngoi mangna chu kakimutai’ tinte.
Chutobang a chu michonse khat in lunghei na aneiya Pathen lama akile kit chun adang somko le ko lunghei ngailou michonpha ho chung sangin van'ah kipana aume. Sum-Pum Kimansah
Ahilouleh, tekah nan, numei khat hin sum dangka som aneiyin chule khat amansah tai. Amanun meivah adet'a insung pumpi atheh'a chule chingthei tah'a amu tokah'a ahol lou ding ham?
Chule amanun hichu amuteng, aloi apai chule aheng akom cheng akoukhom ding, ‘Nei kipapiuvin, ajeh chu kasum mang kakinungmu tai’ atiding ahi.
Chutobang chun van'ah Pathen Vantilte pan na'in, michonse khatseh lunghei na chungah kipana aum'e” ati.
Athusei hilchet be theina din hiche thusim hi aseiyin ahi: “Mikhat in chapa ni aneiye.
Aneojo pan apa jah'a, ‘Nathi masangin nanei nagou kachan ding ho tun kadei tai’ ati. Hijeh chun apan achateni chu anei agou ho hoppeh dingin anomtai.
Niphabep jouvin hiche chapa neojo pa chun anei jouse akisemtup in mun gamlatah a dingin achetai, chule hia chun asum le pai jouse hindan kinomsah nan asumang tai.
Chutia asum akiman chai phat chun, gamsunga chun kel nasatah alhan, kel athoh pan tai.
Chumun'a loulhoumi khat in natoh apeh na dingin akithujon, amapan jong aloumun langah vohchate vah dingin asol'in ahi.”
Khangdong pachu agilkel lheh tan, vohchate anehsah ji voh-an jeng jong chu twilheh dingin amitmun akilang tan ahi. Ahivangin koiman nehding ape tapon ahi.
“Achainakeiya ahung khahdoh phat chun, ama le ama akihoulim in, Ka-in ah soh thalah ho jengin jong anehval set'u anneh aneiyun, kei hiche'ah gilkel'a thidingin kaume! ati.
Ka-in a kache ding kapa koma, ‘Hepa, van le nangma dounan kachonse tai,
chule keima nacha tiding hoi kahitapoi. Lungset tah in soh thalah khat bangin nei sangin, tinge’ atitai.”
Chuin ama apa koma dingin inlam akile tai. Chule amapa mun gamlatah ahung gei nalaiyin, apan ahung amutan ahi. Ngailutna le khotona dimset pum'in achapa komah alhaiyin, akolchuh chuh in, achoptai.
Achapan ahin seitai, “Hepa, keima van le nangma dounan kachonse tai, chule tun nacha tiding jong kalhing jou tapoi,” ati.
Ahinlah apan asohte komah aseitai, Gang'un! Insunga ponsil hoipen pen hinchoiyun lang silpeh un. Akhutjung'a akibu ding khutjem le akise ding kengchot hinchoiyun.
Chule bongnou ivahthao uchu that un. Eihon golvah loupi tah a ilop diu ahi,
ajehchu hiche kachapa hi athi anahitan, tua hi hung hingdoh kit ahi. Amangsa anahin, tua hi kimukit ahitai. Hiti chun golnop chu akipan tai.
Chutia aumlai chun, chapa a'upajo pachu loulanga um natong ahi. Inlam ahung kile chun, in'a chun tumging le lam gin ajatan,
chuin asohte khat komah ipi thilsoh umham ti adongin ahi.
Nasopipa hung kile ahi, tin aseipeh un, chuleh napan bongnou thaotah chu athapeh ahi. Damsel'a ahunglhun jeh'a ilop'u ahi, tin aseipeh tai.
A'upajo pachu alung hangin insung alut tapon ahi. Apa ahungdoh in ahung tem'e,
ahin aman adonbut in, Kum hijat hi nasoh banga kaum chule bol'in nati jouse kada na umkhalou ahi. Chuleh hiche phat jouse achun nangman kaloi kagol hotoh kaneh khom diuvin kelcha nou khatbeh neinape khapoi.
Ahivangin hiche nachapan noti ho chunga nasum jouse aveichai nungin, nangman bongnou thaotah nathapeh in nalop peh e, ati.
Apan ajah'a aseiyin, “Ven, kachapa ngaitah, nangma kakomah naum jinge, chuleh kanei jouse jong hi nanga ahi.
Eihon hiche kipa nikho hi ilop diu ahi. Ijeh inem itile nasopipa hi athi'ah ahitan chule hung hingdoh kit ahi! Amangsa anahin, hinlah tun akimutai!” ati.
Jesun hiche thusim hi aseijuite aseipeh e: “Mihaotah khat ana um'in, aman neiching khat ima ma vesuiya anganse aneiye, ahin aneichin na ah akitah poi ti thulamleng ahunge.
Hijeh chun apansah pan ama chu akouvin aseitai, ‘Ipi ham nathu kajah hi? Na neichin ho sutup in lang neihin pen ajeh chu nachungthu kisei ding ahitai’” ati.
Neichingpa akingaiton, “Tua ipi kabol ding?” tin akihoulim'in, “Kapakai pan la eihaisah ahitan, lei lai dingla katha ahatpon, chule thum ding la hibanga kikiletsah'a,
aphai, eihaisah tengleh loi le pai tampi kaneiya amahon a-in'a eilhunsah nadiuvin hitin bol inge” ati.
Hijeh chun apansah pa sumba jouse chu ahungkhom uva athu seitoh ahina din akoukhom sohtai. Amasapa jah'a, “Ijat nabat ham?” atileh,
mipa chun adonbut in, “Keiman olive thao twipai dim jaget kabai” ati. Chuin neichingpan aseipeh in, “Aman kijihna lekha hi kilah loiyin lang twipai jali jih in” ati.
Ahileh nangin ijat nabat em? tin anina pa adonge. Keiman suhlou chang lhuh sangkhat kabai, tin ahin donbut'e. Neiching pan aseiyin, hin, lekha hi kilah in lang lhuh jaget in jih in, ati.
Mihao pa chun chuche chondih lou neichingpan chingthei tah a abol chu apahcha tan ahi. Adih ahi, hiche vannoi chaten avel uva ho toh kipol ding dan hi khovah chate sangin achingjouve.
Kijildoh ding chu hiche ahi: Vannoiya nagouthil ho se hi midang phatchomna le jol le gol kisem nan mangin. Chuteng, nalei gouthil ho jouse abeisoh teng cheho chun tonsot in'a dinga nanalem diu ahi.
Nangho thil neocha chunga nakitah ule, thil lentah ho chunga jong nakitah diu ahi. Amavang thil neocha chunga nakitahlou ule, mopohna lentah ho chunga jong kitahlou ding nahiuve.
Chuleh leiset gouthil chunga tahsan naum louleh, kon vangou dihtah chunga natahsan dingu ham?
Chuleh midang thil chunga nakitah louleh ipi jeh a nangma thil chunga nakitahsan ding ham?
“Koiman pakai ni sohna atongkop theipoi. Ajeh chu nangman khat namuda a khat nangailut tum ding ahi; khat dinga nakiphal theng'a khat nadonda thei ahi. Nanghon Pathen le sum sohna tongkhom thei pouvin nate,” ati.
Pharisee ho, sum ngailu dehset hon, ajasoh keiyun ama chu anelpeh un ahi.
Chuin aman amaho jah'a aseitai, “Jalah'a miho mitmu'a michonpha nahinom, ahin Pathen in nalungthim ahei.” Hiche vannoi miten ajabol chu Pathen mitmua thet umtah ahi.
Twilutsah John phatlai chan'a chu, Mose dan le themgao ho thuhil chu nakai hoi leuva pang anahi. Ahin, tun Pathen Lenggam Kipana thupha chu seiphongin aumtan, chule mijouse lutding athanom in ahi.
Ahivangin danthu chu apanna umtalou tina ahipoi. Van le lei amanthah ding hi Pathen danthu neopen khat kilekhup ding sanga gamchenga baijo ahi.
“Vetsahnan, mikhat chun ajinu ada'a midang khat akichenpi le ajong'ah ahi. Chuleh koihileh ajipan ahindasa numei kichenpi jong chu ajong'ah ahi” ati.
Jesun aseiye, “Mihaotah khat, ponsandup le tupet ponnem kisil'a loupitah'a kivon le niseh a nomsatah'a umkhat anaum in ahi.
Akelkot phunga chun Lazarus kiti tiphah natna dimset, mivaicha khat aum jin ahi.
Chutia Lazarus jong mihaopa dokhanga an lhajah ho ducha'a aumlaiyin, uicha ho ahung jiuvin atiphah namun ho chu ahung leh jiuve.
Achainan, mivaichapa chu athitan chule Vantilte Abraham koma um ding'in apotauve. Mihaopa jong athin avui tauve,
chule alhagao chu mithi ho lah'a achetai. Chua athoh gentheina mun achun, Abraham gamlatah a aum chule Lazarus akoma atou chu amun ahi.
Mihaopa chu ahung pengjah'in, ‘Hepa Abraham, themkhat neilungset in! Lazarus hinsol in lang akhutjung twiyah hin delut henlang kalei hung sudap hen. Keima hiche meikong lah a hin kahesoh lheh jeng'e,’” ati.
Ahin Abraham'in amapa jah'a aseiyin, chapa, geldoh in, nangman nahinlai sungin nadei jouse naneisoh keiyin chule Lazarus in ima ananeipoi. Hijeh a chu tua hi ama hikom mun'a nomtah'a kiumsah a nangman hesoh nathoh ahitai.
Chule chuche tilouvin jong, ikikah uva hin eikhen uvah onghom lentah aume. Koiman hikom mun'a pat'a apal galkai thei lou, chule chua pat'a jong keiho kom lang koiman apal galkal thei lou ahi, ati.
Chuin mihaopan asei kit in, Lungset tah in, Hepa Abraham, kapa in beh'a gasol in.
Ajeh chu keiman sopi pasal nga kaneiye, chule amachun hikom thoh gentheina muna ahung lou nadiuva aga gihsal ding kadeiye, ati.
“Ahin Abraham'in aseipeh in, ‘Mose le Themgaohon agihsal nauve. Nasopi hon chua ipi asut'u hin kisimdoh nauvinte,’ atipeh e.
Mihaopan adonbut kit'in, ‘Ahipoi, Hepa Abraham! Koiham khat athilah'a kona akisol le, achonset nauva kona lungheina aneidiu chule Pathen lam'a kihei diu ahi,’ ati.
Ahivangin Abraham'in aseikit in, ‘Amahon Mose le Themgaoho thu angailou uleh, athilah'a konin khat thoudoh jongleh ngaideh pouvinte,’” ati.
Nikhat Jesun aseijuite jah'a aseiye, “Chonset na dia lhepna hi aumjing ding mong ahi, hinlah itobang lungkhamnan anga hitam alhem'a pang mi chu!”
“Na-ngongchanga sumhei song naki-o a twikhanglen'a nakilelut chu hiche aneocha ho nakipal lhuhsah sanga phachomjo ding ahi.
Hijeh chun chingtheiyun! Tahsan cha adang khat achonset leh, amachu sosal'in; chutia alung ahei le ngaidam in.
Hiche mipa chun ihamtia nikhat'a sagi vei nachunga thildihlou abol'a, abol phat jousea jong ngaidam athum leh ngaidam in” ati.
Seijuiten Pakai jah'a aseiyun, “Tahsan na kangaichat be uve, iti kanei diu ham neisei peh un” atiuve.
Pakai in adonbut in, “Nanghon tahsanna ankammu te cha hijongleh naneiyuleh, hiche thing theimi phung koma hi, ‘Kibotdoh in lang twikhanglen'ah kilehlut in’ tijongleu chun nathu'u angai ding ahi! Sohpa Natoh Ding
Soh khat chu aloukai na ham ahiloule akelngoi chinna ham'a pat'a ahung lut teng, apakai pan, ‘Hunglut in an nekhom hite’ tin tem?
Tiponte! Hitijoh hin seiyinte, ‘Ka anneh ding nei gonpeh in, natai kigeh in lang, kaneh sungsen neijen in. chuteng ajoujep le nenan nate’ atiding ahi.
Chuleh apakai pan asohpa chu atoh dinga lom atoh jeh a apachat em? Apahcha deh poi.
Chutobang a chu nanghon kathua nanun teng uleh hitia hi nasei diu, ‘Keiho soh lhingjoulou kanatoh diuva lom bou tong kahiuve’ nati diu ahi,” ati.
Jesu Jerusalem lam jon'a achejom jing laiyin, Galilee le Samaria kigamgit na mun alhung tai.
Chutia khokhat agalut laiyin, chua chun miphah som gamla thimtah in adingun,
ahung eodoh un, “Jesu, Pipu, nei khoto un!” atiuve.
Aman amaho chu aven, “Cheuvin lang thempuho gakimusah tauvin,” atipeh tai. Chutia acheuleh, aphah natnau chu suhtheng in aumtai.
Alah uva khat chun suhdam a aumchu akimu phat in, Jesu hengah ahung kilen, “Pathen Vahchoiyin umhen!” tin apengjah tai.
Ama Jesu kengbul'ah abohkhup in, athil bolpeh na chungah kipathu aseiyin ahi. Hiche mipa chu Samaria mi ahi.
Jesun adongin, “Mi som kasuhdam hilou ham? Adang mi ko ho la?
Koiman Pathen loupina peh ding ageldoh lou hitam hiche gamdang mipa tailou?” atin ahi.
Chule Jesun hichepa koma chun aseiyin, “Dingdoh in lang che tan, natahsan in nasuhdam ahitai,” ati. Pathen Lenggam
Nikhat Pharisee hon Jesu adongun, “Pathen Lenggam itih le hung lhung ding ham?” atiuve. Jesun adonbut in, “Pathen Lenggam chu muthei melchihna ah akihedoh thei poi.
Nanghon, ‘Hikom'ah aum'e’ ahiloule ‘hichea khun aume’ tin seithei pouvin nate, ajeh chu Pathen Lenggam chu nalah'uva aumtai” ati.
Chuin aseijuite hengah hitin aseiye, “Phat ahung lhunge Mihem Chapa ahung kile na ding nikho mu nom'a naum diu, ahivanga namu lou diu ahi.”
Mihon ahinsei diu, “Veuvin Mihem Chapa khukom'ah aume” ahilouleh hivah aume, atidiu ahi, ahivangin potdoh hih un, chule jui hih'un.
Ijeh inem itile kolphe ahung phet'a van mong langkhat'a pat mong langkhat gei asalvah soh banga Mihem Chapa hung ni jong chutobang hiding ahi.
Ahin amasa'a Mihem Chapa hin thoh hahsa tampi athoh a hiche khang miten apampai diu ahi.
Mihem Chapa ahung kile teng leh, Noah nikholai toh bang ding ahi.
Chuche nikholai chun mihon golvah neh le don chule kichen abol'un, Noah kongsunga alut'a chule tuisang ahunglet'a abonchauva asuhmang nikho geiyin nomsatah in hinkho amangun ahi.
Chule vannoi leiset jong Lot nikho lai toh bang ding ahi. Miho nitin akimanchah nauvah akisaboi un–neh le don, choh le joh, loulho le insah,
Lot in Sodom khopi adalhah ni jingkah chan in abol'un ahi. Chuin van'a konin mei le kath ahung julhan abonchauvin asumang soh tan ahi.
Henge, angaima banga kiseimona Mihem Chapa ahung kile kit ni geiya umding ahi.
Chuche nikho chuleh indan chunga um chun insunga athil kisemtup din lutkit da hen. Mi louva kondoh jong inlam a kile da hen.
Lot inneipi chunga ipi anasoh em geldoh un!
Nahinkho tuhchah jing nagot le namansah ding, chule nahinkho nachesah le, nahuhhing joh ding ahi.
Chuche jan leh mini jalkhun khat'a lumkhom ding; khat kila ding, khatpa kidalha ding.
Nupi nin sumhei khat'a chang agoikhom lhon ding, khat kila ding khat kidalha ding,
lou mun'a um teni jong khat kida lha'a khat kila ding ahi, ati.
“Pakai, hitiho hi itih leh soh ding ham?” tin aseijuiten adongun ahi. Jesun adonbut in, “Muthong ho kititna achun mithi long naivel ah aume ti aphotchet banga hiche melchihna ho jong chun akichaina anaitai ti avetsah ahi,” ati.
Nikhat Jesun aseijuite ataojing nadiu leh alhahdai lou nadiu vetsahnan thusim khat aseipeh e.
“Khopi khat a hin thutan khat Pathen ginglou chule miho khohsah na jong neilou khat aumin ahi.
Chuche khopia meithai khat chu kinong chel'in ahung jingin, ‘Kagalmi hotoh kakiboinau hi thu adih in neitan peh'in,’ ahung tijin ahi.
Thutan pan phat chomkhat amanu chu isahlou tah in anakoiyin, ahin achainakeiyin hitin akihoulim in, Keiman Pathen kaging pon ahiloule miho jong hole tilou kahi,
ahivangin hiche numei nu hin eisungol lhatai. Keiman thu adih'a tanlhah peh ahinadin vetpeh inge. Ajeh chu amanu hin athilthum jinga kon hin ei sulungvai lhatai,” ati.
Chuin Pakaiyin aseiyin, “Hiche chondihlou thutanpa a konin kihil un.”
“Ama jengin jong achaina a thu adih'a tandia ahin gellhah ahi. Hijeh a chu Pathen in alhenchom te, ama koma asun ajan'a kapjing techu thu adih'a atanpeh ding ahi ti nagel lou u ham? Amaho chu donlouvin koijing in te natim?
Kaseipeh nahiuve, aman kinloitah a thu adih'a atanpeh ding ahi! Ahinlah Mihem Chapa hung kit teng, leiset chunga hin mi ijat tahsan nei mudoh intem?” ati.
Chuin Jesun hiche thusim hi mi konkhat ama chonphatna a kisonga midang musit ho dingin aseiye:
“Mi ni houin ah taona mangin ache lhon'e. Khat chu Pharisee mi ahin, chule adang khatpa chu musit umtah kaidong ahi.
Pharisee mipa chu adingin hitin ataove: ‘Kakipah'e Pathen, adangho banga chonse kahilou jeh in. Ajeh chu lepthol in kabol pon, kachonse pon, chule jonthanhoi jong kabolpoi. Keima atahbeh in khuche kaidongpa tobang kahipoi!
Keiman hapta khat in nivei an kangol'in, kasum mu jat a konin soma khat kapei,’ ati.
Ahivangin kaidong pachu gamlatah a adingin chule amit jeng'a jong vanlam ve ngamlouvin ataove. Chusang chun lungkham tah in aman a-op achum'in hitin aseiye, ‘O’ Pathen, neilungset in, ijeh inem itile chonse kahibouve, ati.
Kaseipeh nahiuve, Pharisee pa hilou, hiche chonsepa chu Pathen ang-ah them achangin inlam akiletai. Ijeh inem itile ama kichoisang hochu suhnem'a umding, chule akineosah hochu dopsang'a umdiu ahi,” ati.
Nikhat nule pa phabep in achateu chapang neocha chaho chu Jesun atham'a phatthei aboh dingin ahin puiyun ahi. Ahivangin aseijuiten hichu amuphat un, anule apateu koma chun ama nasuboi bep uve tin ahouse uvin ahi.
Chuin Jesun chapang ho chu akouvin chule aseijuite hengah aseitai, “Chapang ho chu kahengah hung uhen. Jahda hih'un! Ajeh chu Pathen Lenggam chu hiche chapang neocha tobanghoa ding bou ahi.
Thutah kaseipeh nahiuve, koi hileh chapang neocha banga Pathen Lenggam sanglou chu lutlou hel ding ahi,” ati.
Khatvei hou lamkai khat hin hiche thudoh hi adonge: “Houhil pha, tonsot hinna kanei thei na dinga ipi kabol ding ham?” ati.
“Ipi bol'a apha tia nei kou ham” tin aledoh in, Pathen bouseh dihtah'a pha ahi.
Ahin nathudoh donbut nan, thupeh ho nahet chula: “Nangman jon bol hih'in, tolthat hih'in, gucha hih'in, jouvin mi hehse hih in, nanu napa jabol in,” ati.
Mipan adonbut in, “Hiche thupeh ho jouse hi kachapan laiya pat kajui sohkei ahitai,” ati.
Jesun adonbutna thu ajah phat chun, hitin aseitai, “Nabol loulai thilkhat aume. Nanei jouse joh in lang hiche sum chu mivaicha ho pen, chutileh van'a gou nanei ding ahi. Chuteng hungin, neijuiyin,” ati.
Ahivangin mipa chun hichu ajahdoh phat in alung kham lheh tan ahi, ijeh inem itile amachu haosatah ahi.
Jesun hichu amuphat in, aseitai, “Mihaosa Pathen Lenggam alut ding hi iti hah hitam!”
“Atahbeh in, heobil hom'a sangongsao alut galkai ding hi mihaosa Pathen Lenggam a alut ding sangin abaijoi,” ati.
Hiche akisei jajouse chun aseiyun, “Achutileh vannoi leiset'a koiham huhhing na chang jou ding?” atiuve.
Aman adonbut in, “Mihem dinga hithei lou chu Pathen dinga hithei ahi,” ati.
Peter in aseiyin, “Keihon nangma jui dingin ka-in'u kadalhauve,” ati.
Jesun adonbut in, “Henge” chuleh ka lhamon nahiuve, “Koihileh Pathen Lenggam jal'a a'in ham, ajinu ham, asopiho ham, ahiloule anu apa ham achate ham pedoh chan chu,
tamtahvei tuhinkhoa hi lepeh'a umdiu chule ahunglhung ding khang'a jong tonsot hinkemlou amuding'u ahi,” ati.
Seijui somleni ho atumbeh'in apuidoh in, Jesun ajah uva aseiye, “Ngaiyun, eiho Jerusalem chetou ding ihiuve, Mihem Chapa chungchang thudol'a themgao thusei jouse guilhun na ding mun chu ahi.
Amachu Rome te khut'a pehdoh'a umding ahi, chule amachu tot thanghoi'a umding, jachat umtah'a kibol ding, chil kisetkhum ding ahi.
Amahon avoh'uva chule athadiu ahi, ahivanga anithum nileh thoukit ding ahi,” ati.
Ahin, amahon hitiho thuhi khatcha ahethei pouve. Athusei ho athupije chu amaho a kona ki im mang ahi, hijeh a chu athusei chu amattoh thei lou u ahitai.
Jesun Jericho anaisuh lai hin, mitcho khutdo khat lamsih'ah ana touve.
Aman mihonpi kijot khuto gin ajah phat in, ipi thu hitam ti adongin ahi.
Nazereth Jesun hikom chu ahopa ahi ti aseipeh tauve.
Hijeh chun amapa ahung eojah tan, “Jesu, David chapa, neilungset in!” ahintin ahi.
“Thip'in” tin masang langa miho chun ahutot tauvin ahi. Ahivangin ama awgingjep in ahapen cheh tan, “David Chapa, neilungset in!” ati.
Jesun ajahdoh phat in, adingin mipa chu ahinpui lut diuvin athupeh tai. Mipa ahung nai toh lhonin Jesun adongin,
“Ipi nabolpeh leng natim?” tin adong tai. Aman, “Pakai, kho muleng kati!” ati.
Chuin Jesun aseiyin, “Aphai, kho mutan! Natahsan in nadamsah ahitai,” ati.
Apettah chun mipa chun kho amutai chuleh amapan Jesu nung ajuiyin Pathen avahchoi tai. Chuleh amujousen jong Pathen avahchoi cheh tauve.
Jesu Jericho alut'in, chule akhopi sung chu ajot in ahi.
Mi khat amin Zacchaeus kiti chua chun aume. Ama chu hiche lhang'a dinga kaidong pipu ahin, ahaova haosa ahitai.
Aman Jesu chu mutei ding agon, hinlah ama anem behseh jeh chun mihonpi lah'a chun amutheipoi.
Hijeh chun ana malhaijel'in lampi panga theiba phung khat'ah anakal'e, ajeh chu Jesun hiche lampi chu aho ding ahi.
Jesu ahung phat chun, Zacchaeus chu avetouvin chule amin in akouvin, “Zacchaeus! gang'in, hungkum'in! tunia na in'a maljin kahi ding ahi,” ahinti.
Zacchaeus jong kinloitah in ahung kumlhan, Jesu chu a'in ah kipah le thanom tah'in apuilut tai.
Ahivangin miho chu alungphamo uvin, “Michonse chungnung in'ah agalhung taget e,” tin aphunchel tauve.
Chuphat chun, Zacchaeus jong Pakai angsungah adingdoh in aseitai, “Pakai, kanei kagou akehkhat mivaicha ho peing'e, chule kai kadon na'a miho lepthol'a kabol aumleh, amaho chu ajatlin nungpeh inge!” ati.
Jesun adonbut in, “Tunin hiche in'ah huhhingna alhung tai, ajeh chu hiche mipa hin Abraham chapa dihtah ahi akimusah tai.
Ijeh inem itile Mihem Chapa chu amangsa holdoh le huhhing dinga hung'ah ahi,” ati.
Mihonpi chun Jesu thusei jouse chu angailha sohkeiyun ahi. Chule ama Jerusalem anaitoh kilhonin, aman thusim khat, Pathen Lenggam chu kipan pai dinga angaito'u suhdih nadin aseiye.
Aman hitin aseiye, “Lengchapate khat mun gamlatah a leng gachanga hung kile kit dingin koudoh in aumin ahi.
Achedoh masangin asohte lah'a mi som akoukhom in dangka mina som apen, ‘kachedoh sungin hiche hi nei veikan peh'un’ ati.
Ahivangin amiten avetnom pouvin, achedoh nungin palai asol'un, ‘Ama hi kalengpau dingin kadei pouve’ tin agasei sah uve.
Leng ahung chan jouvin, ahung kilen chule asohte sum apeh sese chu akoukhom tai. Aman aveikan jat'u chu ahetnom ahi.
Soh masapan thu ahinlhut in, ‘Pipu, keiman nasum kaveikan in, neipeh chu ajat som in apunge!’ ati.
Lengpan adonbut in, ‘Nabol pha'e!’ ati. ‘Nangma sohpha nahi. Nangma themcha kapeh chunga kitah nahi, hijeh a chu natohphat kipaman'a khopi som chunga gamvaipo nahi ding ahi,’ atipeh e.
Soh anina pan thu ahinlhut kit in, ‘Pipu, nasum kaveikan in neipeh chu ajat ngan kapunsah be'e’ ati.
‘Nabol aphai!’ tin lengpan adonbut in, ‘Nangma khopi nga chunga vaipo nahi ding ahi’ ati.
Ahivangin soh athumna pan sum amu mama chu ahinchoiyin aseitai, ‘Pipu, keiman nasum chu kasel'in kana koitup peh e.
Kakichat nahi ajeh chu nangma mikhel nahin, nanga hilou jong nakilah in, natu lou jong aga nakichomkhom ji'e.’ ati.
‘Nangma soh gilou!’ tin lengpa ahung eojah in, ‘Nathun themmo nachan ahi. Nangman mikikhel kahi nahet a, keiya hilou kakilah theiya, katulou jong ka-at thei leh,
ipi dinga sumkoina in'a kasum chu nanakoi louham? Ken athoi themkhat beh kikimu tadinga,’ ati.
Chuin akom avel'a ding ho hengah akiheiyin, hitin thupeh aneitai, ‘Hiche sohpa a kon chun sum chu lahpeh unlang mina som neipa chu petauvin’ ati.
‘Ahin, pipu, aman som aneitai!’ tin ahinsei yuve.
Lengpan adonbut in, ahinai, akipe mangthem hochu, kipeh be ding. Amavang imacha bollou ho koma pat, anei sun'u themcha jong chu kilahmang peh ding ahiuve.
Chuleh hiche kagalmi ho, lenga kapan ding deilou ho chu–hin puilut unlang ka-angsung tah a hin thatdoh tauvin,” ati.
Hiche thusim aseijouvin, Jesu Jerusalem lam jon'in, aseijuite sangin anamasan ahi.
Ama Bethphage le Bethany khopiho Olive molchung lang ahung gei phat in, aseijui mini asol masan,
“Hiche kho a khun galut lhonin lang” tin aseipeh in, “Nalut lhon tengleh, sangan nou kihen koiman atouna nailou namu lhon ding ahi. Hin sutlha lhon in lang hilang'ah hinkai lhon in.
Khattouvin ahindoh'a, ‘Ipibol'a hiche sangan nou chu nasut lhah lhon ham’ atileh, hitin seilhon'in, ‘Pakaiyin aman nom'e’ tilhon'in” ati.
Chutichun amani jong achelhon in, Jesu sei bangin sangan nou chu agamu lhon tai.
Chule atahbah'in, asutlhon laiyin aneipan ahin adong lhon in, “Ipi bol'a hiche sangan nou chu nasutlhon ham?” ahin ti.
Chule seijuite ni chun bailam tah in adonbut lhon in, “Pakaiyin aman nom'e” atilhone.
Hiti chun sangan nou chu Jesu hengah ahin kaiyun chule aponsil hou chu achungah atouna dingin aphapeh un ahi.
Chutia ahung tou phei laiyin, mipihon lampi ah aponsil hou anaphauvin ahi.
Olive mol'a pat a lampi chesuh kipatna aphah chun, anungjui jousen kholhang asam un, ache toh lasah akop un, Pathen in thil kidang abolho amujal un avahchoiyuve.
“Pakai min'a hung'ah lengpa chu anunnom e! Van ah cham leng hen, chule van sangpena jong loupi hen!” atiuve.
Ahivangin mihonpi lah'a Pharisee ho phabep khatchun aseiyun, “Houhil, nanungjui hon hitobang thuho aseiyu khu phohthip'in!” atiuve.
Aman adonbut in, “Amaho athipbeh uleh, lampam'a songho kipah'a hung eodoh diu ahi!” ati.
“Ama Jerusalem ahung naijep'a khopi chu amuphat in akap pan tai.
Iti kadeisah nahi hitam tunikhon mijouse lah'a nangman chamna lampi hi kihet tave lechun. Ahinlah, tun ageisang tan, chamna hi namit mua kona kisel ahitai.
Sot louva nagalmi teu vin nakul pam'a pansatna akisem diu, amai lang jousea na umchin todiu ahi.
Amahon tol'a nachil thang diu, chule nachateu jong chutia abol diu. Nagalmi teu vin song khatcha aumna a aumsah louding ahi, ajeh chu huhhingna dinga phat kilemchang nasan loujeh ahi,” ati.
Chuin Jesu houin alut in, kilhaina ding gancha joh ho ahin nodoh pan tai.
Aman amaho jah'a, “Pathen Lekhabun hitin aseiye, Ka in chu taona in kiti ding ahi, ahin nanghon gucha michom ho kokhuh in nasem tauve” ati.
Chujou chun, aman niseh leh houin ah thu ahiljin, ahin thempuho, hou danthu hil ho chule adang mipi lamkai hon ama chu iti tha ding ham ti thilgon akisem pat un ahi.
Ahivangin ima dang ageldoh chom pouve, ajeh chu mijousen athuhil apomchah jeh chun. Jesun Thuneidol Adoh'u
Nikhat Jesun mipi thu ahil'a Kipana Thupha houin'a aseiphong laiyin, thempu pipui ho, hou danthu hil ho, chule upa ho cheng ahengah ahungun.
“Ipi thuneina noiya nangman hiche hohi nabol ham? Kon thaneina napeh ham?” tin ahung dong uve.
“Ken thudoh khat nanei masauvinge” tin adonbut in,
“Twilutsah John thaneina chu van'a kon ham ahilouleh mihem a kon ham?” tin adongtai.
Amaho akihouvun, “Van'a kon ahi tileu hen, ibol'a John natahsan lou u ham eiti kit diu.
Ahin iham tin mihem a kon ahi tileu hen, mipin songa eise kit diu, ajehchu John chu themgao ahi tia apom'u ahi” akitiuvin ahi.
Hijeh chun achainakeiyin kahepouve tin ahin donbut tauve.
Chuin Jesun adonbut in, “Achutileh kenjong ipi thuneina noiya kabol ham ti naseipeh pouvinge,” ati. Lengpi-Lei Le Alei Lhouho Thulem
Tun Jesun mipi lam angakit in hiche thusim hi aseipeh e: Mikhat hin lengpilei abol in, aloulhou miho komah apedoh in, gamdang khat ah kumsottah tham dingin achetai.
Lengpi ga khoptup phat alhin in, asohte khat ama chanding lan asol'e. Ahin loulhou ho chun sohpa chu ahin bolseuvin, avouvin, khutgoh keovin ahin lesol tauve.
Hijeh chun lou neipan soh dang khat asol kit in, ahivangin amahon ahinsujum kit un, avouvin, khutgoh keovin ahin lesol kit tauve.
Athumna pa asolkit in, chule ama jong chu ahin mavouvin adelmang tauve.
“Ipi kabol ding hitam?” tin louneipa akihoulim in ahi. “Kahetai! Keiman kachapa kasahlut tah hi sol'inge. Tahbeh in jana hinpe nauvinte” ati.
Ahinlah, aloulhou hon achapa amu phat un, amaho akihou som'un, “Agoulo ding pa ahunge, thatdoh utin agoulo ding hi eiho chang tauhite!” akitiuve.
Hijeh chun ama chu lengpilei pam langah akaidoh un athat tauve. “Lengpilei neipa chun amaho chungah ipi bol'in te tia nangaitouvam?” tin Jesun ahin dongin,
“Naseipeh unge–ama hungin tin loulhou ho chu athadoh a lengpilei chu midang asan sah ding ahitai” ati. “Iti khoh hitam chutobang thil aso jeng ding chu,” atiuvin athusei jaho chun ahin donbut uve.
Jesun amaho chu aven aseitai, “Achutileh, Pathen Lekhabun ipi ati naham? Insa hon apaidoh u song chu Inning songpin apangtai,”
“Hiche songpia kipal jouse chu ahal hal'a keh ding, chule achunga lhu chu ipi hijong leh chip ding ahi” ati.
Hou danthuhil ho le thempu pipuihon Jesu chu kintah a matding adeilheh un ahi ajeh chu athusim seichu amaho kiseina ahi ahin kihetdoh u ahitai–amaho chu loulhou agilou hochu hiuvah ahi. Ahivangin mipi ho lethuh na chu akichauvin ahi.
Phat kilemchang vepum'in, alamkai houvin avelhi le ding miphalhem asol uve. Jesun seikhel khat neihen Rome gamvaipo komah amat nadingin kipedoh le ti agon u ahi.
Amahon “Houhil, Nangman adih chu nahil'a nasei ahi chule midang lunggel in nasuhboi joulou ahi keihon kaheuve.”
“Tun neiseipeh un–Caesar henga kai pehding hi dih hai dihlou ham?” tin adong tauve.
Aman alungthim bol'u ahichu ahen aseitai,
“Rome te sumpum khat neivetsah'un. Koi lim le thucheng kijih ham achunga chu?” tin adongtai. Amahon adonbut un, “Caesar a ahi,” atiuve.
Aman asei kit in, “Aphai ahileh, Caesar a chu Caesar peuvin lang Pathen a chu Pathen peuvin,” ati.
Chuti chun amahon mipi masanga athu seikhel'a kipal sah ding atiu chu ajou tapouve. Chusang chun, amahon athu donbut hochu kidang asauvin, athipchet tauve.
Chuin Jesu chu Sadducee–hou lamkai, thokitna aumpoi tihon kimupi din ahin naiyun ahi.
Hiche thudoh hi adongun ahi: “Houhil, Mosen dan khat eipeuvin, mikhat chu athia ajinu adalhah'a chaneilou ahileh, asopipan hiche meithai chu akichenpi ding, cha aneipi ding hichun asopipa min apoh ding ahi.
Aphai, tun tekahnan ucha pasal sagi aume. A'upen ajineiyin cha neilouvin athitai.
Hijeh chun ani napan akichenpin, ama jong athitai.
Chuin athumna pan akichenpi kit in ahi. Hiti hin asagiuvin achelhan abon'uva chaneilou ahitauve.
Achainan numeinu jong athi tai.
Hijeh chun neiseipeh un, thokitna'a chu koi ji a pang ding ham? Ajeh chu asagiuva chu akichenpi cheh u anahi!”
Jesun adonbut in, “Kichen hi hiche leiset chunga cheng miho ding bou ahi.”
Ahin, ahung lhung ding khang'ah, athilah a kona thoudoh dinga lom ho chu akicheng tapouvin chule chen jong akichensah tapouve.
Chule amaho thikit talou diu, hitia chu amaho van'a Vantilte tobang hidiu ahitai. Amaho Pathen chate ahitauvin chule thoukit chate ahitauve.
“Ahin tun, mithi thoukit mong ding hinam ti thudol ah”—Mose jengin jong nanglah meikong thudol asut chun avetsah in ahi. Abraham, Isaac, le Jacob thijou phat sottah jou nungin, Pakai chu Abraham Pathen, Isaac Pathen, Jacob Pathen tia akou ahi.
“Hijeh a chu ama chu ahingho Pathen ahin, athiho a hilou ahi, ajeh chu amaho abonchauva ama'a hingah ahitauve.”
Chukom mun'a ding, hou danthu hil ho phabep khat chun, “Nasei hoiye, houhil” atiuve.
Chule koiman thudoh adong ngam tapouvin ahi.
Chuin Jesun thudoh toh thon hiche hi aseipeh kit e, “Ipi jeh a Messiah chu David chapa kiti ding ham?”
Ajeh chu David amatah in jong Labu'a anajihlut ahi: “Pakai in ka Pakai jah'a, Kajet lam'a kijana mun'ah touvin,”
Namelmate kasuh nem a, Nakengto chotpha'a kakoi masang sen, ati.
“David in Messiah chu Pakai, tia akou leh, Messiah chu iti David chapa hithei ding ham?” ati.
Chuin mihonpi jah dingin, aseijuite kom langah akiheiyin aseitai,
“Hiche hou danthu hil hoa kon hin kichih theiyun! Ajeh chu amahon vonhoi tahtah kivon a kailhang lah dunga min chibai aboh diu adeiyun, chule kikhopna in le golvah na mun ho ah touna mun thupi lai lai aholjiuve.
Ahin, amahon jahcha louhel in meithai ho anei agou uva kona lheplhah ding agel uvin, chule kilhagao misah tah bangin taona sottah tah japi lah'a amang jiuvin ahi; hiche jeh'a hi amaho hatah a bolgimna changding ahiuve,” ati. Meithainu Sumto
Jesu houin aumlaiyin, mihao hon sumdolna bom'a athilpeh houchu aven ahi.
Chuin meithai mivaicha khat jong ahungin sumsan pehni alehlut in ahi.
Jesun aseitai, “Thutah kaseipeh nahiuve, hiche mivaicha meithainu hin adang jouse sangin atam to joi.
Ajeh chu amahon aneival hou lah'a themkhat bou atou ahin, amavang amanu hin, avaichat totoh'a, anei chasun apeh ahitai,” ati.
Aseijuite lah'a phabep khat chun Hou'in kisah na'a song kikheng ho chule bang'a melchihna kijempah ho chu anatsat dan aseipan tauvin ahi. Ahivangin Jesun aseitai,
“Phat ahunglhung e, hiti ho jouse hi aboncha kisuchim ding ahi. Song khatcha khat chunga kisethom namu lou diu ahi,” ati.
Amahon adongun, “Houhil, hitiho hi itih le soh ding ham? Melchihna itobang in hitiho chu sohding ahitai ti eivetsah diu ham?” atiuve.
Aman adonbut in, “Koima kilheplhah sah hih un, ajeh chu mi tamtah kamin'a hung ding, ‘Keima Messiah kahi’ tia aseidiu ‘Phat ahung lhung tai!’ ahin tidiu ahi. Ahivangin tahsan hih un.
Chuleh gal kisat le thunoh najah teng uleh tijahih'un. Ahinai, hiti hohi soh masa ding ahi, ahin achaina chu hijeng loulai ding ahi,” ati.
Chuin aman aseiben, “Namkhat chu namkhat toh gal kisat a konding, chule lenggam khat jong lenggam dang khattoh kidou ding ahi.
Lingpi nasatah tah kihot ding, kel lhading, chule mun tin'a gamna hise lang ding, tijat um tahtah thilsoh chule van'a melchihna kidang tahtah namu diu ahi.
Ahivanga hiche ho ahung so masanga, suhgenthei na phat nasatah umding ahi. Nangho kikhopna in tinle songkul hoa nakikai diu, chule kanungjui nahijeh uva lengho le gamvaipo ho thutanna angsunga nadin diu ahi.
Ahivanga hiche hi nangho dinga keima neiseiphong nadiu phat kilemchang chu hiding ahi.
Hijeh chun nakihehset nau chu iti kadonbut dem tin lunggim masat dauvin,
ajeh chu keiman nangho thu adihtah chule chihna, nadoudal teuvin nahin donbut theilou nadiu ahiloule nanelkal joulou nadiuva kapeh ding nahiuve.
Nakinaipi pen'u–nanu napa, nasopiho, na inkote, chule naloi le pai ho jengin jong nahin pehdoh nahlai diu ahi. Amahon nangho abangkhat nahin tha nahlai diu ahi.
Chule mijousen kanungjui nahi jeh uva nahin muda diu ahi.
Amavang naluchung'a nasamjang khat jengjong mahthah lou ding ahi!
Dettah a nadin uleh, na lhagao naki huhdoh diu ahi.”
Chuleh nanghon Jerusalem galmi sepai hon aum kimvel namu teng uleh, nanghon alhuh nading phat hunglhung ahitai ti nahet diu ahi.
Chuteng Judea gam'a cheng ho thinglhang langa najam doh diu ahi. Jerusalem'a umho napotdoh diu, chule thinglhang langa umdoh ho khopi langa nakile lou diu ahi.
Ajeh chu hiche ho chu Pathen phulah nikholai hiding, chule Pathen Lekhabua themgao thusei ho guilhung ding ahi.
Chuche nikholai chu numei naovop hole naosen sin minute dinga iti da umding hitam. Ajeh chu gamsunga hesoh genthei khohtah chule hiche miho chunga lunghanna nasatah chuding ahi.
Amaho chemjam'a kithat diu ahilouleh sohchang'a vannoi nam jouse lah'a solmanga umdiu ahi. Chuleh chidang namdang te phatsung kichai kahsea Jerusalem hi chidang namdang ten achotpha ding ahi.
“Chule nisa, lha, chule ahsi hoa melchihna kidang tahtah hung umding ahi. Chule leichung'a hi namtin boina'a dimding, twikhanglen kitum le tuikinong gimnei chun asuh lungjin diu ahi.
Miho chu leiset chunga thillhung ho amuuva kona kicha diu ahi, ajeh chu van munhoa thaneina cheng kihot ling gam ding ahitai.
Chuteng mijousen Mihem Chapa meilom chunga thahat le loupi tah a ahung amudiu ahi.
Hijeh a chu hitiho jouse hi ahung kipat teng leh, dingun lang chunglam veuvin, ajehchu nasochat nau nai ahitai!” ati.
Chuin aman hiche thutekah hi apen ahi: “Theichang phung khu veuvin, ahiloule thingphung dang hijong leh.
Ado ahung pullhah teng, nanghon seipeh louvin jong naheuve, nipi anaitai.
Chutobang chun, hitiho jouse aguilhun namu tenguleh, Pathen Lenggam chu anaitai ti nahet thei diu ahi.
Thutah kaseipeh nahiuve, hiche khang hi chemang lou ding ahi, hitiho jouse aguilhun masang sea.
Van le lei mang ding ahi, ahin kathu ho vang manglou beh ding ahi.”
“Kihong phauvin! Nalungu, nopchon nale juneh motchon na jeh, chule tuhinkhoa lunggim naho jeh'in motsah hih'un. Hiche nikho chu hetlou kah'a thang banga kimatsah bolhih'un.
Ajeh chu hiche nikho chu leiset chunga hing mijouse chunga lhung ding ahi.
Phat jousen kiging jingin um'un. Chuleh hitobang kichat umtah hunglhung ding peldoh nadia nahat jing thei nadiu le Mihem Chapa angsunga nadin jou thei nadiuvin taovun,” ati.
Niseh le Jesu houin'ah thuhil dingin achejin, chule nilhah seh le Olive mol'a jan phat mang dingin ahung kile jin ahi.
Mihonpi chu houin'ah jingkah seh le athuhil ngai dingin akikhom jiuvin ahi.
Cholsolou Changlhah Kut, Kalchuh kut tiajong kihe chu ahung naitai.
Thempu pipui hole hou danthuhil hon Jesu chu iti tha ding ham ti agong pan tauvin, ahin mipin ahinlethuh ding akichauvin ahi.
Chuin Judas Iscariot, seijui somleni holah'a khat, sungah Satan alut tan,
chule ama thempu pipui hole houin ngahtup lamkai hotoh Jesu amaho henga pehdoh nadinga lampi phapen ho kihoulim dingin achetai.
Amaho akipah un, sum peh dingin akitem tauve.
Chuti chun amajong anom in chule Jesu pehdoh na dinga phat kilemchang chu avelhi jingin, mihonpi umlou pet'a amat thei na diuvin avejinge. Seijuihon Kalchuh Kut An-Neh Ding Agon-U
Tun Cholsolou Changlhah Kut chu ahunglhung tai, Kalchuh kut'a kelngoi akitha chun.
Jesun Peter le John asol masan, “Chelhon in lang kalchuh kut anneh nading hin gongtup lhontan, thakhat'a ineh khom thei nadiuvin” ati.
Amanin jong ahindong lhon in, “Hoilai mun'ah gongtup lhon leng natim?” atilhon'e.
Aman adonbut in, “Jerusalem nalut lut lhon leh mikhat twibel a tui pu khat namu lhon ding ahi.” Amachu juilhon'in. Alutna in a chun,
inneipa jah'a seilhon in, houhil'in adonge: jinlhun in, kaseijuite toh kalchuh kut an kaneh nading mun chu hoiba ham? ati tilhon'in.
Aman indan chung ka-lentah gotsa um khat'a napuilut lhon ding ahi. Hiche lai mun'a chu nangnin i-anneh diu nagon lhon ding ahi, ati.
Amani khopi lam'a chun achelhon in ahileh imajouse Jesun asei bang bangin agatoh lhon in chukoma chun kalchuh kut anneh ahinsem lhon tai.
Phat ahung lhun phat in Jesu le aseijuite dokhang ah atoukhom tauve.
Jesun aseiye, “Kathoh gim kipat kah a hitobang kalchuh kut ankong nangho toh nehkhom ding hi kana ngalel jing ahi.
Ajeh chu tua kaseipeh nahiuve, Pathen lenggam'a aguilhunna aum tokah'a hiche an hi kaneh kit lou ding ahitai,” ati.
Chuin khon'a lengpitwi chu alan Pathen thangvah na apen ahi. Chuin aseitai, “Hiche hi kilah unlang nangho kihom un,
ajeh chu Pathen lenggam ahung lhun kah'a lengpitwi kadon lou ding ahitai,” ati.
Aman changlhah themkhat alan Pathen thangvah na apen ahi. Chuin ahehbal bal'in aseijuite apen, “Hiche hi katahsa, nangho dinga kipe chu ahi. Keima geldoh nan bol'un” ati.
Jan anneh jouvin, lengpitwi khon dang khat alan hitin aseiye, “Hiche khon hi Pathen le amite kikah a kitepna thah–kinoptona kathisan a kisudet, nangho dinga kilhaina a kisunglha chu ahi,” ati.
“Ahivangin hiche dokhang a hin, ilah uva jol le gol hina'a tou, mikhat eipedoh ding aume.
Ajeh chu Mihem Chapa athi ding chu gotsa anahitai. Ahin, itobang lungkham nan anga hitam apedoh a pang pachu,” ati.
Seijuite khat le khat akidong to un, alah uva koipen chun chutobang chu abol mong ding ham akitiuve. Let Thudol'a Kinelna
Chuin amaho khat le khat alenpen koi ahidiu thu'ah aki nelkal lah lah jeng tauve.
Jesun aseipeh un, “Hiche vannoi leiset a hin lengho le milen milal ten amiho potgih apohsah un ahin ‘mipi ho jol le gol’ tin akiminvo uve.
Ahin, nangho lah'a vang achomdeu ngai ahi. Nalah uva alenpen chun panmun nem pen alo ngai ahi, chule alamkai chu soh tobang ahi ngai ahi.
Koi thupijo ham, dokhanga toupa le ajenlea pangpa? Ahinai, dokhanga toupa athupijo nai. Amavang hikom'a chutilou ahi! ajeh chu keima nangho lah a ajenlea kapan ahi.
Nanghon kathoh genthei na ah nei umpiuve.
Chule kapan Lenggam eipeh banga, kenjong tua thaneina kapeh nahiuve,
Chuche lenggam'a chu ka dokhanga naneh uva chule nadon thei nadiuvin. Chule nangho laltouna a natou diu Israel phungsom le phungni chunga thu natan diu ahi. Jesun Peter in Aseilep Ding Asei-Masah
Simon, Simon, Satan in nabonchauvin chang kilhah chil banga lhah chil dingin nathum uve.
Ahivangin taona ah kathumpeh uve, Simon chule natahsan chu alosap lou ngai ahi. Hijeh a chu nalung naheiya keilam a nahung kile kit teng nasopi ho suthahat in,” ati.
Peter in aseiyin, “Pakai, nangma to songkullut dinga kigosa kahi, chule thina hijong leh thingap cha kahi,” ati.
Ahivangin Jesun adonbut in, “Peter, thilkhat naseipeh inge. Jing jingkah ahchal khon masanga, nangman thumvei neiseilep ding, kahekha poi nati ding ahi,” ati.
Chuin Jesun amaho chu adongin, “Keiman Kipana Thupha seiphonga kanasol uva, sum polou, sakhao kiken lou, ahiloule kengchot khel kichoilouva naum uva chu ipi ngaichat naneiyuvam?” atileh, amahon adonbut un, “Imacha” atiuve.
“Ahinlah tun nasum ule sakhao kipoh tauvin. Chule chemjam naneilou uleh naponsil joh unlang khat kichoh un.
Ajeh chu phat ahung lhunge kei chungchanga hiche themgao thusei guilhun na dingin: ‘Ama adoudal hotoh akisimtha tai’ tia kisun chu. Henge keima chungchanga kisun themgao thusei jouse guilhung ding ahi,” ati.
“Ven Pakai” tin ahin donbut un, “Chemjam ni eiho lah'a aumnai,” atiuvin, hichu aphatai, tin aseiye.
Chuin, seijuite toh kivop in, Jesun indan chung adalhan chule abolngai ma bangin Olive mol langah achetai.
Hia chun amaho aseipeh in, “Taovun, lhepna a nalhah lou nadiuvin,” ati.
Themkhat, song sephah nathei chan bep ah, ache chon jep'in, chule adilsun ataotai,
“Hepa, nalung ahileh, lungsettah in thoh gentheina khon hi keiya konin ladoh in. Ahin, keima lunggot hilouvin, nangma lunggot joh akibol ding kadeiye,” ati.
Chuin van'a konin vantil khat ahung kilah in chule atha asuhhat peh in ahi.
Ama lungluttah in ataoben, chule alhagao thohgim natsat dan chu, a-ul sa chu thisan vat lentah tah bangin alenglhan ahi.
Achainan adingdoh kit in aseijuite hengah ahung kilen ahileh ana ihmut u ahung mun, lungkham na'a kon joilha gamu ahitai.
“Ipi bol'a na-imut u ham?” tin adongin, “Thoudoh unlang taovun, lhepna a nalhah lut louna dingun,” ati.
Ahivangin Jesun chutia asei jeng vang chun, mihonpin ahin nai pheiyun, Judas, seijui somleni lah'a khat, in ahin lamkai ahi. Judas jong Jesu kom langah chibai boh a chop ding in achen ahi.
Ahin Jesun aseiyin, “Judas, nangman Mihem Chapa hi chop'a pehdoh ding nagot ham?” ati.
Seijui danghon thilsoh ding chu amuphat un ahung eojah un, “Pakai, ikidel pidiu ham? Chemjam kahin pouve!” ahin tiuve.
Chule alah uva khat chun Thempu chungnung sohpa jetlang kol asatlhah peh in ahi.
Ahin Jesun aseiyin, “Kidoupi tahih un,” atin chule mipa kol chu atham in asuhdam peh'e.
Chuin Jesun ama mandinga hungho thempu pipui ho, Houin ngah lamkaiho, chule upa ho komah thu aseiye. Amaho chu adongin, “Keima tijat umtah doudal natong kahim, chemjam toh moltum thoa keima man dinga nahung u?
Ipi jeh a houin a neimat lou u ham? Keima niseh'a ana kium jinga. Ahivangin tuhi naphat'u ahi, muthim thaneinan vai apoh pet ahi,” ati.
Hijeh chun amahon aman'un thempu chungnung pa in'ah apuiphei tauve. Chule Peter chun galkang in ahinjuiye.
Angah ho chun leitol lailunga chu mei atiuva toubem u ahin, chule Peter jong agajaovin ahi.
Soh numei chapang khat in mei kitivah na'a kon chun ahin mun ama chu ave vejeng tai. Achainan amanun ahinseiyin, “Hiche mipa hi Jesu nungjui holah'a khat ahi,” ahin ti.
Ahin Peter in aseilep in, “Numei, ama khu koi ahi jong kahet lou ahi,” ati.
Chomkhat jouvin koiham khat in ahinven aseitai, “Nang jong amaho lah'a khat nahi tei ding ahi,” ati. Peter in adonbut in, “Ahipoiye, kahipoi,” ati.
Nidan khat jou lang hin koiham khat in angoh kit in, “Hiche mipa jong hi amaho lah'a khat hitei tei ding ahi, ajeh chu ama jong Galilee gammi ahi,” ati.
Ahivangin Peter in aseiyin, “Ipi nasei ham kahehih beh e,” atitai. Chuin chutia asei lai tah chun ahchal ahung khong tai.
Hiche pettah chun Pakai chu ahung kiheiyin Peter chu ahin ven ahi. Kinloitah in Peter lung sungah Pakai thusei ho chu ahung kilangin: “Ahkhon masanga, jing jingkah le, nangman neiseilep ding, kahekha poi nati ding ahi” atichu.
Chuin Peter chun leitol adalhan, lainatah'in agakap tai.
Jesu ngah'a pangho lah'a mopopa chun totnopnan aneiyin chule avopan tai.
Amit atompeh un, “Gaovin lang seiyin, koiham nadeng'a chu?” atiuvin ahi.
Chule ama suhjum nan bolthei jouse abol'un ahi. Hou Vaipo Ho Ang-Sunga Jesu
Jingkho avah in, upa ho jouse, thempu pipui hole hou danthuhil ho pan nan akikhom un ahi. Jesu chu akikhom mipi angsungah ahin puiyun,
chule amahon adongun, “Neiseipeh un nangma Messiah chu nahim?” atiuve. Ahivangin aman adonbut in, “Naseipeh uleng, neitahsan lou diu ahi.
Chule thudoh naneiyu leng neidonbut lou diu ahi.
Ahin, tua pat'a Mihem Chapa hi thaneitah a Pathen khut jetlam a touding ahi,” ati.
Amaho abonchauvin ahung eojah jeng'un, “Ahileh, Pathen Chapa kahie natina ham?” ahintiuve. Chuin aman adonbut in, “Naseiyu chu kahi” ati.
Chuin amahon, “Ipi dinga hettohsah dang ingaikhoh uham? Eiho tah in athusei ija tauve,” atiuve.
Chuin mipi kikhom chengse chun Jesu chu Rome Gamvaipo, Pilate hengah ahin pui tauve.
Amahon apansat nau thu chu aseipan un: “Hiche mipa hin kamiteu apuileng'in, Rome solkal koma kai peh lou ding tin aseiyin chule ama tahjong Messiah, Leng akihisah e,” atiuve.
Hijeh chun Pilate in ama chu adongin, “Nangma Juda te Lengpa nahim?” ati. Jesun adonbut in, “Kahi chu nasei khai” ati.
Pilate chu thempu pipui hole mihonpi hengah ahung kiheiyin chule aseitai, “Hiche mipa chunga hin ima adihlou kamupoi!” ati.
Chuin amahon asei teitei jengun, “Ahivanga, amahin achena chan'a athuhil a kona boina asem jing jeng ahi–Judea pumpia, Galilee a pat Jerusalem geiya!” atiuve.
“Oh, Galilee gammi ham?” tin Pilate in ahin dong'e.
Amahon ahi atipeh phat un, Pilate in Herod Antipas koma dingin asol tai, ajeh chu Galilee chu Herod vaipoh nanoi anahi, chule Herod jong chu Jerusalem a aumpet anahi khan ahi.
Herod in Jesu mu na dinga phat hoitah amujeh chun akitai lheh jengin ahi, ajeh chu ama chung chang thudol anajah'a chule sot'a pat'a thilkidang abolho anamu nomten ahi.
Aman Jesu chu thudoh tamtah adongin, ahivangin Jesun adonbut nom poi.
Hiche lai chun thempu pipui hole hou danthuhil ho chua chun adingun ahehset nathu'u chu asam un ahi.
Chuin Herod le asepaiten Jesu chu totnopnan aneiyun adaichavai pan tauve. Achainan, amahon leng ponsil asilpeh un Pilate hengah ahinle sol tauve.
(Herod le Pilate, masanga kimelmah teni chu, hiche ni chun jol le gol ahung hilhon'e). Jesu Tha Dinga Athu Atan-U
Chuin Pilate in thempu pipui hole hou lamkai adangho, mipiho jaonan, akoukhom in,
chule athulhuh sem aphongdoh in ahi. “Nanghon hiche mipa hi kakoma nahin puiyun, doudal natoh atonge tia ngohna naneiyu ahi. Keiman hiche thudol a hin phatah in nangho mitmun kavelhan chule bolset neilou ahi kamudoh'e.
Herod in jong themmona amulou jeh a eiho koma ahinle sol ahi. Thina thei chan gotna peh nading natoh hiche mipan abolpoi.
Hijeh chun keiman gimbolna peing ting, hinlhadoh tange,” ahinti.
Ajeh chu kut sunga chu amahon mikhat alhadoh jing-u ahi.
Chutah chun mihonpi lah a kon chun awgin sangtah ahung gingin, thakhat tah in ahin sam'un, “Amahi thatdoh'in, chule Barabbas chu neilhadoh peh un!” atiuve.
(Barabbas chu agam solkal douna natoh jeh le toltha jeh'a songkul'a kikhum anahi.)
Pilate in amaho anelkal'in ahi, ajehchu aman Jesu alhadoh nom jeh ahi.
Ahivangin amahon asam sam jengun, “Thingpel'a khenbeh in! thingpel'a khenbeh in!” atiuve.
Athumvei channa din aman adongin, “Ipi bol'in em? Ipi them mona aneiyem? Keiman thina chan'a gotna peh nading thu ima kamupoi. Hijeh chun hin vogim ingting hinlhadoh tange,” ati.
Ahivangin mihonpi chun awsang jep in aha sapcheh un, Jesu chu thingpel'a khetbeh ahinadin athum'un, chule a-awgin u chun ajoujotai.
Hijeh chun Pilate in Jesu chu angeh dungjuiyun athi dingin atanlhah peh tai.
Amahon athum dungjuiyun Barabbas, michohnoh le toltha jeh a songkul'a umpa, alhadoh peh in ahi. Ahin Jesu vang chu amaho khut'ah anop nop alodiuvin apedoh tai.
Chutia Jesu ahinpuidoh uchun, Simon kiti Cyrene gam mi khat thinglhang langa pat'a ahung pettah anahi. Sepai ho chun aman un thingpel chu achungah akoiyun Jesu nunga chun apohsah tauve.
Mihonpi tamtah'in anung ahinjuiyun, a-op chum'a kap nupiho jong ahiuve.
Ahivangin Jesu amaho langah akiheiyin aseitai, “Jerusalem chanute, keiya dingin kap hih'un, amavang nangho le nachateu dingin kap jouvin.
Ijeh inem itile amahon hitia aseina diu nikho hung lhung ding ahi. Cha neilou numeiho, naovop khalou naobu, chule nao noichepsah khalou ho anunnom uve, kiti ding ahi.
Mihon mol ho jah'a ‘Neilhuh khum'un’ tia athum dingu, lhang jah'a ‘neikhu khum'un’ atidiu ahi.
Ajeh chu thingphung ahinlai'a bon hitia hi abol ule, iti da ding ham agot teng,” ati.
Adang mini, anilhona miphalou, teni jong chu amatoh tha thading'in ahin puidoh uve.
Lugu mun atinau mun ahung lhun phat un, amahon thingpel ah thingkil'in akilbeh un ahi. Chuleh miphalou teni jong chu akhetbeh tauve–khat ajet ah chule khat aveiyah.
Jesun aseitai, “Hepa, ngaidam in, ajeh chu ipi abol'u ahepouve,” ati. Chule sepai hon aponsil chu vang asang'un achang ding akivelhauve.
Mihonpi chun aveuvin chule alamkai hon ajontai'un. “Aman midang ho ahuhhingin” tin amahon aseiyun, “Ama le ama kihuhhing tahta Pathen thaonu, Akilhengdoh pachu ahi mong mong leh,” atiuvin ahi.
Sepai hon jong adai chavaiyun, donding juthuh apeuvin ahi.
Ama ahin kou uvin, “Nangma Judate lengpa nahileh, kihuhhing in!” atiuve.
Achungah chun melchihna khat atah uvin, “Hiche hi Judate lengpa ahi” tin asun uve.
Miphalou akikhetbeh pi teni khatpa chun ahin jontaiyin, “Nang, Messiah nahi hilou ham?” Nahi vetsahnan nang le nang kihuhhing in lang chule keini jong neihuhdoh lhon tang'em, hitia nathoh gim laihin! ati.
Ahivangin miphalou khatpa chun ahin phohsal in, “Pathen nagin lou ham athidinga naum kisan'a?
Eini hi athidinga lom ihi ithil bolkhel jeh'a, ahin hiche pa hin imacha bolkhel aneipoi,” ati.
Chuin aman aseitai, “Jesu, neigeldoh in nalenggam'a nahung teng,” ati.
Jesun adonbut in, “Tahbeh'a kaseipeh nahi, tunia Paradise a iumkhom ding ahi,” ati.
Hiche phat hi sunkim dontah ahin, chule nidan thum chan in gamsung pumpi muthim ahung jingin ahi.
Nisa a kon vah achemang in, chule kinloitah in houin muntheng'a pondal chu akimlai tah'a akehlhasuh in ahi.
Chutah chun Jesu ahung peng in, “Pa, nakhut'ah kalhagao kapedoh e” ati. Chule chuche thucheng asei toh kilhon in ahinna alhatai.
Rome sepai jalamkaipa, kithana velhalea pang pan thilsoh umchan chu amun, Pathen chibai aboh in aseitai, “Hiche mipa vang michonpha ahi,” ati.
Chuleh mihonpi akikhetbeh ve'a hung sesen jong thilsoh umchan chu amu uvin, amaho lungkham tah in inlam ache tauve.
Ahivangin Jesu jol le gol te, Galilee gam'a pat'a hinjui numeiho chengtoh, amaho chu gamla thimtah in adingun ahin galvet uve. Jesu Long Avui-U
Tun Joseph kiti mipha le chondih tah khat aume. Amachu Judate vaipoloi lah a khat ahi.
Ahin aman houlamkai dang ho thulhuhna sem le natoh chu ana noppeh lou ahi. Amachu Judea gam'a Arimathea khoa kon ahi, chule Pathen lenggam hung ding chu anga jing ahi.
Ama Pilate koma achen Jesu long chu athum'in ahi.
Chuin aman atahsa chu thingpel a pat in alalhan, tupat ponnem ajolsao thimtah khat in atom in, chule song kilai lhanthah khat ah alupsah tai.
Hiche chu kigotni nilhangkai don a vaigei thimtah a kibol ahi, ajeh chu Cholngah ni kipan ding kon cha ahitai.
Atahsa akilah mang phat chun, Galilee a pat'a hung numei ho chun ahin jui yun, atahsa kikoina lhan chu agamu uvin ahi.
Chuin inlam acheuvin chule thil namtui le atahsa a nuding nuthei akisem uvin ahi. Ahin athilsem u ajo phat'un Cholngah ni anakipan tai, hijeh chun dan thun angeh dungjui in akichol tauve.
Ahin nimasani jingpi tah in, numeiho chu lhan lam'ah acheuvin, thil namtui asem u jong akichoiyun ahi.
Lhan sung lut na'a um song anakitang doh chu agamu uve.
Hijeh chun alut un, ahivangin Jesu long chu amutapouve.
Chutia lungboi tah'a adin laitah un, mini apettah in ahung kilah in, ponbang vallah lah akisil lhone.
Numei ho chu atijauvin chule amaiyu tol'ah akunlhah sah un ahi. Chuin miteni chun ahin sei lhon in, “Ipi bol'a athiho lah'a ahingdoh khat nahol uham?
Ama hikom'ah aumtapoi! Ama athilah a konin athoudoh tai! Galilee a aumlaiya nanaseipeh houchu geldoh un,
Mihem Chapa michonse ho khut'a pehdoh a umding, thingpel'a akhetbeh diu, chule anithum nile thoukit ding ahi, tia anasei chu,” atilhone.
Chuin amahon hiche hi anasei mongnai ti ageldoh un ahi.
Hijeh chun amaho lhan mun'a konin aseijui somlekhat ho–chule adangho jouse–thilsoh umchan seipeh dingin kintah in akile loi tauve.
Solchah ho thilsoh umchan seipeh chu Mary Magdalene, Joanna, James nu Mary, chule numei adangho jong ahiuve.
Ahivangin miho ding chun athusim jah'u chu mohthu homkeo dan in agel uvin, hijeh chun atahsan tapouve.
Ahin Peter vang chu achomdoh in lhan veding chun alhaijel'in ahi. Abung'in aven ahileh tompon akeova um bouseh chu amun, chuin inlam akile kit in, ipi iti hitam alungdong lheh jeng tai. Emmaus Kho Lampia Jesu Akilah
Hiche ni mama chun Jesu nungjui mini, Emmaus kho jotna lampi, Jerusalem a pat mel sagia gamla achun ache lhone.
Amanin lamjot toh thilsoh umchan jouse chungchang thudol kihoulim toh akop lhon ahi.
Hitiho jouse thu akihoulim lhon laiyin, Jesu jong amatah kinloi tah in ahungin amanitoh alhon khom tai.
Ahivangin Pathen in ahetdoh lhon louna din aumsah e.
Aman adongin, “Nalamjot pum lhon'a chu ipi thu lom lungluttah a nakihoulim lhon hitaimo?” ati. Chomkhat akhongai lhonin, amaiso lhon lungkham na maiso apulhon in.
Chuin amani lah a khat pa, Cleopas chun adonbut in, “Tu niphabep masanga thilsoh ho jouse helou Jerusalem miho lah'a nang bouseh hin nate,” atilhone.
Jesun adong in, “Ipi thilsoh ho am?” ati. “Nazareth a hung kon Jesu chunga thilsoh umchan ho,” tin aseipeh lhontai, “Ama thilkidang nasatah bolthei themgao khat anahin, chule Pathen le miho mitmu a thaneitah houhil ahi.
Ahivangin kathempu pipui hou le adang hou lamkai hon thina chan gotna changdin themmo achan'un, chule amahon thingpel'ah akhenbeh tauve.
Keihon Israel huhdoh dinga hungpa Messiah chu ahi tia kakineppiu ahi. Hiche hi nithum masanga thilsoh ahitai.
Chutichun keiho lah'a ama nungjui numei phabep khat tujingkah matah chun alhan'ah aum uvin, chule amaho ahung kileuvin kidangtah thulhut ahinpouvin ahi.
Amahon atahsa akiholmoi atiuvin, chule vantil amuuvin, aman Jesu ahingkit tai ati.
Keiho lah'a pasal phabep khat avedingin alhaidoh un, atahbeh in, Jesu long chu numei ho seibang chun anaum tapoi,” atilhone.
Chuin Jesun amani jah'a, “Vo lungthim bei miho! Themgaohon Pathen Lekhabua ajihlut ho tahsan ding hahsa nasah uve.
Messiah chu aloupina a alut masanga hitiho jouse hi athoh galkai ding ahi ti kichen tah a kivetsah anahilou ham?” ati.
Chuin Jesun amani chu Mose le themgao lekhasut hojouse le Pathen Lekhabu jousea kipat in ama chungchang hilchet abolpeh in ahi.
Hiche pet a hi amaho Emmaus kho lhung koncha ahitauve. Jesu chu achejom ding dan in aum'in,
ahin amanin alho lhonin, “Tujan keini komah gehtan, ajeh chu avaigei tai,” atilhone. Hitichun ama jong amani chutoh alhon tai.
Anne dinga atoulhah uchun, aman changlhah chu alan phatthei aboh'e. Chuin ahehbal in amani chu apen ahi.
Chupettah chun amit lhon ahung hahdoh in, chule amanin koi ahichu ahinhedoh lhon tai. Chuin hiche pettah chun ama amangtai!
Amani khat in khat jah'a asei lhon in, “Lampia ikihoulim uva Pathen Lekhabu hilchet abola chu ilungchang lhon kileojap bang louham?” atilhone.
Chule hiche nidan kah sung mama chun Jerusalem langah akile lhon tai. Chua chun seijui somlekhat le adang amahotoh anakikhom khom ho amulhon in,
amahon, “Pakai chu tahbeh in athoudoh tai! Peter henga akilah'e!” tin ahinseiyuve.
Chuin Emmaus khoa pat hung tenin jong amani thusim, Jesu aheng lhona lampia akijot laiyuva ahung kilah dan, chule changlhah ahin hebal phat'a ahin hetdoh lhondan, aseilhon in ahi.
Chule chutia asei laitah uvin, Jesu alah uva hetmanlou kah'in anadingin ahi. Aman ahinseiyin, “Chamnan naumpiu hen!” ahinti.
Ahivangin amaho abonchauvin atijauvin akichauvin, thilha mudan'in akigel uve!
“Ipi jeh a kicha nahiu ham?” tin ahin dongin, “Ipi bol'a nalung sungu chu lungthoina a dim ham?
Kakhut veuvin, kakeng veuvin, nanghon keima mong mong kahinai ti namu uve. Nei tham uvin lang thilha kahilou hi hechen un, ajeh chu thilhan tahsa mel tua neimu bangu hi aneipoi,” ati.
Thu aseitoh thon akhut le akeng avetsah in ahi.
Chutichun amaho tahsan loutah in adingjing nalaiyun, kipana le lungdon nan adimset un ahi. Chuin aman ajah uva, “Neh ding nanei uvam?” ahinti.
Amahon nga kikang khat apeuvin ahi,
chule aman hichu anen amahon aveuve.
Chuin aman aseiyin, “Masanga nangho toh iumkhom laiyuva, kanaseipeh soh nahi tauve, Kei chungchang thudol Mose danthua, themgao ho lekhabua, chule labua kisun jouse chu guilhung ding ahi,” ati.
Chuin aman alungkot u Pathen Lekhabua thuho ahetthei nadiuvin ahonpeh in ahi.
Chuin aseitai, “Henge, masanglai a pat'a chu Messiah hi thohgim ding chule thiding chule anithum ni le athilah'a kona thoudoh ding tia anakisun ahi.
Hitia jong hi anakisun ahi, hiche thuhi namtin jouse henga amin thaneina'a seiphonga umding ahi, Jerusalem a kipan ding: ‘Chonset ngaidamna alung hei jousea dingin aume.’
Nangho hicheho jouse hettohsah nahiuve.
Chuleh tua Lhagao Theng kahinsol peh ding nahiuve, kapa anakitepna banga. Ahin Lhagao Theng ahung'a van'a kon thilboltheina nadimset tokah uvin hiche khopi a hin um uvin,” ati.
Chuin Jesun amaho chu Bethany langah apuiyin, vanlam'a akhut alhangin amaho chu phatthei aboh'e.
Amaho phatthei aboh laitah in, amaho chu adalhan chule van langah lahtou vin aumtai.
Hijeh chun amahon amachu ahouvun chuin Jerusalem lamah kipana dimset pumin ahung kile tauve.
Chuin aphat jouseu chu houin ah Pathen vahchoinan amang tauve.
Thu chu atil abul'a ana umsa ahi. Thu chu Pathen toh umkhom ahin, chule thu chu Pathen ahi.
Ama chu atil abul'a umsa Pathen toh umkhom ahi.
Pathen in ama vanga thil jouse asem ahi, chule aum jouse hi Ama louva kisem doh khatcha jong aumpoi.
Thuchun thil jouse hinna apeh ahin, chule Ama hinna chun mijouse dinga vah ahinpoh lut ahi.
Vahchun muthim ahinsal in, chule muthin in vah chu asumit jou tapoi.
Pathen in mikhat, Tuilutsah John chu ahin sole.
Mijouse henga vah thuseiphong ding, chule mihon ama thuseiya kona atahsan thei na ding in.
Ahivangin John amatah chu vah ahipoi, vah thudol hettohsah le seiphong ding ahibouve.
Vannoiya hung a mijouse vah hungpe Ama bou chu vah tahbeh ahi.
Asemsa vannoiya ama ahungin, ahin vannoiyin ama ana hepouve.
Ama amite henga ahungin, amiten ama ana sang pouve.
Ahivangin koi hileh ama tahsan jouse chu Pathen chate hidingin thu apetai.
Ahin amaho chu mihem lunglama kona tahsa thisan'a peng hilouva, Pathen akon pengkit ahiuve.
Chuin thu chu mihem tahsaphe ahungsoh in, ilah uva ahung chengtai. Ama chu ngailut le kitahna dimset ahi. Chule keihon ama loupina, Pathen chapa changkhat seh ahina loupitah chu kamutauve.
Chuin John chu Jesu thudol hettohsah in apangin, mipiho henga asam'in “Hichepa hi ahi, athudol kana hettohsah chu, kanunga mi khat ahunge, ama chu kei sanga gamchenga lenjoahi, ajehchu ama keima um masanga ana umsa ahitai, kati chu,” ati.
Aninglhin na letlha a kon'a eihon amilungset vanga vangbohna aban ban'a imu-u ahitai.
Ajehchu danthupeh chu Mose a kon ahin, Pathen mingailut na le kitahna chu Jesu Christa vanga umdoh ahibouve.
Koiman imatih chan in Pathen amukhapoi, Ahin atepi umlou, amatah Pathen chapa chang khat seh, Pa lungchanga behjing chun, eiho henga Pathen chu aphondoh ahitai.
Judah vaipo hon Jerusalem'a pat'a thempu ho leh Hou'in a sottol le ho, John henga “Nang koi nahim?” tia aga dohsah nauva, John thu hettohsah chu hiche ahi.
Ama akileppon, akiphong doh jengin “Keima Christa kahipoi” ati.
Chuin amahon adongun, “Achutile aphai, koiba nahim? Elijah nahim?” atiuve. Aman adonbut'in “Kahipoi” ati. “Ahile kanga jingu themgao chu nahim?” atiuve. Aman “Kahipoi” ati.
“Hichun amahon, ahile koi nahim? Eihinsol ho koma lhutding donbutna kangai chauve. Nangman koi kahi nakiti em?” atiuve.
John in adonbut'in “Keima gamthip a khosam awgin khat, Pakai hung nading lampi sutheng un, tia Isaiah themgao kamsoh chu kahi,” ati.
Hichun Pharisee ho ahung kisol hochun,
Ama chu adong un, “Christa nahi louva, Elijah nahi louva, chule themgao nahilou le, ipi thuneina naneiya Baptize nachan sah ham?” atiuvin ahi.
Chuin John in amaho jah'a, “Keiman twiya Baptize kachan sah ahin, ahinlah mipi lah'a nanghon nahet dohlou'u mikhat aume.
Ama keima nunga hung ahivangin keima ama soh dinga jong lhingjou lou chule akengchot khao sutlham dinga jong kilom kahipoi,” ati.
Hicheng chu Jordan vadung gal solam Bethany mun'a John in Baptize achansah na'a thilsoh ahi.
Ajingin John in amaheng lam'a Jesu ahung amun, “Veuvin vannoi chonset pomang Pathen kelngoinou khu,”
Amahi ahi keiman kasei, kanunga hunga kei sanga gamchenga lenjo, kati chu, ajehchu ama kei um masang peh'a ana umsa ahitai, ati.
“Keiman ama Christa ahilam kana hepoi, ahivangin ama chu Israel lah'a phondoh'a aumna ding'a keiman twiya Baptize kachan sah ahi,” ati.
Chuin John in athu hettohsah nan, “Keiman van'a kon'a Lhagao Theng vakhu banga ahung lenlhah'a achunga aumden kamui.”
Keiman ama ahilam kana hepoi, ahivang'in Pathen in twiya Baptize chan sah dinga eisol chun, aman kakoma “Achunga Lhagao Theng achuh'a a umden namupa chun, Lhagao Thenga baptize ahin chan sah ding ahi,”
“Chule keiman Jesu chunga hicheng asopet hi kamun, hijeh'a chu amahi Pathen in alhen doh achapa khat seh chu ahi tia kahettoh sah ahitai,” ati.
Ajing kit'in, John aseijui mini toh adinpet un,
Jesun ahinjotpa chu amun, ama chu aven, “Veuvin Pathen kelngoinou khu,” ati.
Chuin John seijui teni chun athusei chu ajalhon in, Jesu nung ajuilhon tai.
Chuin Jesu akihei leh amanin ajuilhon chu amun, “Ipi nangai chat lhon ham?” atitai. Amanin adonbut lhon'in “Rabbi” (Hichu houhil tina ahi) hoiya na umji ham? atilhon e.
Chuin aman, “Hunglhon in hungve lhon in,” ati. Amani Jesu toh akilhon khom lhonin, aumna chu agamu lhon tai. Chule hiche nikho chun aumkhom tauve. Hichu nidan som don ahi.
John thuseija, Jesu nungjui teni lah'a khat joh chu, Simon Peter naopa Andrew chu ahi.
Andrew chun asopipa Simon agahol doh in ajah'a, “Keihon Messiah (Christa tina ahi) kamu tauve,” ati.
Chuin Andrew in Simon chu Jesu henga ahinpuiyin ahi. Hichun Jesun Simon chu aven ajah'a, “Nangma John chapa Simon nahi, hijongle Cephas kisah ding nahitai. (Hichu Peter tina ahi).” Jesun Philip le Nathanael akou
Ajingin Jesu Galilee lam'a che dingin aume. Hichun aman Philip amun, ajah'a “Hungin neijuijin,” ati.
Philip chu Andrew leh Peter khosah na Bethsaida kho'a kon ahi.
Chuin Philip in Nathanael aholdoh'in ajah'a, “Mose le themgao hon athudol anasut'u amapa tah chu kamutauve. Ama chu Nazareth khomi, Joseph chapa, Jesu ahi,” ati.
Hichun Nathanael in adatmo lheh in, “Nazareth khoa kon'a thilpha sohdoh ngai em?” ati. Philip in adonbut'in “Hungin nangma tah in hungven” ati.
Ahenglam'a amani ahung lhon chu Jesun amun, ajah lhon'a, “Phatlhemna beihel mikitahpa, Israel chapa dihtah chu tun aumtai,” ati.
Hichun Nathenael in adongin, “Iti neihet jeng ham?” ati. Jesun adonbut'in, “Philip in naholdoh masanga theichang phung noiya na umpet'a chu kamu ahitai,” ati.
Chuin Nathanael tijatah'in, “Rabbi nangma Pathen chapa tahbeh, Israelte lengpa nahi,” atitai.
Chuin Jesun adongin, “Theichang phung noiya na umpet kamu ahitai, kati jeh'a chu natahsan ham? Hiche ho sanga chungnungjo namu ding ahi,” ati.
Chujouvin ama jah'a, “Atahbeh kaseipeh nahi, nangman van akihon'a chule Pathen vantil ho mihem chapa chunga akaltou le akumsuh namu ding ahi, ajehchu amabou chu van le lei kimatna kalbi ahi,” ati. Cana khoa moupui golvah
Anithum nin Galilee gamsunga Cana khoa moupui golvah khat aum in, chua chun Jesu nu jong apange.
Chule hiche golvahna'a chu, Jesu leh aseijui ho jong akouvu ahi.
Golvahna lengpi twi alhin lel phat in, anun Jesu jah'a “Lengpi twi anei tapouve,” ati.
“Ngailut umtah Numei, hichu eini boina ahipoi” tin Jesun adonbut'in, “Keima kaphat lhing loulai,” ati.
Ahivangin anun lhacha ho jah'a, “Aman najah uva asei jouse bol un,” ati.
Akom'uva chu kisuhtheng na songbel lentah cheh gup um ahi. Bel khat chu tuithei somni somthum koina thei cheh ahi.
Jesun soh ho jah'a “Songbel ho chu twi sungdim un,” ati; hichun amahon twi asundim phat un,
Aman ajah'uva, “Tun phabep thaldoh unlang golvah vaihompa henga choiyun,” ati, chuin lhacha ho chun aseibang chun aboltauve.
Chuin golvah vaihompa chun, twisih lengpi twi kisosah chu atep khan, ahung kondohna hechen louvin (lhacha hon vang aheuve), moulang chu akouvin, ajah'a;
“Mitin in lengpi twi chihpen ahomdoh masa jin, mihon adon khop tengle, adaojep ahomji bouve, ahin nangman tugeiyin achih pen nahom nalaiye,” ati.
Galilee gam'a Cana khoa hiche melchih na kidang abol hi ama loupi kiphon dohna dinga anatoh masapen ahi, hichun aseijuiten ama atahsan tauve.
Kichen golvah kichai jou chun, ama anutoh asopiho toh, chule aseijui ho toh Capernaum a nikho phabep umdingin ache tauvin ahi.
Chuin Judah te kalchuh kut anai phat in, Jesu Jerusalem'a achetai.
Chuin Houin sunga kivei mihon kilhaina thilto ding bong, kelngoi chule vapal ajoh'uva chuleh sum lhengho atouvu agamu dohtan ahi.
