Hichun Jesun khao phabep ahol'in, kijepna asem in, amaho jouse chu Houin a konin adeldoh tan ahi, chule aman bong le kelngoi ho chu anomangin, sum lhengho dokhang alekhup peh in, sum ho athethang peh in;
Chuin vapal joh ho koma achen ajah uva, “Hiche hohi hilai mun'a konin podoh un, Kapa In chu nanghon kailhang mun sosah hih un,” ati.
Hichun aseijuiten, Pathen lekhabua themgao thusei, “Na-in dinga katompan hin katha jouse eine chaiye,” tichu ahin gel doh tauve.
Ahivangin Judah vaipo hon ajah'a “Ipi ham nabol? Hitobang bolna dinga thuneina Pathen in napeh mong ahileh amelchihna kidang khat neimusah un,” atiuve.
Jesun adonbut'in, “Aphai, hiche Houin hi suchim un, chule Keiman nithum in tungdoh inge,” ati.
Hichun amaho tijatah'in, “Hiche Houin sah na a kum som li le kum gup jen lut'a, nangin nithum'a iti nasah doh ding ong?” atiuve.
Ahivangin, Jesun hiche Houin ati chu Ama tahsa aseina ahibouve.
Hiche hi Ama thina a kona kaithouva a um nung chun, aseijuiten ipi aseina ahi ahin geldoh un, Pathen lekhabua thuho leh Jesu thusei ho atahsan tauve.
Kalchuh kut laiya, Jerusalem'a aumpet'a Jesun thil kidang melchihna abolho jeh chun mitamtah in ama atahsan tauve.
Ahivangin amaho chu Jesun atahsan poi, ajehchu mihem hina chu aman ahetsa ahi.
Ama dingin mikhat thudol adang khat in ama henga hettohsah angaipoi, ajeh chu mijouse lungsung ahetsa ahi.
Pharisee mi amin Nicodemus kiti Judah teho'u lamkai khat aum e.
Amapa chu jankhat Jesu henga ahungin Jesu jah'a, “Houhil, keiho dinga Pathen in nahin sol ahi kaheuve; melchihna kidang hijat nabol hohi Pathen'a kon nahi aphot chetna ahitai,” ati.
Jesun adonbut'in “Tahbeh a kaseipeh nahi, nangma napen kit loule Pathen lenggam namu lou ding ahi,” ati.
Nicodemus chun datmo tah in, “Mi ateh nunga iti anu naobu a lelut kit'a hung peng kit thei ding ham?” ati.
Jesun adonbut'in, “Thutah chu ahileh, twiya le lhagaova apenlou le koima Pathen lenggam alut thei poi.
Mihem tahsaphe a penga chu tahsa a hinna bou ahin, ahivangin Lhagao Thenga penga chu Lhagaova hinna chang ahi.
Hijeh chun nangma napen kit ding ahi, kati chu datmo hih'in.
Huikhu anopna lam lam'a anungin, nangin agin najan, ahivangin hoiya hungkon hoilam ajot nahepoi, chutobang chun Lhagaova pengho jong nangin nahethei poi,” ati.
Chuin Nicodemus chun ajah'a “Hiche ho chu iti hithei ding ham?” ati.
Jesun adonbut in, “Nangla Judah te houhil pipu khat nahin, hiche hohi iti nahet thei lou ham?
Tahbeh a kaseipeh nahi, keihon kahet kaseiyu ahin, kamu kahettohsah'u ahi; ahivangin kahettohsah'u hi nanghon nasang pouve.
Keiman leiset thil ho kaseiya natahsan lou leh, van'a thil ho thudol seileng iti natahsan ding ham?
Koima van'a akal'in, ahung kile khapoi; ahivangin Mihem Chapa vang chu van'a kona hung kumlha ahi.
Chuleh Mose in gamthip'a thing'a sum-eng gul adop sang banga chu, Mihem Chapa kidom sang ding ahi.
Hijeh chun amitakip ama tahsan chan in tonsot hinna anei ding ahi.
Ajeh chu Pathen in hibanga hi vannoi angailut ahin, koi hijongleh Ama tahsan chan chu mangthah louva tonsot hinna anei na dingin, aneisun achapa changkhat chu apetan ahi.
Pathen in achapa vannoiya ahinsol chu, vannoi huhhing'a aumna ding joh ahibouve.
Koi hile ama tahsan chan chu, achunga thutanna umlou ahitai; ahivangin koi hijongleh atahsanlou vang chu, Pathen chapa changkhat chu atahsan loujeh a achunga thutanna umsa ahitai.
Chule thutanna chu hiche hi ahi; Pathen vah chu vannoiya ahungin, ahivangin mihon vah sangin, achonnau aphatlou jeh in muthim joh adeijouvin ahi.
Michonphalou jousen vah athet'un, nai jong anailut ngam pouve, ajeh chu achonset nau hinphong doh khante tin akichauve.
Ahivangin thudih'a chonphat bol ho vang chun Pathen lungdei abol'u chu mihon amuthei na dingin vah'a aum jinguve.” Tuilutsah John in Jesu achoisang
Chuin Jesu leh seijuiten Jerusalem adalhauvin, Judea gam thinglhang lam ajontauve; chukom a chun phat chomkhat a umkhom'un, miho baptize achansah jin ahi.
Hiche pet chun Tuilutsah John injong Salim koma Aenon mun'a twi ninglhing tah'a aum jeh chun, miho baptize achansah jin, chule aphat seh in, miho jong baptize chang dingin ahung jingun ahi.
Hichu John songkul'a akikhum masang ahi.
Hichun kisuhtheng na thudol'a John seijui ho leh Judah mi phabep kikah'a kinelna anasoh in ahi.
Hijeh chun John seijui ho ahenga ahung'un, ajah'a “Rabbi (hichu houhil tina ahi), Jordan luigala nakimupi a ama Messiah ahi tia nahettoh sah pa jong chun miho baptize achansah jin ahi. Chuleh mi tampi eiho henga hungtalouvin ama henga ache tauve,” atiuvin ahi.
Chuin John in adonbut'in “Pathen in vana kona apehlou chu, koima ima achangthei poi.
Keiman nahenguva kasei chu, nangho ahetoh'ah nahiuve; keima Christa kahipoi, ama lampi semtoh dinga hung kahi bouve.
Hiche hi ahi, mou kichenpia chu moulang ahin; chuleh moulang jolpa vang chu moulang koma adin'a moulang kitep na ajah chu akipana ahijenge. Hijeh chun ama lolhin na chun keima kipana dim'a eikoi ahi.
Ama chu khangtou touding, chule keima kemsuh suh ding kahi. Vana hungkon Jesu
Ama chunga hungkon ahin, mijouse sanga chung nungjo ahi; Eiho leiset'a kon ihiuvin, leiset thu iseiyu ahi, ahivangin ama chu chunga kon ahijeh in mi jouse chunga achungnungpen ahi.
Aman amu leh ajah chu ahettohsah ahi, ahivangin ama hettohsah chu koiman asangpoi.
Hijeh chun koi hileh, athu hettohsah tahsan'a kisan chun Pathen dihtah chu apomdet ahitai.
Ama chu Pathen hinsol ahi, Aman Pathen thutah aseiye, ajeh chu ama Pathen lhagao dimset'a kipe ahi.
Pa chun Achapa angailun, chule ima jouse ama khut'a apetai.
Hijeh chun, koi hijongleh Pathen tahsan'a chun tonsot hinna anei ahitai. Pathen chapa thungailou vang chu tonsot hinna changlouva Pathen lunghan na thutan chu achunga chu ding ahi,” ati.
Pakai chun John sangin seijui tamjo asem'in miho Baptize achansah jinge ti Pharisee hon ajatauve ti chu Jesun ahetan ahi.
Hichun Jesu amatah in baptize achansah lou vang'in, aseijuiten abol'u ahi.
Hijeh chun aman Judea gam adalhan Galilee gam'a akile tai.
Aman alampi'a chun Samaria gamsung ajotpa in;
Chutichun Samaria mite khokhat Sychar mun chu ahung lhungtai; hiche mun chu Jacob in achapa Joseph ana peh loumun kom ahi.
Chukom'a chu Jacob twikul um'ah ahi, Jesu chu lamsao ajotna'ah acholtan, twikul panga chun leltah in atouvin ahi; Hichu sunkim dontah ahi.
Hichun Samaria numei khat twithal dingin ahungin, Jesun amanu jah'a “Twi donding neipeh thei ding ham?” ati.
Hichepet a chu Jesu achangseh'a bou um ahi, ajehchu aseijuite khosunga anneh ding cho'a achedoh kah'u ahi.
Numeinu chu atija lheh e, ajehchu Judah hon Samaria miho chu athet uva imacha akikoppi ngailou'u ahi; hijehchun amanun Jesu jah'a “Nangla Judah mi nahin, keila Samaria numei kahin, ipi dinga keikom'a donding twi nathum ham?” ati.
Jesun adonbut'in amanu jah'a “Pathen thilpeh nachan ding hi henlang, chule naki houpi hi koi ahi hele chun nangin keikom'a nathum joh ding, chule keiman nangma hintwi pedinga,” ati.
Chuin amanun ajah'a, “Pu nangman athaldoh nading khao le bel jong neilouva, twikul jong athuh in, hintwi nati chu hoiya nalah ding ham?
Chukit jongleh hiche twikul eina peuva kapului'u Jacob sang'a nangma chung nungjo nahim? Amatah in anadon'a achate leh agancha ho anadonsah'a hiche twi sanga phajo hoiya nalah ding ham?” ati.
Jesun adonbut'in ajah'a, “Koi hileh hiche twi don'a chu dangchah kit ding ahi.
Ahivangin Keiman kapeh ding twidon jouse chu a itih'a dangchah kitlou ding, amaho chu asung uva hintwi put'a twinah theng soh ding, chule tonsot hinna chang ding ahiuve.”
Chuin numeinun ajah'a “Pu lungset in hiche twi chu kei neipen, chuteng avel'a kadang chah kitlou na ding, chuleh hilai mun'a twithal'a kahungkit lou nadingin,” ati.
Chuin Jesun amanu jah'a, “Chenlang najipa gakouvin,” ati.
Amanun adonbut'in, “Keiman ji kaneipoi,” ati, hichun Jesun ajah'a, “Nasei dih'e, nangman ji kicheh naneipoi,” ati.
“Nangman ji ngatah naneitan chule tua naum khompi pa jong khu naji tah ahipoi, nasei dih lheh jenge,” ati.
Chuin numeinun ajah'a, “Pu nangma themgao khat nahi.
Ahile neisei peh in ipi dinga keiho Samaria mihon, kapuluiteu bolbanga hiche Gerizim mol'a Pathen kahou'uva, ahivanga nangho Judah mihon Pathen houna ding mun chu Jerusalem bou ahi, natiu ham?” ati.
Jesun adonbut'in, “Numei neitahsan in nanghon Pathen nahou na dingu mun chu hiche mol'a jong hilou, chuleh Jerusalem'a jong hilou, phat chu ahung lhunge.
Nangho Samaria mihon nahet chen lou u nahouvun, ahivangin keiho Judah mihon vang kahou'u ama chu kahet chen'u ahi; ajehchu huhhingna chu Judahte a kona hung ahibouve.
Ahivangin phat chu ahung lhunge, tutah hi ahi, ahou tahbeh hon Pachu Lhagao leh thutah'a ahouding phat; ajeh chu Pa chun chutobanga houho bou chu ama hou dinga ahol ahi.
Ajehchu Pathen chu lhagao ahin, ahouten lhagao leh thutah'a ahou ding mong ahi” ati.
Chuin numeinun ajah'a, “Keiman Messiah hung ding chu kahenai, ama chu Christa ahi. Ama chu ahung tengleh aman ijakai eihil dingu ahi,” ati.
Chuin Jesun amanu jah'a, “Keima Christa chu kahi,” ati.
Hiche pettah chun, aseijuite ahung kiletauve, amahon Jesu leh numeinu kihou chu amu'uvin, atija lheh jengun ahi, ahivangin koiman ajah'a, “Amanu henga ipi nathum ham?” ahilouleh, “Ipi dinga amanu naki houpi ham?” tia dong ngam aum pouve.
Hichun numeinu chun a twibel chu twikul panga adalhan khosung lam'a alelhai kit'in miho jouse henga;
“Hungun mikhat hungveu vin, aman kathilbol leh kachon na jouse aseidoh soh keiye, Ama hi Christa hitei yinte,” ati.
Chuin khosunga kon chun mipi tamtah ahung potdoh'un ama chu ahung veuvin ahi.
Hichepet chun aseijuiten Jesu heng'ah, “Rabbi an themkhat beh nen,” atiuve.
Ahivangin Jesun adonbut'in, “Keiman nangho het phahlou anneh kaneiye,” ati.
Hichun aseijuite amaho akidong touvin, “Eiho chedoh kah'a mikhat touvin anneh ding ahin choipeh khat ham?” atiuve.
Chuin Jesun ahilchen in ajah'uva, “Eisolpa Pathen lunggot lam bol leh akin subulhit chu keima anneh ahi,” ati.
“Nanghon changphu'a pat chang at khom na ding lha li alut'e natiuvin ahi, ahivangin keiman najah uva kasei ahi, khodah uvin loujao khu veuvin, chang amin in a-atphat val ahitai.
Chang-at chun atha man akisanji mong ahi, chule a-atkhom lousoh ga chu miho tonsot hinna'a apuilut chu ahi; chutia chu aphut pa le a atpa anilhon'a kipahkhom jiahi.
Akisei ji bang chun, ‘mikhat in aphut in adang khat in a-at khomji,’” kiti chu adihtah ahi.
Hijeh chun keiman nangho, na phulou nauva a-atkhom dinga kasol nahiuve; midang in atoh gimnasa chu nanghon aga nakhop tup'u ahi. Samaria Mihon Jesu Atahsan'u
Numeinu chun, “Kathilbol leh kachon na jouse eisei doh peh'e,” tia ahet tohsah'a kon chun, chuche kho'a Samaria mi tamtah'in Jesu chu atahsan tauve.
Chuin amaho Jesu henga ahung'un, akom'uva umden dingin a ngeh'un ahi, chuin Jesu chukom'a chun nikho ni achongden tan ahi;
Chua aumsung chun mi tamtah'in athusei ajah'uva kon chun ama chu atahsan tauve.
Chuin amahon numeinu jah'a, “Nangma thu hettohsah jengseh hilouvin, keiho tah in ama thusei kajauvin, tun katahsan tauve, chuleh amahi vannoi huhhing dihtah ahi kahechen tauve,” atiuvin ahi. Galilee mihon Jesu asan u
Chua ni ni achon jou chun, Jesun Galilee ajontai.
Jesu amatah in themgao chu achenna agamsung'a jabol na achangpoi, tia anasei dohsa ahi.
Ahijeng vang chun Galilee miten ama chu ana sanguve, ajehchu amaho chu kalchuh kut laiya Jerusalem'a ana um uva, chumun'a Jesu thilbol ho ana musoh keiyu ahi.
Aman Galilee gamsung ajot'in twisih lengpi twi asosah na Cana kho'a chun ache kit'in ahi, chuche kho koma Capernaum kho'a chun vaipo milal khat a um'in, achapa chu ha dammo lheh jeng ahi.
Chuin aman Jesu chu Judea gam'a kon'in Galilee gam'a ahunge ti ajah phat in, amatah Jesu henga achen, Capernaum geiya ahunga achapa ahung damsah dingin ataotai, ajeh chu achapa chu athikon cha ahitai.
Jesun ajah'a, “Melchih na kidang hicheng hohi mulou hile chun neitahsan nadem?” ati.
Hichun vaipopa chun, “Pakai lungset in kachapa athi masang in hungin,” tin ataotai.
Jesun amapa jah'a, “Na in'ah kiletan nachapa ahinge!” ati. Chuin mipa chun, Jesu thusei chu atahsan in, a inlam ajontai.
Chuin mipa chu a In alhun masang in, asohten lampia ahung lamtou vin, achapa damtheng thu chu ahung seipeh uvin ahi.
Hichun aman asohte jah'a, “Itih phat a chu damdoh ham?” tin adongin ahileh, amahon, “Janhi sun nidan khat dontah chun akhosih abeitai,” atiuvin ahi.
Chuin mipa chun hiche phat laitah chu, Jesun ajah'a nachapa ahinge tia aseipet tah ahi chu ahedohtan ahi; hiche jeh chun ama leh a Insung mite chengsen Jesu atahsan tauve.
Hiche hi Judea gam'a kon'a Galilee gam'a ahungna'a Jesun melchihna kidang abol aniveina ahitai.
Hiche jou chun, Judah ho kut nikho thengho jeh'in Jesu chu Jerusalem'a akile kit in ahi.
Khopi sunglam'a kelngoi kotphung koma chun, Bethsaida kiti twikul khat aum in akimvel'a chu leibuh nga kisa ahi.
Hiche mun'a chu ana damlou mitcho, elbai, langthi, chatmo tampi lum ahiuve, ajehchu twi kicholing ngah jing'a um ahiuve.
Ajeh chu phatkhat kom kom leh Pakai Vantil hungkum lha jia, twi chu acholing ji ahi; chuleh twi kicholoh nung'a twilah'a kumlha masapen pen chu itobang natna hijong leh damhel ji ahi.
Hilai mun'a umho lah'a mikhat chu kum somthum leh kum get jen nakong chatmo'a lum ahitai.
Jesun amapa chu amun, kum sottah damlou va um ahi ahen, amapa jah'a, “Nadam nom em?” ati.
Nakong chatmo pa chun, “Pu kadam joulou hila, twi akicholing teng twikul'a eikoi lhavah ding mi kaneipon, keima kacheji le kalhun masangin midang amasa jitai,” ati.
Chuin Jesun ajah'a, “Kipat doh in nalupna pheh kichoiyin lam jottan,” ati.
Apettah chun mipa chu adamtan ahi, hichun aman alupna pheh chu akijel doh in lam ajottai, hiche thil kidang aso ni chu Cholngahni ahi.
Hijeh chun Judah vaipo hon hichu ajadauvin, akisu dampa jah'a “Cholngah nikho'a natoh phal ahipoi, nangman nalupna pheh nakichoiya lam najot chu dan ngai ahipoi,” atiuve.
Ahivangin amapan adonbut'in ajah'a, “Eisudampa amatah in kajah'a nalupna kichoiyin lam jottan eiti chula em,” ati.
Chuin amahon, “Koi ham najah'a chutia sei chu?” atiuve.
Ahinla mipa chun, asudampa chu koi ahi ahepoi, ajeh chu Jesu mipi lah'a achelut mangtan ahi.
Ahivangin chom khat jouvin, Jesun amapa chu Houin'ah amun ajah'a, “Tua hi akisudam nahitai, chonse kit tahih in, ajole akhohjo cheh nachunga chuget inte,” ati.
Chuin mipa chun Judah vaipo ho jah'a ama sudam chu Jesu ahi ti agaseitan ahi.
Hijeh chun Judah vaipo hon Jesu amatah in Cholngah nikho apalkeh jeh in, achunga bolsetna apantauvin ahi.
Ahivangin Jesun adonbut'in, “Kapan aphat jousen na atongin, keiman jong katong jinge,” ati.
Hiche jeh tah chun, Judah vaipo hon Jesu thana ding aha hol cheh tauvin ahi, ajehchu aman Cholngah nikho apalkeh keo hilouvin, Pathen chu apa ahisah a chuleh Pathen toh kibanga aumjeh chu ahi.
Hijeh chun Jesun ahilchen in, ajah'uva, “Thutah chu nangho kaseipeh nahiuve, Chapa chun ama cham cham in ima abolpoi; Pan abol amu ho chacha bou chu aman abolji ahi, hijeh chun Pan abol jouse chu Chapan jong abol ahi.
Ajehchu Pan chapa chu angailun, anatoh athilbol jouse avetsah in ahi. Chule tahbeh in Pa chun hiche mipa kisuhdam na sanga chungnungjo avetsah ding ahi, hichu nanghon kidang nasah cheh dingu ahi.
Ajeh chu Pan mithi ho akaithouva ahinsah ji bang chun Chapan jong ahinsah nom ho chu hinna apeh ji ahi.
Chuleh Pan koima thu atanpoi, aman thutanna leh thuneina jouse abon'a Chapa apeh ahitai.
Hiti ahijeh chun, mijousen Pa ajabol banga Chapa chu ajabol cheh ding ahi; ajeh chu Chapa jabol lou chun ahinsol'a Pachu ajabollou ahi.
Keiman atahbeh chu nangho kaseipeh nahiuve, kathusei ngaiya chuleh eisolpa Pathen tahsan'a chun tonsot hinna anei ahitai; amaho chu a itih'a chonset themmo channa geita louva thina akon'a hinna galkai ahitauve.
Chuleh keiman nangho tahbeh'a kaseipeh nahiuve, phat chu ahung lhunge, tuhi ahi, mithi hon ka aw (Pathen Chapa aw) ajah ding'u, chuleh aja chengse hing ding ahiuve.
Ajeh chu Pa chun ama'a hinna anei ahin, chuleh aman hiche hinna pe thanei na chu Chapa apeh ahitai.
Chuleh aman mi jouse chung'a thutanna leh thuneina chu chapa apeh ahitai, ajeh chu ama Mihem Chapa ahi.
Hijeh chun nangho lung dong hih'un, phat chu ahung lhunge, lhankhuh'a mithi ho jousen Pathen chapa Aw ajah ding'u;
Chuleh amaho thoukit ding, chuleh thilpha bol ho chu tonsot hinna a thoukit ding, chule thilpha lou bolho chu thupi tanna'a themmo chang'a thoukit ding ahiuve.
Chuleh keiman kacham in ima kabol theipoi, Pathen in eisei peh banga thutanna kanei ahijeh in, kathutan chu dihtah ahi, ajeh chu keima lunggot lam hilouva eisolpa ama lunggot lam'a kabol ahi.
Chule kachungthu chu keima man kahet tohsah leh kathu hettohsah chu adih'a pomthei hilou ding ahi.
Ahivangin keima chungthu chu midang khat'in jong ahettohsah'a ahileh tahbeh'a kaseipeh nahiuve, amapan ahettohsah keima chungthu jouse chu adih ahi.
Chuleh nanghon John Baptist henga thu kholtoh dingin mi nasol'un, chuleh aman kachung chang thu dihtah chu ahettoh sahtai.
Keiman mihem a kon hettohsah kangaipoi, ahivangin nangho huhhing'a naum na ding'uva hiche hi kasei ahi.
John chu meivah koujing leh vahjing tobang ahin, chuleh ama thusei chu nanghon chomkhat dinga bou nalunglut piu ahi.
Ahivangin, keiman John sanga chung nungjo hettohsah kaneiye-hiche kathuhil leh melchihna kidang kabol hi ahi. Chuleh Pan eisol lona photchenna dinga, hiche hohi kabol dinga eipeh ahi.
Chuleh eihin sol'a Pa amatah chun kachungthu ahettohsah ahitai, nanghon a imatih in ama aw najakha pouve, chuleh kimaito pin jong namukha pouve.
Chuleh nalung sung'uva ama thusei achengpoi; ajehchu aman nangho dinga ahinsol keima hi natahsan pouve.
Nanghon Pathen Lekhabu thu nahol'un, ajeh chu hiche ho chun tonsot hinna napeh dan'un nagel uve, ahivangin Pathen Lekhabu'a thuchun, keima thudol ahettohsah ahibouve.
Ahivangin nanghon hiche hinna chu chantheina dingin keima henga nahung nompouve.
Chule nangho phatsah peh chu keima dingin a ngaikhoh poi.
Ijeh inem itileh, Pathen ngailutna chu nasung'uvah achengpoi ti kahei.
Ajeh chu keima kapa min'a naheng'uva kahung ahin, nanghon neisang pouve. Ahinlah midangho chu amaho min'a naheng'uva ahungleh kipahtah in nasang'uve.
Chule nanghon natahsan theilou chu datmo aumpoi, ajeh chu nanghon khat leh khat kijabolto natha noppiuvin, Pathen khatseh ama ahung kon chu, jabol ding nakhoh sah pouve.
Hijeng jongleh Pa ang'a themmon achansah ding'u chu keima kahipoi; nanghon nakinep piu Mose chun themmo na chan sah dingu ahi.
Chuleh nanghon Mose chu natahsan tahtah'u ahileh keima neitahsan dingu ahi, ajeh chu aman keima thudol asut ahibouve.
Ahivangin nanghon Mose chu natahsan lou jeh'un kathu sei hohi nanghon iti natahsan dingu ham?” ati.
Hiche jeh chun Jesu chun Galilee dillen (Tiberias dillen tiajong kihe) agalkaiyin alangkhat gal langa chun achetan ahi.
Chuin mihonpi tamtah'in, melchih na kidang abolho leh anaho asuhdam amu jeh'u chun achena chan'a anung ajui tauve.
Chuin Jesu chu mol chung khat'a akal touvin, aseijui ho toh atoukhom'uvin ahi.
Hichu Judah ho kalchuh kut nikho koncha ahitai.
Hichun mihonpi tamtah ama henglam jon'a ahung'u chu Jesun amun Philip jah'a, “Mipi hijat nehding changlhah hoiya ichoh dingu hitam,” ati.
Hiche hi Philip patep na a asei ahibouve, aman abol ding ageltoh sa ahitai.
Hichun Philip in adonbut'in, “Eihon kum lhungin na tong jong leu hen mi hijat in themkhat khat'a aneh khop'u chohna ding kinga jouponte,” ati.
Chuin Simon Peter sopipa, Andrew chun ajah'uva.
“Hilaiya chapang khat in changlhah pheng nga leh nga ni aneiye, ahivangin mipi hijat lah'a hicheng hi ipia pang kham ding ham,” ati.
Hichun Jesun ajah'uva, “Miho jouse chu tousah'un,” ati; chuin amaho chu abon'un hamhing chung'a chun atoutauve. (Numei chapang simlouvin mipilhing sangnga jen ahive).
Chuin Jesun changlhah chu alan, Pathen athangvah'in miho hoppeh dingin apedohtai; chujouvin aman nga jong chutima chun abol in, chuleh mipi ho chun avaset cheh in ane tauve.
Hitichun amitakip ava soh phat'un, Jesun aseijui ho jah'a, “Tun neh moh chengse loh khom'un, moh suhmang hih un,” ati.
Chuin amahon changlhah pheng nga-a kon'a mipi nehmoh anong aval chengse aloh khom'un ahileh paipeh som le paipeh ni aloh dim'un ahi.
Chuin amahon, Jesun hiche melchih na kidang abol chu amuphat'un, atija behseh un, “Eihon themgao ina nga jingu chu ama hi ahi mong monge,” atiuve.
Chuin amahon Jesu chu ada achamlouva alengpau hisah ding agotauve, ti ahet jeh in, ama achangin thinglhang lam'a akilep mangtan ahi. Jesun twi chunga lam ajot
Chuin nilhah ahiphat in aseijuite dillen pang lam'a acheuvin, Jesu angah tauve.
Ahivangin khothim geiya Jesu ahung kile lou phat'in, amaho kongsunga alut'un, Capernaum lam jon'in akitol tauvin ahi.
Chuin phulou helouvin hui hattah khat in amaho chu ahinno khum'in twi kinong chu asang jep asang jep'in, akhohse lheh jengtai.
Hitichun amaho mile li vel akitol lhungun, phulou helouvin Jesu amaho lam jon'a twi chunga lam ahinjot chu amu uvin, akicha lheh jeng'un ahi.
Ahivangin Jesun amaho akouvin, “Kicha hih'un keima kahi bouve,” ati.
Chuphat in aseijuiten, Jesu chu kong sunga lutsah loi ding athanom'un hetman lou kah chun ajotnau mun alhung tauve.
Ajingin dillen panga mihonpi umho chun, seijui hon kong khat umsun chu alah'uva akitol'u chu amu'uvin chuleh amaho lah'a Jesu ajaopoi ti aheuvin ahi.
Chuleh Tiberias a kon'a hung lhung kong dang tamtah, Jesun changlhah phatthei aboh a mipin anehnau mun koma chu uma ahi.
Hijeh chun mihonpi chun, Jesu leh aseijuite chukom'a aum tapouve ti amuphat'un amaho jong kong hoa chun alut'un Jesu hol in Capernaum lang agal kaitauvin ahi.
Chuin amahon dil gal lang khat'a Jesu amuphat'un, “Rabbi nangma itih'a hilai mun nalhun ham?” atiuve.
Chuin Jesun amaho chu adonbut'in, “Keiman nangho tahbeh'a kaseipeh nahiuve, nanghon keima neihol'u hi neh ding changlhah kapeh jeh'a bou ahin, melchihna kidang kabol ho nahet chen jeh'uva ahipoi.
Hijeh chun, amang thahji nehding holnan hibang lom'in kisugim hih'un, hisang chun mihem chapan napeh ding'u tonsot hinna joh chu hol'in kisugim jouvin; ajehchu Pa Pathen in keima hiche dinga chu Mohor einamdet ahitai,” ati.
Chuin amahon adonbut'un, “Keihon jong Pathen'a ding na katoh nom'uve; ipi kabol dingu ham?” atiuve.
Jesun ajah'uva, “Hiche bou hi Pathen in nanghoa kon'a adei natoh chu ahi, ahinsolpa hi tahsan un,” ati.
Hichun amahon adonbut'un, “Nang katahsan thei nading'un ipi ham nabolthei melchihna kidang khat neimu sah un,” atiuve.
“Chule kapu kapateu chun gamthip ajotlaiyun manna aneuvin ahi, hichu Pathen Lekhabun asei Mose in amaho chu van'a kona changlhah neh ding apeuve,” kiti chu ahi.
Chuin Jesun ajah'uva, “Keiman nangho atahbeh kaseipeh nahiuve, Mose in vana kon changlhah apekhapoi, kapan apeh ahi, chuleh tun nangho dingin van'a kon changlhah tahbeh chu apetai.
Pathen a kon'a changlhah tahbeh chu, van'a kona hung kumlha-a vannoiya hinna pea amabou chu ahi.”
Chuin amahon ajah'a, “Pu chuche changlhah chu keiho aniseh'in neipeuvin,” atiuve.
Jesun adonbut'in, “Keima hinna changlhah kahi, koi hileh kahenga hung jouse gilkel kitlou ding, chuleh koi hileh keima eitahsan jouse a itih'a dangchah kitlou ding ahi.”
Ahivangin nanghon keima neimu vang'un neitahsan deh pouve.
Hijongleh, Paneipeh chengse ho chu kahenga hung ding ahiuve, chuleh keiman amaho chu kaledoh louhel ding ahi.
Ajeh chu keima eihin solpa Pathen lunglam bol dinga vana kon'a hung kumlha kahin keima lunggot bol dinga hung kahipoi.
Chuleh Pathen lunglam chu hiche ahi, Aman keima eipeh chengse hi khatcha mansah louva, ni nunung nileh amaho kakai thou ding ahi.
Ajeh chu hiche hi kapa lunglam ahi, Chapa mua chuleh tahsan jousen tonsot hinna anei ahitai; keiman amaho chu ni nunung nileh kakai thou ding ahi, ati.
Chuin Judah ho chu lunglhai lou tah'in aphun gam tauve, ajeh chu Jesun, “Keima vana kon'a hung kumlha hinna changlhah kahi,” ati.
Hichun amaho akihouvun, “Hichepa hi Joseph chapa Jesu hilou ham? Apa leh anu kihe'a iti aman keima vana kon'a hung kumlha kahi atithei ham?” atiuve.
Ahivangin Jesun adonbut'in, “Kathusei ho jeh in phun hih un.
Ajeh chu keima eihinsol'a Pa chun kahenga aloilut ho tilou chu koima ama cham in, kahenga ahung thei poi, chuleh keiman amaho chu ni nunung nileh kakai thou ding ahi.
Pathen Lekhabu'a Pathen in amaho abon'uva ahilding ahi, kitibang chun, koi hileh Pa thu ngaiya chuleh ama a kon'a kihil ho bou chu kahenga hungji ahiuve.
Chule koiman Pathen amukhapoi, Pathen'a kon hung kisol amabou chun Pathen chu amu ahi.
Keiman nangho tahbeh'a kaseipeh nahiuve, koi hileh ama tahsan chan chun tonsot hinna anei ahitai.
Keima hinna changlhah kahi.
Napu napateu vin gamthip'a manna aneuvin, ahivangin amaho abon'un athisoh heltauve.
Koihileh vana kon'a changlhah neho vang chu a itih'a thita lou ding ahi.”
Keima vana kon hung kumlha changlhah hing chu kahi, koi hileh hiche changlhah neho chu tonsot'a hing ding ahi; chuleh vannoi hinna dinga kapeh ding changlhah chu katahsa hi ahi.
Chuin miho chu khat leh khat Jesu thuseidoh chun akinel'un, “Iti hichepan atahsa chu eiho nehding'a apeh thei ding ham?” atiuvin ahi.
Hichun Jesun adonbut'in, “Keiman nangho tahbeh'a kaseipeh nahiuve, nanghon Mihem Chapa sa naneh lou'uva chuleh athisan nadonlou'uleh, nasung'uva tonsot hinna naneilou dingu ahi.
Ahivangin koi hileh kasa ne'a, chuleh kathisan don'a vang chun tonsot hinna anei ahitai. Chuleh keiman ama chu ni nunung nileh kakai thou ding ahi.
Ajeh chu nehding tahbeh chu kasa ahin, chule donding tahbeh chu kathisan ahi.
Hijeh chun koi hileh kasa ne'a chuleh kathisan don'a chu keima sunga ama aum'in chuleh ama sunga keima ka um'in ahi.
Chule eihinsol'a hing jing Pa jal'a keima hing kahi; hiche bang chun keima'a kon'a kivah chu keima jal'a hing ding ahi.
Ajeh chu keima vana kon'a hung kumlha changlhah tahbeh chu kahi, hijeh chun koi hileh hiche changlhah ne'a chu, napu napa teuvin Manna ana neh'uva athisoh hel'u bang hita louva, amaho chu tonsot'a hing jing ding ahiuve.”
Thu hicheng hi aman Capernaum kho'a kikhop na In'a athuhil pet'a asei ahi.
Chuin aseijuiten ajah'a, “Hiche thuhi hetchen ahahsa vale koiman sangthei ponte,” atiuve.
Hichun Jesun aseijuite alung himo thim'u chu ahen, ajah'uva, “Hiche kathusei hin nalungu asuh noh phah hitam?
Achutileh nanghon Mihem Chapa vana lahtou va aum mukit leu chun, ipi nati tadiu vem?
Lhagao bouvin tonsot hinna apehji ahi, Mihem tahsa kihabol in ima abukim joupoi, chuleh keiman najah uva kasei doh thucheng hohi, abon'a Lhagao leh hinna thu ahi.
Ahivangin nalah'uva keima eitahsan lou na um'uve,” ati, ajeh chu Jesun atil'a pat'a koiham ama tahsan lou chuleh koiham ama pedoh ding ti ahetsa ahitai.
Chuin aman ajah'uva, “Hiche jeh'a chu Pan eipeh lou chu mi koima kahenga ahung theipoi, tia kasei ahi,” ati.
Hiche apat chun, aseijui ho tamtah ache mang'un, ama adalha tauvin ahi.
Chuin Jesun somle ni ho jah'a adongin, “Nanghon jong neidalhah dingu ham?” ati.
Hichun Simon Peter in adonbut'in, “Pakai koi henga kache ding'u ham? Tonsot hinna pe'a thunei nangbou nahi.
Keihon nangma Pathen theng khat seh nahi kaheuve, hichu katahsan uve,” ati.
Chuin Jesun ajah'uva, “keiman nangho somle ni kalhendoh nahiuvin, ahivangin nalah'uva satan khat aume,” ati.
Hichu aman alhen doh somle ni ho lah'a Simon Iscariot chapa Judas in khonunga ama apehdoh ding aseina ahi. Asopi hon Jesu atahsan lou
Hiche jou chun, Jesun Galilee gamsung muntin achon'in avahlen ahi, ajeh chu Judah vaipo hon ama thadinga agot jeh'un, ama Judea gam'a chun aumnom tapon ahi.
Ahivangin hiche pet chu Judah te lhambuh kut kon cha ahijeh chun,
Asopiten Jesu jah'a, “Hilai mun dalhan lang Judea gam'a chen, chukom'a chu naseijuiten thil kidang nabol hohi amuthei ding'u ahi.
Hitia nakisel leh iti namin kithang ding ham? Hitobang thil kidang hohi nabol dingleh vannoi kimu sah in,” atiuve.
Ajeh chu asopi ho jengin jong ama chu atahsan lou ahi.
Hichun Jesun adonbut'in, “Tuhi kei che na dinga phatpha ahipoi, ahivangin nangho chena dingin phat jouse ahitheiye.
Chuleh vannoiyin nangho nadou pouve, keima bou eidou'u ahi, ajeh chu amahon setna aboljeh'uva kaphoji ahi.
Chule nangho cheuvin, keima chethei ponge, ajeh chu keima phat alhing jep poi,” ati.
Chule thil hicheng aseijou chun Jesu Galilee gam'a aumden in ahi. Lhambuh Kut laiya Jesu
Ahivangin asopiho kut'a achejou nung'un, mipi ho kimu sah louvin, Jesu jong guhthim in achen ahi.
Kut lai chun Judah vaipo hon Jesu chu ahol'un, mipi lah'a khat khat henga chun Jesu namu em? tin adong leuvin ahi.
Hichun mipi holah'a, Jesu chung chang kinel bautam na asoh dohtan ahi, mi phabep chun, Jesu chu mipha ahi, atiuvin, ahivangin adang phabep chun Jesu chu imacha hilou mi lhem chavai bou ahi, atiuvin ahi.
Ahivangin Judah vaipo hon abol genthei diu ginna jal chun, Jesu thudol panpi na mipi maiya ngamtah'a seiphong ding koima a umpouvin ahi.
Chuin kut kibol kimlai tah chun, Jesu Houin'ah achetouvin chuleh thu ahilpantan ahi.
Athusei ajah'u chun Judah ho chu alung dong lheh un, “Hichepa hin kijil na neilou hel'a iti thil hijat hi ahet ham?” atiuvin ahi.
Hijeh chun Jesun ajah'uva, “Kathu hil hi keima cham'a hung kon ahipon, eihin sol'a Pathen'a kon ahi.
Koi hileh Pathen lunglam hol'a bol ding go'a chun kathu hil hi keima cham'a ham ahilou leh Pathen'a kon ham ti ahet ding ahi.
Ajeh chu ama cham'a thuhil chun, ama chang kichoi-at na adeiyun, ahivangin ahinsol pa jabol na leh choi-at na holpa vang chun thutah asei ahi, ama a chun jou aumpoi.
Mose in danthu napeh'u ahin, ahivangin nangho khat in jong najui pouve, nanghon keima tha tahtah dinga neigot jingu ahi,” ati.
Chuin mipi chun adonbut'un, “Koiham nang tha dinga nagong'ah? Nanghi thilha vop nahi bouve,” atiuve.
Jesun adonbut'in, “Keiman Cholngah nikhoa thil kidang khat kabol chu nanghon nadatmo lheh uve.
Ahivangin nanghon jong nabol'uve, Mose dan thupeh palkeh lou bangtah in Cholngah nikhon mi chep natan peh jiuve; tahbeh mongin cheptan hi Mose danthu peh um masanga napului teuvin ana phudohsa ahitai.
Chuleh nanghon nachapa teu cheptan nikho chu Cholngah ni ato khah jongleh Mose dan thupeh palkeh lou bangin hichu nabol jiuve, achutile ipi dinga keiman Cholngah nikho'a mi kasuh dam chu nanghon nalunghan piu ham?
Hijeh chun kun'un noilang veuvin, kingaito phauvin, chutileh adihtah chu nahet ding'u ahi,” ati.
Hichun Jerusalem miho chu amaho leh amaho aki dong touvin, “Vaipo hon tha dinga agot jing'u chu hichepa hi hilou ham?
Amapa la hilaiya aum in, phongtah in mipi lah'a thu aseiyin, chuleh vaipo hon jong ima alopouve. Achutileh amahon jong hichepa hi Messiah ahi ti apom ngap'u ahitadem?
Ahivangin amapa hi hichu iti hithei ding ham? Eihon ama ahung konna kihesoh keiya, Messiah vang chu ahung tengleh koiman ahung konna ahetlou ding, hung kilah jeng ding ahibouve,” atiuvin ahi.
Chuin Jesun Houin'a athuhil pet chun, ajah'uva, “Adih'e, nanghon keima neiheuve, chuleh kahung konna jong naheuve, ahivangin keima kacham'a hilaiya um kahipoi, keima eihinsolpa chu thudihtah ahi, chuleh nanghon ama chu nahe pouve.
Ahivangin keiman ama kahe chen'e, ajeh chu keima ama-a hung kon kahi, chuleh aman keima naheng'uva eihinsol ahi,” ati.
Chuin vaipo hon ama chu mat ding agouvin, ahivangin ama phat alhin lou lai jeh in, koiman achunga khut alhapouve.
Hichun Houin'a um mitamtah chun Jesu atahsan tauve, chule amaho akihouvun, “Messiah ahung teng, hichepan abol kalval'a nasajo melchih na kidang abolnah ding ham?” atiuvin ahi.
Chuin mihonpi chu, Jesu thudol akihoulhih melmul'u chu Pharisee hon ajahdoh phat'un, thempu pipui hotoh kijaton, Jesu man dingin Houin ngah ho chu asol tauvin ahi.
Ahivangin Jesun ajah'uva, “Keima nangho toh phat chomcha bou ka umkhom ding ahi, chuleh keima eihinsolpa heng'a kakile kit ding ahi.
Nanghon keima neihol'un natin, neimulou dingu ahi, chuleh keima chena'a chu nangho nahung thei lou dingu ahi,” ati.
Chuin Judah vaipo ho chun, hiche Jesu thusei chu adatmo lheh un ahi, amaho akidong touvin, “Hichepa hi hoilanga che ding kigo ham? Oleh, amahi hiche gam dalha'a mun danga um Judah ho henga cheding kigo ahidem? Amahin Greek miho jeng jong agahil got hinte.
Chuleh ipi aseina mong ahidem? Nanghon neihol'un natin, neimulou dingu chuleh keima chena'a chu nangho nahung theilou dingu atihi,” akitiuvin ahi.
Chuin kut kichaini aniloupi pen nin, Jesu mihonpi lah'a ading doh'in, ajah'uva, “Koi hileh adangchah'a chu kahenga hunghen.
Koi hileh keima eitahsan'a chu kahenga hunghen chuleh hungdon hen, ajeh chu Pathen lekhabun aphondoh banga ama lung sunga kon'a chu twi hing luiya longdoh ding ahi,” tin asamtai.
Aman twi-hing ati chu ama tahsan jouse chunga Lhagao aum ding aseina ahi, ahivangin Jesu chu aloupina'a alut loulai jeh'in hiche Lhagao chu kipeloulai ahiuve.
Chuin mihonpi chun, hiche asei chu ajauvin, alah'uva phabep chun, “Hichepa hi inga jingu themgao pachu hitei yinte,” atiuvin ahi.
Chuleh adang phabep chun, “Amapa hi Messiah ahi,” atiuvin ahi, ahivangin adang phabep chun, “Hiponte, iti Messiah chu Galilee gam'a hungsoh doh thei ding ham?” atiuvin ahi.
Ajeh chu Pathen lekhabu'a kicheh tah'a kiphong dohsa bangin, Messiah chu David chilhah hiding, David khopi Bethlehem a kon hiding ahibouve, atiuvin ahi.
Hijeh chun, Jesu chung chang thua, mihonpi chu akikhen tel gamtauvin ahi.
Chuleh alah'uva mi phabep chun, Jesu chu mat tei ding angaitou vin, ahivang in koiman achunga khut alhapouve. Judah vaipo hon Jesu atahsan lou
Chuin Houin ngah sottol le ho chu Jesu manlouva ahung kile phat'un, thempu pipui holeh Pharisee ho chun ajah'uva, “Ibol'a ama nahin puilut lou u ham?” tin adongun ahi.
Houin ngah sottol le hon adonbut'un, “Keihon hichepa thusei tobang kaja khapouve,” atiuvin ahi.
Hichun Pharisee hon anuisat un, “Nangho jong lhep lhah'a na um'u hitam?
Eiho lah'a vaipo ho leh Pharisee ho khat beh injong amapa chu atahsan em?
Khohelou mihonpi in dan thupeh ima ahetlou jeh'uva ama nung ajuiyu ahibouve, chuleh achung'uva Pathen sapset chuding ahi,” atiuve.
Hichun masanga Jesu toh gakimuto sa vaipo lah'a khat amin Nicodemus chun, ajah'uva;
“Mikhat chu ama thu kija masa louva, achunga themmo chansah jeng chu dan ngai na ham?” ati.
Chuin amahon adonbut un, “Nang jong Galilee mi nahim? Pathen Lekhabu'a phet inlang sim'in Galilee gam'a kon'a themgao sohdoh khalou hel ahi,” atiuve.
Hichun akikhop nau aki khen'un mijousen a-in cheh akijot tauvin ahi.
Jesu chu Olive lhang lam'a akile kittai.
Ahivangin ajing jingkah matah in ama Houin'ah ahungkit in ahi. Chuin hetman louvin, mihonpi khat aheng'a ahung kikhom'un ama atouvin, amaho chu thu ahiltan ahi.
Hitia athuhil laitah chun, Danthu them hole Pharisee hon, ajonpet tah'a kiman numei khat ahin kaiyun, mipi lailunga chun adinsah'un ahi.
Hichun amahon Jesu jah'a, “Houhil hiche numei hi ajon pettah'a kiman ahi.
Hijeh chun Mose danthu peh dungjui in, amanu hi songa selih ding ahi, nangman ipi nagel em?” atiuve.
Hichu ama hehset na thei ding ikhat beh aseidoh khat leh tia thangkam peh ahiuve; ahivangin Jesu akun'in ima seilouvin akhut jungin tol chu ajih in ahi.
Hichun amahon Jesu chun adonbut teidinga ano jeh'un Jesu ading doh in ajah'uva, “Aphai nalah uva chonset bolkhalou hel pen penin amanu chu songin sep masa hen,” ati.
Chuin ama akun'in tol chu ajih kit in ahi.
Chuin amahon hichu ajah phat'un, atehpen'a pat aneopen geiyin ama ho khat khat in achemang gamtauvin, mihonpi lailunga chun Jesu changseh leh numeinu bou adalha tauvin ahi.
Hichun Jesu adingdoh in amanu jah'a, “Nahinkai ho hoilam gei hitauvem? Koiman themmo nachan lou hitam?” ati.
Hichun amanun, “Pakai koiman themmo eichan tapoi,” ati. Hichun Jesun amanu jah'a, “Keiman jong themmo kachan poi chetan, ahin tukal chonsekit tahih'in,” ati.
Chuin Jesun avelin miho jah'a, “Keima vannoi Vah kahi, kanung najui uleh nangho muthim'a vahle lou nahi tauve, ajeh chu nanghon hinna vah chu naneiyu ahitai,” ati.
Hichun Pharisee hon adonbut'un, “Na chungthu nangma tah in na hettoh sah chu hettoh sah dih ahipoi,” atiuve.
Hichun Jesun ajah'uva, “Kachungthu keima tah'in kahet tohsah hi, hettoh sah dihtah ahi. Ajeh chu keiman kahung kona leh kajot na ding kakihet in, ahivangin hichu nanghon nahe pouve.”
Chule nanghon tahsa mihem hina dol'in ka chungthu natan'un, keiman vang koima chungthu chuti chun katan jipoi.
Ijemtia thutanna kabol tah jongle, kathu tan jouse abon'a dihtah ahi; ajeh chu keima kachang kahipon, eihinsol'a Kapa toh kahilhon'e.
Ajeh chu nangho danthu dungjui in minin kitoh tah'a ahettoh sah leh hichu hettoh sah dihtah'a kipom ahi.
Hijeh chun, keima tah hettoh sah khat kahin, chuleh eihinsol'a kapa chu hettohsah adang khat chu ahi.
Hichun amahon adong'un, “Napa hoiya umham?” atiuve, Jesun adonbut'in, “Nanghon keima neihe pouve, kapa jong nahe pouve, keima neihe leu chun kapa jong nahet diu ahi,” ati.
Hicheng jouse chu, Jesun Houin sunga sumkhol na kiti mun'a athuhil pet'a asei ahi. Ahivangin anikho alhin jep loulai jeh in, koiman ama chu amanpoi.
Chujouvin Jesun avel in ajah'uva, “Keima kache mang ding ahi, nangho kache na-a nahung thei pouve, ajeh chu na chonset nau chu nathipi ding'u ahi,” ati.
Hichun miho chu akidong touvin, “Hiche pa hi ama leh ama kithat go khat ham? Chuleh kache na-a nangho nahung thei pouve ati hi ipi aseina ahidem?” atiuve.
Chuin Jesun avel in ajah'uva, “Nangho noiya kon nahiuvin, keima chunga kon kahi, chuleh nangho hiche vannoiya um nahiuvin, keima kahipoi.
Hiche jeh a chu najah'uva kasei ahi, nanghon keima koi kahi kahet tohsah hi natahsan lou uleh, na chonset nau chu nathipi teiding'u ahi,” ati.
Hichun amahon adong'un, Nang koi nahim? atiuve, Jesun adonbut'in, “Keima ama chu kahi tia kaseijing tah chula em,” ati.
“Keiman nangho chunga demna dingleh sei ding adim'in kaneiye, ahivangin seipong e; ajeh chu keima eisolpa chu thudihtah ahin, ama-a kon'a kajah ho bou kasei ahi.”
Ahivangin Jesun hiche asei chu, Pa thudol aseina ahiti amahon ahedoh thei deh pouve.
Hiche jeh chun, Jesun ajah'uva, “Nanghon Mihem Chapa chu thingpel a nadop sang teng'u leh ama chu keima tah kahi nahet dingu ahi, ajeh chu keiman kacham'a imacha kabolpoi, Pa chun eihil ho bou kasei ahi.
Chuleh keima eisolpa chun ei umpi jinge, aman kachangin eidalha poi, ajeh chu keiman phat jousen ama lunglhai na bou kabol jin ahi,” ati.
Chuin mitam tah in thu hicheng asei chu ajah phat'un, ama chu atahsan tauve.
Hichun Jesun ama tahsan ho henga chun, “Nangho kathuhil'a hi kitah tah'a na umjing'u leh nangho kaseijui tahbeh nahiuve.
Chuleh nanghon thutah chu heuvin natin, chuteng thutah chun nacham lhat sah dingu ahi,” ati.
Hichun amahon, ajah'a, “Keiho vang Abraham son leh pah kahiuve, keiho imatih in koima soh'in ka um khapouve; nangho nacham lhat sah ding'u nati chu ipi naseina ham?” atiuvin ahi.
Jesun adonbut'in, “Keiman atahbeh chu kaseipeh nahiuve, koi hileh chonset bol jinga chu chonset soh ahi.”
Chuleh soh chu insungmi tahtah ahiden thei poi, ahin chapa vang chu a itih'a insungmi dihtah ahijinge.
Hijeh chun, Chapa chun nangho nalha-ong'uva ahileh nangho achamlhat tahbeh nahiu ahitai.
Adih e, nangho Abraham son leh pah nahiu kahenai; ahivangin nanghon keima tha ding neigo jing'uve, ajeh chu nalung sung uva kathu hil hi alutpoi.
Chuleh keiman kapa koma kamu chengse nangho kaseipeh nahiuve, ahivangin nanghon napau thumop bou najuiuve.
Ama hon adonbut'un, “Kapau chu Abraham ahi,” atiuve, hichun Jesun ajah'uva, “Ahipoi,” nangho Abraham chate hileu chun, ama thilbol nung najui dingu ahi.
Ahinlah keiman Pathen'a kon'a kajah thutah cheng nangho kaseipeh jeh'un, nanghon keima tha ding neigo jinguve, Abraham chun imatih chan in chutobang thil abolpoi.
“Nanghon napau dihtah adang khat umchan najui'u ahibouve,” ati. Hichun amahon adonbut'un, “Keiho jaocha kahipouve, Pathen amatah chu kapau dihtah ahi,” atiuve.
Hichun Jesun ajah'uva, “Pathen chu napau ahileh nanghon keima nei ngailut dingu ahi. Ajeh chu keima Pathen'a kon hung kipan kahi. Keima kacham'a hung kahipoi, aman eihin sol ahibouve.
Chuleh nanghon ibol'a kathusei nahet thei lou'u ham? hiche hi nanghon kathu sei nangailou jeh'u ahi.
Nangho napau Satan chate nahi jeh'un, ama thilbol aphalou ho bol ding nanomui, ama chu atil'a pat'a tolthat ahin, ama-a thutah'a umlou jeh chun, phat jousen aman thutah ahot in ahi; aman jou asei chu achonna'a behden ahitai, ajeh chu ama mijou ahin, jou kondon na pa ahi.
Hijeh a chu keiman nangho thutah kasei peh'u jongleh nanghon keima neitahsan theilou'u ahi.
Chuleh nangho koipen in hettohsah kichehtah'a mi chonse kahina nei ngoh thei uvem? Achutileh na henguva keiman thutah kasei ahi, ibol'a neitahsan lou'u ham?
Hijeh chun koi hileh Pathen'a hiho chun kipah tah in Pathen thu angaiyun ahi; ahivangin nangho Pathen'a nahilou jeh'un athu na ngaipouve,” ati.
Chuin amahon ajah'a, “Nangma Samaria mi nahin, thilha vop nahi tia kana seijingu hita lou ham?” atiuve.
Jesun adonbut'in, “Kahipoi, keima thilhavop kahipoi, ajeh chu keiman kapa kajabol ahin, nanghon keima neija bol pouve.
Ahivangin, keiman keima chang kichoi-at kaholpoi, Pathen in keima eichoi sang dingbou ahi; ajeh chu ama thutan dihtah ahi.
Chule keiman nangho atahbeh chu kaseipeh nahiuve, koi hileh kathuhil ngaiya bol'a chu a itih'a thi lou ding ahi,” ati.
Chuin amahon ajah'a, “Thilhavop nahi kahe tauve, Abraham leh themgao ho athigam tauvin, ahivangin nangman kathuhil nit'a chu a itih'a thilou ding ahi, nati.
Chule kapau Abraham sang'a chungnung jo nahim? Ama athitan, themgao ho jong athitauvin, ahileh nangman koi kahi tia naki gel ham?” atiuve.
Hichun Jesun adonbut'in, “Keima kichang choi-at na hol kahileh hichu keima ima hilou kahitai; ahinlah nanghon ka Pathen'u natiu kapa ama chun keima ei choi-at ding ahibouve.
Ahivangin nanghon ama chu nahe pouve, kenvang ama chu kahei, chuleh keiman ama chu kahepoi tileng keimatah hi nangho banga mijou kahi khah ding ahi, ahivangin keiman ama kahet jeh chun, amathu kangaiyin ahi.
Chuleh napau Abraham chun keima nikho mu ding anagal dot ahin, chule aman hichu anamun chuleh akipah lheh jengin ahi,” ati.
Chuin Judah ho chun ajah'a, “Nangma kum somnga bon lhinglou laiya, iti nangin Abraham kamutai nati ham?” atiuve.
Jesun adonbut'in, “Keiman nangho atahbeh kaseipeh nahiuve, Abraham masanga keima ana umsa jing kahitai,” ati.
Chuche phat chun, Judah hon ama sena dingin song akilah tauvin ahi, ahivangin alah'uva kon'in Jesu chu akiseldoh in, Houin'a kon chun achemangtai.
Chuin Jesu chu avahlen ahileh, apen'a mitcho'a peng mikhat amun ahi.
Hichun aseijuiten ajah'a, “Houhil, hichepa hi ipi jeh'a apen'a mitcho'a peng ham? Ama chonse ham? Oleh anu leh apa chonse a ham?” atiuve.
Jesun adonbut'in, “Hiche hi ama chonset jeh jong ahipon, chuleh anuleh apa chonset jeh jong ahipoi; hiche a hi Pathen thahatna ama chunga akiphon na dinga ahibouve.
Hijeh chun eihon kinloi tah'a eisol pauvin einganse nau hi itoh dingu ahitai.
Ahivangin keima hiche vannoiya kaum laisea hi vannoi vah kahi,” ati.
Chuin aman tol'ah achil aset in, achil a chun bonlhoh asemin chuleh hiche bonlhoh chu mitchopa mit'a aloiyin ahi.
Hichun aman ajah'a, “Chen Siloam (sol tina ahi) twikul'a nangma tah in gaki phetlhah in,” ati. Hijeh chun mipa chu achen agakiphet lhahtai, chuleh kho amun ahung kiletan ahi.
Chuin aheng akom achenkhompi ho chuleh masanga amapa khutdo ji musa ho chu akidong touvin, “Toumun'a khutdo jipa chu hichepa hi hilou ham?” atiuvin ahi.
Mi phabep chun “Amapa chu ahi” atiuvin, chuleh adang phabep chun, “Amapa chu ahipoi akilopi joh ahibouve,” atiuvin ahi; hichun amapa chun, “Henge ama chu kahinai,” ati jengtan ahi.
Chuin amahon adong'un, “koiham kho namu sah? ipi iti dan ham?” atiuvin ahi.
Hichun amapan ajah'uva, “Jesu atipau chun bonlhon asem in, hichu kamit'a eiloi peh in chuin kajah'a ‘chen Siloam twikul'a nangma tah'in gaki phetlhah tan eiti,’ hijeh chun keima kachen kaga phetlhah leh kho kahin mu ahitai,” ati.
Chuin amahon adongun, “Amapa chu tua hoiya um tam?” atiuvin ahi, aman adonbut in, “Kahepoi,” ati.
Chuin amahon masanga mitchopa chu Pharisee ho henga ahinpui tauvin ahi.
Ajeh chu Jesun bonlhoh asem'a amapa asuhdam nikho chu Cholngah ni ahi.
Chuin Pharisee hon amapa chu amit khomu dol abonchan adongun ahi, hijeh chun aman ajah'uva, “Aman bonlhoh chu kamit'a aloiyin, chuin keiman kaga phetlhah leh kho kamu jeng ahitai,” ati.
Chuin Pharisee ho phabep chun, “Hiche mipa Jesu hi Pathen a kon ahipoi, ajeh chu aman Cholngah nikho apalkeh e atiuvin ahi.” Ahivangin adang phabep chun, “Iti michonse khat in hitobang melchihna kidang hohi abolthei ding ham?” atiuvin, amaho lah'a chun kibung khenna lentah a umdohtan ahi.
Chuin Pharisee hon, mitcho kho mupa chu adong kit'un, “Namit kho namu sahpa chu nangman koi ahi natim?” atiuvin, aman adonbut'in, “Themgao khat hiteiyinte,” ati.
Hiche jeng jong chun, Judah vaipo hon hiche mipa chu, mitcho anahia tua kho amu ahitai, tichu atahsan pouve, hijeh chun amahon anu leh apa akimu piuvin ahi.
Chuleh amahon anu leh apa chu adong'un, “Hichepa hi apen'a mitcho'a peng'a hinam? Ahileh tua iti kho amuthei ham?” atiuve.
Hichun anu leh apan adonbut'in, “Ama hi apen'a mitcho'a peng kachapa lhon ahi, kahe lhon e,” ati.
“Ahivangin aman iti kho amu ham, koiyin amit adamsah ham, kahe lhonpoi; ama dong'un, amatah achungthu kiseitheiya upa ahitai,” atilhon e.
Hichu anuleh apan Judah vaipo ho kichat na jeh'a achuti seilhon ahi, ajeh chu amahon, “Koi hileh Jesu chu Messiah ahi tia sei aum leh kikhop na in'a kon'a nomang ding tia ana phon dohsau ahitai.”
Hiche jeh'a chu amanin ajah'uva, “Ama kidoh un amatah chu athu kiseithei ja len ahitai,” atilhon ahi.
Chuin amahon anivei nan mitcho khomupa chu akouvun, ajah'a, “Hiche thua hi Pathen bou loupi sah in, ajeh chu Jesu kitipa chu michonse ahi, keihon kaheuve,” atiuvin ahi.
Hichun aman adonbut'in, “Ama michonse ahi ahilou kahepoi, ahivangin kahet chu hiche ahi, ‘keima mitcho kana hin tunvang kho kamutai,’” ati.
Chuin amahon adongkit tei teiyun, “Ama chun ipi abol'a iti namit chu asuhdam ham?” atiuve.
Aman ajah'uva, “Veuvin khatvei kaseisa ahitai, nanghon nangai pouve, ibol'a avel'a najah nom kit'u ham? Nangho jong ama seijui nahi nom'u ham?” ati.
Chuin amahon mipa chu agaosap'un, ajah'a, “Nangbou ama seijui nahin, keiho vang Mose seijui kahiuve.
Pathen in Mose heng'a thu asei chu kaheuve, ahinlah hichepa hi hoiya hungkon koi ahi kahepouve,” atiuvin ahi.
Chuin amapan adonbut'in, “Hichu datmo umtah ahi, aman kamit kho musahta'a ahivanga nanghon ama hungkon na nahetlou'u chu;
Pathen in michonse ho thu angaipoi, ahivangin ama guttah a houva alunglam bolho thubou angaiye, ti iheuve.
Chuleh vannoi leiset umtil apat koiham khat'in, apen'a mitcho'a peng kho amusah lam akija khapoi.
Hichepa hi Pathen'a kon ahilou leh aman hitobang hi abolthei lou hel ding ahi,” ati.
Hichun amahon adonbut'un, “Nang napum'a chonse sa-a peng'a nangin keiho neihil got'u ham?” atiuvin, kikhopna in'a kon chun anodoh tauvin ahi.
Jesun thilsoh umchan chu ajan, chuin mipa chu amun, ajah'a, “Nangman Mihem Chapa chu natahsan em?” ati.
Amapan adonbut'in, “Pu, ama chu koi ham? Keiman katahsan ding nati chu,” ati.
Chuin Jesun adonbut'in ajah'a, “Nangman ama chu namutai, chuleh nahenga thuseiya hi ama chu ahi,” ati.
Hiche pettah chun mipa chun, ajah'a, “Henge Pakai katahsan e,” atin, Jesu chu chibai abohtai.
Chuin Jesun amapa jah'a, “Keima mitcho hon kho amu'uva chuleh khomu'a kigel ahivanga la mitcho, hon akigel doh thei nading'uva thutan dinga vannoiya hung kahi,” ati.
Hichun avel'a um Pharisee hon ajah'a, “Keiho hi mitcho neihi sah'u ham?” atiuve.
Jesun adonbut in, “Mitcho hileu chun chonset na naneilou dingu ahin, tunvang nanghon kho kamui nati jeh'un, nachung'uva chonset um ahitai,” ati.
Keiman nangho atahbeh kaseipeh nahiuve, koi hileh kelngoi hongkot'a lut louva bang'a kal'a hunglut chu gucha michom ahi.
Ahivangin kelngoi hongkot'a hunglut ama vang chu kelngoi chingpa ahi.
Ama chu kot ngahpan kot ahonpeh jin, chuleh kelngoi hon ama aw aheuvin, aheng'a ahungjiuve, chule aman akelngoite chu amin cheh in akouvin, apuidoh jin ahi.
Chule aman akelngoi ho ahoidoh soh tengleh, amaho chu alamkaiyin, chuleh akelngoi hon anung ajuijiuve, ajeh chu amahon amapa Aw chu aheuve.
Chuleh kelngoi hon hetphahlou midang nungjui louhel ding ahiuve, ama-a kon'a jam mang ding ahiuve ajeh chu amahon michom dang aw ahepouve.
Jesun hiche thulem asei jaho chun, aman ipi aseina ahi ahepouve.
Hijeh chun Jesun ajah'uva, asei chen in, “Keiman nangho atahbeh kaseipeh nahiuve, keima hi kelngoi hongkot chu kahi.
Kamasanga hung masa ho jouse abon'uva gucha leh michom ahiuve, ahinlah ama ho thu chu kelngoihon angaipeh pouve.
Henge, keima kelngoi hongkot dihtah chu kahi, koi hileh keiya hunglut'a chu huhhing'a umding ahi; amaho chu nom tah'a lutle potle dingu, chuleh hamhing hoitah akimu dingu ahi.
Guchapa hunglo na chu agu mang ding leh asumang ding bou ahi, keima vang amahon ninglhin na leh lunglhai na hinkho aneina dinguva hunga kahi.
Keima kelngoi chingpha kahi, kelngoi chingpha chun akelngoite dingin ahinna apejin ahi.
Ahin thalah kelngoi chingpa vang chun, ngei hung amuteng ama ajamjin chuleh akelngoite adalha jitai; ajeh chu ama kelngoi chingtah ahipon, kelngoite jong ama-a ahipoi, chutengleh ngei chun kelngoite chu adelkhum in aman in chuleh asu cheh jitan ahi.
Ijeh inem itileh ama thalah kelngoi ching, sum muna ding bouva natong ahijeh chun, aman kelngoite ngailut na aneipoi.
Keima kelngoi chingpha kahi, keiman ka kelngoite kahen, chuleh amahon keima eiheuve.
Kapan keima eihet tobang bangin keiman Pachu kahei; hijeh chun, keiman ka kelngoite dingin ka hinna kapei.
Chuleh keiman hiche hong sunga umlou kelngoi dang jong kaneiye, chule keiman amaho jong chu kaga puilut ding chuleh amahon ka-aw ahet dingu chuteng kelngoi ho chu honkhat hiuva achingpa jong khatseh hiding ahi.
Pan keima eingailui, ajeh chu keiman kahinna chu avel'a kilelah kit ding'a kakatdoh tah jeh chun;
Khattouvin, keiya kon'a kahinna chu eilah peh thei ahipoi, keiman kacham'a kakat doh ahibouve, ajeh chu keiman katdoh nale avel'a kile lah kit theina chu kanei ahi. Hichu kapan keima eithupeh ahi,” ati.
Aman thu hicheng asei jeh chun, Judah ho chu abung bungin akikhen kit tauve.
Alah'uva phabep chun, “Hichepa hi thilhavop ahin alunggel kisuhlou ahibouve, chule ibol'a ama thusei kingai ding ham?” atiuve.
Chule adang phabep chun, “Athusei hi thilhavop umdan ahipoi, thilhan mitcho kho amusah ngaiyem?” atiuve. Juda Hon Jesu Asandau
Hichu phalbilai ahin Houin katdohna kut abollaiyu ahin, Jesu Jerusalem'a aumpet ahi.
Ama Houin'a aum in, Solomon hongcha kitilaiya chun ama avahlen ahi.
Hichun Judah hon ama chu aumkimvel un, “Itihchan keiho lung hesoh'a nei umsah ding'u ham? Nangma Messiah chu nahileh neiseipeh un,” atiuvin ahi.
Hichun Jesun adonbut in, ajah'uva, “Keiman nangho kasei pehsa ahitai. Ahivangin nanghon neitahsan pouve, kapa min'a kathilbol chenghi keima thudol hettohsah ahitai.
Ahivangin nangho ka kelngoite nahilou jeh'un, keima neitahsan pouve.
Keima kelngoi hon ka aw angaiyun, keiman amaho kahen, chuleh amahon kanung eijui'uve.
Keiman amaho chu tonsot hinna kapen, chuleh amaho chu itih'a jong mangthah lou ding ahiuve. Chuleh koiman keiya kon'a amaho chu eilahpeh lou ding ahi.
Ajeh chu kapan amaho chu keima eipeh ahitai, chuleh kapa chu ima jouse'a thaneipen leh hat chungnung ahi. Koiman amaho chu kapa khut'a kon'a alahpeh lou ding ahi.”
“Chuleh Pa leh keima chu khatseh kahi lhon e,” ati.
Chuin Judah hon ama selih na ding song akilo tauvin ahi.
Hichun Jesun ajah'uva, “Kapa thusah bangtah a, keiman thilpha tamtah kabol ahitai. Hoiche pentah jeh'a chu nanghon keima song'a neise dingu ham?” ati.
Amahon adonbut un, ajah'a, “Keihon nang naphatoh jeh'a songa kase dingu nahipoi. Pathen nataitom jeh ahibouve. Chuleh nangma mihem hiya Pathen naki hisah jeh ahi,” atiuve.
Chuin Jesun adonbut'in ajah'uva, “Hiche hi nangho Pathen lekhabua kisun hilou ham? Pathen in mihem ho jah'a anaseisa, nangho hi Pathen ho nahiuve kiti chu, kasei ahi.
Chuleh nanghon naheuve, Pathen lekhabua kisun chu khel thei ahipoi. Hiche jeh chun, Pathen thu lhunna miho bon Pathen ho tia akikou thei leh;
Ibol'a ken keima Pathen chapa kahi tia kasei leh, nanghon Pathen taitom nahi neitiu ham? Pan hiche dinga chu keima atumbeh'a eikhen doh'a eisuhtheng'a vannoiya eihinsol ahi.
Eisol'a kapa natoh ho kabol louleh neitahsan dauvin.
Ahin, ama kin katoh ahivang leh, keima neitahsan theilou jongleh, melchihna kidang kabol hohi hettohsah nan neiyun lang, tahsan un. Chutileh nanghon Pa keiya aum'a chuleh keima Pa'a ka um chu hetauvinnate,” ati.
Chuin avel'in amahon Jesu chu matding ago kit'un, ahi. Ahivangin ama hiche mun'a kon chun apotdoh in amaho chu adalhatai.
Chuin ama Jordan lui gallam'a amasa-a John in baptize ana bol na lam'a chun achen aga umtai.
Chua chun, mi tamtah'in anung ajuiyun, amaho chu akihouvun, “John in melchihna kidang ho anabolpon, ahivangin Jesu thudol aseiho abonchan atah in alhungsoh keiye,” atiuvin ahi.
Chuin chukom'a um mi tamtah ho chun Jesu atahsan tauve.
Pasal khat amin Lazarus kitipa chu Bethany a cheng ahin, dammo na nei, chule asopiteni Mary leh Martha toh cheng khom ahi.
Hiche numeinu Mary hi ahi, Pakai kengbul'a thao nu'a asama theh ngima chu;
Chule amanin a-ucha lhon in Pakai Jesu heng'a thu athot lhon'in hitin asei lhon e, “Pakai nangailut nasopi naloipa hi adammo lhehtai,” atilhon in ahi.
Hichu Pakai Jesun ajah chun hitin aseiyin, “Lazarus dammo nahi thina a kichai ding ahipoi, Pathen loupina dinga kibol'a ahibouve ati, hiche jeh a chu Pathen Chapa loupi na hungsoh doh dinga kitah lang joh ahi,” ati.
Pakai Jesun, Mary, Martha leh asopipa Lazarus alungset lheh jeng vang chun;
Hikom'a aum na mun'a chun Pakai Jesu chu nini tobang aumbe nalaiyin ahi.
Hichun aphat ahung lhin phat chun Pakai Jesun aseijui ho koma aseijin, “Eiho Judea gam langa kinungle kit tauhite ati.”
Ahin aseijuiten lung opkai na aneiyun, “Rabbi, ni ijat ham khat masanga chu Judea gam'a mihon songa selih ding nagot'u chula em,” atiuve.
Jesun adonbut'in, “Nikhat sunga hi nidan som le ni niseh a um ahi, chule sun a hi mi jousen lam ajotthei cheh ding ahi. Chuleh amahon kho amuthei nau chu ahileh vannoi vah anei jeh'u ahi.
Ahin, jantengleh tijat natah jong aumin, kipal lhuh na thei jong aumin ahi, ajeh chu vah aumji tapon ahi,” ati.
Hichun aman aseiyin, “Iloipau Lazarus a-imu lhatai” ati, “Amavang keima kache ding kaga thodoh ding ahi,” ati.
Hichun seijuiten adonbut uvin, “Pakai, Lazarus chu a'imut leh damvah ding tina ahitai,” atiuve.
Ahin seijui ho geldan'a chu kicholdo dinga a'imut aseiyin angaitouvin, ahin Pakaiyin asei chu Lazarus thi ahitai atina ahi.
Hichun Pakaiyin aseichet pehin, “Lazarus chu athitai.”
“Chuleh keima kakipah lheh e, ajeh chu nang hon natahsan theina dingu ahi, hijongle tun hungun ahenga cheu hite,” ati.
Hichun Thomas minlhem ni neipa chun aloi aseijui ho lah'a aseitan, “Eiho jong cheu hitin, chu a Pakai toh gathi khom'u hite,” ati.
Jesu Bethany kho'a ahung lhun chun Lazarus chu lhan khuh'a avui nau ni li ahitai ti aseipeh uve.
Bethany chu Jerusalem kom ahin, mile themkhat bouva gamla ahi;
Chuleh Judah le midang tamtah achekhom'un, Mary leh Martha amani lungmon sah dinga hung'ah anaum'un ahi.
Hiti chun Martha in Pakai ahungtai tithu ajah phat'in amanu chu achen Pakai chu aga kimupin Mary vangchu inmun'ah aum dentai.
Hichun Martha in Jesu koma aseitai, “Pakai nangma hilai mun'a hi ana um hile chun kasopi pa hi thilou ding ahi” ati.
Ahin tunjong Pathen in nathum chan napeh ding kahe nai ati.
Jesun amanu jah'a, “Nasopi pa thou kit ding ahi,” ati.
Marthan adonbut'in, “Henge kanom'e, Ni nunung nia thokit nia atho doh kit ding chu kahe nai,” ati.
Hichun Jesun amanu jah'a hitin aseiye, “Keima hi thokitna le hinna chu kahi; chule koi hijongleh keima eitahsan chan chu thita jongleh thoudoh kit ding ahi.
Chuleh koi hijong leh ahinga keima eitahsan a chu itih hijongle thilou ding ahi. Martha hiche hi na tahsan em?” ati.
Marthan adonbut'in, “Henge, Pakai Pathen katahsan'e, nangma hi Pathen Chapa Messiah vannoiya hung dinga chu nahi,” ati.
Hiche chu asei jouvin achemang in asopinu Mary guhthimin akouvin, “Houhil chu hikoma aumin, nakouve,” ati.
Chuin Mary in hichu ajah jah in gangtah in akipat doh in ahenga achetai.
Pakai Jesu chu khopam'a Martha toh akimu to nalhon a chu umnalai ahin;
Hichun mipi ho Mary lha mon dinga umhon ama akipat doh'a kino thethu'a adalhah chu amu'u chun Lazarus lhan khuh langa gakap dingin agel'un, hichun amahon Mary nung chu ajuiyun ahi.
Hiti chun Mary chu Jesu umna alhun phat'in ama chu amun akengphang bul'ah abohkhup jengin ajah'a, “Pakai nangma hikoma um hile chun kasopipa thi lou dinga,” ati.
Hichun Jesun amanu aka amun ahin lhonpi mipi ho jong chu akau amun alung sunga lunghem tah le pohnat na neitah in a um uvin ahi.
Hichun Jesun ama ho chu adongin, “Hoiya nakoiyu hitam,” ati, mipi hon adonbut'un, “Pakai hungven,” atiuvin ahi.
Hichun Jesu akaptai.
Hikom mun vel'a dingho chun aseiyun, “Veuvin iti angailut hitam,” atiuve.
Ahin koitobang loichun hitin aseiyun, “Hiche pa hin mitcho ho kho amu sah hilou ham, chule Lazarus jong chu athida sah thei chula em,” atiuvin ahi.
Hichun Jesu chun lhan khuh ahin phah chun lunghem tah in aum in; chuleh alhan chu kohom khat ahin, akot chu song khat'a kising ahi.
Jesun amaho jah'a aseiyin, “Song chu tangdoh'un,” ati. Chule athipa sopinu Martha chun ajah'a, “Pakai tun a uitai, ijeh inem itile ni li ahitai,” ati.
Hijeh chun Jesun adonbut'in, “Natahsan'u leh Pathen loupi na namu dingu ahi kati hilou ham?” ati.
Hichun amahon songpi chu atangdoh tauvin, hichun Jesun Vanlam aven “Pa nangman kataona na-ngai jeh in namin kathangvah e;
Chuleh nangman kataona na-ngai jinge, ti keiman kahenai, ajeh chu kakimvel a mipi ding ho hin nangma sol kahi hi ahin tahsan thei na dinguva kati ahibouve,” ati.
Hichun Jesun hasap tah in asam in, “Vo Lazarus, hung thou doh'in,” ati.
Hichun Lazarus chu akhut akeng lhanpon a kitom pumin amai ultheh pon a kitom pumin lhan khuh a konin ahungdoh tan ahi. Hichun Jesun ajah uva, “Lhamun lang lamjot sah'un,” ati.
Hichun mipi tamtah Mary toh umjouse chun athilbol chu amu'uvin hichun Jesu chu atahsan tauve.
Ahin mipi lah'a mi kimkhat acheuvin Pharisee ho jah a Jesu thilbol chengse chu agasei tauve.
Hijeh chun thempu pipui hole Pharisee ho houvaipo loi akikhom'un, “Eihon ipi ibol'u ham? Hichepa khun la melchihna tamtah abol jing jengin ahi.
Eihon ama hi tua banga iche jomsah jingu le mi jousen ama ahin tahsan cheh cheh dingu, hiche teng chule Rome solkal in eiho inam'u ahin i-Houin'u ahin eisuhchimpeh dingu ahitai” atiuve.
Hiche laiphat tah'a thempu a ana pang chu Caiaphas ahin aman hitin aseiye, “Nang hon nathu seiyu hi ipi kiseina ham nahe pouve ati.
Chujongle vannoi pumpi aboncha aman thah louna dinga miho dinga mikhat athi nangho dinga phajo ahi, tijong nagel pouve,” ati.
Chuleh hiche ho hi Caiaphas in ama chama asei doh ahipon, thempu pipui hina'a gaova aphondoh'a, Pakai Jesu hin vannoi nam jouse khel'a ahinkho apeh doh ding thu asei masah ahibouve.
Chuleh Israel chate kisuh khom ding seh hilouvin, namtin jouse le Pathen chate jouse akikhop khoma pumkhat ahidoh na dinga jong ahi.
Hiti ahijeh chun, hichea pat chun Judaten Jesu thana ding lung angaitouvin akihousom tauve.
Hijeh chun Jesu Judah ho lah'a lhangphongin avahle tapoi; chua kon chun Jerusalem adalhan, gamthip lama Ephraim khoa aseijui hotoh chua chun aum jing tauve.
Chuleh Judahte kalchuh kut ahung naitan, hichun kut masanga kisutheng dingin gamsunga Judahte jousen, Jerusalem ahin jon cheh tauvin ahi.
Amahon Jesu ahol'un, Houin vel'a adin uchun, khat le khat akihouvun, “Ipi na ngaito uvem? Jesu chu kut'a hi hunglou ding ham?” akitiuve.
Hichun thempu pipui hole Pharisee hon, lhangphongtah in aphongun, koi hijongle Jesu umna hea chun amat theina dinguva avetsah dinguvin mipi ho thu apeuvin ahi.
Kalchuh kut kipatna ding nigup masang'in, athi a kona athodoh Lazarus umna Bethany a chun Jesu ahungin,
Hiti chun ama dingin jan an asemun, chuleh Marthan ajenlen Lazarus vang chu ankonga ama toh touho lah'a chun apangin ahi.
Chuin Mary in halpi bei Bego thao namtui man tamtah chu ahin choiyin Jesu kengphanga anun asamin atheh ngimin ahileh agimnam chun insung chu alosoh jeng in ahi.
Chuin seijui holah a khat Simon chapa Judas Iscariot, amatsah a pang dingpa chun,
“Hiche thao namtui hi manlutah ahi. man tamtah'a joh a mivaicha genthei ho pehding ahi,” ati.
Aman hiche ati chu vaicha genthei khohsah a asei ahipoi, ama chu gucha ahin, chule sumdip avop ahin, asunga kikoi chu akilahji ahi.
Hichun Jesun adonbut'in, “Amanu chu limsah hih'un. Kakivui nia dinga kigontup theina a abol ahi.
Nanghon genthei chaga aphat seh a nanei jing dingu ahi, ahin keima vang aphat seh a nangho lah a umjoulou ding kahi,” ati.
Chuin mipi hon Jesu chukoma ahunge ti ajah phat'un, Judah ho mi tamtah ama chung chang jeng hilouvin, athi lah a kona athodoh Lazarus jong chu venomin ahenga ahung tauve.
Hichun thempu pipuihon Lazarus jeng jong thadoh dingin agongun ahi.
Ajeh chu amapa jeh tah a jong chu miho lah a tamtah pin amaho anuse uva Jesu atahsan u ahitan ahi.
Hiche ni ajingin kut'a dinga hung mipi atama tamin, Jesu Jerusalema dingin ahunge, ti ajah phat'un,
Lusu na akidop'un aga lamtouvin, “Hosana, Pakai min a hunga Israelte Lengpa chu anun nome,” tin asam asamun ahi.
Chuin Jesun sangan chalgol khat amun, achunga atouvin ahi;
“Vo Zion chanu, kicha hih-in; Ven, nalengpa sangan nou chunga atouvin ahunge,” tia kisun bang chun.
Hicheng thu chu Jesu seijuiten amasan ana hepouvin ahi, ahin Jesu choiat'a aumdoh phat chun, hiche thu chu ama thudol'a kisunsa ahin, amahon hitia chu abol'u ahi tichu ageldoh tauve.
Hichun aman Lazarus akouva athi lah a kona athodoh pettah a aumpi mipi chengse chu athu hettohsah a pang ahiuve.
Hiche melchihna abol ajah jeh tah-uva chu mipi chun alamtou ahi.
Hichun Pharisee ho khat le khat akihou lim un, “Veuvin eihon imacha ibol thei dingu aumpoi; ajeh chu mijousen ama nung ajui cheh tauve,” atiuvin ahi.
Hiche kalchuh kut a chu Pathen hou dinga Greek mi phabep khat chetou ahiuvin;
Hichun amaho Galilee gam'a Bethsaida khoa mi Philip henga ahungun ajah'a, “Pu Jesu chu kamu nomui,” ahung tiuve.
Hichun Philip ahungin Andrew jah'a ahung seiyin, chuin Andrew ahungin Philip toh Jesu jah a asei lhone.
Jesun adonbut in, “Mihem Chapa choiat'a aum ding phat ahung lhunge.
Thutah chu ahile, chang malkhat chu tol'a tulut in aumjie. Hichu athilou le achangin aumden ji bouve; athi vang le tamtah agajin ahi.
Koi hijongle hiche vannoi leiset chunga ahinkho itcha ho chu mangthah ding ahi; ahin koi hijongle hiche vannoi leiset chunga ahinkho pedoh ho chun tonsot hinkemlou anei dingu ahi.
Koi hijongle kalhacha a panga chun kanung eijuihen, keima umna'a chu kalha cha jong um ding ahi; mi koi hile kalhacha a panga chu Pa chun ajabol ding ahi.”
Tun kalung adongtai; ipi kati ding ham? Pa, hiche nidan a kon hin neihuhdoh-in, ahivangin hiche dinga hi tu nidan geiya hi hung kahi.
“Pa, namin choiat in” ati. Hiche chun van'a konin Aw ahung gingin, “kachoian tai, chule choian kit nalai ding kahi,” ati.
Hiche chun akimvel a ding mipi chun hichu ajauvin, “Van aginge,” atiuvin; adangsen, “Vantil in ajah a thu asei ahi,” atiuve.
Hichun Pakai Jesun amaho chu adonbut'in, “Hiche awgin najah'u chu nangma ho phatchomna ding ahibouve, keima a ding ahipoi.
Hiche vannoi leiset chunga thutanna phat ahung lhungtai, Satan vannoiya vaihompa nodoh naphat jong hung lhung ding ahitai.”
Chule keima leiset'a kona kathodoh tengle keiman mi jouse kahenga dinga kahungpui ding nahiuve.
Hichu aman athi ding dan tahlang na a hitia chu asei ahi.
Mihonpi chun adonbut'in, “Keihonla Messiah chu tonsot'a hing jing ding ahi, ti Pathen Lekhabua kon in kaheuvin; Ipi jeh a Mihem Chapa thiding ahi nati thei ham? Hiche Mihem Chapa chu amonga koi ham?” atiuve;
Jesun adonbut'in, “Kavah hi nalah uva chomkhat bou umnalai ding ahi; muthim in naphah louna dingun vah umpet hin vahle uvin; muthima vahlea chun achena ding ahepoi.
Vah nanei pet chau hin vah chate nahi theina dingun vah chu tahsanun,” ati. Thu hicheng chu aseiyin, apotdoh-in amahoa kon chun akiseltai.
Isaiah themgao thusei: “Pakai kathuseiyu kon atahsan em? Chule Pakai ban thahat koi henga kilang am?”
Tia asei chu guilhun theina ding chun, a-ang sunguva melchihna kidang tamtah abolin, ahivangin atahsan pouve.
Hiche thua hin Isaiah themgao chun avel in aseikit in:
“Aman amit'u asuchon, alungu asutah tai; achuti loule amit'un mu'uvin tin, chule alungun heuvin tin, chule hung kihei kit'un tin keiman boldam get inge,” ati; hiche jeh a hi amahon atahsan thei lou'u ahi.
Isaiah chun aloupi chu amu jeh a hicheng chu aseiya; ama ho thudol chu asei ahi.
Achuti vang'in vaipo ho jeng jong tamtah'in atahsan tauve; ahinla Pharisee ho jeh chun kikhop na akonin eiki kaidoh khante, tin aseidoh aumpouve.
Ajeh chu amahon Pathen choiat sangin mihem choiat adei jouvin ahi.
Hichun Jesun aw sangtah in asam in, “Koi hijongle keima eitahsan chun keima hilou va eisolpa joh atahsan ahibouve;
Chule keima eimua chun eisolpa amu ahi.
Koi hijong le keima eitahsan a chu muthim a a-umlouna dinga keima vah hina a vannoiya hung kahi.
Mikhat touvin kathu jahen nit hih jongle athu katanpoi; ijeh inem itile keima vannoi thutan'a hung kahipoi, vannoi huhhing ding joh a hung kahibouve.
Koi hijongle keima eipampaiya kathuhil jong joplou chu, thupi kitan nile thutah kaseidoh hin achungthu atan ding ahi.
Ijeh inem itile keiman kacham'a kasei ahipoi, eisol'a Pa chun kasei dingle kapao ding dan hi thu eipeh ahibouve.
Ama thupeh chu tonsot hinna ahi, ti kahei; hiche jeh a chu kathusei hi Pan eihil bang banga kasei ahi,” ati.
Kalchuh kut masangin Jesun hiche vannoiya kona apa henga ache ding phat ahung lhungtai, ti ahen, vannoiya um ama a ho chu angailun akhon nigeiyin angailu lhumkeiye.
Chuin jan anneh lai sungin diabol chun Simon chapa Judas Iscariot lung sunga ama matsah na ding lungthim khumsa akoi ahitan;
Jesun, Pan thil jouse ama khut'a apeh chule ama Pathena kona hungdoh ahia, Pathen henga chea ahi chu ahen;
Ajan anneh ankonga konin akipat doh in chuin aponsil akong'ah akigah in ahi.
Chuin aman kisilna kong'ah twi alheiyin, aseijuiho keng asil'in, akong gahna pon chun atheh peh in ahi.
Chuin ama Simon Peter koma ahungin ahile aman ajah'a, “Pakai nangman kakeng neisilpeh ding ham?” atin ahile,
Jesun adonbut'in, “Kabol hi nangman tun nahepoi ajo le he nan nate,” ati.
Chuin Peter in ajah a, “Nangman itih hijongle kakeng nasil lou hel ding ahi,” ati. Jesun adonbut in ajah a, “Keiman nangma kasil loule keiya nangman chan nanei lou ahi,” ati.
Simon Peter in ajah a, “Pakai kakeng keojeng hilouvin kakhut le kalu jonge,” ati.
Jesun adonbut in, “Apumpia kisil khat chu akeng tailou adang silding angai khohpoi; apumpin angim sohnai. Chule nangho nangim nauve, ahivangin nabonchau nahi pouve,” ati.
Ijeh inem itile ama matsah a pang dingpa chu aman ahetsa ahin, hiche jeh a chu aman, “Nabonchauvin na ngim pouve,” ati ahi.
Aman akengu asil jouvin apon akilah in atou kit'in amaho jah a chun, “Ipi bol'a kahi, kabol chu nahet nah uvem?
Nanghon keima Houhil le Pakai neitiuve; hiche natiu chu aphai, ijeh inem itile keima hichu kahi.
Hijeh chun keima Pakai le Houhil jengin bon nangho keng kasil le nang hon jong khat'in khat keng nakisilpeh to dingu thu ahi.
Ajeh chu keiman nangho kabol banga chu nanghon jong nabolna dinguva vetsahna a kabol ahi.
Iti dih a dih hitam, Pakai sangin soh achungnungjo poi, asol'a sangin solchah jong achungnungjo poi.
Hiti ho hi nahetdoh uva nabol'u le nangho anun nom nahiuve.”
Nang ho nabonchauva thudol'a kasei ahipoi; keiman kalhendoh ho chengse chu kahenai; ahivangin, “kachanglhah nepan kachunga akengto alamtai,” ti Pathen Lekhabua thu guilhun theina dinga ahi.
“Tua kal'a ahung guilhun tengle keima hi ama chu kahi, nahetna dinguva ahung guilhun masanga kaseipeh nahiuve.
tahbeh a koi hijongle kasol na a nom chan chun keima eisan ahi; chule keima eisang chan chun eisolpa asan ahi,” ati.
Hichun Jesu alung dong lheh jengin aseitai, “Atahbeh a nangho lah a mikhat in neijoh doh dingu ahi,” tin ahin seidoh e.
Hichun seijui ho chu khat le khat akiveto uvin, koi asei ahi agelmouve.
Hiche a chu aseijui ho lah a khat Jesun angailut chu a-ang a ki-ngai ahin;
Simon Peter in akhasuh in, “Koi nasei ham neisei peh'un,” ati.
Hichun aman aki ngai bang chun aki ngaiyin, “Pakai hiche chu koiham?” tin adongin ahile;
Jesun adonbut in, “Hiche changlhah hal hi kade a kapeh dingpen tah chu ama chu ahi,” ati. Chuin aman changlhah hal chu adekot jouvin alan Simon chapa Iscariot Judas chu apetai.
Chuche changlhah hal akisan joutah chun Satan asunga aluttan, chuphat chun Jesun ajah a, “Nabol ding chu bol loiyin,” ati.
Ahivangin aman ipi dol'a achuti sei ahidem, ankonga touho khatchan jong ahedoh pouve.
Ijeh inem itile kimkhat'in Judas khut'a sumbom aum jeh a chu kut'a dinga manchah ding choa, ahilou le vaichaho ikhat pe dinga Jesun aseiyin angaitouve.
Chuin aman changlhah hal chu akisanin hiche pettah chun apotdoh paijengtai. Hichu jan ahi.
Ama apotdoh chun Jesun, “Mihem Chapa choiat'in aumtai, ama ah Pathen jong choian'in aumtai;
Chule Pathen in jong Chapa jeh'a choi-atna amu jeh a, aman chapa chu achoiat pai jeng ding ahi.”
Chapang neocha ho nangho toh chomcha khat bou um ding kahi, nang hon neihol dingu, ahivanga Juda ho jah a kasei “Keima che na a chu nangho nahung thei lou dingu,” kati ahi.
“Keiman nangho thupeh thah kapeh nahiuve, nang ho khat le khat kingailuto cheh un; keiman nangho ka-ngailut bangu hin, nangho jong khat le khat kingailu uvin.
Nangho khat le khat nakingailut tocheh uva ahile hichun keima seijui nahiu vannoiya natahlang'u ahi,” ati.
Simon Peter in adongin, “Pakai nangma hoilama nache ding ham?” atile Jesun adonbut in, “Tun nangma kache na a kanung nunga hung thei pon nate, phat chomkhat jou teng vangleh kanung nunga nahung ding ahi,” ati.
Peter in ajah a “Pakai ibol'a tua nanung nunga kahung thei lou ding ham? Nangma jal'in kahinna jong penge,” ati.
Jesun adonbut in, “Keima jal'a nathi ding ham? Chutiponte, jing jingkah ahchal khon masanga kahekhapoi tia thumvei nei seilep ding ahi,” ati.
“Nalung'u khamsah hih'un, Pathen tahsan'un, chule keima jong neitahsan'un.
Kapa In'ah chenna ding indan ninglhingset in aume; umlou hi le najah uva kasei tah hih ding ham? Ajeh chu keima nangho dinga mun sema che ding kahi.
Thil jouse gontup ahiteng leh, keima hung ingting, kaumna a chu naum jingthei nadiuva kahung puiding nahiuve.
Chule nanghon kache na ding mun alampi nahe nauve,” ati.
Thomas in adonbut'in, “Pakai keihon nache na ding bon kihelou a alampi iti kahet dingu ham?” ati.
Jesun amapa chu adonbut'in, “Keima hi lampi le thutah chule hinna chu kahi; keima henga pat tailouvin koima Pa kom ahung theipoi.
Chule nanghon keima neiheleu chun Kapa jong chu nahet dingu ahitai; tua pat'a vang nanghon amapa chu naheuvin chule namu tauve.”
Hichun Philip in adonbut in, “Pakai Pachu neimu sah'un, hichu keiho dinga phaset ahi,” ati.
Jesun adonbut'in, “Philip, keima hitih chan nangho toh kaum khom a jong chu neihet loulai ham? Chule keima eimua chun Ka-Pa amu ahitai; achutile Pachu neimu sah-un iti nati ham?
Chule keima Pa a kaum a chule Pa jong keiya um ahi, hiche hi natahsan lou ham? Chule keiman nangho jah'a thu kasei chengse hi keima cham'a kasei ahipoi; Pachu keiya uma na atoh ahibouve.
Keima Pa a kauma chule Pa jong keiya aume ti chu neitahsan jengun; ahilou jongle na kitong chengse jeh tah hin tahsanun.
Atahbeh a, keima eitahsan'a chun kathilbol chengse hi aman jong abol ding ahi; asanga lenjo jo abol ding ahi, chule keima Pa henga kinungle kit ding kahitai.
Chule Pachu Chapan achoiat'a, chule nanghon thil jouse ipi hijongle Keima mina nathum chanu chu kabol peh ding nahiuve.
Chule Keima mina nathum dingu chu ipi hijongle kabolpeh ding nahiuve.”
“Keima neingailut uleh kathupeh ho hi nanit dingu ahi.
Keima Pa henga taoving ting chuleh aman nangho naumpi jing dingu Lhamon sah Lhagao napeh dingu ahi.
Amachu Lhagao Theng, thudih lampia napuiyuvah ahi; vannoiyin ama chu asang theipoi; ijeh inem itile ama chu mu jong amu pouvin, he jong ahepouve; nang hon vang naheuve, ajeh chu ama nangho sunga chenga ahi, umjong hung um ding ahi.
Chule keiman nangho avetup ding beiyin nadalha pouvinge; keima nahenguva hung kit ding kahi.
Vannoi mihon phat chomkhat jou le eimu tahlou dingu ahi, ahinla nanghon vang neimu dingu ahinai; Ajeh chu keima kahing jinge, chule nangho jong nahin dingu ahi.
Keima hinna a kathodoh kit teng, nanghon nahet chen diu ahi; keima Pa a kaum a chule nangho keima a naum diu chule keima nangho a kaum ding ahi.
Koi hijongle kathupeh ho neiya chule nit chu eingailua ahi; chule keima eingailua chu Ka Pan angailut ding; chule keiman ama chu ka-ngailut a ahenga kakiphon ding ahi,” ati.
Judas (Iscariot hilou, seijui achom khatpa) chun ajah'a, “Pakai, ibol'a nangma keiho henga nakiphona vannoi mi henga naki phon lou ding ham?” ati.
Jesun adonbut'in ajah a, “Ei ngailu jouse chun kathu anit ding, chule Ka Pan amaho chu angailut ding, chule ahenguva kahunga amaho chu kachenpi ding ahi,
Chule koi hijongle keima eingailu lou chun kathu jong anitpoi; chule nathu jah'u hi keiya ahipoi, eisola Pa a chu ahibouve.
Keiman nangho kaumpi pet'a thu hicheng hi kaseipeh nahiuve.
Ahinla Pan keima khel'a naki thopi dingu Lhagao Theng ahinsol teng, Ama chun thil jouse nahetsah dingu chule thil jouse kasei doh ho jouse avela nagel dohsah kit dingu ahi.
Lungmon kada lhah peh nahiuve; kalungmon kapeh nahiuve; kapeh hi vannoi mi peh bang ahipoi; nalungu donsah hih-un, kicha jong kicha hih-un.
Nahenguva thu kana seiho gel doh jinguvin ajeh chu keima kache mang ding ahin, ahin naheng uva kahung kit ding ahi; chule keima nei ngailut mongule kei sanga laljo Pa koma kache dinghi nanghon nei kipa pi joh dingu ahi.
Hiche ho hi nahenguva kasei peh masat'u ahi, Ajeh chu thil hohi ahungso phattengleh nanghon natahsan thei na dingu ahi.
Nangho toh kihou limna ding phat kanei lhomtai, ajeh chu vannoi leiset chunga vaihompa ahung nai tai, aman kachung ah tha aneipoi.
Amavang Pan keiya kona a ngaichat chu kabol ding ahi, chutile vannoi in Pa ngailutna hi ahin hetthei dingu ahi, hunguvin eiho che jengu hite.”
Keima lengpi gui kahi, chule kapa hi alhoungim hon neipa ahi.
Chuleh keiya um abah aga lou ho chu aman apaidoh ji; chuleh aga chengse chu ahaga chehna dingin amal ngim jin ahi.
Kathusei vanga chu nangho angimsa nahi tauve.
Chuleh nangho keiya umjingun, keijong nanghoa um inge, abah lengpi guia aumlou le achanga agathei lou banga chu nang ho jong keiya naum lou u le naga theilou dingu ahi.
Henge, keima hi lengpigui chu kahi, nangho abah nahiuve. Keiya umho chule keiman jong kaumpi jouse chun ga tamtah ahin sosah dingu ahi. Ajeh chu keima louvin nanghon imacha nabol thei pouve.
Mi keiya umlou chu pannabei abah bangin paidoh-in aumjin, chuleh agop jin chuleh achom khomun meikong sungah asep lut jiuvin ahile akavam jitai.
Ahin nangho keima a naum jinguva, chuleh keima thucheng ho nangho a aumle, nanghon nangai chat chan'u nathum thei'u ahi; chuleh naki bolpeh dingu ahi.
Nanghon theiga tamtah napunsah teng'ule keima seijui dihtah nahiuve, hiche jeh'a chu Pa choiat na um ding ahi.
Pan keima eingailut bang banga keiman jong nang ho ka-ngailut nahiuve, hijeh chun kangailutna a hin umjingun.
Nanghon keima thupeh napom tengule keima ngailut na'a um nahi tauve; chule keiman jong hitobanga Pa thupeh kanit jing jeh'a, ama ngailut na a umjing kahi.
Kakipana nangho a aum jingna ding le naki panau acham kimna dinga thu hicheng hi najah uva kana sei ahi.
Hiche hi keima thupeh ahi, “Keiman nangho kangailut bangin, nangho jong khat le khat kingailu tocheh in um'un.
Min ajol agol dinga ahinna apeh sanga ngailut chungnungjo koiman aneipoi.
Kathu peh ngai ho chu kaloi ahi.
Keiman nangho soh kati lou ding nahi tauve, ajeh chu soh in apupa thilbol ahepoi; tua nangho hi kaloi ngaitah nahiuve, ajeh chu Pan keima eihetsah jouse nangho kasei peh nahi tauve.
Nang hon keima neilhenu ahipoi, keima joh-in nangho kalhen doh a nacheuva haga nagauva chuleh nagau aumna dinga kapansah nahiuve. Ipi hijongle nagot chanu kamin a Pa henga nathumu chu aman napeh theina dingun,
Hiche hi keima thupeh ahi, nangho khat le khat kingailu tocheh'un,” ati.
Chule vannoiyin nahin vetda tengule geldoh un keima ei vetda masat'u ahi.
Nangho vannoiya hileu chun vannoiyin ama a chu angailut ding ahin; tunla nangho vannoiya nahi lou u, vannoiya kona keiman kalhen doh nahiuvin, hiche jeh a chu vannoiyin nahot'u ahi.
Chuleh najah uva kathusei hi, “Soh apakai sangin achungnungjo poi,” kati chu geldoh-un. Amahon kei eibolseuva chu nang ho nabolset dingu ahi; kathu nit leu nang ho thujong anit dingu ahi.
Amahon keima jeh'a hiche ho jouse hi abolsoh diu ahi, ajeh chu amahon eisolpa ahet lou jeh'u ahi.
Keiman kana seidoh lou hile amaho hi themmo chang pouvinte. Ahinla tun amahon achonset nau jeh chun thuphat bolthei pouvinte.
Koi hi jongleh keima eidoudal'a chun Kapa jong adoudal ding ahi.
Keiman alah uva mi koima dangin abol khah lou thil kabol lou hile chonset aneilou dingu ahin; tuvang'in amahon keima le Ka-Pa kakop lhonin eimu tauvin, ho jong eihotauve.
Hiche hin Pathen lekhabuho a kisei, “Amahon ajeh beiyin eidoudal ui” kiti chu aguilhunsah ahi.
Amavang keiman thumopthem–thutah Lhagao, chu kahin solding ahi. Pa Pathen a kona hung ding ama chun keima thudol aphondoh ding ahi.
Chule nanghon jong atil'a pat kaumpi jing nahi jeh-uva chu kathu hettohsah a napan dingu ahi.
Nakipal lhuh louna dinguva thu hicheng hi kaseipeh nahiuve.
Chuleh phat hung lhung ding ahi, kikhopna in'a kona nahin kaidoh dingu, chutengle koi hileh nathat uva pang hon athil bol'u chu Pathen'a dinga napha tonga kingaito dingu ahi.
Hiche ho jouse hi ipi jeh ham itileh amahon Pa Pathen ahet lou jeh ule keima eihetthei lou jeh'u ahije.
Ahinla hiti phat chu ahung lhun tengle keima tah'in kana seipehsa chengse hi nagel doh dinguva thu hicheng hi kaseipeh nahiuve. Chuleh keiman nangho jah'a kanasei masah lou na ajeh chu phat chomkhat kaumpi ding nahi jeh'u ahi.
Ahinla tua keima eihin solpa henga kile kit ding kahitai, ahi nangho koima chan hoilam a che ding nahim tinjong neidong pouve.
Ahin thu hicheng chu kasei jeh'in nalungu lunghem nan adimjotai.
Ahinla tahbeh a kaseipeh nahiuve, keima kapotdoh chu nangho dinga phatchomna joh ahi, ajehchu keima kaum laisea nangho kithopi ding chu hung theilou ding ahi. Ahin keima kapotdoh teng, Lhagao Theng chu nangho henga kahin sol ding ahi.
Ama chu ahung tengleh, aman vannoi mite hi chonset thudol, chonphat thudol, chuleh thutan thudol'a ahetphotsah ding ahi.
Chonset thudol chu, ijeh ham itile amahon keima eitahsan pouve.
Chonphat thenna ho hi chanthei ahi, ijeh inem itile keima Pa koma cheding kahi, chuleh nanghon nei mukhah lou diu ahitai.
Chule tun thutanna ahung lhung tai ajeh chu vannoiya vaihompa hi athu tansa a uma ahitai.
Chule keiman hiche ho tilouva thildang tamtah jong kaseipeh nom nahiuve, ahinla nanghon tua nathoh joulou diu ahi.
Lhagao dihtah chu ahung teng vangleh ama chun thutah lam jousea nangho napuihoi dingu ahi, ijeh inem itile aman achama aseilou ding, ajah chan asei dingbou ahi, chuleh khonung thusoh ding naseitoh peh dingu ahi.
Chule ama chun keima eichoiat ding ahi, ajeh chu kanei chengse chu aman alah a nangho nahetsah dingu ahi.
Pa a kona thil jouse chu keima a kona ahisoh keiye, hiche jeh a chu kaphon doh ahi; Lhagao Theng chun ana phondoh ho chu aboncha keiya kona alahson ahiye.
“Phat chomkhat joule nanghon neimu lou dingu ahitai; Ahinla phat chomkhat jouteng neimu kit dingu ahi,” ati.
Hichea chun aseijui ho khat le khat akihouvun, “Chom khat jou le neimu lou dingu, chuleh chom khat jou le neimu kit dingu, ijeh inem itile keima Pa henga che ding kahi, ati hi ipi aseina ahidem? akitiuve.
Chuleh phat chomkhat joule ati chu ipi aseina ham? Keihon kahe theipouve,” atiuvin ahi.
Adoh nom'u chu Jesun ahen ajah uva, “Chomcha khat jou le neimu lou dingu, chomcha khat jou le neimu kit dingu, kati chu itidol ahi khat le khat kidongtoa nahiuvem?
Tahbeh a nangho keima chunga nalhiso diu chule nalungu kham ding ahi; Ahinla vannoi mite dinga kipana ahiye, ajeh chu nangho nalungu sangtah'a boiding, ahinla nalung kham nau chu hetman louva kipana thupitah hiding ahi.
Numei aso dinga anat tengle athoh gimlheh jin, acha chu asolhah teng vangleh vannoiya mihem khat apen jeh chun akipah jin ahile alungdon hesoh chu ahejitapoi.
Tua nangho nalunglhah dah nau hi, keima in nangho kahin vil kit tengle thanopna a nadim dingu, chuleh koima chan naguh mangpeh thei lou dingu ahitai.
