Hiche teng chule nanghon keima imacha neidoh'u jong ngaita ponte, thutah chu ahile, Pa henga nathum jengthei'u ahitai; ajeh chu keima mina nathum jeh uva na ngaichat hou chu suhbulhit a um ding ahi.
Chule hiche hohi masanga nana bolkhah lou'u ahiye, Keima min in thum'un chuteng namu diu ahi, chutengle kipana sangtah'a nanei diu ahi.”
“Keiman hiche ho jouse hi nangho jah'a alem a kasei ahi, ahin phat hung lhung ding chuteng chuleh keiman alema kasei tahlou ding ahi. Ahin Pathen ama hina tah'a kaphon doh ding ahi.
Hiche nikho teng chuleh keima mina nathum dingu keima kanop tahlou ding ahi ajeh chu keima Pa henga nangho dinga taova kahi.
Ijeh inem itile Pa amatah in nangho na-ngailuve, ijeh inem itile nanghon keima nei ngailuvin, chuleh keima Pa a kona hung kahi natahsan tauvin ahi.
Pa koma kona vannoiya hung kahin, vannoi kadalhah a Pa henga che kit ding kahi,” ati.
Hichun aseijuiten adonbut'un, “Ven, tun nangin thu alem'a seita louvin phongtah in naseiye.”
“Tuhin keihon ima jouse kahe chen tauve; Nangman thil jouse nahesoh hel'in, hiche ho jeh'in keihon katahsan tauve; nangma Pathen a kona hung kondon nahi ti katahsan tauve.”
Jesun adong'in, “Achainakeiya neitahsan'u hitam?” ati.
“Veuvin, nangho nabonchauva nava cheh soh keiyuva keima kachanga neida lhah dingu phat ahung lhungtai, ahivangin keima kachang kahipoi; ijeh inem itile Pan keima ei umpinai.
Nanghon kachunga lungmon chamna nanei thei na dinguva thu hicheng hi kasei peh nahiuve, hiche leiset chunga hi nanghon thohgim hahsa tamtah nathoh diu ahiye, ahinla nalungu neosah hih'un, ajeh chu lungnom'un, keiman vannoi kajoutai,” ati.
Jesun thu hicheng chu aseiyin, vanlam aven, “Pa naphat chu ahung lhunge; Chapan nangma na choiat thei na dingin na chapa choian in.
Ajeh chu nangman ama napeh ho jouse chu aboncha aman tonsot hinkemlou apeh dinga, nangman ama chu mi jouse chunga thuneina napeh ahi.
Pathen tahbeh khatseh nangman nasol Jesu Christa tah chu ahet doh dingu, hiche hi tonsot hinna ahi.
Chuleh nangman keima bol dinga neipeh chu kajouvin, chule leiset chunga nangma min ka choian tai.
Chule tun, Pa vannoi leiset um masanga nangma toh ium laiya iloupina chun nangma tah toh kigomin nei choian in.
Vannoi leiset a neina peh ho chu keima in kahin tahlange. Amaho chu nangma a din aum jinguve, chule nangma in keima neipeh ahitan, amaho in nathu chu anit jing nauve.
Tun amahon nangman keima neipeh thil chengse hi nanga kon ahi ahetauve.
Hiti ahijeh chun nangman keima neipeh thuho chu keiman amaho kapen, chule keima hi nanga hung kon kahi jong atahsan tauvin, chuleh nangman nei hin sol ahiti jong atahsan tauve.
Chuleh keima amaho dinga katao ahi, vannoi dinga katao ahipoi; Ahin nangman keima neipeh ho dinga bou katao ahi, Ijeh inem itile amaho nanga ahiuve.
Keima'a umjouse nanga ahi, chuleh nangma in keima neina peh ahitai. Ajeh chu amahon loupina eihin chansah'u ahi.
Chuleh keima vannoiya hi kaumlou ding ahitai, amaho vang hi vannoiya aum nalaiyuve, chule keima nahenga hung ding kahitai. Ka Pa Theng, eini pumkhat ihi banga amaho jong pumkhat ahithei na dingun, nangman amaho hi vengtup'in.
Keima hikoma kaum sungin, amaho hi kana vengtup e. Amaho hi kaventup jal'in khat cha jong amangthah aumpouve, Pathen lekhabun anaseisa, manthahna lama chepa tailou chu.
Chuleh tua keima nangma koma hunga kahitai, chule keima leiya kaum laiya chu kipa thanopnaa adim jing thei na dinguva kana seipeh sohhel ahitai.
Chuleh keiman nathu amaho kapetai; chule keima vannoiya kahilou banga amaho jong vannoiya ahilou jeh'un, vannoi miten ahotauve.
Chule keiman kathum chu amaho hi vannoiya konin ladoh in tia katao ahipoi, agiloupa natoh na'a kon in huhdoh in katijoh ahibouve.
Keima vannoiya kona kahilou banga, amaho jong vannoiya kon ahipouve.
Chule nathutah chun amaho jouse hi sutheng in ajeh chu nangma thuhi thutah ahiye.
Nangman keima vannoiya neina sol banga chu keiman amaho hi vannoiya kasol ahi.
Chule amaho jouse hi thutah'a suhthenga aum thei na dinguva amaho jal'a keima kisuthenga kahi. Jesun tahsan chate jouse dia taona anei
Keima seijui ho ding seh'a tao kahipoi, amaho thusei'a kona keima eitahsan ho jouse dinga jong taova kahi.
Chule amaho chu pumkhat ahina dinguva, Pa, keima nangma sol kahi hi vannoi miten atahsan thei na dinguva nangma keiya nauma keima nanga kaum banga hi, amaho jong einia aum theina dinga katao ahi.
Keiman amaho chu loupina nangman neipeh ho chu kapetai, amaho eini banga pumkhat ahitheina dingu ahi.
Keima amahoa kauma chule nangma keiya naum, abon'a khat a chamkim soh ahi. Chuteng vannoiyin keima neisol ahi ahetdiu chule keima nei ngailut banga hi amaho jong nangailut ahidan ahetthem diu ahi.
Hepa nangman neipeh loupina chu nangin neipeh ho hin amuthei na dingun, keima umna'a chun kakoma amaho jong umleu kati ahi; chule vannoi bul kiphu masanga nangman neingailut ahijeh chun.
Vo Kapa Theng vannoi leiset miten nangma nahethem theipouve, ahinla keiman nangma kahen, chule keima neisol hi seijui ho hin ahetauve.
Keiman nangma hi amaho lah'a katah lang nahitai, chule keiman hiti a chu katah lang jing ding nahi; hiche teng chule keima nei ngailut naho chu amaho'a umding chuteng keima jong amaho a ka umjing ding ahi.”
Jesun thu hicheng chu aseiyin apotdoh in Kidron vagal a hon umna'a chun aseijui hotoh agalkaiyun, chuin hon sunga chun amale aseijuiho aluttauve.
Jesu pedoh a pang Judas jong chun hilai mun chu ahet chen mama ahi, Ijeh inem itile Pakai Jesun aseijuite chu phat seh a ana pui jing ahi.
Chutah in Judas chun sepaihon chule thempu pipui ho le Pharisee hoa kona sottolle ho aloiyin, meivah, meisel, chuleh hem manchah athouvin hiche kom mun chu ahung lhung tauve.
Jesun achunga thil hunglhung ho jouse chu ahesoh keiyin ahi, hichun amaho kom lang chu ajonphei in adongtai, “Koi nahol'u ham?” ati.
Amahon adonbut'un, “Nazareth khoa kona hungkon Jesu chu kahol'u ahi,” atiuvin ahi. Jesun adonbut'in, “Ama chu kahi,” ati. (Judas, apedoh a pangpa chu, amaho lah'a chu dinga ahi).
Jesun, “Keima hi kahi,” ati chun amaho jouse chu anung chon'un tol'a alhu jengun ahi.
Hichun avel'in adongkit in, “Nanghon koi nahol'u ham?” ati. Chuin amahon adonbut'un, “Nazareth khoa kona hung Jesu chu kahol'u ahi,” atiuve.
Jesun adonbut'in, “Keiman kaseipeh nahiuve, amapa chu keima hi kahi, keima neihol'u ahijeh chun midang hohi soldoh tauvin,” ati.
Nangman keima neipeh chengse chu khatcha jong kaman sahpoi, tia asei chu guilhunna dinga chutia ahi.
Hichun Simon Peter in achemjam asatdoh in thempu chungnung sohpa asatle ajetlam abilkol asatlha tai, sohpa min chu Malchus ahi.
Ahinla Jesun Peter jah'a, “Nachemjam chu apai sunga koilut kit'in, Pan eipeh gentheina khon chu donlouva ka um ding ham,” ati.
Hichun sepai ho le apipui pau toh chuleh Juda ho sottolle hon Jesu chu aman un akan tauvin ahi.
Annas henga apui masauve; Ijeh inem itile ama chu chuche kuma chu Thempu chungnung pen'a pang Caiaphas nupa pa ahi.
Hiche Caiaphas hi ahi, “Miho jouse dinga mikhat athi aphajoi,” tia Juda ho ana thumop chu. Peter in Jesu aseilep
Simon Peter chun, seijui dangho bangin, Jesu chu anung ajui tan ahi. Seijui holah a khat chu Thempu pipui hotoh ana kihet jeh chun Thempu pipu pa umna gei chu Jesu toh ana lutsah un ahi.
Ahin Peter vang chu polanga phat chomkhat aumin, hichun seijui holah a khat thempu pipuipa toh kihe pa chun kelkot ngah a pang numeinu koma phalna athumin hichun Peter insunga apuilut tai.
Hiche numeinu chun Peter chu thudoh aneiyin, “Nangma hi hiche pa seijui ho khat nahi lou ham? Nangma nahi,” ati. Ahin Peter in adonbut'in, “Kahipoi,” ati.
Hiche koma chu soh hole sottol le hon adapjeh'a mei akitiuva dinmuna mei aoiyu ahin, Peter jong adingin meichu aoiyin ahi.
Hikom insung langa chun Thempupan Jesu chu thudoh anei'in, anungjui ho ipi ana seipeh'a chuleh ipi ana hilchah em tichu adongtan ahi.
Jesun adonbut'in, “Mipihon ahesoh keiye ipi kana hilchah, chule Houin a jong aphat jouse in mipi ho koma kana seipeh jinge, guhthima kana seipeh imacha aumpoi.
Ibol'a nangman hiche thudoh hohi neidoh ham? kathusei ngai ho le jaho chu nadoh thei lou ham? Ajeh chu amahon kathu hil jouse chu ahesohkei uve,” ati.
Hichun Jesun thu hicheng chu aseiyin ahile akoma Santri dingho lah'a khat in Jesu ngeiphe abengin, “Thempu chungnung hitia chu kidonbut ngaiyem?” ati.
Hichun Jesun adonbut'in, “Keiman kasei khel aumle neimu sah'un, ahinla thutah kasei doh jeh'a chu ibol'a neivoh uham?” ati.
Hichun Annas chun Jesu chu ahentup'in Caiaphas Thempu chungnung heng lama asoltai.
Hiche phat dontah a chu Simon Peter chun dap asah jeh'a mei aki oi ahin, amahon adongkit'un, “Nangma hi amaho lah'a khat chu nahilou ham?” atiuve. Ahin Peter in adonbut'in, “Keima kahipoi,” ati.
Ahinla Thempu chungnung sohpa Simon Peter in abilkol asatlhah pehpa inko khat'in ajah'a, “Keiman Hon a chu nangma amato kamu nahi lou ham?” atin ahi.
Hichun avel'in Peter in aseilep kit in, chule hetman louvin Ahchal akhong tai.
Chutah chun amahon Caiaphas in a konin gamvaipo pa inlama Jesu akaitauve; hichu jingkah ahina laiye; ahivangin kal chuh kut an aneh thei na dingun, akisuhboh louna dingun gamvaipo inpia chun amaho alutpouve.
Hichun Pilate apotdoh in, amaho chu aga kimupin thudoh anei'in, “Hiche pa hin ipi abolkhel atoh khel um hitam?” ati.
Hichun amahon adonbut'un, “Amapa khang-gilou ahilouleh nangma koma kahin lhut lou dingu ahi,” atiuve.
Hichun Pilate in adonbut'in, “Hiche chu ahitah le, nanghon nungpui tauvin, chuleh nangho dan dungjui in kitan lhah tauvin,” ati. Hiche phat chun Judah hon adonbut'un, “Keima ho Danthu dungjui'in koima thana ding tha kanei pouve,” atiuvin ahi.
(Hiche hin avetsah chu, Jesun athiding dan ana seidoh masah chu guilhunna ahi).
Hichun Pilate insung dan'ah alut'in, Jesu chu akouvin, thudoh aneiyin, “Nangma Judate lengpa chu nahim?” ati.
Jesun adonbut'in, “Hiche thudoh ho hi nangma chama kon ham, ahiloule mi khat tou'in keima chung chang nasei peh ham?” ati.
Hichun Pilate in adonbut kit'in, “Keihi Juda mi kahi ham? Namite le thempu pipuihon kakhut'a eipeh nahi chu, ipi nabolsetba ham?” ati.
Jesun adonbut'in, “Keima lenggam hi hiche vannoi a kon ahipoi. Hiche vannoi a kon ana hitaleh keima dingin kaseijui hon gal eisat peh intin, Judate khut'a peh doh'a kaum lou ding ahi. Ahinla keima lenggam hi hiche vannoi a kon ahipoi,” ati.
Hichun Pilate in aseikit'in, “Ahileh nangma hi lengpa nahim?” atile Jesun adonbut'in, “Leng kahi chu nasei khai, Thutah thu hettohsah dinga hung penga, hiche dinga hi vannoiya hunga kahi. Thutah hechan chun thutah ahinphot chen diu ahi” ati.
Hichun Pilate in adonbut in, “Thutah chu ipi ham?” Hichun Pilate chu Juda mipi holah'a aga potdoh kit'in, ajah'uva aseitai, “Jesu hi themmo na neilou ahi, ati. Jesu tha dia alhuh sah'u
Ahivangin nanghon kalchuh kut le mikhat nakilha doh peh dingu chonna ngai khat naneiyui; hijeh chun Juda lengpa hi lhadoh peh leu veng nalungu ham?” ati.
Ahinla amahon asam'un, “Hiche pa hi hida hen, Barabbas joh,” atin asamtauve. (Barabbas chu doudal natong ahi).
Hichun Pilate in Jesu chu mol'a jep dingin apedoh tai.
Chuin sepai hon ling lukhuh apheh'un, Pakai chu akhuh peh tauvin ahi. Chuleh amahon ponsandup asilpeh un ahi.
Chuin akoma ahungun, “Judate lengpa chibai,” atiuvin, totnopnan aneiyun chuleh abengphe abeh peh'un ahi.
Chuin Pilate agapot kit'in, ajah uva, “Veuvin akhan gitlouna ima kamu lou nahetna dinguva ama naheng uva kahin puidoh ahi,” ati.
Hichun Jesu chu ling lukhuh khuh le ponsandup kisil pum chun ahung potdoh'in, chuin Pilate in ajah uva, “Veuvin hiche mipa hi!” ati.
Hichun thempu pipui hole Houin ngah'a pang sepai hon ama chu amuphat un, “Thingpel'a khenbeh-in, thingpel'a khenbeh-in,” tin asamtauve. Ahin Pilate in adonbut'in, “Nanghon natahsa tah in kai unlang thingpel'a khenbeh tauvin, keiman vang Jesu hi amona kamu dohpoi,” ati.
Judate lamkai hon adonbut uvin, “Keiho danpi dungjui'a ama hi athi dinga lomtah ahi, ijeh inem itile ama tah Pathen Chapa akihisah jeh chun,” atiuve.
Hichun Pilate in hiche thu ajah phat'in, atil'a sangin akicha cheh tan;
Hichun Pilate chu inpi sunga alut kit'in Jesu jah'a, “Nangma hoiya hung kon nahim?” ati. Ahivangin Jesun adonbut pon ahi.
Hijeh chun Pilate in ajah'a, “Nei houpi lou ding ham? Nangma lhadoh na ding jong chuleh thingpel a khetbeh na ding jong thu kanei hi nahet lou ham?” ati.
Hichun Jesun aseitai, “Nangman keima chunga imacha tha nanei nading aumpoi, amavang chunglam akon tilou'in, ati. Hiti ahijeh a chu keima eipeh doh'a pangpa chonset na achungnungpen e,” ati.
Hichun Pilate in Jesu chu lha doh dingin agongtan, ahinla Judah hon asam uvin, “Nangman hichepa hi nalha doh leh Caesar jol nahilou ahi; ama lenga kisem chan chu Caesar douna'a thusei ahi,” atiuve.
Pilate in thu chucheng ajah phat chun Jesu chu ahin puidoh in; chuin Pilate chu song lhongnal atiu (Hebrew paova Gabbatha) hichu thutanna'a touna, chunga chun atoutan ahi.
Hichu kalchuh kut dinga kigot ni, nidan gup dontah ahi; chuin Juda ho jah'a, “Veuvin na lengpau hi!” ati.
Hijeh chun amaho a-aosot jengun, “Sumangin, sumangin, thingpel'ah khenbeh-in!” atiuvin ahileh, Pilate in ajah'uva, “Nalengpau thingpel'a kakhet beh ding ham?” atileh; thempu pipuihon adonbut'un, “Keihon Caesar tailou leng dang kanei pouve,” atiuvin ahi.
Hichun Pilate in Jesu khetbeh na dingin amaho koma ape dohtai, Hichun Judaten Jesu chu apuidoh tauvin ahi.
Hichun amahon Jesu chu akai'un, chuin a thingpel akiput'in Lugu mun (Hebrew paova Golgotha) atiu mun chu jonin achetan ahi.
Chuleh hiche mun'a chun Pakai Jesu chu thingpel chung'ah akhenbeh tauvin ahi, chuleh midang pasal ni jong asih langto gel'a amatoh akhetbeh thau vin, Jesu chu amani lai tah a akikhenbeh in ahi.
Chuin Pilate in thingpel chunga simdoh ding atah in hichu, “Nazareth Jesu, Judate lengpa,” tin atah doh in ahi.
Chuleh Jesu akhetbeh na mun chu khopi nai ahijeh chun, hiche min chu Juda ho tamtah-in asimun; hichu Hebrew pao, Latin pao, chuleh Greek paova kisun ahi.
Hichun thempu pipuihon Pilate henga alungkim lounau aga lhut'un, Hiche kheldoh na dingin, “Judate lengpa” khel'a “Aman aseijin, ‘keima hi Judate lengpa kahi,’” tijoh a khel dingin aseitauve.
Ahin Pilate in adonbut'in, “Hithei ponte, ajeh chu keiman kana jihdoh sa chu kajih doh ahitai,” ati.
Chule Rome sepai hon Jesu akhetbeh uchun, aponsil alauvin, hal li asouvin sepai khat hal khat cheh in achang'un; chule asangkhol jong chu alauvin; asangkhol chu khuilou ahin, alua pat ato geiya kikhong lhungkei ahi.
Hichun amahon aseiyun, “Atel tel'a bokeh sangin leh sangu hitin, vang vetaote, koi chang ding ham” atiuve; Hiche hi Pathen thua kijih guilhun na dinga kisei chu ahi. Hichun amahon von chu alehsang un vangvet nan aneiyun, hitichun anabol'un ahi.
Hiche jeh chun sepai hon hiti chun hicheng chu aboltauve, Ahin Jesu thingpel koma chun anutoh, anu sopinu Mary (Clopas Inneipi) toh, Mary Magdalene ading jingun ahi.
Hichun Jesun anu le angailut aseijui chu akom'a adin amu phat'in anu jah'a, “Numei ven nachapa chu,” ati.
Chuin Jesun hiche aseijui pa jah'a aseijin, “Hiche hi nanu ahi,” atin hichun hiche aseijui pa chun Jesu nu Mariam chu a-inlam'a apui tan ahi.
Hiche jou chun Jesun thil ijakai akichai soh chu ahen, Pathen Lekhabua thu chu guilhun sohthei nan, “Kadang achah-e!” ati.
Chuleh chukoma chu belkhat'a theitwi thuh kitung ahin, chule twichop phon a theitwi thuh dimset in hyssop mol leh'a atah-un akamtoh asutouvin ahi.
Chuin Jesun theitwi thuh chu adonin, “Akichaitai,” ati. Chuin akaikun alhagao alhadoh tan ahi.
Chuin kigin ni ahijeh chun cholngah ni a thilong ho chu thingpel'a aumden louna dingin (cholngah ni Chula ni loupi ni ahin), Judah hon Pilate henga akenggu heboh dingleh along galah mangna dingin athumun ahi.
Hichun Rome sepai ho ahungun mi ni kikhai Jesu toh kikhenbeh te ni keng chu ahehbong tauvin ahi.
Amavang Pakai Jesu kom ahin phah uchun, ama chu ana thitan ahi, hiphat chun Jesu keng vang chu aheh bong tapouve.
Hitia aum vang chun sepai ho khat in Jesu nah chu tengcha a asut le apet pet chun thisan le twisih ahung pot tan ahi.
Chule amupa tah chun ahettohsah ahi; chule ama thu hettohsah chu tahbeh ahi; chuleh aman atahbeh asei ahi chu ahei; nanghon jong natahsan thei na dingu ahi.
Hiche ho jouse hi Pathen thua ana kisei doh banga, “Agu khat cha jong kihehbong lou ding ahi,” ati chu guilhunna dinga thil hicheng chu soh a ahitai.
Chule “Amahon tengcha'a asutpau chu avet dingu ahi” kiti toh.
Chuin hicheng jou chun Arimathea Joseph, Jesu seijui khat, amavang Juda ho gin jeh a guh thima hia ahin, ama chun Jesu long chu pohdoh dingin Pilate henga aga thum'in ahileh, Pilate'in jong ana phal'e. Hijeh chun ama ahungin Jesu long chu apo mangtai.
Chule Arimathea Joseph toh hung khom pachu Nicodemus ahin, ama hi Jesu toh kimuto dinga jan muthim'a hungpa chu ahi. Nicodemus chun Myrrh leh Aloes thao namtui kihal, sel som sagi le nga a gih ahin choiyin ahi.
Hichun amahon Jesu long chu alauvin Judate chon na ngai bang in lounam tui toh tupat pon nemin atom tauvin ahi.
Chuleh thingpel'a aki khetbeh nau mun'a chu hon khat uma ahin, hon a chu koima kivuina khahlou hel lhan thah khat uma ahi.
Hijeh chun Juda ho kiginni ahijeh chun lhan chu akomcha ahiman chun chukoma chun Jesu chu avui tauvin ahi.
Chuin hapta kipatna nimasa ni jingkah matah ahung lhungtan, kho jong vah chen loulai ahin, Mary Magdalene chu lhan a chun agachen ahileh song chu lhan a kona tahdohsa aum chu agamui.
Hichun Mary Magdalene chu alhai in Simon Peter leh Pakaiyin a-ngailut seijui pa henga hitin thu aga lhuttai, “Pakai longdamsa chu amahon apo mangtauvin, chule lhan khuh akon'a hoilanga akoiyu ham akihetapoi” agatin ahi.
Hiche jehchun Peter le seijui khatpa chu lhan khuh lam jon in ache lhontai.
Hichun seijui teni chu hatah in lhan lam jon'in akilhaitet lhon in ahile seijui khatpa chun Peter akhokhel in lhan khuh apha masa tan ahi.
Ama akunin asung avet le tupat ponnem ho um chu amun, ahivangin asunga alutpoi.
Hichun Simon Peter chu ahung lhungtan, chuin lhan sunga chun alut tai; chuin tupat ponnem ho aum chuleh,
Aluchunga um ultheh pon chu tupat ponnem ho chutoh umtha louva akijel'a atuma ana um aga mun ahi.
Hichun seijui alhung masajo pa jong chu lhan khuh sunga aga sunglhan, hichun amun atahsan tai.
Hiche masangsea chu amahon Pathen thu akisei doh “Pakai Jesu chu thi ding chuleh hungthou doh kit ding ahi” tichu ana tahsan thei lou'u ahi.
Hichun amahon Inlam ahin jon tauvin ahi.
Mary vang chu lhan khuh pam'a chun ading in akap'in aka pum chun lhan khuh sung chu aga ven ahi.
Hichun aban abang Vantil ni Jesu long alupsah nauva chu khat alulhuna atouva khat akeng todop'a atou amui.
“Ngailut umtah numei nangma ibol'a kap nahim?” tin Vantil teni chun ahindongin ahi. Hichun amanun adonbut'in, “Ajeh chu amahon Ka Pakai apomang tauvin, chuleh along damsa chu hoiya akoiyu keiman kahe tapoi,” ati.
Chutia aseijou chun ama aki nungheiyin ahileh, Jesu adin amun, ahin Jesu ahi chu ahepoi.
Jesun ahin dong'in, “Ngailut umtah numei ibol'a kap nahim?” ati. Amanun honlei ngahpa ahisah in, “Pu, hoilaiya nakoi hitam Ka Pakai long chu, neisei peh in keiman gapo mang ing kate,” ati.
“Mary!” tin Jesun ahin koutai. Mary chu Pakai henglam a ahung kihei in akap'in, “Rabboni,” ati (hichu Hebrew paova, “houhil,” tina ahi).
Hichun Jesun ajah'a, “Neitong khahih in; ijeh inem itile keima Pa henga chun kakaltou hih laiye; ahin chen lang kasopi ho jah'a gaseiyin, Ka-Pa, nangho Pa, Ka Pathen nangho Pathen henga kakaltouve,” ati.
Mary Magdalene chun seijui ho akimupin, hitin aseiye, “Keiman Pakai chu kamutai,” ati. Chuin amanu chun athusei ho chu asei peh tai. Jesu Aseijuite Henga Akilah
Nikho kipat ni nilhah chun aseijuite Judah ho gin na jeh'a kot kikha khuma um ahiuvin, hichun Jesu ahungin amaho lah'a ahung dingin ajah'uva, “Nachung'uva lungmon umhen,” ati.
Aman hiche chu aseijou vin amaho chu akhut thihkil maha le anah tenga kisut na maha avetsah tan ahi. Hichun amahon Pakai amu'u chun seijuite chu akipah lheh jengun ahi.
Hichun Pakaiyin avel'in ahoulimpi kit in, “Nachunguva lungmon chamna umhen, chuleh Pan keima eisol banga nangho kasol nahiuve,” ati.
Hichun Pakai in aseijui ho chu ahu ahai khum in, “Lhagao theng kisan un.”
“Nanghon koitobang ham khat chu achonsetna nangaidam uva ahileh kingaidam ahitauve, ahin nanghon nangaidam louleh amaho chu kingaidam lou ahijenge,” ati.
Seijui som le ni holah'a khat Thomas (Didymus atiu) vang chu Jesu hung kilah a chu amaho lah'a ana umlou ahi.
Amahon aseipeh un, “Keihon Pakai chu kamutauve,” atiuvin ahi. Ahivangin Thomas chun, “Keiman akhut phanga thingkil maha kamua kakhut junga kakhoiya, anah kakhut a katham kahsen keiman tahsan ponge,” ati.
Niget jouvin seijuite insunga aumkhom pettah'un, hia chu Thomas jong um'ah ahi. Aumnau in chu kot kikhah soh keiya ahi, hinlah hetmanlou kah'in, amasa'a bangin, Jesu alah uva ana dingin ahi. “Chamnan nalon khum'u hen,” ati.
Hichun Thomas jah a, “Nakhutjung in hinkhoiyin, kakhut teni hi ven; chuleh nakhut hin lhangin lang kanah tham'in; chuleh gingcha lel tahih in, tahsanin,” ati.
“Ka Pakai le Ka Pathen!” tin Thomas chun ahin phongdoh tai.
Chuin Jesun aseipeh in, “Nangman neimu jeh a neitahsan ahi. Mulouva tahsan ho anun nomui,” ati.
Hiti tah a chu Jesun aseijuite ang sunga melchihna kidang tamtah abol ahin, hiti ho chu hiche lekhabu sunga hin akisunlut poi.
Ahinla nanghon Jesu chu Messiah, Pathen Chapa, ahi chu natahsan uva chule natahsan vanguva ama min a hinna nanei theina dinguva hichengse hi hiche lekhabua hi kisun'ah ahibouve.
Hichun phat chomkhat jouvin Jesu chu seijui hotoh Galilee dillen panga akimuto kit'un, hiti hin ana um'in ahi.
Simon Peter le Thomas (Didymus atiu) chutoh, Galilee gam'a Cana khoa mi Nathanael toh, Zebedee chapa teni toh chuleh seijui dang nitoh umkhom'a ahiuvin;
Simon Peter in, “Keima nga manin chenge,” ati. Hichun amahon ajah'a, “Keiho jong kahung dingu ahi atiuvin ahi.” Chuin acheuvin kong sung khat ah aluttauve, ahin hiche jan chun imacha amanpouvin ahi.
Jingkah matah in Jesu chu vapam'a adin seijui hon amuuvin, hinlah ama chu koi ahi ageldoh pouve.
Hichun Pakaiyin amaho chu akouvin, “Sopite ho, nga ijat namat tah uvem?” ati. Ahin amahon adonbut'un, “Imacha Kaman pouve,” atiuvin ahi.
Hichun aman, “Nalen'u chu kong jetlam'a gaseplha temun, hiteng chule namat dingu ahi,” ati. Hichun amahon aseu le nga atama atam jeh chun akaidoh joutapouve.
Hichun Jesun angailut seijui chun Peter jah a, “Pakai ahi,” ati. Hichu Peter in Pakai ahi ati chu ajah phat in asangkhol aki-ah loiyin, (asagoh keova um ahin) dillen a chun achom lhan chule vapam lam chu ajon'in ahi.
Adangse vang chu kong sunga atouvun, len chu vapam langa kaidoh ding agong'un, ajeh chu len a chu nga dimset ahin chule amaho vapam alhun nadingu chu tong jani tobang achebeu ngaiyah ahi.
Amaho vapam alhun uchun songmeihol meiya kitih le achunga nga kikoi chuleh changlhah, jing-an a nehding, amu'uvin ahi.
Jesun amaho jah'a, “Namatsau nga chu themkhat hinchoiyun,” ati.
Hichun Simon Peter kong sunga alut'in len chu vapam langa akai doh in ngalen ja khat le som nga le thum dimset len chu agakaiyin, nga achuti tam vang chun alen chu a-eh pon ahi.
Hiphat chun Jesun, “Tun nangho hungun lang jing an hung kineh tauvin,” ati. Ahinla aseijui holah a chun khat cha beh in jong, “Nang koi nahi ham?” tin adong ngam pouve. Amahon Pakai ahi chu ahesoh keiyun ahi.
Hichun Pakai in seijui ho chu changlhah le nga anehsah in avahva sohkei tai.
Hichu athia kona athodoh nunga aseijuite henga akilah athumvei na ahi.
Jing-an anehjou phat'un, Jesun Simon Peter adongin, “John chapa Simon nangman hiche ho jouse sanga hi nei ngailut joh em? ati. Peter in adonbut in, henge Pakai keiman kangailut nangman nahe nai,” ati.
Hichun Jesun ajah'a, “Kakelngoi ho vah'in,” ati. Anivei nan ajah'a, “John chapa Simon nangman neingailut'em?” ati kit tai. Aman ajah'a, “Henge Pakai ka-ngailut nangman nahenai,” ati. Hichun Jesun ajah'a, “Kakelngoi ho vah'in,” ati.
Jesun athumvei nan adongkit in, “John chapa Simon, keima hi nei ngailut tahbeh mong hinam?” ati. Thumveijen, “Neingailut'em?” atijeh chun Peter chu alungthim anommo lhehtan, ahin Peter in adonbut'in, “Pakai nangman ijakai nahe sohkeiye, keiman nangma kangailut na jouse nangman nahenai,” ati. Hichun Jesun ajah'a, “Kakelngoi ho vah'in” ati.
“Tahbeh a kaseipeh nahi, nakhandon lai chun nangma deibang tah'in navon nakivon thei in, chuleh nangma nop nop na lama nache theiye, ahinla nakum ahungtam tan chujongleh nahung pilhingtan, hijeh a chu nakhut ho nahinjal doh'a midang koitobang in navon nahin vonpeh ding chuleh nache nom louna lam lama napui dingu ahi,” ati.
Hichu ama iti thia athiding Pathen achoiat ding chu hetsah na a ati ahi. Chuin hiche chu asei jouvin ajah'a, “Kanung hin jui in,” ati.
Peter akinung hei jin avetle anunglam uva–Jesu ngailut seijui, jan anneh pet'a Jesu henglam a akingailhua chule “Pakai koiham nangma napedoh dinga chu,” tia dongpa chu amun ahi.
Peter in Jesu chu thudoh aneiyin, “Pakai hichepa chula?” ati.
Jesun adonbut'in, “Keima kahung kinungle kitkah a ana umdinga phalna kapeh chu, nangma a dinga ipi aboina uma ham? Nang man keima neihin juitan,” ati.
Hichun hiche asei chu, hiche seijui chu thi louding ahi, tin sopite lah'a athangtan ahi; ahinla Jesun ama jah'a chu, “Ama chu thilou ding ahi, ati ahipoi. Kahung kahsen umhen, tileng hichu nangman ipi ding natim?” ati ahibouve.
Hicheng thu hettohsah a chule hicheng thu suna hi hiche seijui chu ahin; ama thu hettohsah chu tahbeh ahi, ti kaheuve.
Chuleh hicheng tailouvin jong Jesun thil kidang tamtah anabol aume; hiti ho chu kageldan in, lekhabun ana kisun sohkei henlang hileh, lekhabua kisun chengse chu vannoi leiset hin dolponte kati.
Theophilus, ka lekhabu masa-a kahin sei chu, Jesu thilbolle thuhil kipattil thudol jouse le
Lhagao thenga kona alhendoh solchah ho thu apeh jouva pat ama van'a lahtouva aum ni gei thu ahi.
Chuche thingpel chunga athia athodoh jou ni somli sung chun, ama solchah ho henga akilah jin, chule ama ahing monge ti chu photchetna tamtah avetsah jin, chuleh Pathen lenggam thudol aseiyin ahi.
Chuin solchah ho toh anehkhom laiyin, aman amaho chu thu apen, “Kana seipeh bangun Pan akitepna thilpeh ahinsol masangsen nanghon Jerusalem dalhah hih un.
John in twiya baptize nachansah'u ahin, ahin tuapat nikho phabep joule nangho Lhagao Thenga baptize nachan ding'u ahi.” ati.
Hichun solchah ho chu Jesu toh aumkhom pet un, amahon adongun, “Pakai, Israelte chamlhat nading leh a lenggam nakiledohsah kit nading phat chu hitam?” atiuvin ahi.
Aman adonbut in, “Anikho leh aphat chu Pa changseh thaneina-a um ahin, nangho hetding dol ahipoi.
Ahinlah Lhagao Theng nachung uva ahung chuh teng leh nanghon thahatna nanei ding'u ahi. Chutengleh nangho Jerusalema, Judea gam'a, Samaria gam, leh leiset chung pumpia kathu hettoh sah'a napan ding'u ahi,” ati.
Thu hicheng chu asei jouvin, amahon avet jinglaiyun ama chu meiloma lahtouvin aumin ahileh amahon amupha tapouvin ahi.
Chutia amahon van lam'a lahtouva aumpet avet jinglaiyun pon-banga kivon mi ni alah'uvah ahung ding lhonin,
“Galilee mite, ibola nadinuva vanlam navet jingu ham? Jesu nangho koma kona vana lahtouva aum banga hi nikhatle vanna kona hung kile kitding ahi!” atilhone.
Chuin solchah hochu Jerusalema kona mile keh'a gamla Olive mola kon chun Jerusalem'ah ahung kile tauvin ahi.
Jerusalem ahung lhunun aumnau inchung langah akaltouvun ahi. Amaho chu: Peter, John, Jacob, Andrew, Philip, Thomas, Bartholomew, Matthew, Jacob (Alphaeus chapa), Simon (Zealot), chule Judas (Jacob chapa), ahiuve.
Amaho chengse hi Jesu nu Mary leh numei dang phabeptoh, Jesu sopite phabeptoh akipunkhomun gunchu leh lungkhat tahin atao jom jing tauve.
Jesu tahsan mipi jakhat le somni akikhop khom laitah uvin Peter adingdoh in,
“Sopite ho, Jesu manho lamkaiya pang Judas thudol hi, kumsottah masanga Lhagao Thengin Leng David kam'a anaphondohsa Pathen lekhabua thu chu guilhungah ahi.
Ijeh-inem itileh Judas chu eiho lah'a khat ahin, hiche lhacha hina jonghi changah ahi,” ati.
(Aman khan gitlou man sumin gambeh khat achon, akhupboh in achun atumpi apohkeh-in agil jouse ahung dohtan ahi.
Judas thi thuhi Jerusalem mite jouse koma ahung kithangsoh tan ahileh amahon hiche gambeh chu Aramaic paovin Akeldama asah tauvin, hichu Thisan gambeh tina ahi.)
Peter in asei jom kit in, “Psalm lekhabua kimu bang in ‘Ama In chu onghen, koima cheng hihhen, chuleh ama panmun chu midangkhat changhen,’ ati.
Hijeh a chu Judas panmun khel ding mikhat ilhen ding'u ahin amachu Pakai Jesu toh iumkhomlai uva pat'a eiholah a umjing khat hiding. John'in baptize achansah jouva pat eiholah'a kona Jesu lahtouva aumni geiya eiholah a lhajing hiding, amachu Jesu thodoh thudol hettohsah dinga eiholah'a pang ding ahi,” ati.
Chuin mi ni: Barsabbas kiti Joseph (Justus tiajong kihe) le Matthias chu alhengdoh-un,
Amaho ataovun, “Vo Pakai, nangma mijouse lungthim hesoh nahi,
Hiche teni hi koijoh in Judas khel'a solchah na atoh dingham neihetsah uvin, ajeh chu Judas chun hiche solchah natoh hi alhatan ahi.”
Chuin amahon vang asangun ahileh Matthias chu solchah somlekhat holah a akisimtha tan ahi. Solchah ho Lhagao Thenga adimu
Pentecost nikho chun tahsan chate jouse chu munkhat a ana umkhomun ahi.
Chuin phulou helouvin van'a konin hui hattah gin tobang ahung ging in, atoukhom nau inchu ahung dimset jengtan ahi.
Chuin meikong toh kilou ahiloule meikong banga kong lei ahung kilah in amaho jouse chunga chun achutan ahi.
chuin amaho jouse chu Lhagao Theng adimsoh tauvin ahileh Lhaogao Theng in apeh bangun amahon paochom paochom in thu asei pan tauvin ahi.
Hichepet a chu vannoi gamtin a kona hungkhom Judah hougut hojong Jerusalema um'u ahi.
Chuin chuche gin chu ajah phat'un mipi ajapha jouse chu ahung khomun ahileh tahsan chate thusei chu ama ama paocheh a ajah jeh uchun amaho alung kichih lah jengun ahi.
Chuin amaho chun kidang asauvin, “Hiche hi iti hithei ham?” tin adatmo lheh jengun ahi. “Hiche mite hi abonchauva Galilee mi ahiuvin,
ahinlah eihon eima eima penna gam cheh paovin ijauve!
Eiho hila Parthia mi, Mede mi, Elam mi ihiuvin, abang Mesopotamia gam'a cheng, Judah gam le Cappadocia gam'a cheng, Pontus gam'a le Asia gam'a cheng,
Phrygia le Pamphylia gam'a cheng, Egypt gam'a cheng chule Cyrene gam vel'a, Libya gam'a cheng ihiuvin; abang Rome a kona hung kholjin, Judah chona chonho,
chule Crete mi le Arab gam mi ihiuvin; ahivang in eima pao cheh-a Pathen thilbol loupi thu aseiyu thakhat jah-in ijauve,” atiuvin ahi.
Amaho chun kidang asauvin adatmo lheh jengun “Itidan ahidem,” tin khat le khat akidongto tauvin ahi.
Ahivang in mipi lah a konkhat chun ajontaiyun, “Hiteho hi lengpi twi kham ahiuve,” atiuvin ahi.
Chuin Peter chu solchah dang somlekhat chutoh adingdoh in mipi ho koma chun aw sangtah in asamin ajah uva, “Phatechan ngaiyuvin, Judah mite le Jerusalema cheng mite! Hiche thuhi nanghon hekhel hih'un,
Nangho ngaito banga hiteho hi lengpitwi kham ahipouve, ajeh chu tuhi jingkah nidan ko ahinalai bouve.
Ahin hiche namu'uhi Joel themgaopan anaphon dohsa guilhunna ahibouve:
‘Pathen in’ ni nunung lamle hiti ding ahi, mijouse chunga ka-Lhagao kabuhlhah ding ahi. Nachapateu le nachanu teuvin gaothu asei dingu, chule na khangdong-houvin mu aneiyuva, chule na Upa houvin mang anei dingu ahi.
Hiche niteng chule kasoh pasalte le kasoh numeite chunga ka-Lhagao kabuhlhah ding amahon gaothu asei dingu ahi.
chuleh vana thil kidang tampi kasosah ding, leiset chunga melchihna tampi-thisan, meikong le meikhu kamusah ding ahi.
Pakai hungkitna nikho loupitah ahung lhun masanga, Nisa hungthim ding, lha jong thisan soh ding ahi.”
Ahinlah koi hijongle Pakai min kou jouse sohcha ding ahi.
“Nangho Israel mite, ngaiyuvin! Pathen in Nazareth Jesu chu nangho lah a amanchah-a bolmo kidang, datmo umho, chule melchihna ho abola kona chu aphotchetsah ahin, hichu nanghon nahet u ahi.
Ahin Pathen in ahet masat le agontoh masat bang in Jesu chu pehdoh in aumtan ahileh nanghon dan neilou chidang namdangte toh kithon thingpel a nakhenbeh un nathat tauvin ahi.”
Ahin Pathen in Ama chu kichat umtah thina-a konin alha-ong in hinna ape kit tan ahi ajeh chu thina in atuhden hoi ahilou jeh chun.
Leng David in Ama thudol aseiyin, “Keiman Pakai chu kamaikoh-a kamu jinge; keima kalonle louding ahi ajeh chu kajetlama ama aum jinge.
Hijeh chun kalung akipah-in, chule kalei athanome; chuche kalval chun katahsa jong kinem'a cholnga ding ahi;
Ajeh chu nangman kalhagao mithiho lah a nadalhah louding, namitheng mon mangna namusah louding ahi.
Nangman keima hina lampi neihetsah ahitan, namaisoa kipana neidip ding ahi, ati.”
“Sopite ho, hiche thuhi ngaito temuvin, Ipu-u David in ama chungchang thu asei ahilou dan kicheh tah in iheuve, ajeh chu ama athi in, akivuina lhanmun jeng jong tugeiyin eiholah-a aumin ahi.
Ahin ama themgao ahijeh chun, Pathen in Ama taiguiya pengkhat alal tounaa atousah ding, kihahsela athutep chu ahen,
Chutia chu khonung thu ahet masah jeh chun Messiah thokit thu aseiyin, ‘Thikhol khul'ah dalhah denin aumpoi, Alongin jong monmangna amupoi,’ ati.
Pathen in Jesu chu thinaa konin akaithouvin, keiho jouse hi ahettoh kahiuve.
Tun Ama vana Pathen khut jet lama choisangin aumin, athutepsa Lhagao Theng chu a-Pa a konin amun, hichu ahin bunglhan, tua namu'u najah-u hi ahi.
David chu amatah vana akaltou lou vang'in hitin aseiye, ‘Pakai chun ka Pakai jah a, jabolna mun kakhut jetlam'a tou jingin,
Namelmate kasuhnem a, nakeng chotpha a kaneisah masang sen,’ ati.
Chuti ahijeh chun Israel chate jousen heuvin, Pathen in hiche Jesu, thingpel chunga nakhatbehpau chu Pakai le Messiah dinga atundoh ahitai!”
Peter thusei chun alungthim'u asuntan ahile amahon Peter le seijui dangho koma chun, “Sopite ho keihon ipi kabol dingu ham?” atiuvin ahi.
Peter in adonbut in, “Nachonset lungheiyun lang Pathen lama hung kiheiyun, chule nachonset nau ngaidama aum jeh in Jesu Christa minin twiya baptize changun, chutengle Lhagao Theng thilpeh nachan dingu ahi.
Hiche thutep hi nangho le nachateu ding, chule chidang namdangte ding le, Pakai Pathen in akou mite jouse dinga jong ahi,” ati.
Chule Peter in thutampi asei jomjing nalaiyin, amaho chu atilkhouvin, “Hiche khang gilou mite-a kon hin kihuhdoh un,” atin ahi.
Hiche nikho a Peter thusei tahsanho jouse chu twija baptize achangun, hiche nikho chun Houbung mi sangthum ana kibe in ahi.
Tahsan chate jouse chun solchah ho thuhil jong, kiloikhomna jong, neh leh chah kihopkhomna le Pakai anjon a jong, taokhomna a jong gunchu tah in anapang det jingun ahi.
Chuin alungthim sunguva kichatna nasatah ahung lhungin, solchah hon jong melchihna le thil kidang tamtah aboltauve.
chuin tahsan chate jouse chu munkhat'ah aumkhom un athilnei jouseu chu neilhangin ana neikhom uvin ahi.
Anei agou-u ajoh uvin asum chu angaicha jouse toh ana kihom jiuvin ahi.
Niseh-in Hou-in a Pathen ahoukhom jiuvin, Pakai anjon jong dingin in'ah akikhom jiuvin, chule kipah tah le hongphal tahin an ana nekhom jiuvin ahi.
Abonchauva Pathen avahchoi jing laiyu-le mijouse lungdeiya thanomtah-a aum jing laiyun, aniseh in Pathen in huhhing'a umho chu amaho lah a chun abe jing tan ahi.
Nikhat Peter le John chu nilhah lang taokhom phat in, hichu nidan thum don ahin, Houin'ah achelhon in ahi.
Houin ahung nai lhontah chun apen a pat a elbai mikhat ahin polut un, ama pa chun houin'a cheho jouse koma akithum theina dinga niseh le houin kotkhahoi atiu muna chu akoi jiu ahi.
Hiche mipa chun Houin'a lut kigo Peter le John amu phat chun sum themkhat neipe lhonin tin athum tan ahi.
Peter le John in amapa chu ave changmel lhonin, hichun Peter in amapa koma chun, “Neive lhonin” ati.
Hichun elbaipa chun sum themkhat beh muding kinem in amani chu lunglut tah in avelhon tan ahi.
Ahin Peter in “Nang dingin Dangka le Sana kanei poi, ahinlah kaneisun penge, Nazareth Jesu Christa minin ding in lang lam jot'in.” ati.
Chuin Peter in elbaipa chu akhut jet'in atuh in akithopi in akai ding tan ahileh, mipa kengphang le a-ahkhomit chu apettah chun adamtan chule athahatdoh tan ahi.
Chuin akichomin akengphang in adingdoh in lam ajot pantan, amani chutoh houin sunga alut'in avahlen, akichomin, chule Pathen avahchoi tan ahi.
Mi jousen elbaipa lamjot chu amu-vin, Pathen avahchoi chu ajau-vin ahi.
Chuin miho chun Houin kotkha hoiya touva khutdopa ahichu ahetdoh phat un kidang asauvin adatmo lheh jeng'un ahi.
Hichepa chun Peter le John atuhchah kheh laitah chun mipi jouse chun kidang asabehseh jeng-uvin, Solomon Kempum atiuva chun ahung lhaikhomun ahi.
Peter in chutobang phat gomkom amutah chun mipi ho chu adonbut in, “Vo Israel mite,” hiche chungchanga hi ipi kidang nasah uham? Ipi dinga keihon keiho thahat le houdih vanga hichepa hi lam kajotsah dan-uva nangaitou-va neivet vet jeng'u ham?
Ajeh chu Abraham, Isaac le Jacob Pathen, ipu ipateu Pathen chun alhacha Jesu choiat nadinga hiche hi abol ahi. Hiche Jesu chu nanghon napam paiyun, Pilate in lhadoh dinga agotlai in jong nanghon ama khut'ah napedoh un ahi.
Nanghon hiche thengtah le chondihtah pa sangin, tolthatpa joh nalhadohpeh nadingun nathumun ahi.
nanghon hinna bulpi chu nathat-un, ahin Pathen in thina-a konin akaithou kittan, chule keiho hi hiche thutah hetoh chu kahiuve!
Jesu mina tahsan vanga hichepa hi damah ahin, chule tumasanga iti dammo ham jong nahet'u ahi. Jesu mina tahsanna chun namitmu tah uva adamsah ahi.
Sopite ho, nangho le navaipo teuvin Jesu nabol nauhi hetlouva nabol'u ahi kahenai.
Ajeh chu Messiah thoh gimding thudol, themgao hon ana sei masah sa chu Pathen in aguilhunsah ahi.
Tun nachonset lung heiyun lang Pathen lama hung kile hei kitun, chutileh nachonset nau thehngima um ding,
Pakai angsunga kona kiledohna phat hung lhung thei kit a, chuteng leh nangho dinga agotsa Jesu Christa chu nahenguva ahinsol kit ding ahi.
Ajeh chu Pathen in phatsot a pat a Themgao thengho ana seidoh sah akitepna banga, ama chu thil jouse akiledoh sah kit phat hung kah-a vana umden ding ahi.
Mosen “Pakai Pathen in keima eitundoh banga hi nangho dinga nasopiteu lah-a khat themgaova atundoh ding ahi; ama chun najah-uva thu asei jouse chu nangai dingu ahi.
Chule koi hijong leh chuche themgao thusei ngailou chu Pathen mite lah'a kona kisumanghel ding ahi,” anati.
“Samuel khanga pat themgao jousen tukhanga thilsoh umchan jouse ana seiyun ahi.
Nangho chuche themgao holeh Pathen in naputeu napateu atepna thutep chate chu nahiu ahi; ajeh chu Pathen in Abraham koma chu nangma chilhah-a kona vannoi leiset phung jouse phatthei changding ahi, tia ana tepsa ahi.
Pathen in alhacha Jesu akaithoukit jou chun, nachonset nau lampia kona nahung kilekitna dingule phatthei nachanthei na dinguva nangho Israel mite henga ahinsol masatpen ahi,” ati.
Peter le John in mipi ho henga thu asei jing lai lhonin, Thempu ho le Houin vengbit a pang vaipo, chuleh Sadducee ho themkhat chun lungphamo tah-in ahung kimaito piuvin,
Peter le John in Jesu vanga thokitna aume tithu ahil lhon jeh chun hiche lamkai ho chu alung phamo lheh jengun ahi.
Chuin amani chu amanun, nilhah lam ahiphat in ajing khovah kah chun songkul'a akhum tauvin ahi.
Ahin athuhil lhon jaho lah a mi tamtah chun athuhil lhon chu atahsan tauvin ahileh numei chapang simlouvin tahsan mi sang-nga aval tauvin ahi.
Chuin ajing nikho chun, avaipoteu le a-upateu chule danthu sunho chu Jerusalema akikhomun ahi.
Ama ho lah-a chun Annas thempu chungnung jaonan Caiaphas, John, Alexander, chuleh thempu chungnung insung mite dang jong aumun ahi.
Chuin amaho angsunga chun solchah teni chu ahin puilut-un thudoh aneiyun, “Ipi thaneina, ahilouleh koi mina hitobang thilhi nabol lhonham?” tin adongun ahi.
Chuin Lhagao Theng dimset pumin Peter chun adonbut-un, “Vaipo hole Upate ho,
Elbaipa chunga thilpha kaboljeh lhona thudoh neibol'u ham? Elbaipa hi iti dam ham nahet chet nomu ham?
Nangho le Israel chate jouse dingin kichehtah in naseipeh uving kate, Nanghon thingpel chunga nakhetbeh uva ahivanga Pathen in thina a kona akaithoukit, thaneitah Nazareth Jesu Christa mina dama ahi.
Ajeh chu Jesu thudola Pathen lekhabun hiti hin aseiyin ahi, nangho insahon nadeimova napaiyu song aninga apipena panga chu ama hi ahi.
Chule koima danga huhhingna aumpoi, vannoiya huhhing'a ium nadiu mindanga mindang Pathen in eipe pouve,” ati
Chuin vaipo ho chun Peter le John hansanna chu amuvin adatmo lheh jengun ahi. Ajeh chu lekha themlou le jilna neimi ahi lhon lou chu aheuvin chule Jesu to anaumkhom ahi lhon jong aheuvin ahi.
Ahin akiboldam mipa alailungtah-uva adin amujeh'u chun, vaipo ho chun seibe ding ahetapouvin ahi.
Chuin kikhop khomna in'a kona potdoh dingin Peter le John chu thu apeuvin, chuin amaho le amaho chu akihouvun,
“Hiche miteni hi i-ilo dingu ham? Thil bolmo kidang abol lhon la inelthei pouvin, chule Jerusalema mijousen jong ahen,
Ahin Jesu mina thu ahiljomkit lhon louna dingin gihsalna neiyu hite,” akitiuvin ahi.
Chuin Solchah teni akoulut kitun, Jesu mina thu ahilkit lhon louna dingin thu apeuvin ahi.
Ahin Peter le John in adonbut lhonin, “Pathen thu ngailouva nangho thujoh kangai diu chu Pathen in deijonte tia nagel uham?
Kamu jouseu le kajah jouseu sapphong ding hi kangah thei lhon louding ahi,” ati lhonin ahi.
Chuin amahon agihsal kit'un achainan alhadoh tauvin ahi, ajeh chu mipi tamtah jeh-a chu asuhgim thei lou u ahi. Mijousen Pathen avahchoiyun ahi.
Ajeh chu kum somli elbaipa kiboldamna chu bolmo thil kidangtah ahi.
Chuin alhadoh jou jouvun, Peter le John chu tahsan chate koma ahung kile lhonin thempu hole upate hon asei jouseu chu asei lhon tan ahileh.
akomuva Peter le John thusei ajah jah'u chun tahsan chate jouse chun o khat tah in Pathen koma hiti hin atao tauvin ahi. “Vo thaneipen Pakai, Van le leiset, twikhanglen le asunga thil umjouse hinsempa,
Nangin Lhagao Thenga kapuluiyu nalhacha David kam'a ‘Namtin vaipi ibola lunghanga hiuvem? Chule ibola mihon mohthil angaitou ham?
Leiset chunga a lengteu galsat din akigong chaiyun, a Pakai le a Christa dou dingin avaipoteu akikhomui’ tia nasei sah ahin,
Atah beh in hiche khopi sunga hin alhungtai! Ajeh chu Herod Antipas, gamvaipo Pontius Pilate, chidang namdangte le Israel chate jouse chu nangma thaonusa nalhacha theng Jesu dou dingin akitho khom sohkei tauvin ahi.
Ahinlah abol jouseu hi nangma lungchamtah aboldinga umsa ahi.
Chuleh tun O Pakai, amigihsal nauhi ngaiyin lang nalhachate hin nathu kasapphong nadiuvin hansanna lentah chu neipeuvin.
Namidamsah theina thahat toh thon nakhut hinlhang inlang, nalhacha theng Jesu minin melchihna le bolmo kidang dang bolu hen” atiuve.
Hitia atao jouvun, akikhopnau inchu ahung kilingin, abonchauvin Lhagao Theng adimset un, hangsan tah-in Pathen thu alhangsamun ahi.
Chuin Tahsan chate jouse chu lungkhat le thakhat ahiuvin, koiman jong anei chu keiya tum ahi tilouvin, anei jouseu abonchan aneikhomun ahi.
Solchah ho chun thaneitah in Pakai Jesu thokit thudol chu ahettohsah jiuvin, chule Pathen phatthei bohna lentah chu amaho chunga aumtan ahi.
Amaho lah-a chun alhasam angaicha anaumpouvin ahi ajeh chu gam leiset le in neihon ahinjoh-un,
asum chu solchahho kengbul'a ahinchoiyun alhasam angaicha ho chu anahop peh jiuvin ahi.
Chuin Joseph, solchah hon Barnabas asah-u (hichu lungmonna chapa tina ahi) chu Levi phungmi Cyprus twikol gam mi ahi.
Amapa chun lou munkhat anei chu ahinjoh in asum chu solchahte kengbul'a ahin choiyin ahi. Ananias le Sapphira
Ahin Ananias kiti mipa khat ana um'in ama chun ajinu Sapphira to agou themkhat ajoh lhonin,
Asum kehkhat chu solchahho henga ahin choi lhonin, abona kahin choi lhon ahitai atilhon in adangse chu ajinu toh kinopto in akikoi den lhon tan ahi.
Chuin Peter chun aseiyin, “Ananias ipi dinga nalungthim chu Satan nalodimsah hitam? Lhagao Theng najoulhep in nasum akehkhat nanga dingin nakikoi tai.
Nagouthil chu nanga ahi, johding le johlou ding jong nangma thu ahi, najoh jouva jong asum chu nanga ahin, pehdoh ding le pehdohlou ding jong nangma thu ahi. Ipi dinga hitobanghi nabol hitam? Hiche hi keiho neijoubol nau ahipon Pathen najoubolna joh ahi” ati.
Hichethu chu Ananias in ajah jah chun lhonglaiya chun alhun athitai, chuin hiche thu ajapha jouse chu akichathei lheh tauvin ahi.
Chuin khangdong phabep ahungdoh un ponin atomun vuidingin apodoh tauvin ahi.
Nidan thum vel chejouvin, thilsoh imacha hephalouvin ajinu chu ahungin,
Chuin Peter in adongin, “Hiche sumhi najipa toh nagam mana namu lhon chu hitam?” atileh amanun jong “Henge hichu kagam man lhon ahi,” ati.
Chuin Peter in aseiyin, “Ipi dinga nanitah lhon'a Pakai Lhagao napatep lhona hitobang thilphalou hi nabol lhon hitam? Najipa vuiya che gollhanghon kotphung ahinpha tauvin ahi, chule nangjong naputdoh diu ahitai,” ati.
Apettah chun lhonglaiya chun alhun athipaitan ahi. Gollhangho ahunglut un ahileh amanu athisa anaum chu amu uvin chuin apodoh paiyun ajipa kivuina koma chun aga vui tauvin ahi.
Chuin Houbung pumpi le athu japha jouse chunga kichatna lentah achutan ahi.
Chuin solchahho chun miholah-a chun melchih nale thil kidang tampi abolun, tahsan chate jouse Houin a, Solomon kempum kiti muna chun niseh in akikhom jing tauvin ahi.
Ahin mipihon amaho chu amusang lheh vangun alah uva jaoding chu angampouvin ahi.
Hijeng jongle tahsan chate chu Pakai henga hung akibe jing jengin, numei le pasal akibe jingin ahi.
Solchahho natoh jehchun miho chun Peter avale komle alebeh achunguva achuh khah nading tin damlou ho jouse chu lamlen dunga ahinpodoh uvin lupna le pheh chunga alupsah un ahi.
Jerusalem kimvela khopi hoa kon chun mipi ahung khomun damlouho le lhagaoboh vop ho ahinpuiyun ahileh abonchauvin adamsoh keiyuvin ahi.
Chuin thempu chungnung leh aloite Sadducee ho chu thangsetnan adimset un ahi.
Chuin solchahho chu amanun songkul'a chun ahentauvin ahi.
Ahin jan in Pakai Lhagao ahungin, akihennau songkul kot chu ahongdohin solchahho chu apuidoh in,
“Hou'in a cheuvin lang miho koma hiche hinna thuhi gaseipeh tauvin,” ati.
Chuin ajing khovah-in solchahho chu Houin'a alut-un, Pakai Lhagaovin akomuva aseipeh bangun ahil tauvin ahi. Chuin thempu chungnung chu atohkhompi chengtoh ahungin, Israelte lah-a aupa houle houvaipoloi ho chu akoukhomun, chuin solchahho chu achungthu-u kholchet dingin songkul'a konin aga puidohsah-un ahi.
Houin ngaha pang sottolle ho chu songkul'a ahungun ahileh, songkul'a chun koima anaum tapon ahi, chuin amaho akile uvin houvaipoho henga chun thil umchan chu aseiyun,
“Songkul kot chu kikhah detchet a angah ho chu apama ding ahiuvin, ahin songkul kot chu ahonuva ahile asunga chun koima anaumpon ahi!” atiuve.
Chuin Houin ngahho lah-a lamkaipa le thempu pipuho chu alungboi lheh jengun, ipi khat ahungsoh tadem tin adatmo lheh jengun ahi.
Chuin mikhat ahungin kidang satah in, “Songkul'a nakhum-u miho chu Houin'a adinguvin miho thu ahil uve,” ahung tin ahi.
Chuin Houin ngaha pang sepai lamkaipa leh a sepai techu acheuvin solchahho chu aga manun, ahin ajokhat le mipi ho chun songin eisep unte tin boina sem louvin oltah in agabolun ahi.
Chuin solchahho chu houvaipoloi angsunga ahinpuilut un, amaho chu thempu chungnung in thu adongun,
“Hiche mipa min chun thu hilkit tahih-un tia hakhama kakham nahilou uham? Ahinlah nathuhil'u Jerusalem nadipsoh un hiche mipa thina chungchanga hin keiho neimoso got uve,” atin ahi.
Ahin Peter le solchahho chun adonbut'un, “Keihon mihem thuneiho sanga Pathen thu kangaijoh dingu ahi.
Ipu ipateu Pathen chun thingpel chunga nakhaisanguva nathau Jesu chu thina-a kona akaithoukit ahi.
Ahin ama chu Pathen in Pakai leh Huhhingpu dinga achoisanga akhutjet lama atousah ahitai. Chule hiche hi Israel chate chonset lungheina dingle ngaidam channa dinga abol ahi.
Keiho hi hiche thudol hettohsah chu kahiuvin, chuleh athua nungho dinga Pathen in apeh Lhagao Theng jong chu ahi,” atiuvin ahi.
Chuin hiche kisei ajah phat'un houvaipoloi ho chu alung hangdoh jah'un thading lung ageltauvin ahi.
Ahin houvaipoloi lah a mikhat, Pharisee mi amin Gamaliel, amapa chu hou danthu them le mijousen ajabol mikhat ahin, adingdoh in miho chu chomkhat pamlanga soldoh dingin thu apen ahi.
Chuin aman aloite henga chun aseiyin, “Nangho Israel mite, hiteho chunga bolding nagot uhi chingtheiyun!
Tu masang chun Theudas kiti mikhat anaumin, ama chu milen khat bangin ana um'in ahile mihem jali valin anung ana jui un ahi, ahin ama chu anathat'un ahileh anungjui ho chu lamchom cheh a anavahcheh gamun, abol atoh hou jouse imalou asohtan ahi.
Amapa jouchun hichu min kisut lai ahin, Galilee mi Judas kiti mikhat anaum kitin ama jong chun anungjui mitampi ana neiyin, ahin athat kitun ahile anungjui ho jouse chu ana kithecheh kit tauvin ahi.
Chuti ahijeh chun hiche mite hi ima lohih un, moh lhaong uvin, ajeh chu amahon angaitouva abolgot'u hi amaho lungchama ahile chomkhat joule hungmang paiding ahi.
Ahin Pathena kona ahileh nasuhmang jou lou dingu, nangho le nangho Pathen toh kidoubep nahilo dingu ahi!” ati.
Chuin ama thumop chun akilol tauvin, solchahho chu akouvun ajep uvin, chujouvin Jesu mina thu aseikit tahlou nadingun agihsalun alha tauvin ahi.
Chuin solchahho chu houvaipoloi angsunga kon chun apotdoh un, Jesu mina suhgima aumjeh uchun akipah lheh jengun ahi.
chule aniseh in Houin le ainson tin'ah “Jesu chu Messiah ahi,” tichu ahil'un asamphong jom jingun ahi.
Ahin aniseh a atahsan akibejing phat in alah uva phun noina le kilunglhaito louna aumdoh tan, hichun Greek pao tho atahsanho chun Hebrew pao tho atahsanhon niseh-a neh le chah kihopna-a meithaiho akhohsah pouve tin aphunnoi tauvin ahi.
Chuin solchah somleni hochun atahsanho chu abonchauvin akou khom uvin, “Keiho solchahho hin Pathen thuhilna-a phat kaman diu ahin neh le chah a hi kaboilou ding dol-u ahi.
Hijeh chun sopite ho, nanghon jaumtah, lhagao le chihna a dim mi sagi lhengdoh uvin lang ama ho chu neh leh chah a mo kapohsah dingu ahi.
Chutileh keiho solchah ho hin taona le Pathen thuhila phat kamanthei dingu ahi,” atiuvin ahi.
Abonchauvin hiche lunggel chu pha asauvin chuin, Stephen (tahsan nale lhagaova dim mipa), Philip, Procorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas, le Antioch mi Nicolas (Jews te tahsana sang masaloi) ho chu hiche panmun loding chun alhengdoh tauvin ahi.
Chuin hiche mi sagi kilhengdoh ho chu solchahho henga ahin puilut uvin ahileh solchah hon achunguva khut angamun ataopeh tauvin ahi.
Chutichun Pathen thu chu amachal jing in atahsan mi hatah in akibejing in, chule Judate thempuho jong tamtah ajau-uvin ahi.
Chuin Stephen chun, Pathen lungset nale thaneina dimset in thil kidang le melchihna tampi mipiho masanga abol in ahi.
Ahin nikhat chu chamlhat miho kikhop khomna a konin mi phabep, amaho chu Cyrene, Alexandria, Cilicia, le Asia gam'a kona Judah mi ahiuvin amaho chu ahungun Stephen chu ahung kinelpi tauvin ahi.
Ahin Stephen in chihna le Lhagao dimset puma aseidoh thucheng ang a chun koima adingjou pouvin ahi.
Chuin amahon mipi themkhat atildoh-un amaho koma chun Stephen in “Mose le Pathen ataitom,” thu kajauve atiuvin ahi.
Hiche asei-uchun mipichu alung handoh sah-uvin, chuin upa hole houdanthu hilho chun Stephen chu aman uvin vaipoloi anga ahin puilut un ahi.
Chuin jouthu hettoh sahna asemun, “Hiche mipa hin Houin theng dounale Mose dan dounan thu aseiyin,
Chule Nazareth Jesu chun Houin hi ahinsuh chimding chule Mose'n eipeh-u danjong akhelding ahi” tia asei kajauve, atiuvin ahi.
Hichepettah chun vaipo loiho jouse chun Stephen chu avesoh keiyun ahi, ajeh chu Stephen maiso chu vantil ho maibanga vahset ahi.
Chuin thempu chungnung chun Stephen chu adongin, “Hiche hehna thu hohi dih em?” ati.
Chuin Stephen in adonbut in, “Sopite le Pateho ngaiyuvin, Ipuluiyu Abraham Haran a achen masang, Mesopotamia gam'a aumlaiyin Loupi Pathen chu ahenga ana kilah in,
Hitin anaseiyin ahi, ‘napena gam leiset le na insungmi hindalhan lang, keiman kavetsah ding gamleiset a hungin’” ati.
Chuin Abraham'in Chaldea gam ahin dalhan apa thikah in Haran a anachengin, chujouvin tua nachennau gamsunga hin ahin puilut in ahi.
Ahinlah Pathen in akengto ngapna dingkham gambeh neocha jong ana pepoi. Ahin Abraham'in chapa aneiloulai vang'in nikhatle ama le ason achilhah ten hichegam hi alodingu ahi tin Pathen in ana thutep-in ahi.
Chuleh Pathen in aseikit in nason nachilhate jong migama kum jali sohchang le bolgima um dingu ahi
Ahin soh-a kai nam mite chunga keiman thu katan ding, achaina le hiche gam'a hi hung kile kit uva keima eihoukit dingu ahi ati.
Chule Pathen in jong Abraham chu cheptana kitepna thu anapen, chuin Abraham'in achapa Isaac ahin phat in aniget nin chep anatan in, chule hiche kitepna chu Isaac in jong Jacob ahina, chuleh Jacob in apului-u somleni ahinchan geiyin jong ahin boljom jingun ahi.
Chuin hiche puluiho chu asopipau Joseph chunga ana thangthip uvin, hijeh chun Egypt gam'a sohding in anajohdoh uvin ahi. Ahin Pathen in anaumpi jingin,
Gentheina ho jouse a konin anahuhdoh in Egypt lengpa Pharaoh angsunga lungsetna anapen ahi. Chule Pathen in Joseph chu kidangtah chihna anapen hijeh chun Pharaoh in Joseph chu Egypt gam pumpia vaipon ana pansah in chuleh a leng inpia jong mopon ana pansah in ahi.
Ahin Egypt gam le Canaan gam sunga kel ahunglha tan ahileh gentheina sangtah ahunglhung tan hijeh chun ipuiluiteu jong nehding neilouvin anaum un ahi.
Chuin Jacob in Egypt gamsunga neh aum nalaiye ti ahet phatin achate-ipuiluiteu chu neh choding in asolin ahi.
Anivei channa a anache uchun Joseph chu a sopite henga ana kiphongin chuin asopite chu Pharaoh henga anapuilut in ahi.
Chuin Joseph in mi asolin apa Jacob le ainsungmite somsagi le nga hochu ahenga dingin agakousah tan ahi.
Chuin Jacob chu Egypt gam'a anache in athitan ahi chule ipuluiteu jong anathi tauvin ahi.
Chun alongdamsau chu Shechem a ahin pouvin Abraham'in Hamor chapate koma anachohna lhanmuna chun avui tauvin ahi.
Pathen in Abraham koma athutep guilhunna ding phat anaitah jehchun miho chu Egypt gam'a chun hatah in apungun.
Ahin Joseph hephalou lengthah khat Egypt lengvaipoa ahung pan phat in,
Hiche lengpa chun imiteu chu doha in abolin asugentheiyin chule achasen houchu athi nadingin anu le apa teu chu hunam'in ana paidoh sah in ahi.
Hichephat laitah chun Pathen mitvet a chapang hoitah Mose chu anapengin, anu le apan inmun'ah lhathum hoitah in anasin lhonin ahi.
Chuin anu le apan Mose chu apaidoh lhontan ahileh Pharaoh chanun ana kimudoh in ama cha bang bangin ahin vahkhang tan ahi.
Chuin Mose chu Egypt gamsung chihna ho jouse ahilun ahile ama chu thusei le natoh a thahattah'a hung hitan ahi.
Chuin Mose chu kum somli ahung hi phat hin nikhat chu asopite-Israel techu agavetan ahile,
Egypt mipa khat'in Israel mikhat alamlou tah'a abol chu amun chuin Mose chu ahungin Israel mipa chu ahuh in Egypt mipa chu athattan ahi.
Mose chun hiche Israel mite chun Pathen in keiho huhdoh dinga eihinsolpeh ahi ti geldoh nauvinte tia anagel vang chun Israel mite chun anageldoh pouvin ahi.
Chuin ajing nikhon amite agavet a ahileh Israel mini ana kina lhonin hijeh chun aman jong chamna Nasem kigon hiche miteni koma chun “Nangni sopi khat nahi lhon louham? Ipi dinga nakinah lhon ham?” atin ahile,
mikhatpa chun Mose chu ahin sondoh in, kon keiho chunga vaihom le thutana napansah ham? tin ahin dongin,
“Janhia Egypt mipa khat natha banga chu keima jong neitha got ham?” atin ahi.
Chuin Mosen hichu ajah phat chun, Egypt gam'a konin ajamin Midian gam apemin hiche muna chun chapa ni ahingin ahi.
Chuin kum somli jouvin Vantil hamboh meikongin Mose chu Sinai mol toh kinai gamthip a chun ana kimupi in,
Chuin Mosen hichu amun athilmu chu kidang asah in, achenaiya agavet kigot le Pakai awgin chun ahin kouvin,
“Keima napuluiteu Pathen kahi, Abraham, Isaac, Jacob Pathen kahi,” ahin tin ahile Mose jong akicha behseh jengin avengam tapon ahi.
Chuin Pathen in aseiyin, “Nakengchot sutlhan ajeh chu nadinna mun chu muntheng ahi.
Egypt gam'a kamite gentheina kamutan, akanau aw kajan ahuhdoh dinga hungkumlha kahitai, hijeh chun tun keiman nangma hi Egypt gam'a kanungsol kit nahi,” ati.
Chuin “Kon keiho chunga vaihom le thutana napansah ham?” tia asanlou pau chu, Pathen in hamboh lah'a kona akimusah vantil jalchun vaipo dingle thutan dingin Pathen in Mose chu alesol kit in ahile.
Mose'n thil kidang le melchihna tamtah pumin Israelte chu Egypt gam'a konin ahinpuidoh in twipisan le gamthip chu kum somli sungin ahung galkaiyun ahi.
“Chuin Mose amatah in Israelte koma anaseiyin, Pathen in keima tobang themgaokhat nangholah-a kona asodohsah ding ahi,” ati.
Mose chu gamthip a ipuluiteu toh Pathen mite kikhop khomna-a anaumkhomin, Sinai Molchunga valtil in thu aseipeh chun, khonunga eiho jouse pehson dingin hinna thu eina lahpeh-uvin ahi.
Ahinlah Ipuluiteu chun Mose thusei anangai pouvin Egypt gam'a kinungle ding ana deijo un ahi.
Ipuiluiteu chun Aaron koma aseiyun, “Eilamkai thei ding-u pathen lim themkhat neisempeh-un ajeh chu Egypt gam'a kona eihin puidoh pau Mose hi iti hitam kahetapouve,” atiuvin ahi.
Chuin bongnou toh kilou milim khat asem uvin, hiche milim henga chun kilhaina gantha asemuvin, athilsem uchu akipapi uvin ahi.
Chuin amahoa konin Pathen akihei mangin, Vana ahsiho chu apathenu hidingin adalhatan ahi! Chuin themgao lekhabun asei “Vo Israel kum somli gamthip'a nathamlaiyuva nahin choiyu kilhaina gantha le thilto ho chu keima henga ding ham?
Ahipoi, nanghon Molech ponbuh le pathen Rephan ahsi hou dinga alim nasemthu-u chu napole ji bouvui, hijeh a chu nangho Babylon gamsung chana soh-a kasol ding nahiuve,” ati.
Ipuluiteu chun gamthip noija chun Houbuh chu anapole un Pathen in Mose henga anamusah lim bang bang chun ana tungdoh ji-un ahi.
Kum phabep jouvin Joshua lamkaina a ipuluiteuvin hiche gam'a kona Pathen in ananodohho khopimun analo-uchun Pathen Houbuh chu anapolut un Leng David khang chanin ana um'in ahi.
David chu Pathen mitmun deium ana chang'in, aitih a Jacob Pathen chenna ding Houin sahna dingin anathumin ahi.
Ahin hiche houin chu Solomon in ana tungdoh in ahi.
Hijeng jongle hiche khut a kisa houin a chun Chungnungpen Pathen chu achengpoi. Themgaovin,
“Van kalaltouna ahin leiset kakengto ngapna ahi, chutobang chenna ding inpha chu neisahpeh thei ding ham?” tin Pakai chun adongin ahi.
Van le leiset ania kakhut a kasem hilou ham? tia asei banga chu.
“Nangho milouchalte, thutah'a dinga alungthim le ana ngong teho, aimatih chana Lhagao Theng nadoudalu hilou ham? Hichu napuluuiteuvin ana bola nanghon jong nabolu ahi.
Napului teuvin ana bolgim lou themgao khat umem? Chondihtah Messiah hungding thu ana sei masaho chu ana that un amatah jong namatsah un na that un ahi.
chule Vantil a kona nalah son u Pathen danthu jeng jong henasa san nanit pouvin ahi,” ati.
Stephen in athemmo nau thu asei chun Judate lamkai ho chu alunghansah lheh jengun chuin amachu akhuttum ajel khumun ahi.
Ahin Lhagao Theng dimset'in Stephen chun vanlam aven ahileh Pathen loupina le Jesu Pathen khut jetlam jabolna muna adin chu amun ahi.
Chuin aman amahojah a, “Ven vankot akihona chule Pathen khut jetlam jabolna muna mihem chapa adin kamui,” ati.
Chuin amahon akhut'un anakol akisip-un apengjah un amachu anokhum jengun,
Khopi pamlanga akaidoh-un songin asep-un, chuin ama themmo chansah hochun avon chu asut-un Saul kiti khangdongpa kengbul'a chun akoiyun ahi.
Chuin songa asepettah-un Stephen chu ataovin, “Pakai Ka lhagao lan,” ati.
Chuin abohkhup in apengjah jengin, “Pakai abolho jouseu hi amaho chonsetin simpeh hih-in,” atin hiti chu athitan ahi.
Saul jong chu Stephen kitha amittah a muho lah'a khat ahin, amatah in jong aphatsah ahi. Chuin hiche nikhoa kipat chun Jerusalema Houbung suhmangna dingin suhgentheina lentah ana kipan tan ahile Solchahho tailou tahsan chate jouse chu Judea le Samaria gam'a ana kithe cheh tauvin ahi.
Chuin Pathen a dinga kipumpeh mi themkhat in Stephen chu lunghemtah in ana vuiyun ahi.
Ahin Saul chu achelen Houbungho chu ana sugentheiyin, a in tina alut in numei pasal akaidoh in songkul'a anaseplut jin ahi.
Ahinlah akithecheh tahsan chate chun achena lam lam uvah Jesu thudol kipana thupha chu alhangsamle tauvin ahi.
Vetsahnan, Philip chu Samaria khopi sunga analut in miho koma Messiah chu ana samphong in ahi.
Chuin mipi chun Philip thusei chu lungluttah in ana ngai uvin ahi.
Chuin lhagaoboh tampi anodohin ahileh amaho chu apenguvin apotdoh tauvin chule lhangthi le elbai tampi jong aboldam in ahi.
Chuin hiche khopi achun kipana lentah alhungtan ahi.
Chuin Simon kiti doithemmi khat hiche gam'a chu kumsotpi anauma ahin, ama chun milen khat kahi tia Samaria mite chu kidang satah-a anaumsah ahi.
Mijouse aneova pat alen changeiyin hichepa chu “Milen khat-Pathen thahat” tia aseiyu ahi.
Chule ama chun adoiya kona phatsottah kidang satah-a anaumsah jeh-u chun amahon aseijouse chu abonchan angai jiuvin ahi.
Ahivangin mipi ho chun Philip in Pathen lenggam thule Jesu Christa mina thupha asei chu atahsan tauvin, hijeh chun numei-pasal tampi twiyin baptize achang tauvin ahi.
Hichun Simon jengin jong atahsan in twiyin baptize achangtan, chule Philip chena chana anung ajuitan, Philip in melchihna le thil kidang lentah tampi abol chu kidang asalheh jengin ahi.
Chuin Jerusalema um solchah hon Samaria miten Pathen thu asang tauve ti ajah phat'un Peter le John chu asol tauvin ahi.
Chuin alhun lhun lhonin hiche tahsan thahho chu Lhagao Theng achanna dingun atao tauvin ahi.
Chule tahsan thahho chunga chu Lhagao Theng hungloulai ahi, ajeh chu amaho chu Jesu mina bou baptize chang nalaiyu ahi.
Chuin Peter le John in hiche tahsan thahho chunga chu khut angap lhona ahileh amaho chu Lhagao Theng achang tauvin ahi.
Chuin Simon in Solchahho khutngap jeh a miho Lhagao Theng achanu chu amun ahileh aman jong sum peha hiche thahat chu kichoh ding agon,
“Kenjong hiche thaneina hi neijing kate chutile kenjong miho chunga khut kangap teng amaho jong Lhagao Theng chang dingu ahi!” ati.
Chuin Peter in adonbut in, “Nasum le nangma suhmangin umtha tan ajeh chun Pathen thilpeh hi chohtho dingin nangaitoi,
Hichea hin nangman chan naneipoi, ajeh chu Pathen mitmun nalungthim adihpoi.
Hijeh chun nachonset lungheiyin lang, Pakai henga tao lechun aman nachonset lungput angaidam maithei ahi.
Ajeh chu nangma hi thangthipna a dimset leh chonset'a kihen-oh nahi kamuchen tai,” ati
Chuin Simon chun Peter koma, “Hitobang kichat umtah naseiho hi kachunga alhun lou nadingin Pakai koma nei taopeh in,” ati.
Chuin Samaria-a Photchet nale Pathen thu lhangsapna aneijou lhon chun, Peter le John chu Jerusalem jonin ahung kile lhon in Samaria kho muntampi ah ahung kibangpa lhonin Kipana thupha ahin lhangsam peh lhonin ahi.
Philip vang chu Pakai vantil, “Lhanglam a Jerusalem a pat Gaza jotna gamthip'a chesuh lampi a khun chetan,” atipeh in ahi.
Chuin akipatdoh in achesuh tan ahileh Ethiopia gouching mikhat akimupin, ama chu Ethiopia lengnu noiya natong lentah nukiso ahin, hiche nukiso chu Jerusalema Pathen houva che ahi.
Chule ahung kile lama kangtalaiya hungtouva Isaiah themgao lekhabu hi gingtah-a ahin sim ahi.
Chuin Lhagao Theng in Philip henga chun ahin seiyin, “Chenlang Kangtalaiya khun kilhon khom lhonin,” ati.
Chuin Philip chun aheng anaiyin ahileh mipan Isaiah themgao lekhabu asim chu ajan, hichun Philip in adongin “Nasim chu ipi kiseina ahi nahet nah em?” atile,
Mipa chun adonbut in, “Eihil ding mikhat aum loule iti kahet ding ham?” atin ahi. Chuin mipa chun Philip chu akouvin hungin lang kangtalaiya toukhom hite ati.
Chule Pathen lekhabu sunga asimmun chu hiche hi ahi, “Ama chu tha dinga kikai kelngoi nou bangin akaiyun, kelngoinou amul vouho angsunga thipbeh cha-a aum bangin, ama jong akam keh pon ahi.
Akineosahna lamin achunga adih a thutanna aumtapon, koipen'in akhang thusim asei ding hitam? Ijeh inem itile a hinkho chu leiset'a kona alahdoh'u ahitai.”
Chuin nukiso chun Philip chu adongin, “Themgaopa hin ama chung chang thudol asei ham ahiloule midang khat thudol asei ham nei seipeh in,” atin ahi.
Chuin in Philip jong chuche Pathen lekhabu muna kona pansa in Jesu thudol kipana thupha chu aseipeh pantan ahi.
Chuin ache che lhonin ahile twi umna khat ahin phah hon phatin Nukiso chun, “Ven! Hikoma khun twi aume! Baptize kachanmo nading ipi um'em?” ati.
Hijeh chun Philip in, “Nalung naheiya nalungthim pumpia natahsan pouleh hithei ding nahi,” ati. Chuin aman adonbut in, “Jesu Christa, Pathen Chapa ahi ti katahsan e,” atitai. Chuin akangtalai lhon chu akham lhonin, twi lah'a chun akumsuh lhonin Philip in ama chu baptize achansah tan ahi.
Chuin twi lah-a kona ahung potdoh lhon chun Pakai Lhagaovin Philip chu alamang tan ahile, nukiso chun Philip chu amupha tapon, ahin alampi a chun kipah thanom tah'in achetan ahi.
Chomkhat jouvin Philip chu sahlam a um Azotus muna chun akimudoh kit in, hichun aman Caesarea ahinphah chanin kipana thupha chu ahin sam phonglen ahi.
Ahin Saul vang chu Pakai nungjuiho gihsal le that dingin ahai hai nalaiyin, hijeh chun thempu chungnung henga achen,
Damascus khopia kikhopna in hoa dingin lekha agathumin, chule koi hijongle hiche lampi tahsanho jouse chu numei hihen, pasal hijongle akana Jerusalem ahinlhutna dingin kithopina agathumin ahi.
Hiche tupna neipuma achelaiyin Damascus khopi anaitah chun vana konin phulou helouvin vah-in akimvel ahin salin,
Chuin ama tol'a alhun chule “Saul! Saul! Ipi dinga neibolset ham?” tia kisam aw khat ajan,
Chuin Saul in jong “Pakai nang koi nahim?” tin adong tan ahi. Chuin aw chun ahin donbut-in “Keima Jesu, nabolset jingpa chu kahi!
Tun kipatdoh in khopi sunga khun lut-in nabol ding ho nakiseipeh ding ahi,” ati.
Chuin Saul toh kilhon khom ho chu paopoh loubeh-in aum tauvin ahi, ajehchu Saul koma thusei aw chu ajauvin ahin koima la amu pouvin ahi.
Chuin Saul chu tol'a kona ahung dindoh-a amit ahasah-le kho amutapon hijeh chun alhonkhompi hon akhut-in akaiyun Damascus khopi sung alut tauvin ahi.
Chuin khopi sunga chun nithum sungin an nelou twidon louvin aumden tan ahi.
Chuin Damascus khopi sunga tahsan mikhat amin Ananias kitipa chu Pakaiyin akimusah in “Ananias!” tin akouvin ahileh amapan, “Hikoma kaumnai Pakai!” atin ahi.
Chuin Pakaiyin adonbut in “Namasanga lampi jangkeiya khun chenlang Judas in'a khun galut tan, chule insunga khu nalut tengle Tarsus gammi Saul kitipa chu gahol tan ajeh chu ama kahenga ataopettah ahi.
Chule hichepa khun Ananias kiti mikhat ahenga hunga aluchunga khut angap'a chutengle kho amukit ding khu kamusah ahi,” ati.
Ahivangin Ananias in adonbut in “Pakai hiche mipa hin Jerusalema tahsan chate kichat umtah-a abol genthei thu mitam tah-a kona kajah ahitai,
chule hoilai mun hijong le nangma min kouho jouse amat a songkul'a akhum thei nadinga thempu pipuihon thaneina apeh'u ahitai,” ati.
Ahin Pakaiyin aseiyin, “Chen ajeh chu Saul khu chidang namdangte le lengho chuleh Israelte henga kathu lhangsam dinga kalhendoh ahitai,
Chule tua hi kamin jal'a itobang genthei athoh ding ham kavetsah ding ahi,” ati.
Chuin Ananias chu achen ahileh Saul chu amutan hichun aluchunga akhut angamin aseitai, “Sopi Saul, kho namukit nading le Lhagao Thenga nadimsetna dinga lampia nakimusah Pakai Jesu chun nahenga eihin sol ahi,” ati.
Chuin apettah chun lip tobang thilkhat Saul mit a kon chun ahung kilehlhan ahileh Saul chun kho amutan ahi. Chutah chun Saul chu akipatdoh in baptize achangtan ahi.
Chujouvin Saul chun an themkhat anen ahileh athahatdoh kit tan, chuin Damascus khopi sunga tahsan chate koma chun nikho phabep aum den tan ahi.
Chule apettah chun Jesu thudol chu asamphong pantan kikhopna in tin'ah, “Jesu chu Pathen Chapa ahi,” tin asamle tan ahi.
Chuin athu lhangsap japha jousen kidang asauvin, “Hichepa hi Jerusalema Jesu seijuiho suhmang ding gopa chu hilou ham?” atiuvin ahi. Chule “Hikoma hi seijuiho man dingle kanchoma thempu ho henga kaidinga hung hilou ham?” atiuvin ahi
Saul thulhangsap chu ahung thahat cheh cheh jeng tan ahileh Damascus khopia um Juda mite chun Jesu chu Messiah ahi ti avetsahna apeh ho chu anel jou tapouvin ahi.
Chuche phat chomkhat jou chun Judah mite phabep khat ahung khomun ama chu thading agouvin,
Ama chu thatei nadingin khopi kelkot dunga sun le jan in achanglhi jingun, ahin mihon thading agonu thu chu aseipeh un,
Hijeh chun seijuiho mi phabep khat chun jankah in Saul chu boma akhumun khopi bang onglai khat'ah khaovin akhai lha tauvin ahi.
Chuin Saul chu Jerusalem ahung lhunin, seijuiho kimupi ding agon ahileh amaho abonun akichauvin ahi ajeh chu seijui dihtah ahiding chu atahsan lou-u ahi!
Chuin Barnabas chun Saul chu solchah ho henga apuilut in Damascus lampia Saul in Pakai akimupi thule Pakaiyin Saul henga asei thuho abonchan solchah ho henga aseipeh in chule Damascus khopia Saul in Jesu mina hangsan tah-a thu asei jong chu aseipeh in ahi.
Chuin Saul chu solchah ho chutoh aumkhom tan, Jerusalem kimvela avahle un hangsan tah in Pakai minin thu alhangsam tan ahi.
Chuin Greek pao tho Juda te toh akinil un ahile Juda miho chun thading agouvin ahi.
Seijui hon chuche thu ajah phat'un Caesarea lama apuisuh un achenna Tarsus lama asol mang tauvin ahi.
Chuin Judea gam le Galilee gamsung chule Samaria gamsung pumpia Houbung chu mongtah-in aumtauvin chule seijui hon Pakai agin jeh'u chun athahat cheh cheh uvin ahi. Chule Lhagao Theng in aumpi jeh-u chun seijui jong akibe jingin ahi.
Chujongle Peter chu munkhat a konin munkhat ah avahle len chuin Lydda khopia seijui ho vilding in ahung kumsuh in ahile,
Hikoma chun Aeneas kiti mikhat langthi-a kumget jen jalkhun a lumpa chu agamudoh tan,
Chuin Peter in ajah a “Aeneas, Jesu Christan nadamsah ahitai! Thouvin lang nalupna kijeldoh tan,” ati. Chupettah chun ama adamtan ahi.
Chuin Lydda le Sharon khopi sunga mijouse chun Aeneas in lam ajot-a avale chu amu-uvin, abonchauvin Pakai lamah ahung kihei tauvin ahi.
Chuin Joppa atiu mun a chun seijui mikhat Tabitha (Greek paova Dorcas) atiu chu aumin, amanu chun midang dingin thilpha abol jingin, genthei ho akithopi jingin ahi.
Amanu chu ahung dammo in athitan ahileh atahsa chu asiltheng-uvin vuidingin indan chungnunga chun alupsah tauvin ahi.
Ahivangin seijuiho chun Peter chu Lydda koma aume tithu ajauvin hijeh chun mini asol-uvin, Peter henga “Lungset tah-in aganna thei penin hungin,” tin aga kousah tauvin ahi.
Chuin Peter chu akouva cheteni chutoh ahung kile khomin ahileh ahung lhun lhun chun amahon Peter chu indan chungnunga chun apuitouvun ahileh insunga chun meithai ho adimset uvin kap pumin a sangkhol hou-le von dang Dorcas in adam laiya anabolpeh houchu avetsah'un ahi.
Ahivangin Peter chun abonchauvin insunga konchun asoldoh-in chuin ama adilsun atahsa alupsah-u chu aven “Thoudoh in Tabitha,” tin atao tan ahileh amit ahung hahdoh in, chuin amanun Peter amuphat in ahung toudoh tan ahi.
Chuin aman akhut in akaiding in chule meithaiho le seijuiho chu abonchan akoulut-in amanu chu ahing in apetan ahi.
Hiche thu chu khopi sunga akithang soh tan ahileh mitam tah-in Pakai atahsan tan ahi.
Chule Peter chu Joppa muna savun sem Simon in'ah nisottah aum dentan ahi.
Rome te sepai lamkai Cornelius atiu mikhat Caesarea ah ana chengin, ama chu Italia loi atiu sepai jalamkai ahi.
Amapa chu Pathen ngaisah tah le ainsung mi jouse toh Pathen gingmi ahin; migenthei ho hongphal tah-a pejing le Pathen henga taojing mi ahi.
Nikhat nilhah lam nidan thum donin mu aneiyin athilmu achun Pathen vantil khat ahenga ahungin “Cornelius!” ahung tin ahi.
Chuin Cornelius chun kichatah-in aven, “Ipi ham Pakai,” tin adong tan ahi. Chule Vantil chun ahin donbut in, “Nataona le migenthei ho dinga nathilpeh ho chu Pathen in thilto bangin nasanpeh tai!
Tun nangman mi themkhat solin lang Joppa-a um Simon Peter kitipa khu gakousah tan.
Ama twikhanglen panga Simon kiti savun sem mikhat in'ah aume,” ati.
Chuin vantil in adalhah lhah in Cornelius chun ainsunga lhacha ni le akinbola pang jing Pathen ngaisah tah sepai ho lah a khat akouvin,
Thilsoh jouse aseipeh jouvin amaho chu Joppa ah asol tan ahi.
Ajing nikho in Cornelius thupoho khopi sung alhun ding konun Peter chu indan chunga tao dingin ahung kaldoh in hichu sun nidan som don ahi.
Chule ama chu agilkel in, ahivangin aneh ding an asem laitah-un ama agaochangin,
Chuin vankot akihona lekha pheng lentah tobang khat aning lia ahung kikhai lhah amun,
Chuin hiche lekha pheng lentah tobang sunga chun ganhing namkim le tol'a vah ganhing chule chunga leng vacha ho aumun,
Chuin aw khat in ahenga ahin seiyin, “Peter, kipatdoh inlang chule kithan lang nen,” ati.
Chuin Peter in adonbut in, “Ahipoi Pakai, ajeh chu imatih chanin keiman Judate dan thu dungjuiya satheng lou le saboh kanekhapoi,” ati.
Ahivangin aw chun ahinsei kit-in, “Pathen in asuhtheng sa chu athenglou tidan,” ati.
chuti chun thumveijen kibang chet'in mu aneiyin chujouvin hetmanlou kah'in lekha pheng lentah tobang chu vana khai touvin aumtan ahi.
Chuin Peter chun gaova athilmu chu ipi kiseina ahidem tia lunggim tah-a ana umlaitah in Cornelius in ahin sol miho chun Simon in chu ahin holdoh-un, amaho chu kelkot ah ana dinguvin,
Amaho chun hiche laiya hi Simon Peter kiti mikhat cheng em tin adong-un ahi.
Chuin Peter in gaova athilmu chu ipi ahidem tia ana gel jing laiyin Lhagao Thengin ahenga thu ahin seiyin, “Mithum tah in nangma nahol'e,
Kipatdoh in, kumsuh inlang amaho toh kilhon ding khu thase hih beh in, chule lungkham hih in ajeh chu keiman amaho khu kahin sol ahi,” ati.
Chuin Peter akum suh in amaho koma “Nahol-u mipa chu keima kahi, ipi dinga hung nahiu vem?” tin adong tan ahile,
Amahon adonbut-un, “Keiho hi Cornelius kiti Pathen gingtah mi chule Judaten ajabol-u Rome sepai jalamkai pa chun eihin sol-u ahin, chule nangma thusei hi ainsung mite toh angaithei nadinga vantil theng khat'in thu apeh bang banga nakouva hung kahiuve,” atiuvin ahi.
Chuin Peter in amaho chu akoulut in a-in'ah jankhat agesah-in, ajing in Joppa a kona sopi themkhat toh akilhon tauvin ahi.
Ajing nikhon amaho Caesarea ahung lhung tauvin ahile Cornelius in a-insung mite le aloi agolho ana koukhomin ana ngah tauvin ahi.
Chuin Peter insunga alut in ahile Cornelius chu akengbula abohkhup in chibai abohtan ahi.
Ahinlah Peter chun akai dingin, “Dingdoh in keijong nang banga mihem khat kahi bouve!” ati.
Chuti chun amani akihoulim lim lhonin insunga mitampi kikhop khomna achun alut lhon in,
Chuin Peter in amaho henga chun, “Judah mikhat hitia chidang namdangte in'a alut hi Judah te chonna dan toh kitoh lou ahi naheuve, Ahin Pathen in koima aboh le athenglou tia kagel lou nadinga eimusah ahitai.
Hijeh a chu lungthoi louhela eihin kou banga kahung jeng ahi. Tun ipi dinga neihin kou ham seitan,” ati.
Chuin Cornelius in adonbut in, “Nili masang, tuphat chet nilhah lang nidan thum donin ka insunga kataovin ahileh, hetman lou kah-in ka masang laitah a ponbanga kivon mikhat ka-anga ahung dingin;
Hitin ahin seiyin ahi, ‘Cornelius Pathen in nataona ajatan genthei ho dinga nathil pha bol jong amutai!
Tun nangman Joppa a mi solin lang, Simon Peter kiti mipa khu gakousah tan. Ama twikhanglen panga Simon kiti savun sempa in'ah aume’ ati.
Hijeh a chu nangma kouva mi kahin sol ahin, nahung hi apha lheh jenge, chule tun Pakaiyin thu napehho ngaiding in hikoma Pathen angsunga ahin ibon chauvin iki khom tauve,” ati.
Chuin Peter in adon but-in, “Pathen in mi lungset tum anei poi ti kichen tah in kamutai;
Ahin chitin namtin lah a koi hijongle Ama ginga thildih bolho chu ama dinga lahthei ahi.
Chule hiche hi Israel chatea dinga kipana thupha ahi–Jesu Christa mijouse Pakai vanga Pathen toh kichamna aum hi.
John in twilut thudol ahin lhangsap pat a pat Galilee a kipan Judea gam pumpia ipi thilsoh em nanghon naheuve.
Chule Pathen in Nazareth Jesu chu Lhagao Theng le thahatna-a thao anua chule Jesu avalea thilpha abolho leh Pathen in aumpi jal'a satan suhgima umho aboldam chu nanghon naheuve.
Chule keiho solchahho hi Judah gam pumpi le Jerusalema athilbol ho jouse hettohsah kahiuve. Ama chu thingpel chunga akhaisang un athat tauve.
Ahin Pathen in ama chu anithum nin akaithou vin aki phondohsah tan ahi.
Hichu mijouse henga hilouvin, athu hettohsah dinga Pathen in ana lhendoh sa, athodoh jouva amatoh nekhom le donkhom keiho henga kiphong ahi.
Chule Jesu chu mihing le mithi ho jouse thutan ahi ti thudol hi hille ding le hettoh sah dinga keiho hi thu eipeh-u ahi.
Ama tahsan ho jouse Amin jal a achonset nau kingaidam ding ahi tia themgao ho jousen ahettoh sah-u chu ama chu ahi,” ati.
Chuin Peter in thu hicheng asei jing laiyin athu ngaiho jouse chunga Lhagao Theng ahung chutan ahile,
Peter toh hung khom Judah mi atahsan ho chun chidang namdang te chunga jong Lhagao Theng akipeh chu kidang asalheh jengun ahi.
Ijeh-inem itile amahon paochom paochoma thu aseiyuva Pathen avahchoi uchu ajah-u ahi.
Chuin Peter in adong un, “Eiho banga Lhagao Theng changa hiteho baptize chanlouna dinga twi kham theiya koi umam?” ati.
Chuin aman Jesu Christa mina baptize chang dingin amaho chu thu apetan, chujouvin Cornelius in amaho henga nikho phabep um ding'in alhotan ahi.
Chidang namdang ten Pathen thu akisan thu chu Judah gam'a um solchahho le seijui dangho henga gangtah in alhung tan;
Ahinlah Peter Jerusalem ahung lelhun phat in Judahmi atahsanho chun ana oimo un;
“Chidang namdang te insunga nalut in chule an jong naga neh khompie,” atiuvin ahi.
Chuin Peter in amaho heng-ah thilsoh jouse kicheh tah-in aseipeh in hitin aseiyin ahi.
“Keima Joppa khopia kauma katao jing laiyin gaochangin mu kaneiyin, lekha pheng lentah tobang aning lin vana konin ahung kikhai lhan, keima komtah ahung geiyin;
Chuin keiman hiche lekha pheng lentah tobang sung chu kaven ahileh leiset chunga umsa akengli hole gamsa chule aop a kithol le chunga leng vacha kamun,
Chuin vana kona awgin khat kajan ‘Peter thoudoh inlang kitha inlang nen’” ati.
Ahipoi Pakai, keiho Judah te chona danin aboh le athenglou tia asei jouse imacha kane khapoi kati.
“Ahin vana kona awgin chun avelin ahin seikit in, ‘Pathen in asuhthengsa thilkhat chu athenglou tihih in,’” ati.
Hiche thilsoh chu thumveijen kijomin eimusah in chujouvin abonchan vana akikhai tou kit tan ahi.
Chutah chun Caesarea a kona mithum hung kisol ho chu kaum nau inmun ahung lhung paiyun ahi.
Chuin Lhagao Theng in kahenga ahin seiyin amaho chutoh kilhon'a chule amaho chidang namdang ahijeh'a ima lungthoina neilou dingin ahin seiyin ahi. Chuin sopi migup chun ei kilhonpiuvin gangtah in ahin solpau in chu kaga lhung tauvin ahi.
Chuin amapa chun thilsoh umchan jouse chu keiho henga chun aseiyin, ahenga vantil akilah-a Joppa a mi solin lang Simon Peter kiti mipa khu gakousah tan,
Chutengle aman nang le na insungmi te jouse huhhing nathu naseipeh ding ahi! ati.
Chuin Peter chun aseikit in, “Thusei kahinpan in ahileh abul'a eiho chunga ahung kibuh lhah bangin ama ho jouse chunga Lhagao Theng ahung kibunglhan,
Chun Pakaiyin ‘John in twiya baptize achansah ahin ahinlah nangman Lhagao Thenga baptize nachansah dinga ahi’ tia Pakai thusei chu kalunga ahung kilang in ahi.
Chule eihon Pakai Jesu Christa itahsan nikhouva Pathen in eipeh-u Lhagao Theng chu chidang namdang te jong apeh ahitah le kei chu koi kahi-a Pathen masanga kadin ding ham?” atin ahi.
Chuin midang hon chuche thu chu ajah phat-un athip tauvin Pathen avahchoi tauvin ahi. Chule amahon aseiyun, “Pathen in chidang namdang tedinga jong chonset lunghei nading le tonsot hina akisan thei nadinguva phatpha apeh hi imu tauve,” atiuvin ahi.
Alangkhat ah Stephen thijouva seijuiho kibol gentheina jeh a jamcheh ho chu Phoenicia, Cyprus le Syria gam'a Antioch changeiyin ajamun, chule Judah te henga bou Pathen thu alhangsamun ahi.
Hijeng jongle Cyprus le Cyrene gam'a kona Antioch khopia che seijui phabep ho chun chidang namdang te henga Pakai Jesu thu alhangsam uvin ahi.
Pakai thahatna amaho chunga aumjeh chun chidang namdang te laha mitam tah in Pakai lama lung aheiyun atahsan tauvin ahi.
Chuin Jerusalema Houbung in hiche thu ajah phat-un Barnabas chu Antioch'a asol tauvin ahile,
Amun alhun phat in Pathen phatthei bohna chu amun akipah lheh jengin hichun aman seijui ho chu Pakaiya dihtah-a umjing dingin atilkhouvin ahi.
Ajeh chu Barnabas chu miphatah Lhagao Thenga dimjing le Tahsanna a dettah mi ahin, mitam tah Pakaiyah ahin puilutbe uvin ahi.
Chuin Barnabas chu Tarsus lama Saul hol dingin ana chepai tan ahi.
Chuin amu phat-in Antioch lama ahin nungpui kit in amani Antioch houbunga chun kumlhung keiyin aumden lhonin mipi tamtah ahiljing lhonin ahi. Hiche Antioch'a hi seijui ho Christian tia akou masat penu ahi.
Hiche phatlai hin themgao phabep Jerusalema kon Antioch'a acheuvin,
Amaho lah'a Agabus atiu themgaopa chu kikhop khomna khat'a ading doh in lhagaovin Rome gamsung pumpia kel nasatah hunglhung ding ahi tin aphondoh sah tan ahi (Hiche gaothu hi Claudius vaipoh laiyin aguilhung in ahi).
Chuin Antioch'a um seijui ho chun Judah gam'a um sopi hoa dinga kithopina thot dingin agel lha tauvin ahile abonchauvin atamthei penin atohkhom tauvin ahi.
