Hiche jeh chun mihon eijabol lheh jeng tauvin, konga kache kit diu phat chun angai cha thil jousen eikithopi un ahi.
Chuin kongke jouva pat lhathum jou phalbi laitah in, pathen lim alu ni neiya kisem Alexandria konga chun kakitol kit tauvin ahi.
Chuin Syracuse muna kakinga pauvin nithum kakibangpa uvin ahi.
Hichea pat chun Rhegium lama kakitol kit un ahile, nikhat jouvin lhanglam hui hattah in ahung nung in hichun ajing in Puteoli mun kalhung tauvin ahi.
Hichelai muna chun seijui ho ana umun, amahon eikouvun hapta khat lam kaum khomun, chujouvin Rome kajon tauvin ahi.
Chuin Rome a um sopi hon keiho kacheu thu ajah phat un Appian a mipi kikhopna muna eihung kimu piuvin ahi. Chuleh adanghon jinlhun in thum'a eihung lhun piuvin ahi. Hichu Paul in amu phat in akitilkhou lheh jeng in Pathen athangvah in ahi.
Chuin Rome kalhun phat uvin, Paul chu achangin inchom khat ah aumsah un sepai ho angasah un ahi.
Rome alhunkal nithum jouvin Paul in amuna Judah te lamkai ho chu akou khomin, “Sopite ho, Jerusalema eimanun, eiho mite leh ipu ipa teu chonna dan ima kasuhkhel lou vang'in Rome mite khut'a eipedoh un ahi.
Rome ten kachung thu akholun thina changei ding themmona ima amudoh lou jeh un lhadoh ding in eigong un ahi.
Ahin hiche thulhuhna chu Judah vaipo hon adoudalun ahi, hijeh a chu kamite themmo chansah nomhih jong leng Caesar in kachung thu atan ding chu ngaikhoh kasah ahitai.
Tunia nangho kahin koukhom lona chu ikihoulim khomuva, chule Israel te kinepna Messiah chu ahung taiti katahsan jeh a kihen kahina thu kahil chen nomu ahi,” ati.
Chuin amahon adonbut un “Judea gam'a konin lekhathot kamu pouvin, chule ahung holah a konin jong nangma hehset na thu ima kaja pouve.
Ahin keihon jong natahsan thudol chu kahet chet nomuve ajeh chu hiche thudol kisei na mun jousea akiseiset na thubou kaja jiuve,” atiuvin ahi.
Chuin phat akitemun, aphat tep nikhou chun mitamtah Paul umna'a chun ahung khomuvin ahi. Chuin Paul in Pathen lenggam thu ahilin miho tamtah chu Pathen lekhabua konin Jesu thudol ah ajoltan ahi. Hiti chun jingkah a pat nilhah geiyin Mose danthu le themgao lekhabua konin ahoulim in ahi.
Chuin mi phabep in athuhil chu ajop un, konkhat in atahsan pouvin ahi.
Chuin amaho le amaho suhnel tounel akitho jouvun hiche thuhi Paul koma konin achainan angaiyun ache tauvin ahi. Hiche athu ngaiyu chu hiche hi ahi: “Lhagao Theng in napu'u Isaiah henga ana phondoh thu chu adih ahi.
‘Hiche mite koma khun chen lang gasei tan, kathusei hi najah tengule ipi kiseina ham nahet lou dingu, kathilbol namu tengule ipi kabol nahetthei lou dingu ahi.
Ajeh chu hiche mite lungthim hi atah dentan, chule anakol uvin kho ajapon, chule amit'u asing tauvin ahi. Hijeh a chu amit uvin amuthei hih a, chule anakoluvin ajah theilou, chule alungthim uvin jong ahethem thei hih un, keima suhdam dingin jong kahenga ahung kihei thei tapouve,’
Hijeh chun hiche thuhi nanghon jong nahet diu kadei ahi, Pathen'a kona huhhing na thuhi chidang namdang te henga jong kipe ahin chule amahon jong asanu ahitai,” ati.
Aman hiche thuho aseijou chun, Juda hon adalhauvin, chule amaho le amaho akihanel lheh jeng tauve.
Chujou kumni sung chun Paul in ama sumin insan man akipeh in Rome ah achengin ama vila che jouse chu analemin,
Chuti chun hangsan tah in Pathen Lenggam thudol asam phonglen, chule Pakai Jesu Christa thudol chu ahil len koi machan ana kham tang joupon ahi.
Hiche lekhathot hi Paul, Silas chule Timothy a kon ahi. Keihon Pa Pathen le Pakai Jesu Christa a hiho Thessalonica Houbung mite henga kahin thot nahiuve. Pathen chun lungset le cham-lungmon napeu hen.
Keihon nangho jouse jal'in Pathen kathangvah jingun chule nangho dingin kataojom jinguvin ahi.
Keihon Pa le IPathen un nangho chung thua kataonauva, tahsan umtah'a natoh nau, ngailutna neiya nathil bol hou chule IPakaiyu Jesu Christa jal a thoh hattah'a kinepna naneiyu chu kageldoh ui.
Kasopi deitahte, Pathen in nangailu uvin chule Pathen in Amite hidingin nalhengdoh tauve, ti kaheuve.
Ajehchu keihon Kipana Thupha kahin pohpeh u chu thucheng jengseh a hilouvin, thaneina to kilhon a Lhagao Thengin hetchetna lhingset napeh u ahitai tia keihon kaseiyu chu thutah ahi. Chule keihon nangho kagel khohnau nangho toka umkhom laiyun kahin danuvin nahe tauvin ahi.
Hiti chun nanghon kathuseiyu chu nangho dinga hahsatna khohtah Lhagao Thenga konin kipah tah in nasangun ahi. Hiti chun nanghon keiho le Pakai umchan chu najom un ahi.
Hitichun nang ho Greece a tahsan saho jouse-Macedonia le Achaia gam jousea vetjui thei nahung hitauve.
Chule tun, Pakai thu chu Macedonia le Achaia gamkallam peh geiyin, hoilai mun hijongleh kachenau chan ah Pathen natahsannau thudol hi aseiyui. Keihon koima koma hithu chu kasei diu angaipoi.
Ajehchu amahon phatah a eina lamtonau thudol aseiyun, chule nangho milim houna'a kona Pathen hing le dihtah kinbol dinga nalung naheiyu thudol aseijom jinguve.
Chule amaho chun Pathen Chapa–Pathen in athilah a kona akaithou Jesu, vana kona ahung ding ngah jinga uma nahiu thudol aseiyun ahi. Ama hin ahunglhung ding thutanna kichat umtah'a kona eihuhdoh u ahi.
Kasopi deitahteho, nangho kahung vil uhi mohseh ahipoi ti nangho tah in naheuve.
Keiho nangho koma kahung masang jep uva Philippia ichan geiya gimbol hesohna katouvem ti nanghon naheuve. Hinama jongleh IPathen un Ama kipana Thupha chu ichan geiya doudalna aum vang'in, lung ngamtah a nangho koma kaseidoh thei nadiuvin hansanna eipeuve.
Hiti chun kathu seiphongu hi lheplhahna thu ahilouleh lungdihlou pua ahilouleh doha lheplhahna ima seina kanei pouve ti nanghon naheuve.
Ajehchu keiho hin Pathen a kona photchetna neiya Kipana Thupha thusei lea panga kahiuve. Kalung gonu hi miho lunglhaina hollouva Pathen lunglhaina kahol joh u ahi. Ama bou chun kalung put u ipi ahi ahet ahi.
Nanghon nahet ngaima bangun keihon joulhep doha a nangho thunun kagopouve. Chule Pathen hi ijakai ahetoh a ahi, keihohi nasumu chanthei nadinga nangho toh jol le gol'a um'ah kahipouve!
Christa solchah kahiu hi mihem pachat channa dingin keihon nangho hihen midangho hijongleh, koima cha lung kahol pouve.
Christa solchahho hina jal a keihon nanghoa kona ngehna kanei theiyu ahi, hinla keiho nangho laha lung nengin kaum jouve ahilouleh keiho hi minun achate an apeh a avah a chule avetsui tobang kahiuve.
Keihon nangho kangailut behseh jeh un nangho to Pathen Kipana Thupha seh seh a chan neikhom pi hilouvin, kahin nau jong nangho dinga kaphal ngamu ahi.
Sopi deitahte, nalahuva ichan geiya katoh gimu hitam ti hi geldoh lou nahiuvem? Nahenguva Pathen Kipana Thupha seiphong na dinga, nangho pohgih pohsah kanop lou jeh un, sun le jan'in na katong gim un ahi.
Nangho tah keiho hettohsah nahiuve–chule Pathen jong chuti ahi-keiho hi nangho atahsan ho jouse a dinga kipumpeh a, lungdih pua chule themmona neilou kahiuve.
Chule keihon nangho khat khatcheh hi Pan achate abolna bangtah a kabol'u nahi.
Keihon nangho kangeh uva, katilkhou uva chule katem nau chu nangho Pathena dinga lomtah a nachonna dingu kati ahi. Ajeh chu aman aLenggam le aloupina a chan nei dinga nakouvu ahi.
Hichejeh chun, keihon Pathen thangvahna kangadeh pouve, ajeh chu nanghon keihoa kona thu chu nasanu chun, kathuseiyu chu moh mihem thuseiyin nalapouve. Nanghon kathupoh uchu Pathena kon ahi tin nasanguve–hichu hijong hiyah ahi. Chule hiche thuhin nangho tahsan neihoa na atoh jom ahi.
Chutima chun sopi deitahte, nanghon nagam miteuva kona gimbol hesohna nathoh u ahi. Hitia hi, nanghon Judea gam'a Pathen houbung ho umchan najomu ahi, amaho chun Christa Jesu atahsan jeh uva, amiteu Judah ho khut a gimbol hesoh athoh u anahi.
Ajeh chu Juda ho lah a phabep chun themgao ho anathat un, chule phabep chun Pakai Jesu jeng jong chu athau anahi. Tun amahon keiho jeng jong eibol hesoh uve. Ama hon Pathen alunglhai pouvin chule mi jouse to kikala natong ahiuve.
Amahon chidang namdang ho lah a huhhingna Kipana Thupha kaseiphong le diu eijada gouve.
Kasopi deitahte, phat chomkhat a dinga nangho to eiki chomkhen jouvin (kalungun vang nangho nadalha dehpouve), kajo chanun hungkit kagouve, ajeh chu keihon nangho kamukit nom lheh jengu ahi.
Keiho kihambol tah in nangho kom kahung nomun, chule keima Paul jong avelvelin kahung gon, hinla Satan in eisuboijiuve.
I-Pakaiyu Jesu ahung kilekit nikhoa a-anga idin tengu leh ipia kinepna le ipin eikipasah uva, chule ipi chu kachandiu tohman le lallukhuh hiding hitam? Nangho nahiuve!
Henge, nangho keiho kisonpi le kipana nahiuve.
Kanan joulou helu ahung hi phat in, keima ho chang Athens a umden dingin kakigel lhatauve.
Chule Timothy hi na vil dingun kahinsol tauve. Ama hi isopiu le Christa Kipana Thupha seiphong naa Pathen na katoh khompiu ahiye. Aman nang ho nahatsah uva, natahsan nauva natil khouna dinguva kahinsolu ahi.
Chule nanghon hahsatna nato chung changuva chu lung olmo tah a naum louna dinguva navetup dinguva ama kahinsolu ahi. Keiho vang hiti hahsatna ho toh mong dinga eikigonguva ahi ti naheuve.
Keihon kaumpipet jenguva jong hahsatna hung lhungloi jeng thei ahi tia kahilchah nau chu, nahet banguvin, amahon ahinboldoh jeng tauve.
Hiti chu ahijeh a, kathoh joulou phata, natahsan nau det jinga hinam ti kaphotchet nomjeh a Timothy kahinsol anahi. Keiman alhempa chun nanghoa aphapen chu akilahdoh a chule kanatohnau hi mohseh bep hitam tia tija'a um kanahi ahi.
Hinlah tun Timothy ahung lhungin, nangho tahsan le ngailut thu ahung lhuttai. Amahin keihon kahung vilnau thudol chu kipahtah in nageldoh jingun chule keihon nangho kamunom tobangun nanghon jong neimu nomuve ti thulhut aneiye.
Hitihin kasopi deitahte, nangho tahsannaa nahat jing jaluvin, keihon hahsatna le gimbolna kathoh laitah jenguvin jong hatah in nei tilkhouvun ahi.
Nangho Pakaiya nadin det jingu kahet jalun keiho hinna thah eipeuve.
Nangho jeh a Pathen iti kathangvah u hitam! Pathen angsunga kalutnauva keiho hi, nangho jal hin hapan kakipah uve.
Pathen in eikimuto sah kit uva nanghoa tahsan a-onglai chu dipdimna dinga nangho dinga sunle jana tao jinga kahiuve.
I-Pau Pathen le I-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa chun nahenguva eihin puiloi jeng tauhen.
Keihon nangho kangailutnau alon letset tobang'in, Pakaiyin nangho khatle khat kingailutna le mijouse ngailutna chu khansah hen chule longlet doh hen.
Hichea kon hin, nangho I-Pakaiyu Jesu amithengte jouse toh ahungkit niteng, I-Pau Pathen angsunga nadin tenguleh, aman nalungu hatsah hen, nolna beiyin koihen chule athengin hinkoi hen. Amen.
Achainakeiyin sopi deitahte, Pakai Jesu mina kahintem nom nau chu kanahil tobanguvin Pathen lunglhainna hinkho mangun. Nangho hitia hi nana kiman chahsau ahi bangin tua jong nahabol cheh dinguvin kahin tilkhou uve.
Ajehchu keihon nangho Pakai Jesu thuneina'a ipi kahilu nageldoh uve.
Pathen in nangho dinga alung gon chu nathenuva, jonthanhoiya kona nakikangse dingu hi ahi.
Chutah le nangho khatcheh hin atahsa kivettup nahiuva chule thenna le jathei hinkho naman dingu hi ahi.
Nanghon Pathen le alamlhah umdan hephalou milim houna neiho bangin jon lung puhih un.
Hiche thudol ahin, Christian sopi khat chun ajinu engbolna ahilouleh dohabolna lamlouvin neihih un, ajeh chu khohtah amasanga kagihji nau bang chun Pakaiyin hitia chonseho chu alethuh ji.
Ajeh chu Pathen in eikouvu hi thenlouna hinkho mang ding hilouvin, hinkho thenga hing ding ihijo bouvui.
Hijeh chun, koi hijongle hiche hoa chona dan juilou chu mihem thuhil juinom lou ahitapon, A Lhagao Theng eipeuva Pathen deilou jeh joh ahiye.
Hinlah keihon nangho henga khatle khat kingailut ding thua kahin jih khoh u angaipoi, ajeh chu Pathen in khatle khat kingailu uvin tia nahilsau ahitai.
Tahbeh mongin, nanghon Macedonia pumpia tahsanho jouse nangailut nau navetsah sau ahitai. Hitima chun, sopite, amaho chu hatah a nangailut cheh diu kangeh nahiuve.
Masanga keihon nangho kana hilsa bangu chun, thip beh a hinkho manding gelkhoh uvin lang, natoh diu cheh kigelkhoh uvin chule nangma khutcheh a natonguvin.
Chutengleh Christian hilou hon nahinkho man dan'u chun najabol untin, chule midanga nakingaiyu ngailou ding ahitai.
Chule tun sopi deitahte, nangho kinepna neilou miho tobanga lunghema naum louna dinguva Pakaiya thisa ho chung chang thudol nahet teiding'u kanom uvin ahi.
Ijeh inem itileh Jesu chu athin, chule Ama chu ahingdoh kittai ti itahsan uva chule Jesu chu Ahungkile tengleh, Pathen in tahsansa ho chu Amatoh ahinlepui ding ahi ti itahsanu ahi.
Keihon hiche hi Pakaiya kona kalah u kaseiyu ahi: Pakai hungkile tengleh ahingnalai eiho hi anathisaho sanga Amato kimuto masajo ding ihipouve.
Ajeh chu Pakai Amatah chu van'a kona thupeh aw ahinsap ding, vantil pipu aw gintoh, chule Pathen sumkon kouna awgin tohthoa van'a kona hungkum ding ahi. Amasa, Christian anathisa ho alhankhuh uva kona thoudoh ding ahiuve.
Chujou tengleh, eiho ahing nalai chule leiset chunga umnalai chengse hi amaho chutoh Pakai chu vanlai jol'a meilhanglah a kimuto dinga lahtouva ium dingu ahi. Chutengleh eiho Pakai toh a'itih a iumkhom jing dingu ahitai.
Hiti hin khat le khat hiche thuhoa hin kitilkhouto uvin.
Tun kasopi deitah teho, hicheng kisei jouse hi iti hungsoh a chule itihle hung hiding ham tithua nangho koma kahinjih mongu angaipoi.
Ajehchu naginchat lou pettah uva Pakai hungkilekit nikho chu, jana gucha tobang ahung ding ahi.
Mihon “Ijakaiya chamnale bitna aume” tia asei laitah uleh numei naosonat thohgim tobanga, jana gucha hung banga achunguva manthahna chu hunglhung ding ahi. Chule hoidohna umtheilou ding ahitai.
Hinlah sopi deitahte, nangho hiche thudol a hi ima helouva uma nahi pouve, chule Pakai nikho chu gucha tobanga ahung ding chu nanghon nadatmo diu ahipoi.
Ijeh inem itileh nangho nabonchauvin vahle sunlai chate nahiuvin, eiho muthim le janlai chate ihipouve.
Hiti ahijeh chun kihong phauvin, midangho bangin ihmu hih un. Kigingin um unlang chule lung limgeh in umun.
Jan phat le miho ihmu jiuva chule judon hon ju adonkham jiu phat ahi.
Hinlah eiho lung limgeh in vah'a umu hitin, tahsan le ngailut lum panu hite, chule huhhingna lukhuh chu lungngam tah in kikhuh u hite.
Ajeh iham itileh Pathen in eiho chunga alunghanna abuhlhah khum ding hijolouva, I-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa jal'a huhhingna chang dinga eilhendoh joh u ahi.
Hiti chun Christa ahung kile tengleh eiho ithiu hihen ahilouleh hing jong leuhen, Ama eiho dinga athi jal a chu a-itih a dia Amato i-umkhom jing dingu ahitai.
Hitichun nabol ngaisau tobang chun, khat le khat kitil khou touvinlang chule kisadohton khat le khat umun.
Sopi deitah teho, Pakai natohnaa nalamkai hou chu jabolun. Amahon nalah uva atong gim'un, chule lhagao lama nakaihoijuva panga ahiuve.
Amaho chu jana lentah peuvin lang chule anatoh jal un lunggilin ngailuvin. Chule kichamdelin khatle khat cheng khomun.
Sopite ho, kahin ngehnau chu mithase ho chu gihsal un. Akichaseho tilkhouvun. Atha lhasam ho phaten khohsah in vesuiyun. Amitakip chunga thoh hat'un.
Koiman ase chu asea alethuh louna dingin vephauvin, chusangin khat in khat chunga chule mijouse chunga thilpha boljing ding gouvin.
Phatseh in Kipah thanomun.
Taona man ngahih helun.
Itobang phat'in naphah jongle thangvahna neijingun, ijeh ham itileh Jesu Christa a hia nangho dinga Pathen lunglam ahi.
Lhagao theng chu sumit hih un.
Gaothuseiho nahsahmoa dai chatvai bol hih un.
Hinlah akisei jouse patep cheh un. Apha chu kolchah un.
Gitlouna chichom choma konin kihei mangun.
Tun cham-lungmon konna Pathen chun imalam jousea nathensah uhen, chule nalhagaovu le nahinnau chule natahsau chu I-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa ahung masangsen nolna beiyin koihen.
Nakou Pau chu tahsan umtah ahijeh in, Pathen in hichu ahin molso ding ahi.
Sopi deitahteho, keiho dingin hung taovun.
Sopite ho jouse chu Christian kingailutna in chibai bolun.
Keiman Pakai mina thu kapeh nahiuve, hiche lekhathot hi sopite jouse henga kisimdoh hen.
I-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa lungsetna in na umpiu hen.
Hiche lekhathot hi Paul, Silas chule Timothy a kon ahi. Keiho hin I-Pau Pathen le Pakai Jesu Christa a hi ho Thessalonica houbung henga kahinsut u ahi.
I-Pau Pathen le Pakai Jesu Christa chun lungsetna le cham-lungmon napeuhen.
Sopi deitah teho, keihon nangho jal in thangvahna kanei jingui, ajeh chu natahsanu akhangtou jingin chule nangho khatle khat nakingailutnau akhangtou cheh cheh in ahi.
Keihon nangho gimbol hesoh nathohnau jouseuva tahsan naumnau thu chule hahsatna natou thudola thohhat le tahsan naumnau thu chu kisonpi tah in Pathen houbung dang ho koma kaseiyuve.
Chule Pathen in hiche gimbol hesoh thohna hi athutan dihna avetsahnom hintin, chule a Lenggama dinga loma nasemuva, hichena dinga chu thoh hahsa nathoh u ahi.
Athutan dihna jal a aman gimhesoh a nabolhou chu alethuh ding ahi.
Chule Pathen in nangho gimbol hesohna thoh ho le keiho dinga IPakaiyu Jesu vana kona ahung kilah tengleh kicholdona eipeh dingu ahi. Ama Avantil thahattah ho to hung kilang ding ahiuve.
Pathen sei ngailouva chule IPakaiyu Jesu Christa Kipana Thupha joplou ho chunga meikou jejua thutanna ahinlhut dingu ahi.
Amaho chu Pakaiya kona kikhendoh dingu chule aloupina thaneinaa kona a-i-tih a dinga tonsot gimbolna a mahthah dingu ahiuve.
Ama chuche nikhoa ahung teng chuleh Aman amithengtea kona loupina amuding-atahsan ho jousea kona vahchoina akimu ding ahi. Chule hichea hin nangho jong najao uve, ajeh chu nanghon Ama thudol kaseipeh u chu natahsan tauve.
Hitia hi IPathenu chun Ama kouna totoh'a hinkho namansahna dinguva keiho hi nangho dinga taojoma kahiuve. Nanghon natahsan Pau chun thilpha natohsah jouseu chu nabulhit molsona dinguvin thaneina napeuhen.
Chutengleh IPakaiyu Jesu chu nahinnau dung juiyin jabolin umintin, chule amatoh jabol a naumtha dingu ahitai. Hiche ho jouse hin hisah theiya um chu IPathenu lungsetna le Pakai Jesu Christa jal ahi.
Sopi deitahte, tun keihon I-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa hungna ding thule Amakoma ikikhop khom dingu thudol a seichetna hinnei uvinge.
Pakai nikho chu ahunglhung'ah ahitai tiho jeh in nangho bailamtah in suhlongin ahilouleh lung tijan umhih'un. Amaho chun lhagaova vetsahna eikineiye, phondohna eikipei ahilouleh keihoa konin lekhathot kaneiye tijongleu tahsan hih un.
Amahon ipi thu aseiyun nathujo dauhen. Ajeh chu hiche nikho chu ahunglhun masanga Pathen douna nasatah hunglhung ding chule danbeipa-manthaina mihempa kiti chu hung kilangdoh ding ahi.
Ama kichoisang ding, chule mihon pathen atiuva aumsah u tapou chu ajahda ding chule amatah Pathen kahi tia hung ki Pathen sah ding ahi. Ama Pathen hou-in'a lut a, keima Pathen kahi ahungti ding ahi.
Keiman nangho kaumpi pet uva hiche thuho jouse hi kaseipehsau chu nageldoh lou u hitam?
Chule nanghon ama chu ipin atuh tang denham ti naheuve, ajeh iham itileh ama aphat lhinteng lebou hung kilang doh ding ahi.
Ajeh chu hiche danbeipa hin guhthima na atoh pat ahitai chule atuhtangpa hi lampia kona akiheidoh masangsea hitia hi umthim ding ahi.
Chujoutah leh Mihem dan neiloupa hung kiphong doh ding, hinla Pakai Jesu chun akama ahaidoh hua chu amapa atha ding chule ahungna aloupina chun asuhmang ding ahitai.
Hichepa hin Satan natoh ama thaneina hilou chu ahinpat ding chule melchihna ho le thil kidang dang boldoh theina tha anei ding ahi.
Aman mahthahna lampia cheho chu doha lheplhahna pana angolbol ding ahi, ajeh chu amahon huhhing achan theina dinguva ngailutna le thutah chu akisan nomlouvu ahi.
Hitia chu Pathen in amaho chu hatah a lheplhahna a achuhsah ding, chule hiche jouthuho chu amahon atahsan dingu ahi.
Chutengleh amahon thutah chu tahsan tah sanga agilou chu athanoppi jeh uva themmo chang diu ahi.
Sopite, keiho dingin vang nangho Pakai ngailut ho jal a bou Pathen chu thangvahna kapeh dingu tailou adang kahepouve.
Aman huhhing'a naumna dinguva nakouvu ahi thua keihon Kipana Thupha kaseipeh nahiuvin; tua hi nanghon IPakaiyu Jesu Christa loupina a chu chan naneikhom theiyu ahitai.
Hiche ho jouse gel pumin, sopi deitahte, keihon nangho tahsa a kaumpi pet u hihenlang ahilouleh lekhathot a kon hijongleh nangho dingdet'un lang chule kathuhilu chu kolchah jinguvin.
Tun IPakaiyu Jesu Christa Amatah le eingailu uvah I-Pau Pathen le Alungsetna jal a tonsot lhamonna chule kinepna kidangtah eipeuva chun,
Thilpha nabolna le naseinau jousea nalhamonu henlang chule nahat dohsah tauhen.
Achainakeiyin sopi deitahte, keiho dingin hungtaovun tia kangeh nahiuve. Nangho henga anahung tobanga chu Pakai thuhil hi alhunna chan a gangtah a akithejala chule jabol'a aumtheina dingin taovun.
Chujongleh amitakip tahsannei ahiloujeh uvin, keiho migilou le miphalou hoa kona huhdoh kachan theina dinguvin taovun.
Hinlah Pakai hi tahsan umtah ahin, Aman natha hatsah uvintin, chule agiloupa a konin nahuhbit nauvinte.
Chule keiho Pakaiya kakisonnau chu–nanghon kathupeh u chu naboluva chule naboljom dingu ahi ti kakisonpiu nahiuve.
Pakaiyin nalungthimu Pathen ngailutna hetkhenna le phondohna bukim keiyin chule Christa a kona thohhatna lama napuiyu hen.
Chule tun, sopi deitahte, Pakai Jesu mina hiche thupeh hi kapeh nahiuve: tahsannei sopiho jouse thasea hinkho mangho chule keihoa kona kathuhilu juilou hoa konin kikhindoh un.
Ajeh chu nanghon keiho umchan najom diu adol ahi. Keiho nangho toka umkhom laiyun kathase khapouve.
Keihon kaneh manu pelouvin koima an kanepouve. Keihon koima kapohgih sah louna dinguvin sun le jan in katong gimuve.
Keihon neivah dinguva thupeh kapeh thei nahiuve, hinla keihon najui dinguvin vetsahna kapejo bou uve.
Keihon nangho kaumpi pet jenguva jong, hiche thupeh hi kapeh u nahi, “Natong nomlou hon nehding kimulou ding ahiuve,” tihi.
Ahijeng vang'in nangho phabep thasetah in hinkho namanguvin, natoh nanom pouve chule midang natohna chunga kikum naumuve.
Keihon hitobang miho chu thu kapeuvin, chule Pakai Jesu Christa minin amaho chu kangeh uve, amaho chun ageltoh uva chule akihinsona diuva na atoh diu hi ahi.
Sopi deitahte, nangho lah a adangse dinga kasei chu, thilpha bolnaa chimhihbeh uvin.
Hiche lekhathot a keiho seingailou ho chu melchih uvin, amahoa konin kichom khendoh leu chun amaho jahcha tauvinte.
Amaho chu melma ho gelin gel hih un, hinla sopi nabolna bangun sosalun.
Tun Cham-lungmon kona Pathen chun cham-lungmon imatih chanin chule phat jousen nape jingu hen. Pakaiyin naumpi jingu hen.
Hiche hi keima Paul in kakhuttah a kajih chibai bohna ahi. Hitia keima tah in lekhathot kajihna ho photchennaa hitia hi kabolji ahi.
I-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa milungsetna chun nabonchauvin naumpi tauhen.
Hiche lekhathot hi Christa Jesu solchah, Pathen eihuhhingpu'u thupeh le kinepna eipeuvah Christa Jesu pansah, Paul, a kon ahi.
Keiman tahsan jal a chapa deitah Timothy henga dinga kasut ahi. Pa Pathen leh Pakai Jesu lungsetna leh khotona chuleh chamnan naumpihen.
Macedonia jona kanache laiya Ephesus mun'ah uminlang thuhil dihlouho suthip in kati bangin, aphachomlou thusim seileh khanggui thuseina'a kihoulimna ho chu anasutangin, hiche ho chun Pathen tahsanna lama khantouna asosah theipon ahi.
Aphachomlou thusim seileh khanglui thuseina-a kihoulimna ho chu anasutangin, hiche ho chun Pathen tahsanna lamah khantouna asosah theipon ahi.
Keiman nang kathuhilna-a katup chu ahileh tahsan chate jouse hi lungthim thengtah a selepha hetkhenna toh tahsan kicheh tah a kona ngailutna adimsetna diu kati ahi.
Ahinlah mi phabep in alakhel gamtauvin, amaho chu hichehoa konin akihei mang gamun thilpha chomlou kihoulimna'ah akimangcha gam tauvin ahi.
Amaho hi Mose dan thuhil juidanin aumun ahinlah amahon thutahbeh seija aseivangun athuseihou jong akihetchet pouvin ahi.
Eihon dan hi ahiding banga imanchah leh aphai tihi iheuve.
Ijeh inem itileh dan hi thildih bol ho dinga kisema ahipon, dan nitlou, thilsebol ho, Pathen helou hole chonseho, thiltheng subohho, anule apa thatho chule mithat ho dinga kisema ahibouve.
Dan hi jonthanhoiya kipeho, pasal leh pasal kikoiho, chule mihem a kiveiho, mijouho, kitepna sukeh ho,
IPathen un eingansena dungjuia hiche loupi tah Kipana Thupha kahilna toh kikal a chon ho jouse dinga kisema ahi.
Hiche natohna dinga thahat eipea I-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa kathangvah-e. Aman akinbol dingin tahsan theiyin eigelin, eipansah-in ahi.
Keima tumasanga Christa min taitoma kana pana thilse bolhat kanahin, amite kanabolset jeng vang'in Pathen khotona chu kachangin ahi. Ajehchu keiman hetthemlou jeh letahsan loujeh a kanabol ahi.
O, I-Pakai chu ichangeiya milungset them le khoto them hitam! Aman Jesu Christa-a konin tahsanna le lungsetna chun eina sudimtan ahi.
Christa hi michonsete huhhing dingin vannoiya hin ahungin ahi tihi tahsan umtah thuhil ahin, mijousen sanding doltah ahi, chuleh hicheho lah a chu keima hi achonse chungnungpen kahi.
Ahinlah Pathen in khotona eina musah hin, Jesu Christa hi mijouse lah-a chonsepen in jong atahsanleh tonsot hinkemlou aneithei ding ahi ti ahetdoh theina diuva keima hi vettoh thei pipena eimanchah ahi.
Loupina le jangaina jouse atonsot atonsot in Pathen a hijing tahen! Amahi tonsot leng, mutheilou, thitheilou, amabouhi hiche Pathen chu ahi, Amen.
Kachapa Timothy, nachunga gaothua anakiseiya kon a hiche thuhil hi kapeh nahi. Hiche hin Pakaiya dinga nagalsatna-a nahatsah ding ahi.
Christaa natahsan chu tuhdet in chule selepha hetna nalungsung chu sutheng jingin. Miphabep khat'in hiche selepha het theina lungsung chu amang khel'un atahsannau kong chu akehgamtan ahi.
Hymenaeus leh Alexander teni hi vetkah thei ahilhon e. Keiman amani chu Pathen ataitom kitlhon louna dinga Satan khut a kapehdoh lhon ahitai.
Amasapen in mijouse dinga tao dingin kangeh-un ahi. Pathen hepina achan theina dingun thum'un, chuleh amaho dingin thangvahna peuvin.
Lengho leh thuneina muna umho dingin taovun, hitia chu Pathen jana neipuma lungmong tahle chamdel a hinkho imantheina diuvin.
Ijeh-inem itileh hichu thilphatah eihuhhingpau Pathen lahthei doltah ahi.
Aman mijouse hi huhhing'a aumtheina dingleh thutah hetna ahinneithei diu hi eideipeh u ahi.
Ajehchu Pathen khatseh leh mihemte kikah-a chamna eisempeh theiyuvah palai khatseh Jesu Christa aumin ahi.
Aman mijouse dingin ahinna mangchan chamlhatna eichohdoh peh tauvin ahi. Hiche hi Pathen in vannoi mite aphatcha ahetsahnom chu ahi.
Chule hiche tahsan thu leh thutah thuhi chidang namdangte lah-a hilchen ding leh seiphong dinga keima hi solchah-a eikilhengdoh ahitai. Keiman kaseivalpoi thutah bou kasei ahi.
Pathen houkhomna mun jousea, mihon lunghanna le kinelbautam neilouva Pathen lama akhuttheng adop uva taona amandiu kadeiyin ahi.
Chuleh numei hohi adolbep chan kijemu henlang kiphalam khenchan umuhen. Akivondiu bepchan kivon u henlang, asampheh danuvah chingtheiyuhen, sana le dangka mantam ahilouleh thilman lutah kivona kilelahna neidauhen.
Ajehchu Pathen ngaisah kahi ti numeiho chu achonphatnauvin kijemjoleu aphai.
Numeihon kangkhencha leh ginggeh cha a um kithemchuh uhen.
Numei hohi pasalho chunga thunei dingleh thuhil dingin thu kapepoi, thipkhen chan thu ngaileu kati.
Ajehchu Pathen in Adam asem masan chujouvin Eve asemin ahi.
Chuleh Satan in alheplhah chu Adam ahipon, numeinu joh chu ana lheplhah-a chonset hunglut ahi.
Ahinlah numeiho hi tahsannale ngailutna'a, thenna le chonnema aum jingleh achahin uva kona huhhing'a umding ahiuve.
Hiche hi tahsanthei ding doltah'a kisei ahi. “Khattouvin Houbung Upa hi ding natoh anopleh amachun ja umtah panmun adei ahi.”
Hijehchun Houbung Upa ding chu ja umtah nolnabei hinkho mang hiding ahi. Aji ang'a kitah ding, ama le ama kitimjoumi hiding, chingthei tah a hing hiding, chule minphat na nei hiding ahi. Jindot them chule mihilthem hiding ahi.
Ama chu julopmi ahiloule agilou hilou ding ahi. Ama chu milungneng hiding, mitoh kinahat hilou ding, chule sum ngailu lou mi hiding ahi.
A-insung kipohtupjou mi, achaten ajathei le athua nunsah joumi hiding ahi.
Ajehchu a-insung akivettup joulouleh Pathen houbung chu iti avettup jouding ham?
Houbung Upa ding chu tahsanthah hilou ding ahi, ajeh chu hung kiletsah intin Diabolin asuhlhuh ding ahi.
Chujong leh, pam a miho seiphat changmi hiding ahi, achuti louleh miseiset achanna-a kon chun Diabol thangkolah ohkhaget inte.
Chutobang ma chun deacon panmun loding ho jong chu ja-um mi chuleh kitahna neimi hiding, ju'a lopmi hilou ding, sum a kitahlou mi hilou ding ahi.
Tahsan thugil tua kiphongdoh thudol'a kipeh theng nanei, chule lungthengsel a hing mi hidiu ahi.
Amahohi Deacon a akipansah masanga hoitah a kholchil masat ding, alhin uva ahileh Deacon panmun a pang ding ahiuve.
Hitobangma-a chu ajiteu jong ja um mi hiding, miseiset hat hilou ding, amale ama kitimjoumi hiding chuleh anatohna jousea jong kitahna neimi hiding ahiuve.
Deacon ho chu jikhat neimi hiding chuleh achateu leh a-insung kivetsuijou mi hiding,
Deacon natohna a lolhingtah michun mipia kon a jana changdiu hichun Jesu Christa atahsannau toh tahsan aumnau asuhpung ding ahi.
Nakom u hunglhunvah ding kinepna kanei jing vang'in tun hiche hohi kahin sun e.
Ijemtia keima kahunggei khah leh Pathen insung mite iti chondiu ham ti nahettheina dinga kati ahi. Hiche hi hingjing Pathen houbung ahin, hichu thutah kingapna khombul ahi.
Kinelna beihel in, hiche hi itahsan nauthugil loupitah chu ahi. Christa chu mihem a hung kilanga Lhagaovin atahlanga vantil hon amuu ahi. Ama thuhi chitin namtin lah-a akiphong jal in vannoi miten atahsan un chuleh loupitah in van ah lahtouvin aumtai.
Tun Lhagao Thengin kichehtah-in eiseipeh-un, ni nunung teng mitamtah, tahsan dihtah-a kona pullha ding, amahon thilha hoa kona lhagao dihlouho thuhil ajui diu ahi.
Amaho chu thuhillhem chule mijouho ahiuvin, selepha ahetnau lungthim chu athisa ahi.
Amahon jinei hi adihpoi atiuvin chuleh thutah hea tahsanten thangvah taona puma aneh diuva Pathen in asemho chu nehding adihpoi atidiu ahi.
Ajehchu Pathen thilsemho jouse hi thangvah taona puma ikisana ahileh aphamo umlou paidoh ding jong umlou ahi.
Ajehchu hiche hi Pathen Thule taonaa santhei ding dol a kisuthenga ahiti iheuve.
Timothy nangin hichehohi sopiho koma nasei chetpehleh nangma, tahsan thua kikhoukhah chule thuhilpha juiyah, Christa Jesu lhacha lomtah nahi ding ahi.
Amavang Pathen deilou gollui thusimho le thuchavai ki houlimna hoa konin kidalsen lang Pathen dei hinkhoa kipuikhangna ah kipelutjon.
Tahsalam phatchomna dinga kimanchah hi aphanai, ahinla Lhagaolam dol a phatchomna dinga kimanchah hi aphajoi, ajeh chu hichehin tuhinkhoa dingleh khonunga dinga phatchomna tah ahi chu thutep uma ahi.
Hichehi tahsan theidol tah-a kisei ahin, mijousen asanding doltah ahi.
Hiche ding jeh-a hi hatah a itoh-u ahin, tohjong itohjom jing dingu ahi, ajeh chu, mijouse huhhingpu ahidehset a tahsan chate Huhhingpu hingjing Pathena ikijopnau uma ahi.
Hiche thu hohi hil inlang amaho chu hetthemsah teiding khohsah-in.
Nakhandonjeh hin mi nahsahmo theiyin umhih-in, amavang nathusei dan leh nahinkho mandan in, namingailutna-in, natahsan hinkho kimanchah danleh thenna hinkho naman danin atahsan ho vetjui theiyin um'in.
Keima kahung kahsen, Pathen Thu simna in, tahsan chate tilkhouna-in chuleh thuhillam in anaponthon.
Houbunga Pakai lhachaten nachunga khut angap uva nachungchang thua themgao thuphondoh naa kona Lhagao Thilpeh nachan chu nahsahmo hihbeh-in.
Hichenga hin lungluttah-in pangin. Nakhantouna hi mijouse het a akilah dohtheina dingin nanatohna-a hin kipumpeh jingin.
Nathuhil dungjui chun kimangchan, hichu chepi jingin chutileh Pathen in phatthei naboh ding chuleh nathuhil jahojong phatthei chang diu ahi.
Upa tehseho chu phoh hih-in, napa tobang'in jana neitah'in jolthon, khangdong pasalho chu napenpi nasopitah tobang'in kihoupin,
Nupi tehseho chu nanu tobang'in gel inlang, nasanga dongjo numeiho chu napenpi nasopinu tobang'in lungthengtah-in kaihoiyin.
Ajending koimacha neilou meithai hochu jana neitah-in kaihoiyin,
Ahinlah chate le tute nei ahiuleh amopohnau masapen chu a-insunga Pathen mikhotona apohdoh dingu, ahinguvah anule apateu phatna ngailutna-a alethuh diu ahi. Hichu Pathen lung lhaina ahi.
Amavang leiset chunga ainsungmi umtalou meithai dihtah hochun Pathena akingapnau ngaplhahna aneitheiyun, Pathen in apanpina diuvin sunle jan in ataojingun ahi.
Ahinlah meithai nopsahna hinkhoa kimang chajing hovang ahinlai sunga jong athisa ahiuve.
Amaho chu miseiset achanlouna diuva hiche thupeh hohi napeh ding ahi.
Ahinlah koihileh ama sopite ding khohsahna neilou adeh deh'a ama insung mite ding khohsah louho chun tahsan dihtah chu apaidoh-u ahitan, hitobang ho chu atahsanlouho sanga khohjo ahiuve.
Kithopi dinga amin kikhum meithaiho chu alhompen a kum somgup hiding, ajipa anga kitahna ana neimi hiding ahi.
Amachu achate ahin khoukhahna a athilphabol jeh'a mijouse jana changmi hiding, maljin khoto, tahsan kibahpiho kisunemtah a jenmi hiding, hahsatna tohho kithopi nommi hiding ahi.
Khangdong meithaiho vang panglou diu ahi, ajeh chu Christa dinga akipehnau sanga atahsau ngaichatna chu hatjoding jineikit nomdiu ahi.
Hiche chun kitepna aneisau chu asuhkeh-a themona changdiu ahi.
Chuleh amaho chun thaset hinpanuntin intina vahle untin, thuchavai seina'a kipeuvintin, mi natohna-a gakikum lediu chuleh akinlouva thuseina'a gakamjao lediu ahi.
Hijeh chun hitobang khangdong meithai hohi ajineikit uva cha aneidiu, inchen akisemdiu kaphatsah ahi. Chutileh melma chun amaho chu aseisetna diu agomkom aneilou diu ahi.
Ajehchu amaho lah a phabep khat hi achelengun, Satan nung ajui tauve tihin eitijat sah'in ahi.
Tahsancha numei khat chun sopi meithai aneiya ahileh amaho chu phatah-in kivetsui henlang mopohna houbung chunga ngapdahen. Chutileh houbungin achangseh'a cheng meithaiho phatah-a avetsuithei dingu ahi.
Houbung Upa akin phatah-a tongho adehset athupha lhangsapna le thuhilna-a hapanho chu jana pehding chuleh atohman jong phatah a pehding ahi.
Ajehchu Pathen thun, “Bongchal changchila chu amuh kikan hihhen chujongleh natonga chu atohman asanding lomtah ahi,” ati.
Houbung lhacha khat chunga hehna aumleh hettohsah mini, mithum aumlouleh lahih in.
Adanghon kichatna aneitheina dingin achonseho chu mipi angsunga sosal'in.
Pathen leh Jesu Christa chuleh vantil sangpen ho mitmua hiche thuhi kapeh nahi, hiche thupeh hohi langnei naleh sihneina koimacha koma neilouvin mangchan.
Houbung sunga Pakai lhacha napansah ding tengleh kino hihbeh in. Midang chonsetna-a kinunat hih-in, nangle nang kisuthengin.
Tuisih jengseh donhih in, naveiset jeh leh nagilpi damlouna jeh in lengpitwi themkhat khat anamang jitan.
Miphabep chonsetna hi mijouse het in akilangin, suhdihthei ahi. Ahinla miphabep chonsetna hi khonungle bou hung kilang ding loi aume ti sumil hih in.
Chutobang chun miphabep thilpha bol hi mipi het in akilangdoh theiyin, chuleh miphabep in thilpha abol hi phatkhat lebou hung kilang doh ding ahi.
Sohhon Pathen min leh athuhil taiponga aumsah louna dinguvin a Pakai teu ginleh jabolna lhingset apehjing diu angaiye.
Chuleh apakai teu chu tahsan chate anahi khah jongleh sopi ahijeh chun nahsahmon boldau hen, chusang chun hajencheh joh uhen, ajeh chu anatoh-u phatchompi hochu angailut u tahsan chate mama ahiuve. Timothy, hiche thuhi hilin, anitchehna diuvin tilkhouvin.
Mi phabep in kathuhilu hi anakhel maitheiyu ahi, ahinla hichehi Pakai Jesu Christa thuhil phachomtah chu ahi. Hiche thuhil hin Pathen deilam hinkho akhantousah ahi.
Koitobang khat in hicheto kitohlouva thuhil aumleh amachu thuhila nunglou chule hetna lhasama ahi. Hitobang michun hiche thudih hi aheimanggot ahi. Hichehin kinel bautamna asodohsah jia achaina chu kimitthipna, kibungkhen, kidemto, chuleh kiginmoto phaloutah asodohsah ji ahi.
Hitobang hohin phat tinin thilphalou asodohsah jin ahi. Alungthim'u asuboh un thutah anungsun tauvin ahi. Hitobang miho ding in Pathen lama lunglut dana aumu hi tahsa lama haodohna ding tohgonbep ahijin ahi.
Ahinlah Pathen ngaisahnatoh kilhon'a lungnachim hinkho hi haona tahbeh ahi.
Atahbeh-in, eihon leiset a hin ima ihinpolut pouvin, chuleh idalhah tenguleh ima ipohdoh diu aumpon ahi.
Hijehchun eihon neh le von ineiyuleh ilunglhai jeng diu angaiye.
Ahinlah ahaodoh nom loihohi lhepna ah alhajiuve chuleh ngolhoitah le hamset umtah ngaichat hohin manthahna-a alehlutji bep in ahi.
Ajehchu sum ngaichatna hi thilphalou jouse hung konna ahi, chuleh sum ngaichatna hin miphabep tahsan dihtah a konin alamvaisah-in lunggimna tamtah-in amaho asuhnatlo ji bep in ahi.
Ahinlah Timothy nangma vang Pathen mi nahijeh in hiche thilse hoa kon in jammangin lang lungnengtah le thohhatna neitah-in ngailutna le tahsanna neipumin Pathen deilam le chonphatna del in.
Tahsan dihtah chuna-in galsat phachu sat'in. Pathen in nakouna tonsot hinkemlou chu tuhchah in, hichu ahetoh mitamtah masanga phatah a naphondoh ahitai.
Mihem hinkho pea Pathen angsungleh Pontius Pilate masanga hettohsahna phatah pea Jesu Christa angsunga hiche thupeh hi kapeh nahi.
Tohdinga nakipe chu bulhingset in tongin, chutileh tuapat le Pakai Jesu hungkit kah in koimachan themmo nachanponte.
Lengho Lengle Pakaiho Pakai anunnom leh hat chungnung Pathen amabou chun Christa chu aphatcha vana kona ahin kilahdohsah ding ahi.
Amabou hi thithei louna hinna nei ahin aumna chu vahbehseh-a koimachan aphah theilou, mihem mit in amuphahlou ding ahi. Loupina le thaneina jouse atonsot tonsot'in Amaa hijing tahen! Amen.
Hiche leiset a haosaho chu akiletsah louna diuleh kisonpi thei hilou asum u chu kisonna a aneilouna diuvin hilchah in. Ingaichat hou ning lhingset'a eipeuva Pathen joh kisonnan neiyuhen.
Asum u chu thilpha bolna a aman diuvin seipeh in. Thilpha bolna lama ninglhingu henlang alhasamho khotona hinneiyuhen. Chuleh midang koma phaldoh dingin phattin in kigosan umjing'u hen.
Hitia chu abol uleh gou kikhol khonunga dinga akhombul phatah nei hidiu chutia chu hinna tahbeh chu atekhah thei dingu ahi.
Timothy, Pathen in nangansena chu kichintup in. Nadou hotoh Pathen deilou ngolhoi tah a kihoulimna ho, amahon chihna atiuva kon chun kiheimangin.
Mi phabep in hitobang ngolnaho chu ajui uvin tahsanna akonin alamvai tauve. Pathen mikhotona chun nabon un naumpiu hen.
Hiche hi Jesu Christa solchah hidinga Pathen lunglhaina-a lhendoh a um Paul lekhathot ahi. Keima Christa Jesu tahsan a kon hinna athutep seiphong dinga eikisol'ah ahi.
Kangailuttah kachapa Timothy dinga kajih ahi. Pa Pathen le I-Pakaiyu Jesu Christa ngailutna le khotona chuleh lungmon na chun naumpi hen.
Timothy, kapu kapaten apom banga selepha hetna lunggel thengtah puma kapom Pathen chu nang jal'in kathangvah e. Asun ajan in kataona a nangma kageldoh jinge.
I-kikhen a namitlhilon chu kageldoh in, nangma kamukit nom lheh jenge. Chule iumkhom kit tengleh keima kipana a dimset ding kahitai.
Natahsan dihtah chu kageldoh e, ajehchu napi Lois leh nanu Eunice a anaumdim masa tahsan chu nachan khompi ahi. Chule hiche tahsan chu nang'ah dettah in aum jinge ti kahen ahi.
Hichejeh achu, nachunga kakhut kangap a Pathen in lhagao thilpeh napeh chu nasuhlang jing dinga kahin geldohsahkit nahi.
Ajehchu Pathen in tijatna le meisanna Lhagao eipepouve, amavang thohhatna, ngailutna chule kitimthemna joh eipeuve.
I-Pakaiyu chung thu midang seipeh ding jahcha hih beh-in, chuleh ama jeh a songkul katan jeh hin keima jong neijachatpi hih in. Pathen in napeh thahatna chu kengin lang hiche kipana thupha jeh a hi thohgimna toh dingin kigosan um'in.
Ajehchu Pathen in eihuhdoh uva hinkho thenga hing dinga eikouvu ahi. Hichehi eiho ichandiu lom a eibolpeh-u ahipon, amavang phat kipat masangpeh a ama tohgon dungjuia abol ahibouve, amikhotona Jesu Christa a kona eivetsah nom jal u ahi.
Tun eihuhhingpau Jesu Christa ahung kilah chun hiche hohi eihet chetsah u ahitai. Aman thina thahat chu asumangin athupha hi mangchan thithei louna leh hinna lampi chu eisalvah peh tauvin ahi.
Chule Pathen in hiche kipana thuphahi hillhangle dinga solchah khat'a eilhendoh ahitai.
Hichejeh-a chu, keiman hiche songkul'a hi kathohgim ahi. Ahinlah keima kajah achapoi, ajeh chu keiman katahsan chu kahechenin chuleh ama ahungkit kah-a achunga kakingap lhahna dungjuiya hi eikaihoi jing ding ahi ti katahsanin ahi.
Keima a kona nahet thuhil dihtah Jesu Christa a nanei tahsan le ngailutnaa kisemdoh chu chepin.
I-sunguva chengah Lhagao Theng thaneina a kon chun nangman nakingansena thutah manlutah chu chingthei tah in kichin tup in.
Nahet ngaima bangin Asia gamkaiya kona hungho jouse Phygelus le Hermogenes changei chun eidalhagam tauvin ahi.
Pakaiyin ahepina giltah chun Onesiphorus leh ainsungmite umpi hen ajehchu aman eihung vil in eihung tilkhou jinge. Kabul put jongchu aman eijachat pipon ahi.
Ama Rome a ahung chun eihung mudoh kahsen muntin'ah eihol len ahi.
Pakai chu ahung kilekit nileh angailutna giltah chun umpi hen, chuleh Ephesus mun a chu itobang tah a phachom'ah hitam nangman nahesohnai.
Timothy kangailuttah kachapa, Jesu Christa a um Pathen in napeh hiche lungsetna a chun hat in.
Tahsan theitah hettohsah tamtah'in asuhdet kathuhil hochu nangman najatan ahi. Tun nangin hiche thutah hohi tahsan thei miho chu hilin, chutileh amahon midangho koma apehdoh sondiu ahi.
Jesu Christa sepai phatah bangin ahahsa kathohhi neithohpin.
Sepai galkap pet koima leiset hinkho thil ho dingin akisalelpoi, ajeh chu hiche chun sepaiya apansahpa alunglhai sah theipon ahi.
Chuleh golseh kitetna ajong koiman dan juilouvin kipaman asang ngaipoi.
Chule natong hat loubol mi jong atohga nemasapen a pang dingdol ahi.
Kathusei hi hoitah'in geltoh them in, Pakaiyin hichehohi nahetthem sahding ahi.
Jesu Christa hi leng David chilhah ahin, athia kona kaithouva um ahi tia kathuhil hi phat tinin geldoh jingin.
Chuleh hiche kipana thupha thohgimna hohi kato ahi. Amavang Pathen thuhi akikham tang theidehpoi.
Pathen in alhendoh ho dinga huhhingna le Christa a tonsot loupina ahinpohlut ding ahiphot le itobang thohgimna hijongleh thohding kanom in ahi.
Hiche hi tahsan umtah thuhil ahi: Amatoh ithikhom uleh amatoh ihinkhom diu ahi.
Amatoh ithohgim khom uleh amatoh ivaihom khomdiu ahi, ama iseilep uleh amanjong eiseilep diu ahi.
Ahinlah eihon kitahna neihih jongleu hen amachu kitahjing ahi, ijeh inem itileh ama chu amaleh ama kiseilep theilou ahi.
Nangman hichethu hohi mijouse geldohsah in, chule phatchomna bei mohthu pouva akinel bautam louna dingun Pathen anga hilchah in. Ajehchu hitobang kinelna hochun ajaho lungthim asuhset ding ahi.
Pathen lunglhaina nachan theina dingin ama a dingin kiphal thengin, gunchun Pathen thuhi jachatna beihelin adihna bangtah in hilchenin lang ponpanin.
Pathen nahsah louna thu phachomlou ngolkai thu kihoulimna'a konin kikangse in,
Hitobang thuphalou hohi tahsa a hivei phalou tobanga, Hymenaeus le Philetus chunga soh tobanga chu, kithejal ji ahi.
Amahohi thutah'a kona lamvai ahiuvin, mithiho chu thoudohsa ahitauve atiuvin miphabep khat tahsanna lama konin alehei tauvin ahi.
Ahinlah Pathen thudih hi khombul kiphut detchet bangin adingdet jingin achungah hiche thuhi akijih in ahi, “Pakaiyin ama hochu koikoi ahi ahen chuleh Pakai mite chu thilsea konin akiheimang jiuve,” akiti.
Mihao insunga chun sana le dangka a kisem thilkeo ngen aumpon thingle leibel jong aumin, amantamho chu kinthupia kimang chading ahin, aman lhomho chu nitina manchah hiding ahiuve.
Nangma nakisuhtheng jinga ahileh kinloupia manchahthei thilkeo thupi chu nahi ding ahi. Nahinkho chu theng ding Pakaiyin thilphachoma amanchah dinga kigosa jing chu nahi ahi.
Khandonlai lungngaichat ho jousea konin jammangin, amavang chonphatna, kitahna, ngailutna le chamna chu hadel in, lungthengsel a Pakai kom beljingho toh kiloikhomin,
Avel in seikit inge, ngol hoitah, ima hetohlouva kinel bautamna hoa konchun kikangse doh in, hichun kinahna asodohsah jin ahi.
Chuleh Pakai lhacha chun mitoh kinah abollou ding, amavang mijouse angailut ding, mihilthem hiding, chuleh mihahsa ho chu adepthem ding ahi.
Thutah doudal hochu kangkhen chan hilthem in ajeh chu amaho lungthim chu Pathen in aleheiya thutah chu ahin hetthem thei diu ahi.
Hiteng chuleh amaho hung khangdoh untin, Diabol thangkol a kona hoidoh theidiu ahi. Ajeh chu aman amaho chu adei deiya abolthei dinga gal hinga anamat ahitai.
Timothy, ni nunung tengleh phat hahsa hunglhung ding ahi ti nahet ding ahi.
Ajehchu mihon amachang kingailutna le sum ngailutna jengbou ahinnei diu ahi. Amahohin kiletsahna le husetna, Pathen taitomna, nulepa thungai louna chule kipaje helou hung hitei diu ahi. Amahon thenna hinkho hi ahin nahsahlou diu ahi.
Amaho chun ngailutnale ngaidam jouna aneilou diu, miseiset hat hidiu chule ama kitim jouna neilou hidiu ahi. Amahohi kichat um phatna hoa ahiuve.
Amahon aloi agol ho hinpedoh untin, i-ang untin, kiletsahnan dimuntin, Pathen ngaisah sanga nopsahna ahin ngaichat joh diu ahi.
Amaho chu hougut hiuvintin, ahinlah amahon Pathen thaneinale athilbol theina ajahnomlou diu ahi. Hitobang hoa kon hin kikangsen,
Amaho doha lungthim in mi insunga alutjiuvin, tahsa ngaichatnan alodim chonset pohgih poa numei tikitimlou ho alhemlhauvin gal hingin amanjiuvin ahi.
Hitobang numeiho hin, thuhil thah hi ajui jingun ahinlah thutah chu ahethem pouvin ahi.
Jannes le Jambres tenin Mose adoudal lhon bang chun amaho hin thutah chu adoudalun ahi. Amahohin lungthim chavai aneiyun tahsan lhem achepiuvin ahi.
Ahinlah amahohi hitiahi hoidoh sottaloudiu Jannes le Jambres banga chu itobanga ngol hiuvam ti nikhatleh mijousen ahin hetdoh diu ahi.
Ahinlah Timothy nangman, keiman ipi thu kahil, chule ipi iti kahin chule kahinkhoa kalunggon nahet ahinai. Hiti chun nangman katahsanna, kathohhatna, kangailutna chule kathoh lhumkeina hohi nahe chen nai.
Ichan geiya gimbol hesohna chule hahsatna kathoh hitam ti nahenai. Chule keiman Anitoch, Iconium chule Lystra khohoa bol-hesohna kathoh hohi nahei, hinla Pakaiyin hicheho jousea konin eihuhdoh tai.
Ahiye chule koi koi hijongleh Christa Jesua Pathen ngaisahna hinkho mangnom jouse chun bolhesohna athohtei ding ahi.
Ahinlah migilouho leh milhem lhaho chu hung pungcheh cheh ding ahiuve. Amahon midangho alheplhah uva chule amaho tah lheplhah a umding ahiuve.
Ahinlah nangma nana kihilsa thilhoa chu tahsan umtah nahi ding ahi. Nangman hicheho chu adih ahin, chule nahil ho chu natahsan thei ahiuve ti nahenai.
Nangma naneova pat a Thuthengbu hi nana kihilsa ahin, chule amaho chun huhhingna nakisan theina dinga chihna chu napehsonu ahitai.
Pathen thubu hi aboncha Pathen Hu haikhum ahi chule hichu eiho dinga ipi chu adih chule ipi chu adihlou ham ti ihinkhouva eihet dohsah dingu ahi. Idihlou tenguleh eisudih diu chule ipi chu adih ham ti eihiluva panga ahi.
Hiche hi Pathen in amite chu abolsah nom thilpha tincheng bolna lama boltheina dimset inei theina diuva kigotna lampi ahi.
Keiman Pathen le alenggam tungdoh a hung ding Christa Jesu, ahingho le athiho chungthu tana pang dingpa angsunga, lungguttah a katilkhou nahi:
Pathen Thu chu seiphong in. Phat kijenpet hihen, hihih jongleh kigosademin um'in. Thohhattah in sudih in, phoh in chule phatah a hilpumin namiteu chu tilkhouvin.
Ajehchu mihon thuhilpha le adihtah a kihilna thu angainom lounau phat hunglhung ding ahi. Amaho chun alung ngaichat u ajui uva, anakolu thahtun tun'a um chun angainom ding thubou hilding mihil akikou dingu ahi.
Amaho chun thutah chu adeilou dingu chule akisemthu thusimho pou adel le dingu ahi.
Hinlah nangma aphat totoh'a imalam jousea lunggel kicheh hina neiyin. Pakaiya dinga gimhesoh thohding kichatna neihih in. Kipana Thupha thu chu hilin chule Pathen in lhacha natohna napeh chu tongdoh in.
Keima vang kahinkho hi Pathena dinga maichama kisunglha kahitai. Ka leihinkho kichaina ding ahung naitai.
Keiman kidouna chu kasat chaitai, keiman lhaitetna chu kajo ahitai chule tahsanna a kapangdet e.
Chule tua hi kipaman kasan ding gotsa koi ahitai. Pakai, thutan dihtah pa chun, ahungkile nitengleh chonphatna lallukhuh chu eipeh ding ahi. Chule hiche kipaman san ding chu keima chang dingseh hilouva Ama hung kilah ding nikho ngaicha geova ngah jing ho dinga jong ahi.
Timothy, lungsettah in agan nathei chanin hungin.
Demas chun tu hinkho thil ho angaichat jeh in keima eidalhan, Thessalonica lama achetai. Crescens chu Galatia ah achen, chule Titus Dalmatia ah achetai.
Luke bouseh kakoma aume. Nahung phatleh Mark chu hinpuiyin, ajeh chu ama lhacha natohnaa eipanpi phachomtah hiding ahi.
Keiman Tychicus chu Ephesus a kasol in ahi.
Nahung phatleh Troas khoa Carpus koma kadalhah Sangkholchol chu hinpo teiyin. Chujongleh kalekhabu ho, adeh'a kalekhajol ho chu hinpon.
Alexander, sum-eng khengpa chun eigimbol lheh jenge, hinlah Pakaiyin athilbol dungjuiyin achungthu tan nante.
Amaa konin chingtheiyin, ajeh chu amahin isei jouseu hadouvin adouvin ahi.
Thutanna anga eikipui masat chun koima eikilhonpia aumpoi. Amitinin eidalhauve. Ama ho dounaa ima sodahen.
Hinlah Pakai chun eidinpin chule thaneina eipei hitia chu keiman chidang namdang ho jouse henga Kipana Thupha kalhangsap chu ajah theina dingu ahi. Chule aman thina theiya konin jong eihuh dohtai.
Henge, hitia chu Pakaiyin gitlouna eihin nokhum theiya konin eihuhdoh intin, chule avan gam'a bitkeiya eipuilut ding ahi. Pathena chun loupina jouse umjing tahen! Amen.
Priscilla le Aquila teni chule Onisephorus insunga umho jouse chu keikhelin analemin.
Erastus Corinth a aumdenin, chule keiman Trophimus chu Miletas ah damlouvin kadalhatai.
Phalbi ma-in hikoma hung teijin. Eubulus in chibai nahinbol e, chule Pudente, Linus, Claudia chule sopi ho jousen jong chibai nahinbol uve.
Pakai chun nalhagaovu umpi hen. Chule Amilungsetna chun nabonchauvin naumpiuhen.
Hiche Lekhathot hi Pathen soh chule Jesu Christa solchah, Paul'a kon ahi. Keima Pathen in alhendoh saho laha tahsan thudol seiphong ding le Pathen mite hindan ahetthem theina diu thutah chu hil dinga ei kisol ahi.
Chuche thutah, jou seitheilou Pathen in vannoi bul kiphudoh masanga ana tepsa, chun tonsot hinna aneiyu chu kisonna apeh ahi.
Chule tua aphat alhintaha hiche thuhi aman ahin phondoh'a, keihon mijouse laha kasei phongleu ahi. Hiche hi eihuhhing uva Pathen a kona thupeh, ama na tong dinga keima ei kinganse ahi.
Keiman, kakikop pi tahsanna jal'a kachapa dihtah, Titus henga kasut ahi. Pa Pathen chule eihuhhing uva Christa Jesun chamna le lungmon nape tahen.
Keiman nangma Crete twikol a kadalhah chu, inatoh lhon nasuhbulhit a chule kahilna banga khopi tinchenga upa ho napansah na dinga kadalhah nahi.
Upa khat chun nolnabei hinkho amanding ahi. Ainneipi dinga kitahna neimi hiding, chule achate chu atahsan chonchatvaina lamle thua nunlouna lama seiset changlou hiding ahi.
Upa khat chu Pathen insunga gouching ahi, hijeh a chu nolna beiya hinkho amanding ahi. Ama chu kichamsah, lungsabai, ju'a loplou hiding, alamlouva sum ngailu mi hilouding ahi.
Maljin phatbol mi, a-in'a jin alhunle kipah, chule Pathen ginga, chondihtaha hinkho mang mi hiding, thilpha ngailu, lunglimgeh, chondih, amachang kitimthei, Pathen ging mi hiding ahi.
Tahsan umtah thu ana kihilna ho detchet a tuhchah mi hiteiding ahi; chutileh aman midang ho chu kihilna hoitah a atilkhou thei ding chule mi nelkal hatho jong athemmonau akomu peh thei ding ahi.
Ajeh chu adoudal ah mi tamtah panna bei thuseiya thanom chule milhemlha tamtah aume. Hiche hi ahideh'a cheptan vanga sochatna um ahi tia sei holah'a aum nom e.
Amaho chu suhthip ding ahiuve, ajeh chu athuhil dihlou uva kon chun insung tamtah apuimangun ahi. Chule hiche athilbol u chu sum ngailut jeh a bou abolu ahi.
Amaho lah jenga jong, mi khat, Crete a kona themgao khat, in amaho thudol hitin aseiyin, “Crete miho hi abon'uva mijou, gam sahang, chule mithase nehlop ahiuve” ati.
Hichehi adihtah mong ahi. Chuti ahijeh chun amaho hi tahsan kicheh mi ahi nadingun hatah in phohsal in.
Thutah'a kona mi heileng thei, Juda ho moh thusimle miho thupeh ah lunglut dauhen.
Alung theng dinga imajouse thengsoh kei ahi, ahinlah akisuboh atahsanlouho ding vanga athenga khatcha umlou ahi, ajeh chu alunggel ule selepha hetna alungsungu bohji a ahi.
Hitobang miho chun akamsunguva Pathen kahenai tin aphongdoh nauvin, ahinlah ahinkho mandan uvin aseilep un ahi. Amaho chu thet umtah, thungailou ahiuvin, thilpha bolna lama panna bei ahiuve.
Titus, nangman vang, kithuhilna dihtah dungjuiya hinkho manding dan domsang in.
Upa lang jep ho chu mi kitim them, ja umtah, lunglimgeh cha a hing, ahithei na diuvin hil'in. Amaho chun tahsan dettah aneiyuva chule ngailutna lethohhat na a adimset diu ngai ahi.
Chutobangma chun, nupi tehse lang jep ho jong chu Pathen jatah'a hinkho mang din hil'in. Amaho chu mihehse hatle ju a lop hilouva, chusanga midang thilpha ipi ahi ahildiu ahi.
Hiche nupi tehse lang jep hochun nutil khangdongho chu ainneipute chengu ngailut leh achateu ngailutje ahil diu,
Lung limgeh le thengsel'a umding, ama in'a natong mi hiding, chule naphatong le ainneiputeu noiya kun ahina diuva ahildiu ahi. Chutile Pathen thu chu jachatna a asosah lou diu ahi.
Hitobang machun, khangdong ho chu limgeh cha-a hingdin tilkhouvin.
Chule nangma tah jong imalam jousea amahon thilpha bolna lama avettoh a ajui nadingun um'in.
Thutah chu hilin, chutileh nathuhil chu adem thei lou dingu ahi. Chuteng eiho dem'a pang hochu jahchauva chule ichunguva seiding ima aneilou dingu ahi.
Sohho chun apakaihou thuphat jousea angai jing dingu chule ajochan uva alunglhaisah diu ahi. Amahon nelkal dauhen,
ahilouleh guhchat bol dauhen, amavang imalam jouseah ginchat theile apha ahinau vetsah uhen. Chuteng eihuhhing uva Pathen chungchang a kithuhilna chu dei umtah asodoh dingu ahi.
Ajehchu Pathen mihepina hung kilah-a mijouse huhhing na chu ahinlhut ahitai.
Chuleh eiho Pathen ngaisah lou nale chonset nopsahna a kona kiheimang dinga kihilchah ihiuve. Hiche gitlouna leiset a hi lunglima, chondihna a chule Pathen ngaisahna neiya ikhosah dingu ahi,
chutia kinep umtah chuche nikho loupitah Pathen hatchungnung le eihuhhing uva Jesu Christa loupina hung kilah ding ni chu katjinga um ihiu ahi.
Aman chonsetna jousea kon eisoptheng diu, i-onthol nadiu, chule ama mitea eisem uva napha tong dinga apumpia kiphaltheng ihina ding uva ahinkho manbeiya eipeh u ahi.
Nangman hichengse hi nahil'a chule tahsan chate chun abol diuva natilkhou ding ahi. Angaikhoh dungjuiya nangman amaho suhdih na tha nanei ahi, hijeh chun koimacha nathusei nahsahmo bolsah hihhel in.
Tahsan chate chu solkal le avaipoho thunoiya umdingin geldohsah in. Amaho chu seingai, thilpha boldia phat jousea kigosadema umjing hidiu ahi.
Amahon mi seisetle kinah abollou diu ahi. Chusanga nunnem nale kineosahna dihtah chu mijouse avetsah diu ahi.
Eihojong, khatvei chu, lungthimbei le seingailou inahiu ahi. Eiho lamdihlou lama puilonlea inaum uva chule tahsa lungngaichat le nomsahna tamtah soh a inaum'u ahi. Ihinkhou chu gitlouna le kithangsetto naa dima, chule khatle khat kihotoa ina umu ahi.
Ahinlah–“Eihuhhing uva Pathen chun amingailut nale khotona ahin tahlang phat chun,
aman eihuhhing tauve, eiho chonphat vang le natoh vang hilouvin amihepina vang'in. Aman ichonsetnau jouse asoptheng in, penthahna eipeuvin, Lhagao theng vang'in hinkhothah eipeuvin ahi.
Aman hongphal tah in Jesu Christa vang'in ichunguvah Lhagao theng chu abunglhan ahi.
Amihepina vang'in michonphan eisimun chule tonsot vangou lodia kisonna eipe tauve.”
Hichehi tahsan umtaha kisei ahi, chule nangman hiche thuhil hi hatah a nadopsang ding kadeiye chutia chu Pathen tahsan ho chun thilpha bolding agelkhoh nadingun. Hiche thuhil hohi pha a chule mijouse dinga phachomtah ahi.
Ngolhoi thua kihoulimna hole khanggui thua kinel bautam Judaho danthu dola kinah, hichenga kon chun kikhindoh in, hitiho chu phatchom nading ahipoi, phat mansah bep ahibouve.
Mihon nalah uva kibung khenna asemuleh, amaho chu khatvei nivei gihsal in. Akalse limsah tahih in.
Ajeh chu chutobang miho chu lamvaija chule chonsejia ahiuvin, amaho le amaho achonset nauvin themmo achan ahi.
Keman Artimas ahilouleh Tychichus nahenga kahin solgot ahi. Khat pen pen ahunglhun lhon tengleh Nicopolis a ahithei chan in kimupi ding neigon, ajeh chu, chukoma chu phalbi sungsea umdia kakigel lhah ahitai.
Dan thusun Zenas le Apollos chu akholjinna lhon'ah nabolthei chan'in kithopin. Angaichat lhon jouse bolpeh a aumna dingin vesuiyin.
Imiteu jong chun midang ngaichat khohtah tah neiho chunga thilpha bol na lamah kiha bol uhen, chutileh gasolouva umloudiu ahi.
Hikoma kaum khompi chengsen nasalamui. Lungsettah in, tahsan chate eingailuho jouse salam einapeh pih'un. Pathen mihepinan nabonchavin naumpi jing tauhen.
